331.Yasen(2): Reppuu... ...Those dazzling wings... Ah...! Even though they're my own planes, they left me mesmerized!
331.MVP: I was the... best one? ...Really? Ah... thank you very much! ...I'm so happy...
331.Damaged(3): Uu... I've been hit. It won't be possible for planes to take off now!
331.Sunk: Even though I'm sinking... I have... such a strange feeling... This time... I was able to... fight with everything... I had...
331.2@NewYears: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! It's an honor to be spending New Year's with you!
331.2@Anniversary: Admiral, today is an important day, right? Amagi is honored to be with you! Fufu, I'm happy.
331.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas to you, Admiral. The scenery at Hakodate and Kure will be beautiful tonight, I'm sure.

429.Intro:
Unryuu-class aircraft carrier, Amagi here!
Admiral, I'll be able to play an active role now!
429.Poke(3): Admiral, do you need to do something with my hangar? You're inspecting the brand new aircraft...? ...Are you really?
429.Married: Admiral, for giving me these wonderful planes... and now, for using me as a mainstay aircraft carrier... I truly cannot thank you enough! I'm so full of appreciation...!
429.Join: Reborn First Carrier Division, Amagi. Starting the sortie!
429.Battle: 601st Air Group, commencing takeoff! Now, let's begin!
429.MVP: *phew* ...I'm happy I was able to do this much in battle! Anyone can do it... if they put their mind to it!
429.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. For today, I, Amagi, will be the one notifying you of the time! Ah, yes! It'll be fine. I'll do my best!
429.H0100: The time is now 0100. Admiral, the fleet is so peaceful at night.
429.H0200: It's 0200. It's the time of Ushimitsu, Admiral. Does it scare me a little? No! It's no... problem... at... all... ...A... Admiral...? ...Where are...? Ah... Hwaa!?
429.H0300: It's... 0300. Admiral? Um... I'd like you to stop teasing me. You really surprised me. ...I-It's not like I was scared...
429.H0400: The time is now 0400. Admiral, this time of night is so sleep-inducing... ... ...I'll pull through!
429.H0500: It's 0500. The night has come to a close. Should I get ready to do the morning call?
429.H0600: 0600. Fleet, rise and shine! It's morning. Let's do our best again today!
429.H0700: It's 0700. Admiral, I'm sorry that it's so simple, but breakfast is ready right over here! To start with, there's miso soup with dashi stock...
429.H0800: It's 0800. Admiral? Did my breakfast suite your tastes? Ah... thank goodness. ...Then I'll put everything away. Fufu... ...thank goodness...
429.H0900: The time is now 0900. Admiral, it's about time for the fleet to sortie. What should we do for the main fleet's composition?
429.H1000: It's 1000. That's right, it makes me really happy that I'll be able to load aircraft! They're nice things to have... these planes.
429.H1100: It's 1100. It's about time to make lunch, isn't it? Admiral, is there anything you'd like to eat? What should we do...?
429.H1200: 1200. It's noon! Admiral, I tried making Japanese curry for lunch. Here's a big bowl for you to eat! There's even enough for seconds.
429.H1300: It's 1300. Wasn't my Japanese curry good? After all, it had dashi! On top of that, the potato starch's thickness was a strong point! Ufufu♪
429.H1400: The time is now 1400. Ah... Unryuu nee-sama! How are you feeling? Nee-sama, you're so beautiful these days... I want to be just like you!
429.H1500: It's 1500. Admiral, how about something sweet? I ordered some kuzumochi from Mamiya-san! Let's have some.
429.H1600: It's 1600. Admiral, if I train hard, will I be able to be like Hiryuu-san and Souryuu-san? ...Eh? You mean it...? Then, I will do my best!
429.H1700: It's 1700. Admiral, the sunset is beautiful, isn't it? ...Eh? I'm also...? Stop... what are you saying? ...Ah? Let's head back...? ...Let's do that...
429.H1800: The time is now 1800. Admiral, should I start making dinner? I'll show you my culinary skills! Please wait just a little while!
429.H1900: It's 1900. I tried making a Western-style dinner. It's katsuretsu. Now, help yourself. I've also made some corn soup.
429.H2000: It's 2000. Eh? You want to know if katsuretsu is different from tonkatsu, and what the difference is? Well, let's see... first of all, they're originally...
429.H2100: It's 2100, Admiral. So that's it— you mean my younger sister, Katsuragi? Yes... I believe we will meet again. I'd like to form a carrier division with her.
429.H2200: The time is now 2200. Night is so peacef- ...or maybe not so much. ...U-Um, shall I go and ask them to quiet down?
429.H2300: It's 2300. Admiral, thank you so much for your hard work today. Please get a good night's rest so that you won't get burned out, okay?

332.Intro:
Unryuu-class aircraft carrier, third ship Katsuragi here!
Eh? You called me a floating anti-air battery?
Y-You're way off...! What are you even talking about!?
332.Library:
Third ship of the Unryuu-class aircraft carriers, Katsuragi here! That's right— a standard carrier.

It looks like I was born a little late. But still, after the battle was over, I put everything I had into my work.

In a sense, I'm the best one. It's true, you know! It's really true!
332.Poke(1): I'm a standard carrier, you know. A standard carrier!
332.Poke(2): Give me your absolute best aircraft. Understand?
332.Poke(3): Ah- That's not my hanga- ...What are you doing, anyway!? What do you want, you idiot!!
332.Idle: I see, I see. So this is a Ryuusei Kai, huh? Mhm, mhm. I'd overheard people talking about it... But wait, isn't that a Reppuu? This is great! It's perfect for me! ...Eh?
332.Married: Admiral... Hey, if only these aircraft were supplied, I could... ...Eh... what? Even if you look at me with such gentle eyes, it's not... It's not getting you anywhere! Geez...

Wedding.1810: Can't you see that I'm kind of busy?
Wedding.4970: I have my hands full with these engines.
Wedding.6970: They need all kinds of maint-

332.Ranking: Right, right! Intelligence is absolutely vital! Shall we try confirming it together?
332.Join: Aircraft carrier Katsuragi, preparations complete! Starting the sortie!
332.Equip(1): Th... That equipment isn't too bad. Mm.
332.Equip(2): Alright...! I can fight with this! I'm really happy!
332.Equip(3): I'll give it all I've got.
332.Supply:
Thanks for the precious supplies.
Alright! I can head back out!
332.Docking(1): I'm entering the bath! You... don't you dare peek!
332.Docking(2): Uweh... this might take a little while... Sorry— I'm going into the bath... Y-You're dead if you peek!
332.Construction: A new force has joined up! I can't wait!
332.Return: Operation completed. The fleet has returned. Good work!
332.Sortie:
Task Force flagship, Katsuragi. I'm setting sail!
...! I've always wanted to say that!
332.Battle: Alright!!! Enemy fleet sighted! All operational aircraft, commence takeoff!
332.Attack: Enemy spotted! All AA guns... W-Wait, no... F-From the top!!! Bomber Squadron, Combat Air Patrol, prepare for takeoff!
332.Yasen(1): Pursuit, huh? Chasing too far is prohibited, but... sometimes you have to... Alright! Let's go!
332.Yasen(2):
Bomber Squadron, take off!
I-I'm... an aircraft carrier, after all!
332.MVP: Eh? Me? I was the best one? ...Ah... I-I see... Hmm...! ...Th-Thank you... ...I see...
332.Damaged(1): No way!? Is the flight deck safe? Prevent any secondary explosions! I don't want to sink!
332.Damaged(2): In a place like this... I, Katsuragi, am not going to sink! Attacks like that won't...!
332.Damaged(3): I took a hit... but... the engine room is still undamaged. Like this, sailing won't be a problem!
332.Sunk: I see... this is what sinking is like... It's cold... and... it's lonely... Bye-bye, everyone...
332.2@NewYears: Have a Happy New Year! I will try my hardest as a core member of the Task Force this year, too!
332.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, huh... I wonder if I can throw these beans at Unryuu-nee and Amagi-nee? Wait. Bad idea, bad idea!
332.2@Valentines: Chocolate... Do you want some? ...Mm... I guess I did make some, but are you sure...? ...I have no choice, so here!
332.2@Anniversary: I see. Today is an important day for us, right? It is for you, too... isn't it? Right?
332.2@Fall: Somehow... doesn't fall seem a bit melancholic...? In a way? Eh? Amagi-nee, you love the fall? Why?
332.2@Xmas: Christmas... huh... This atmosphere really isn't bad. This is champagne? I-I see...
332.2@YearsEnd: It's almost New Year's Eve. There's so much cleaning to do in my hangar, er... Hey! don't put your hands in there, you idiot!
332.2@WhiteDay: Of course, you are going to give me the return gift, right? Return for what you say? It's in return for those chocolates! THE chocolates!

430.Intro:
Aircraft carrier Katsuragi, present!
Feel free to watch what a genuine standard aircraft carrier is capable of!
430.Poke(1):
That's right, an aircraft carrier!
I'm a mainstay, a mainstay!
430.Poke(3): I told you! That's not my hangar! How many times do I... ...Mmh... I'm not letting you get away with it today!
430.Join: Aircraft carrier, Katsuragi! My air squadrons are flawless! I will show you the true power of the remodeled Hiryuu-class!!
430.Battle: Alright! Enemy fleet sighted! Here I go! Bomber Squadron, all operational aircraft commence takeoff!
430.MVP: Me again? My bad... I keep taking first place. Sorry!
430.H0000: Um... Today I, aircraft carrier Katsuragi, will act as your secretary ship. What? Got a problem with that? I can just barely spare some time for announcements. Barely!
430.H0100: It's 0100. Is that good? Are you listening? Ah, I see... Th-Then it's fine... Alright!
430.H0200: It's 0200! Hey, aren't you listening to the time announcements I'm doing!? Oh...? Really? Then I guess it's okay.
430.H0300: 0300... Now, look! You're clearly not listening! Just what have you been doing? ...Er, eh? ...Cooking?
430.H0400: It's 0400. What? You made a late-night snack? That's hot pot with udon... W-Well, thank you. Eh... it's good, but... w-what's this for?
430.H0500: 050- ...Eh? Compared to my sisters, the part that should stick out doesn't, and so I have to eat up...? ...! Now you've done it! Do you have any last words!?
430.H0600: It's 0600! *sigh* ...Seriously, just where the heck do you even look when you assess us? That place has nothing to do with our abilities... Honestly...
430.H0700: It's 0700. Telling someone off builds up an appetite. You, go make breakfast, alright? Isn't that fine? It's your punishment! Your punishment!
430.H0800: 0800! No way... the breakfast you made is... delicious! Who in the world did you learn it from!? ...Eh? Amagi-nee? S-Seriously?
430.H0900: It's 0900. I just never really wanted to! But still, when it comes to a carrier's abilities, cooking has nothing to do with it. To start with, a carrier is...!
430.H1000: It's 1000. Ah! Zuikaku-senpai!? As always, goodworkoutthere! *sigh* I was so nervous. After all, that was Zuikaku-san, the one I admire!
430.H1100: 1100! Eh? What? It's true. The one I admire is the one and only Zuikaku-san! She's so wonderful...! Her camouflage is so lovely! It even matches with mine!
430.H1200: 1200. It's already lunchtime!? What are you doing for lunch today? Going to Mamiya-san's? Or maybe... hmm...
430.H1300: 1300. Sometimes, it's nice to go somewhere outside the harbor! You get this sort of disembarking feeling♪ ...Ah! I-It's not like we're on a date or anything!
430.H1400: It's 1400. Geez, what kind of misunderstanding was that? You're such an idiot, really. ...But still, that Western-style place was really good... I wouldn't mind going there again!
430.H1500: 1500! Ah, Amagi-nee, how are you? Yeah, I'm doing great as always! Look! My flight deck and my rocket launcher, all perfectly maintained☆
430.H1600: It's 1600! Eh? What? Anti-air defense? That's my number one specialty! ...What? Show it to you right now? It's going to be really flashy♪
430.H1700: 1700. After all that, it's already evening... *sigh* Sorties and expeditions are... ugh... I-I'll get them done tomorrow!
430.H1800: 1800. It's already dinner time. Well... if you don't mind something basic, I'll go make it. Do salted rice balls, pickled radish, and a side of leaf miso soup sound okay?
430.H1900: It's 1900. So? How are my salted rice balls? Isn't the amount of salt perfect? That's right! Something like this takes a high degree of practice!
430.H2000: 2000. A-As for me, one day, I hope I can hit the open sea with the responsibility of Task Force flagship... ...I'm serious!
430.H2100: 2100. Then, what's your dream? I really want to hear it, okay? Huh? So that's it... Ehh... Hmmmm... ...So that's it...
430.H2200: It's 2200. Hehe... hm... ...Eh!? Am I in an unusually good mood...? N-Not at all! It's normal! It's-nor-mal! ...Ehehe♪
430.H2300: 2300. Well, it's just about closing time. You did a really good job! We have to get up early, so why don't we get some rest? Eh? We're not turning in!?

432.Intro: Guten Morgen. I am the aircraft carrier, Graf Zeppelin. You are the admiral overseeing this fleet, yes? Is that so? Roger.
432.Library: First of the Graf Zeppelin-class carriers, Graf Zeppelin. Capable of undertaking three-dimensional commerce raiding, I am a heavily armed and full-scale carrier. It seems that the technology used in the Japanese carrier, Akagi, was also referenced in my construction. A Japanese fleet, huh. I'm looking forward to it.
432.Poke(1): Am I to depart? So be it.
432.Poke(2): What is it? You seem to be concerned. These flight decks are continually being maintained by me, personally. There is no need to worry.
432.Poke(3): What is the meaning of this? This is not a custom of your fleet, is it? An explanation, if you please.
432.Idle: The Messerschmitt... it has a fine airframe. The Focke-Wulf is an extremely powerful fighter, too... Mm. This fleet's airframes as well... ...The a-admiral is also... rather good. N-No, not at all. I said nothing.
432.Married: Admiral? Is there something on your mind? I see. That's fine, then... If you wish to consult with me on commerce raiding... Actually, if there is anything at all, do not hesitate to talk to me about it. Feel free.

Wedding.2740: How may I, Graf Zeppelin, aid you?
Wedding.13770: It is a thing of beauty.

432.Ranking: Admiral? Ah, you wish to examine the latest intelligence? Roger.
432.Join: Aircraft carrier Graf Zeppelin, sortieing! Lichten des ankers!
432.Equip(1): Na gut. This is a fine plane. Hmm...
432.Equip(2): Oh...? This carrier-based plane... indeed... danke.
432.Supply: Resupply is vital at all times, no? This will help.
432.Docking(1): I shall briefly cleanse my rigging and myself. That is not a problem, is it?
432.Docking(2): Apologies. I have sustained heavy damage. Please allow me to enter the docks.
432.Construction: Hmm... a new ship? From this arsenal, many ships have been born. How lively.
432.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned. Yes, the operation is complete.
432.Sortie: Excellent. You may entrust this task force to me. Flagship Graf Zeppelin, setting sail.
432.Battle: We've spotted the enemy, have we? Wonderful. Bomber Squadron, depart at once! Break their formation!
432.Attack: Launch all capable planes! Hahaha! How thrilling.
432.Yasen(3): Allow me to demonstrate that I am no mere carrier.
432.Yasen(4): Haha...! A night battle, is it? So be it. I will show you that I, Graf Zeppelin, am no ordinary carrier. Fleet, follow after me. Pursue!
432.MVP: I, Graf Zeppelin, have brought you the greatest battle results? I see. Hmm...
432.Damaged(1): Ughh! What the...? A direct hit!?
432.Damaged(2): A hit? The flight deck? Suppress secondary explosions!
432.Damaged(3): Tch! They got me. And yet, my cannons still function! If it comes to a night battle... Admiral!
432.Sunk: I'm... sinking in a fleet battle... am I? Ha...hah...! So be it! ...Just what is... this feeling... ha... heheh...
432.2@Setsubun: So this is the Setzbühn tradition Eugen spoke of. It is certainly a strange tradition. Right! I shall try throwing some. Akagi, here I come! Prepare yourself!
432.2@Valentines: A chocolate exchange custom... That's not bad. The country of courtesy, indeed. ...R-Right... Admiral, this package is... Th-That's right, I am offering it to you!
432.2@Rainy: It has been raining quite a bit lately. I remember that it was at this time of year that they initially decided to halt my construction. It was infuriating. Ah, no. It's ancient history. Please forget it.
432.2@Summer: So this is what this country's summer is like? This so-called "watermon-splitting" fighting style is of interest to me. One day I must experience it.
432.2@Fall: Mm. The Autumn Festival? I've heard of it. In my country, we call it Oktoberfest. I shall look forward to it.
432.2@Saury: What...? Saury...? ...What is the meaning of this? The overall strategy behind this mission is truly baffling. Safeguard the fishing grounds... and... support... them? I see.... Wait, no. Wait, wait, wait.
432.2@Xmas: Admiral, this fleet also celebrates Christmas, I see. This stollen isn't bad at all. It was baked by a submarine from this country? Hmm... not bad.
432.2@YearsEnd: December, is it...? ...I was launched in December. How nostalgic. ...What? O-so-ji? Eh... you wish for me... to...?
432.2@Spring: So this is a sakura... Hm, it's beautiful. I see, it feels like I had understood something... something.
432.2@WhiteDay: Admiral. Is that...your return gift for the chocolate? D-danke. Danke...
432.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations, Admiral. I'm honoured to be able to spend this special time with you. Yes.

353.Intro: Guten morgen. Aircraft carrier Graf Zeppelin, reporting for duty. Admiral, I shall rely on you for today.
353.Equip(2): While the Focke-Wulf has a fine airframe, this is also... danke.
353.Yasen(3): Haha...! A night battle, is it?
353.MVP: Deploying the Graf Zeppelin to a real battle... Was this not the natural result, Admiral?
353.H0000: Guten Abend. Admiral, I will be serving as your secretary ship for today. Entrust this duty to me. ...Right.
353.H0100: 01...0-0. This will do, yes? Leave it in my hands. There will be no issues.
353.H0200: 02...0-0. Hmm... flawless. Admiral. Admiral? Are there any further tasks for me? As your secretary ship, expect nothing but the best.
353.H0300: 03...0-0. Understood! You desire coffee, yes? Entrust it to me. Prepare to taste the most supreme of coffees. I am quite confident when it comes to the aroma and flavor of coffee.
353.H0400: 04...0-0. How is it? This is authentic German coffee. Ah! First, you should enjoy the aroma thoroughly, and after that... *sigh* It doesn't matter. Please, go ahead.
353.H0500: 05...0-0. It's morning now, Admiral. Why don't you go ahead and take a shower? I will support you with the work here.
353.H0600: Guten Morgen. 06...0-0. Admiral, what would you prefer to do for breakfast? If you are fine with something simple, I will prepare it for you.
353.H0700: 07...0-0. Admiral, I made a kaiser roll, cheese, ham and hot coffee. I will place them here. Partake of them when you have a moment.
353.H0800: 08...0-0. Now then, our work awaits. Let us commence today's fleet operations. What shall we do? To start with, how about combat drills with Akagi?
353.H0900: 09...0-0. "Akagi". "Kaga". So they are this country's frontline standard carriers. They do not have any catapults. Nor do I see a main battery...
353.H1000: 10...0-0. Those aircraft bear a resemblance to my Messerschmitt. Are those not carrier-based aircraft? I assume they are from the air force. What? They are not?
353.H1100: 11...0-0. It is nearly lunchtime. Admiral, what do you intend to do for lunch? What? "Mamiya", you say? I have heard the rumors. Oh...?
353.H1200: 12...0-0. Oh...? So this is "Mamiya". The menu... has variety. Admiral, what is your recommendation? Curry, you say? Right! I shall order it.
353.H1300: 13...0-0. The curry from lunch was quite a memorable dish. So the fleet here is able to have that every day, yes? I see. Hmm....
353.H1400: 14...0... Ah, Bismarck, you are stationed here as well. I am still new to the area— please teach me all you know. Ah... that... will do for now.
353.H1500: 15...0-0. This country has a unique culture. Admiral, I will diligently study as much of it as I am able, just as that U-boat has done.
353.H1600: 16...0-0. So these are... "Shoukaku" and "Zuikaku". They are quite the sight. So they are the "final form" of this country's carriers... Hmmm...
353.H1700: 17...0-0. The sun is setting. The setting sun is beautiful no matter the sea you are in. Admiral, what is it? Is there something on my face?
353.H1800: 18...0-0. For dinner today... ah, I have been invited to a "standard-carrier-banquet"... Admiral, would you like to join me?
353.H1900: 19...0-0. Ah, Akagi. My gratitude for inviting me to the dinner banquet this evening. Danke. What... is that? "Hot pot", you say? Such an unusual cuisine.
353.H2000: 20...0-0. "Hot pot"... Is this similar to a pot-au-feu? Why is everyone surrounding the hot pot? Taihou, teach me. How should I eat it?
353.H2100: 21...0-0. That was a strange banquet. However... mm, I found it quite enjoyable. Admiral, this fleet is... I believe I will enjoy it here.
353.H2200: 22...0-0. Admiral, the evening has advanced to night. Now then, let us begin drawing today's work to a close. Shall I make some coffee?
353.H2300: 23...0-0. Admiral, today was quite a day, yes? Let us work hard tomorrow as well. Gute nacht.

444.Intro: Buon giornov! I'm the aircraft carrier from the Mediterranean, Aquila! I'm ready for service... supposedly♪ Please look forward to it!
444.Library: Built in the Mediterranean at Genoa, the aircraft carrier from the land of pasta, it's Aquila! I'm a carrier converted from a passenger liner, but it was a large-scale conversion, so my specs should be in line with a proper carrier's... ...supposedly. Right, Graf, Akagi? ...Aren't you listening!?
444.Poke(1): That's right— I'm Aquila. Did you remember?
444.Poke(2): Is it my turn now? Certainly. The sortie... when is it?
444.Poke(3): Graf, what is it? ...Oh, my. Admiral? You've taken an interest in me? No problem. Ask me anything you waaant.
444.Idle: Good, good. With these planes, on the next sortie, Akagi and Graf won't be able to be so big-headed! Good, good! Next time for sure! Next time for sure!
444.Married: Admiral? What's wrong? You're looking a little bit tired... I know! How about if I there-there you? Now look, step right over here. There, there. There, theeere. ...Feeling better?

Wedding.0:
Admiral!
Is this a present for me?
Wedding.11980,14708: I'm going to show off to Graf!

444.Ranking: Oh, my. The intelligence, right? I'll go get it for you. And here you are.
444.Join: Aircraft carrier, Aquila, sortieing! Carriers of Japan, follow me! Just kidding... a-ouch...!
444.Equip(1): My, what a cute plane. Admiral, grazie.
444.Equip(2): This equipment is also nice. Now I can enter active service. Good, good.
444.Docking(1): Mukyukyu... My clothes are a little bit dirty... Admiral, I'll take a short break, okay?
444.Docking(2): Mugyugyugyu... There's a big hole in my flight deck... Admiral, I'll have to take a short holiday.
444.Construction: Admiral, it looks like a new ship is completed.
444.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned! Everyone is safe! That's the important part♪ *phew* Good, good.
444.Sortie: Good, good. My rigging and planes are just perfect! Task force flagshiiip, Aquila, setting saaail!
444.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted! Good, good. Let's launch the planes! Bow to windward. Let's do this!
444.Attack: All Bomber Squadron aircraft, to the catapult! Continuous launch. Quickly, now~!
444.Yasen(1): A night battle, is it? If Graf can do it, then so can I! Surely I can. All ships, form up behind me! Attaaaack!
444.Yasen(2): So this is an air battle? Good, good. Aquila Carrier Air Group, go~!
444.MVP: My, Admiral, I played the biggest part? Grazie! Good, good.
444.Damaged(1): Ahhh! It hurts! It really hurts!
444.Damaged(2): I said no! You can't hit me there...!
444.Damaged(3): *sigh* The deck has a big hole in it... and the catapult is all bent up. This is bad... bad, bad!
444.Sunk: I'll... only come this far...? But... this time... since it's in the middle of the sea... is... this fine...?
444.2@NewYears: Admiral? Best wishes for the coming year! Buon Anno. Shall we have another good, good kind of year?
444.2@Setsubun: Roma, where did you get this "Setsubunga" from exactly? Especially the "ga" part. Eh? The admiral said it? Really?
444.2@Fall: In autumn, there are so many delicious looking foods~ Admiral, look. Umm... that Autumn Festival stall looks delicious! Wow! Zara has her own pasta stall, too! Fuuu~
444.2@Saury: Sanma...? I've never heard of that fish... Is it for a Japanese festival? Hmm, hmm... so we're supporting the fishermen! Ro-ger-that♪
444.2@Xmas:
Buone Feste. Admiral, here's my Christmas present to you♪
...There! Thank goodness! It suits you♪
444.2@Spring: So this is Japan's springtime. Flower viewing is fun, isn't it? I'm looking forward to Zara's cooking too. I like this season.
444.2@Rainy: Raining today too, this is Japan's "Tsuyu" right? Aquila wants to make a teru teru bo too! Ah, Libe! Teach me please! Huh? This is... different than I expected...
444.2@EarlySummer: It's gotten a bit hotter huh~ Summer is coming right? Japan's four seasons are fun!
444.2@Anniversary2018: Did you hear, Admiral, that it's the 5th Anniversary? There, there... There, there... There, there, there, there!
444.2@Valentines2019: Admiral, here is my Mediterranean-style Genovese chocolate for you. Yes, it's my own secret recipe. I haven't even tasted it yet.

365.Friend45(1): Now, it's time for my planes to go on a real sortie.
365.H0000: As of now, the time is midnight. Buona sera! Admiral? For today, I'll be assigned as your secretary ship.
365.H0100: 01♪00♪ Admiral? See? I'm perfect for announcing the time!
365.H0200: 02... umm... 00! Good, good! That was flawless!
365.H0300: 02... No, that's wrong. I know this... umm... 0... 3! 00. *phew* That was close.
365.H0400: 03... no... 4... 00 ...*phew* Ah, Admiral? That means... it'll be morning soon.
365.H0500: Um... tre, quatro, so it should be... ah! It's 05! 0500. Good, good.
365.H0600: 0600! Admiral, buon giorno! It's morning. Morning is here!
365.H0700: 0700. Admiral, who is going to make breakfast? Eh? I will? ...Well, hold on... could I be dismissed a bit early today...?
365.H0800: 0800. Ah, Admiral, excuse me. This is the breakfast you had me make. *slurp* Mm... This miso soup is really delicious!
365.H0900: 0900. About the breakfast you and I had— other than the natto, I really enjoyed it. I'm looking forward to breakfast tomorrow! Good, good... A-ouch!
365.H1000: 1000. So, Admiral, what will we start with today? Naturally, it should be exercises with the task force, right? I'll do my best♪
365.H1100: 1100. Admiral, this is bad! It'll be lunch soon! Who is going to be the one to make lunch...?
365.H1200: 12... *sniff* *sniff* That smells good! This smell is... ah! Zara! You're letting people try your brand new pasta? My, today is very rosso! Grazie!
365.H1300: Admiral? Isn't this pasta delicious, with its balance of tomato and garlic? *phew* It's 1300♪
365.H1400: 14... My, Akagi! Eh? There's something on my cheek? Ah... a piece of tomato from today's pasta... Ufufu... yes, it was delicious.
365.H1500: 1500. It must be nice to be able to carry as many planes as Akagi, huh? Admiral, if I practice hard enough and finally get remodelled, can I be like that?
365.H1600: 16... Ah, Graf. How are you feeling? Eh? I'm always in perfect form. Right, Admiral? ...Huh? Admiral?
365.H1700: 1700. Admiral? The sunsets here are so beautiful. The sunsets at Genoa in the Mediterranean are pretty, too. Would you like to go there with me sometime?
365.H1800: 1800. Dinner is... Ah, Admiral, that's so like you. So we're eating out. Could it be... at the reputed trattoria Mamiya?
365.H1900: 1900. This is... ...and this, too! They're so delicious! This reputed trattoria Mamiya... simply amazing! ...Ah, seconds, please.
365.H2000: *nom* Mm. 2000. *phew* Ah... Italia! Roma! Good evening. Oh... who is the noisy heavy cruiser over there? I feel like I've seen her before...
365.H2100: 2100. My, isn't that Pola? Hey, she's stripping! Ah, it's Zara! Ah... she's getting angrier and angrier. Uh-oh.
365.H2200: 2200. Admiral, you must be exhausted from all the hard work today. You'll take it easy and relax tonight, won't you? Huh? Now it's the light cruisers who are acting up!
365.H2300: 2300. Admiral, buona notte! Good night~ See you tomorrow.

433.Intro: Hello~! Aircraft carrier Saratoga here. Admiral, please call me Sara. It's a pleasure to meet you.
433.Library:
Hello~! American-born aircraft carrier, Saratoga here.

My name comes from a major historical event. During the great war, I fought hard from the beginning to the very end. After the war, I was involved in a certain experiment with Nagato-san and the others.

From now on, I'll be in the same fleet as you, so I intend to fight hard with everyone!
433.Poke(3):
Admiral, I just ran maintenance on this Wildcat.
Can this wait, please? If you don't mind.
433.Idle: Yup! With this, the planes won't have any issues! There's quite a lot of them, so this is pretty tough. Oh, Nagato! Hi! Eh...? You're going to do exercises now? Sorry about this, but I have other duties to perform for today. Maybe next time!
433.Married: Admiral? Are you feeling worn out? I can go make you tea or anything else that will get you going again. Eh? Bread? I'm not so good at making that... although on the other hand, I am pretty good at making cakes. I'll bake one for you. Please wait a bit, okay?

Wedding.8430: Is it okay if I open it?

Somehow... I feel a little guilty for this.

438.Intro: Hello~! Aircraft carrier Saratoga here. I've been improved, with an enhanced rigging and planes! Let's do our best together from now on!

Can this wait, please? If you don't mind.

438.H0200: 2 o'clock. Yes, I'm doing fine. Admiral, aren't you tired?

438.H0500: 5 o'clock. The sunrise is... so beautiful...!

438.H0700: 7 o'clock. I made breakfast for you this morning. Are scrambled eggs fine with you? There's coffee over here.
438.H0800: 8 o'clock. After I finish cleaning up, I need to service my planes. They're all good little girls.

438.H1100: 11 o'clock. Kaga-san, that's just like you. The Japanese Task Force mustn't be underestimated. I'll have to work harder from now on!
438.H1200: It is noon. Admiral, what are you doing for lunch? I can throw together a simple sandwich real quick for you if you'd like. Okay? Ufu... just a moment.
438.H1300: 1 o'clock. Here— I hope you like it. A turkey salad sandwich. Please give it a try!
438.H1400: 2 o'clock. Admiral, what did you think of my turkey salad sandwich? Did it suit your tastes? Ahh... really!? ...! Thank goodness...!
438.H1500: 3 o'clock. Whew... I'm a little tired. Huh? No! I'm totally fine!
438.H1600: 4 o'c- ...Oh... Hey, Akagi-san! How are you? Ufu... I see. That's great! It's the same with me. Ufufu♪
438.H1700: 5 o'clock. Admiral, the sunset overlooking the sea is breathtaking. So beautiful!
438.H1800: 6 o'clock. What would you like for dinner? Eh? You will...? No, it's fine. Leave dinner to me as well! I'll do my best!
438.H1900: 7 o'clock. Here. Thanks for waiting! It's New Jersey-style beefsteak. Please have some! Here— have a beer to go with it!
438.H2000: 8 o'clock. Admiral? Did it fill you up? Oh? Glad to hear it. There's a dessert as well. Here— it's my special ice cream made with corn syrup. Please have some! Now, don't hold back, okay?
438.H2100: 9 o'clock. Oh, Iowa! Such a rare sighting. You're alone? After I finish work, did you want to do something for a bit? Yeah, that's okay. Wait a bit, then!
438.H2200: 10 o'clock. Admiral, what is it? Eh? You want to come along as well? Of course! That'd be great! That's right, why don't we invite Kaga-san and the others as well? Eh? We can do that next time...?
438.H2300: 11 o'clock. Admiral, thanks for your hard work today! Well, let's go meet up with Iowa and then let's go for a drink!

549.Intro: Hi! I'm the 5th ship of the Essex-class carriers, Intrepid! So you're the Admiral then? Wonderful! Now then, let's get going! That's fine, right?

Even after the war ended, I was modernized, becoming one of the pioneers of modern carriers with an angled deck and more. After I was decommissioned, I was turned into a Sea, Air, and Space Museum on the Hudson River.

549.2@WhiteDay2019: In return for the chocolates? Wonderful! I'm opening it. ...Oh my, it looks delicious! *Nom*... Mmmm, thank you!

397.Friend44(1): Shall we attack at full force?

397.H0200: 2 o'clock! 02, 00! How's that? Perfect, right? Yep, good!

397.H0700: 07, 00! Here's your breakfast! Is coffee alright for your drink? Got it! Careful, it's hot.

397.H0900: 09, 00! Come on, let's give it a go! To the sea now! Weigh Anchor! Nnnngh! The sea is really great. Wonderful!

397.H1100: 11, 00! I'm not too familiar with them, but they're wonderful Japanese aircraft carriers! Mhm, they seem great, good!
397.H1200: 12, 00! Lunchtime! Don't worry, I got some sandwiches from Sara! Oh my, wonderful, turkey sandwiches? Thanks - for - the meal!
397.H1300: 13... Ah, Zuikaku! How are you? Hm? Why the glare? Angry? Why are you always in a huff, Zuikaku? You're so cute, don't let that go to waste.
397.H1400: 140- Shoukaku!? About your younger sister... A-ah, there's no need to be so polite - ah, no, that's not what I meant! No, I just want...I just want to get along with her!
397.H1500: 15, 00! Phantom? Skyhawk? Indeed, they're good planes. They're multi-purpose planes.  Yes! Ah, right, they're called "Fu-shiki" here, right? "Fu-shiki", huh.
397.H1600: 16, 00! Ahh, Kongou sisters! Hey, how you doing? Good! Fine, thank you!
397.H1700: 17, 00! The sunset is... beautiful. Hm? That silhouette is... the Yamato-class? So... so beautiful!
397.H1800: 18, 00! Alright, how 'bout I make dinner tonight? Don't worry, sit, sit! Leave it to me!
397.H1900: 19, 00! Thanks for waiting! How's this? An authentic New York cut steak! Made Manhattan-style, you see! Go ahead, eat up!
397.H2000: 20, 00! How was it? Delicious? Mm, good! We're proud of our steaks in Manhattan, you see. And definitely our Tomcats and Phantoms too!
397.H2100: Harrier and MiG, and even a Kfir! It's like Area 8- *cough cough* right? Feel free to stop by! Ah, sorry, the current time in Japan is 21, 00!
397.H2200: 22, 00! Pretty tired from all that happened today, but I'll still work hard tomorrow! Good night!
397.H2300: 23, 00! Hm? Admiral? Can't fall asleep? Me too, actually! Wanna get up and get a drink? Aha, sounds great, let's go! I'll get changed!

393.Friend42(1): The Home Fleet has arrived! Come, I'll show you! Let's go! Follow me, Nelson!
393.H0000: Admiral. That's right, I'll be in charge of this today. Oh? What is it? Don't tell me you're unhappy with that?
393.H0200: It's 2. ...What!? Could it be that something about this leaves you dissatisified?
393.H0300: It's 3. So I see. That's fine, then. Sorry. I should not have doubted you, Admiral. So that was it...
393.H0400: It's 4. So it's almost morning. I'll put on some black tea. Are you fine with Darjeeling? Alright.
393.H0500: Good morning, Admiral. It's 5. I don't really like mornings, but... the mornings here are nice.
393.H0600: It's 6. Good morning! ...The fleet? All hands, arise! Alright, I've got it now.
393.H0700: It's 7. Breakfast is toast with mushrooms, tomatoes and baked beans, hashed brown with black pudding, and... How would you like your eggs?
393.H0800: It's 8. Alright, it's almost time to begin fleet sortie preparations, right? ...Oh...? W- ...W-Wait... That's....

393.H1000: It's 10. ...What...? ...I'm wrong? ...I-type? It's a friendly I-type submarine, you say? I... I see. Now that you mention it, I do see the difference. So... So that's it...
393.H1100: It's 11! Wait a minute, what about her? Isn't she a U- ...What? She's a Ro-type from our fleet, you say? What... on earth...?
393.H1200: It is noon. I've worked up an appetite after all the little surprises around every corner. No, it's fine. I brought some sandwiches along just for this occasion. Warspite made them. Come on, let's eat!
393.H1300: It's 1. Weren't the sandwiches delicious? That Warspite is pretty skilled with her hands. Is that so? Alright, I'll ask her to do it again next time.
393.H1400: It's 2. Isn't that...? Isn't that Bismarck!? Did she also come here to join up with us? So she's an ally! Oi! Oiii~! ...Ah! Why is she running away!? Wait!
393.H1500: It's 3. Oi, Bismarck. Why are you running away? I've no choice— Swordfish Squadron, take off! Stop her in her tracks! Go on!
393.H1600: It's 4... She got away this time. That Kraut... I just wanted to ask her in person to be my accompanying ship. How rude... Well, fine.
393.H1700: It's 5. The sunset, huh? I like the sunsets here. Sunsets in the Mediterranean were very beautiful... However... even here... they're beautiful.
393.H1800: It's 6. Actually, Hiryuu and Souryuu invited me out for dinner this evening. Let's go together. It seems to be a pub. If I recall, it was "Mamiya".
393.H1900: It'sh 7. Thish ish delishious! Shoryhuu, what dish ish thish? Chicken? Ohhh, so it's turkey. Ohhh... ...And this is? Curry? Ah, Indian food?
393.H2000: It'sh 8. Hiryhuu, evehn if it'sh delishioush, arhen't yhou eatihng a biht too much? Oh... ...This isn't a problem since you get so much exercise? Is that so? That's great!
393.H2100: It's 9. That was delicious, but I ate a bit too much. That Hiryuu girl was amazing. I won't be following her example, though. Ah, look over there— the Italian girls are out making a fuss. Shall I go tell them to keep it down? ...Are you sure?
393.H2200: It's 10. In this fleet, the torpedo squadrons get really active at night. ...Are they hunter-killers? ...What? Was I wrong? ...Then what are those girls doing?
393.H2300: It's 11. Admiral? You worked hard today. Please get some rest. Good night. Sleep well.

521.Intro:
I am the converted aircraft carrier known as Kasuga Maru.
I may be inadequate, but I want to fulfill my duty.
521.Library:
Converted aircraft carrier, Kasuga Maru here.

I was a passenger ship built under the Superior Shipbuilding Subsidy Program, but I was remodeled into a carrier in order to face battle.

After I was done transporting aircraft, my name was changed to Taiyou, and I was reassigned to naval escort duties.

The submarines at night... are scary...
521.Poke(3): Ah... this little one? She's Type 96-san. She's... become a little attached to me... Do you want to touch her?
521.Idle: I'll need to thoroughly maintain these little ones...! ... ...Ah... Admiral, what's the matter? Ah, these little ones? Aren't they such good girls? They've been getting a little better at detecting submarines. Isn't raising them fun?

Wedding.0: Um... did you call for me, Admiral?
Wedding.18420: You wanted me for something else?

521.Married: Admiral, what's the matter? A dream about enemy submarines? We can't have that. If you'd like, you can have a little rest on my lap. ...I'll give you a pleasant dream. I'll... make sure of it. Ah, just tea is fine? Okay.

A new carrier aircraft... Compared to the Type 96 Fighter, it's... Ah...!

521.Sunk: ...! I'm listing... Water is... So much...! Water is... flooding... inside... Everyone... I'm so sorry...!

Aircraft carrier, Taiyou here.

526.H0000: I'll be the secretary today Admiral. I'll be in your care.

526.H0500: 0500. Acknowledged. Please leave the breakfast preparations to me. I'm actually... good at cooking.

526.H1400: 140... Ah, good afternoon Hayasui-san. Yes, I'm doing fine. Look at all these girls...
526.H1500: 1500. Ah, Hibiki-san. Eh, that's not your name anymore? That's a stylish name. Ah, Chuuyou-san? Yes, I believe we'll meet again soon.
526.H1600: 1600. That's right, we three sisters were scattered around the world in the end.
526.H1700: 1700. The day is almost over. The night's... sea is scary...
526.H1800: 1800. The day is over. Can you come a bit closer Admiral?
526.H1900: 1900. I'll go concentrate on making dinner for a change of pace. I haven't tried making a dinner course in a while.
526.H2000: 2000. I won't lose to Yamato and the others! How is it? I made a special dinner course my mixing ingredients. Please dig in!
526.H2100: 2100... Somehow washing dishes is fun... Ehe, It's... nostalgic... Huh? Tears? Huh, strange...
526.H2200: 2200. Sorry Admiral. Thank you. I'm fine now.
526.H2300: 2300. Thank you for your hard work today Admiral. Please get some rest. See... see you tomorrow...

534.Intro: Guten Tag...I-I mean...hello...my name's Shinyou...I'm an aircraft carrier...I'm sorry...I'm still getting used to things... but, I'll do my best.
534.Library: I'm the aircraft carrier Shinyou. I was hiding in Kobe as a German passenger ship...I wasn't able to return to my country. I was then given to the Japanese navy, and was reformed into an aircraft carrier. I was deployed on ASW missions as part of the Maritime Escort Division to protect convoy routes. I wanted to take revenge on the enemies for my sisters, but... I.. I hate the night sea...it's scary!
534.Poke(2): Um, Admiral...I'm not doing it wrong...correct?
534.Poke(3): I'm Scharnhors...t...I mean...Shinyou. Yes, you write the symbol for "god" and "eagle" and that reads "Shinyou." I'm sorry that I'm still getting used to things. I'll do my best getting used to around here.
534.Idle: Kobe...was a great city...I couldn't move an inch at the time...but now...no...one day I'll be a passenger ship...again!
534.Married: Um...is Kobe Beef...oh, I've never had it... Um, the one heavy cruiser said she liked it...sounds nice...one day when it becomes peaceful...I would like to try it...as well.
534.Wedding: Did you call, Admiral? Ah, um, I um...ah...yes! The Maritime Escort Division...has been gradually getting...eh? It's not about that...? Um...what is that box...?
534.Ranking: Um...I'll bring it over. Is this what you needed?
534.Join: Marine escort corps, aircraft carrier Shinyou...ready to sortie.
534.Docking(2): I...I'm sorry. I'll try...I'll try...to heal up quickly...

534.Attack: Please begin the attack, my air wing.
534.Yasen(2): I'm counting... on you, my air wing.
534.MVP: I, um...thank you...very much. I'm glad that I was helpful...I, Shinyou, am very happy...I'm glad...
534.Damaged(3): No! Fire? If that ignites my fuel...ahh!
534.Sunk: I'm sinking...I'm sinking...again? It's dark...the sea...I'm scared...I'm sc...a...

381.Intro: Guten! I mean, good morning, Admiral. Aircraft carrier Shinyou reporting in...I'm sorry I'm still getting used to things... but, I'll do my best today as well.
381.Poke(1): Yes. Aircraft carrier Shinyou, ready for deployment.

381.Equip(2): Um, danke! I mean, thank you very much.

381.H0500: 0500. Look, Admiral! The sun's rising! Look, it's becoming brighter...phew...
381.H0600: 0600. It's...morning! I'll go and assemble the fleet. It's morning, everyone!

381.H0800: 0800. Would you like some more coffee? Here, it's hot...Ehe, I'm glad...
381.H0900: 0900. I was remembering the past... Yes, I enjoy cooking and serving. I-I'm sorry.

381.H1100: 1100. Sado-san! Looks like you're doing well! Have a wonderful day.
381.H1200: 1200. I've prepared lunch, Admiral. I've made sausage, potatoes, and baked German bread...here. Ah, was this too much?
381.H1300: 1300. Was lunch too much for you? Although, you ate all of this...I'm...very happy.
381.H1400: 1400. Daitou-san! Looks like you're doing well today! Yes, I'll do my best as well.
381.H1500: 150...ah! Etorofu-san! Good work. Yes, I'm doing well. I'm very happy right now.
381.H1600: 1600. Admiral, it's almost evening...it's almost...night time. I...don't like...the night...
381.H1700: 1700. The sunset...it's beautiful, but the color looks sad to me. A lonely color...
381.H1800: 1800. The sun has set...it's night...time...ah...I need to prepare supper...I'm...sorry.
381.H1900: 1900. Admiral, I've prepared supper. Don't worry! It's not German style, but it's a dinner that I've prepared while I was a passenger ship...please...help yourself.
381.H2000: 2000. The sea, the night sea... I'll be on the lookout.
381.H2100: 2100. I'll need to be on the lookout for enemy submarines...
381.H2200: 2200. Admiral...warm...this place is safe right? Is it alright not to worry...? ...yes...
381.H2300: 2300. Thank you, Admiral...I...thank you very much...I'm, alright now...

184.Intro: Good day, I'm Submarine Tender Taigei. I may be inexperienced, but I am glad to be of service.
184.Library: I'm Submarine Tender Taigei. I serve as flagship of submarine fleets in order to support operations through supplies and usage of scout planes. I have also been designed as a carrier backup to be converted if it is needed. I'll do my best!

184.Married: Aren't you a little tired, Admiral? As I am a Submarine Tender, I am quite confident in my livability.

Wedding.1590: I thank you from the bottom of my heart for raising me in my default form.
Wedding.9570: I will always, yes, always be thankful.

184.Ranking: Admiral? I see you're grasping the situation. It sure is important.

184.Sunk: Eh... I'm... sinking? So this is what it's like... to be in the water...

184.2@NewYears:
Ad~mi~ral~
Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I'll be counting on you again this year!
184.2@Setsubun: Well, it's Setsubun, so all the submarine girls are... Ow...! St-Stop it! Owww! Please, no more! Ahhh...! Stop it! I surrendered already~!
184.2@Valentines: Ad~mi~ral~♪ Here, this is Taigei's chocolate. I'd be happy if you would accept it. Ah- Thank you very much!
184.2@Hina: It's Hina Matsuri, the Hina dolls are so cute. Of course the Submarines are cute as...huh? The Hishimochi...that's strange...I was sure I...oh well, that's fine I guess.
184.2@EarlySummer: Ad-mi-ral. Eh? What's that? A swimsuit? I have one prepared, but... Eh? Right now? Please be patient until summer.
184.2@Summer: Ad-mi-ral. Um, I... put on the swimsuit. How do I look? U... um, please don't stare at me so much... hawaaa....
184.2@Fall: Ah, Shigure-san. Nice work out there. Eh, the fall bulge? That's true. Shigure-san should be fine, but I should be careful...
184.2@Saury: It's a fleet for saury fishing support? Orders received! Ah, Isokaze-san is also ready to go! Great!
184.2@Xmas: Ad-mi-ral♪ It's Christmas. I'll show you what I can do! If you have any cooking requests, please let me know, okay?
184.2@YearsEnd: Houshou-san, what are you doing? Oh right, it's time for the Naval Base End of the Year cleaning. I'll help too. Ah, yes! Sweeping comes first, right?
184.2@Spring: A flower viewing? Leave it to me! I'll pack a nice full stacked lunchbox alright? I wonder what those kids will like. Sounds like fun!
184.2@WhiteDay: Any chance this one is for me? Thank you very much! I will have it with great great cheer♪
184.2@LateFall2017: It's getting a bit colder. I hope that I don't catch a cold, Please make sure you stay warm too, Admiral.
184.2@Anniversary2018: Ad~ mi~ ra~ l~, congratulations! The fleet's 5th Anniversary is finally here! I congratulate you! I'll work hard on the food for the celebration.
184.3@Anniversary2019: Ad~ mi~ ra~ l~, congratulations. This spring, the fleet has marked a new page in it's history. I offer my sincerest thanks and congratulations.

185.Intro: Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender. I'll once again try my best as a carrier!
185.Library: Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender. My speed was not up to plan specifications as there were issues with changing the boilers, but I have an enhanced flight deck and armaments as this Light Carrier class. Carrier Ryuuhou, giving it her all!
185.Poke(2): Unfortunate...? Bad luck? Eh, me!? That's just not true!
185.Poke(3): Doolittle? Somehow, the word doesn't ring well with me... Don't do anything...? Huh...?
185.Idle: A-D-M-I-R-A-L~ Admiral! Um... is Carrier Task Force deploying? Ah, a short break... I-I see, right...
185.Married: Aren't you tired, Admiral? Want to take a quick nap on my flight deck? Please do!

Wedding.1620: I thank you from the bottom of my heart for raising me as a remodeled carrier.
Wedding.8770: I will always, yes, always be thankful.
Wedding.13140,20936: I'll always, always be part of the admiral's carrier task force!

185.Ranking: Admiral, what is the situation like? Is it okay?
185.Equip(2): With this, I won't lose to the enemy's planes!
185.Supply: Thank you for replenishing my planes!
185.Docking(1): I'll just be in the bath.
185.Docking(2): Apologies. This may be a long bath.
185.Construction: Seems like a new friend has come.

185.H0200: 0200. Admiral, are you sure you don't need to rest?
185.H0300: 0300. Geez, I'm starting to feel a little sleepy, too... I-I'm fine! Yawn...
185.H0400: 0400. D-don't worry! I've been keeping myself awake by counting the number of Tenzan in my hangar.
185.H0500: 0500. It's morning, Admiral! You're up early... don't tell me you stayed up all night...
185.H0600: 0600. What should we have for breakfast? I guess curry is a little too heavy for the morning...
185.H0700: 0700. Admiral, I tried making miso soup with fried eggs along with fried salmon fillets for breakfast. Dig in!
185.H0800: 0800. Now, let's get through the day with zeal! Right, Admiral?
185.H0900: 0900. I want to clean the base. I'm off to do some sweeping!
185.H1000: 1000. There sure is dust gathered. Give me a hand, Admiral. Here, hold this.
185.H1100: 1100. Cleaning sure makes you hungry. What shall we have for lunch?
185.H1200: 1200. Lunch today is Taige—er, I mean, Ryuuhou's specialty curry!
185.H1300: 1300. How was my specialty curry? The potato was good too, right?
185.H1400: 1400. Um, Admiral, it's time for the mobile squadron to- ah, not yet? Okay...
185.H1500: 1500. Admiral, it's now time for the carrier squadron to sortie, right? Right?
185.H1600: 1600. The seared sky sure is beautiful... it's already evening, huh.
185.H1700: 1700. Have to prepare dinner soon. What would you like, Admiral?
185.H1800: 1800. Since we had curry for lunch, I guess we should have something more exquisite...
185.H1900: 1900. Admiral, I tried making Fricandeau Beef. How is it?
185.H2000: 2000. How was the Fricandeau Beef? Hehe... great to hear!
185.H2100: 2100. Admiral, want to go draft up tomorrow's operation plans after we clean up?
185.H2200: 2200. Tomorrow WILL be the day when the mobile squadron get to sortie... Right, Admiral!?

185.2@NewYearsOld: Admiral? Ah, um... even a slow light aircraft carrier is still good enough for fighting, isn't it? Right? I have to believe in myself!
185.2@Setsubun: Well, it's Setsubun... I'm sure that since I've become an aircraft carrier, all those submarine girls are... ...Ow! Eh? Why me? Ow! Owowowow! G-Geez... come on, stop it! Why me!? Geez!
185.2@Saury: The fleet is going all-in for saury fishing support? Ryuuhou— orders received! Isokaze-san and Hamakaze-san, are you both ready to go?

318.Poke(2): Eh!? A sortie for the mobile squadron?
318.Poke(3): Geez! I'm not a transport, nor an anti-air cannon stand! I'm a carrier, a carrier you know!

182.Intro: I'm Repair ship Akashi. If you take a little damage, I can fix you up in the base. Just leave it to me!
182.Library: I'm Akashi, the only dedicated repair ship in the combined fleet. I was in charge of repairing ships damaged in the front lines when I was stationed in the Truk Anchorage. I supported the fleet from behind right up until the destruction of the Anchorage. Pleased to meet you.
182.Poke(2): Admiral, you need repairs? Have you been damaged somewhere?
182.Poke(3): It's dangerous, so don't touch my cranes... hey! That's even more dangerous!
182.Idle: Right... don't worry! I'm busy with things such as repairs and procuring new machinery! So don't worry! ... really...
182.Married: Admiral... you've gotta make sure you fix yourself up sometimes. Just leave the maintenance... to me, okay?

Wedding.3430: You want to process the ring in my factory?
Wedding.7280: Geez... I wonder who the lucky person is?

182.Ranking: Do you want to check the fleet's operational status, Admiral?
182.Equip(1): Now...this is what I call progress!
182.Equip(2): Now I can repair even more! Thank you so much!
182.Docking(1): I guess even I need maintenance once in a while...
182.Docking(2): Phew... what a blessing it is to have people washing my back. Thanks so much.
182.Construction: It seems like a new ship has been completed. Looking forward to it.
182.Return: The fleet has returned safely. Phew.

182.Yasen(1): A pursuit... w-what am I supposed to do about that!?
182.Yasen(2): It's not my forte, but here we go...!
182.MVP: Eh...EEEEEH!? M-me!? How did that happen...? Well, can't say I'm not happy...

182.Damaged(2): I'm hit...don't let the fire spread to the work machines!
182.Damaged(3): I...I was targetted!? I can't do a good repair job in this state!

182.2@Valentines: Admiral? Here, chocolate! For my return gift... some fancy sweets and raw materials would be nice!
182.2@Anniversary: Admiral, isn't today our anniversary? It's great, isn't it? Are you making anything to commemorate the occasion?
182.2@Rainy: It's the rainy season. The arsenal is going to rust.... I should run a good maintenance on it and oil the equipment.
182.2@EarlySummer: It's summer, isn't it! I want to wear a swimsuit, too! Admiral, you can buy me one! *sparkle* Ehe.
182.2@Fall: Fall has arrived. It's a season that gives you a bit of an appetite. Mamiya-san, we need you!
182.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas, Admiral! Maybe we should decorate the cranes with Christmas lights!
182.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, are there any return gifts? It's almost done? Ooyodo and I were looking forward to this y'know! Right?!
182.2@Summer2017: It's summer, huh. I want a fashionable swimsuit too. Admiral, it's fine for you to buy me one, you know? *sparkle*. Ehe~

187.Intro: Repair Ship Akashi, at your service! Leave the emergency maintenance at the base to me! I'll support the girls in the front lines!
187.Poke(2): Admiral... I really think you ought to be repaired a little too.
187.Battle: You have to wipe off.. the sprinkle of sparks!
187.Attack: Never have I thought that I would be using my weapons to hit the enemy fleet!
187.MVP: I've been under your debt, so take this as a token of my appreciation! My real job is repairs though!
187.H0000: 0000, Midnight... Shouldn't you be resting soon?
187.H0100: 0100. Aren't you sleepy after all? Eh? Me? I'm fine!
187.H0200: 0200. I've somehow remembered my time at Truk... I sure worked hard.
187.H0300: 0300. About Palau… I wonder why? I don't really remember much of it.
187.H0400: 0400. It's morning soon, yeah? Admiral? You sure you're fine with not sleeping tonight?
187.H0500: 0500. The sky is gradually getting brighter! It's a brand new day!
187.H0600: 0600. Admiral? What will you have for breakfast? It's not anywhere near Mamiya's level, but my cooking is unexpectedly good, you know?
187.H0700: 0700. It's morning, huh. Should we go and wake the sleepy heads up?
187.H0800: 0800, huh. Now! Time to get the repairs on!
187.H0900: 0900. Which ship would you like me to repair? …Eh!? It can't be… a sortie!?
187.H1000: 1000. …Admiral? For me, battles are a bit… ah… no… even if you load me with all these weapons…
187.H1100: 1100. You're too reckless, Admiral. It'll be hell if the work machines broke down!
187.H1200: 1200. It's afternoon! It's Akashi curry time! What do you say!?
187.H1300: 1300. I'll be doing the inspection of ship interior factory! There's quite a lot of it~
187.H1400: 1400. It's about time I dive fully into the afternoon repairs, okay?
187.H1500: 1500. Admiral? Don't you feel a little hungry now? Hmm?
187.H1600: 1600. Mamiya Monaka is really tasty, isn't it! I would like to make some in the ship too...
187.H1700: 1700. The sun will be setting soon. Oof… It's been tiring, yeah.
187.H1800: 1800. Do you want to eat out for dinner? Like the Yamato hotel, perhaps... just a joke, really.
187.H1900: 1900. I'm sorry it's only something simple, but dinner is ready!
187.H2000: 2000 I guess a full stomach really makes you sleepy, huh… Yaaawnn… Ah— I shouldn't!
187.H2100: 2100, huh. The day will be ending in three more hours. Thanks for the good work.
187.H2200: 2200 Nights at the anchorage sure is quiet, huh… It'll be nice if it stays like this…
187.H2300: 2300 Admiral? Thank you for your hard work for today!

161.Intro: I'm Akitsu Maru, sir. It is an honour to be part of this fleet, sir.
161.Library: I am the class-3 of Army's special transport 'Akitsu Maru', sir. Please leave transportation and landing combat to me, sir. My pride is this Daihatsu, sir. I'm different from the mouse and mole, sir.
161.Poke(1): Officer... I mean, Admiral. Is there something I can help with?
161.Poke(2): Admiral... I have noticed a certain peculiarity in this fleet's formation... is this one of your preferences...?
161.Poke(3): Admiral...! I'd rather you do this sort of thing with someone else...!
161.Idle: Admiral, I am aware that being on standby is part of my duties, but... after I've been assigned to this fleet I started to... feel a bit lonely, sir...
161.Married: Admiral, there are no ship daughters that you will never get a chance to meet. I can say this, for it is in this way that I, too, have managed to meet you…

Wedding.0: I thought that you had no concerns about me.
Wedding.3640: The strength of this feeling is connected...
Wedding.12820,16880: I would like to know more and more about you, sir.

161.Ranking: It is important to check reports regularly.
161.Equip(1): Hm, I see you are very thorough with the daily maintenance.
161.Docking(1): So this is the naval dockyard...
161.Docking(2): The naval dock... sure is great...
161.Construction: So this is the naval shipyard... Ah, the construction of a new ship has just been finished.
161.Return: The fleet has returned to base.
161.Sortie: Alright, let's defeat them and aim for success.
161.Battle: I have spotted an enemy fleet, sir!
161.Yasen(1): The Daihatsu, is it not firing up!?
161.Yasen(2): We're boarding in for a closer look, sir!
161.MVP: I still have a long way to go, sir. I am going to give my best, sir.
161.Damaged(3): Now I can face neither officer nor Admiral...!
161.Sunk: I didn't think... I would sink... in such a place...
161.H0100: 0100 hours. Hmm, are you unable to sleep?
161.H0200: 0200 hours. Will you be requiring a lullaby? That was a joke.
161.H0300: 0300 hours. Still drinking at a time like this...gah...
161.H0400: 0400 hours. Ah..did I just catch myself dropping off!?
161.H0500: 0500 hours. I cannot eat anymore... Eh!? Were you saying something?
161.H0600: 0600 hours. The morning air is quite fresh.
161.H0700: 0700 hours. You should not neglect sleep.
161.H0800: 0800 hours. I have seen to the admiral's schedule for today.
161.H0900: 0900 hours. Plan for today. First off, expeditions.
161.H1000: 1000 hours. A daily mission is fine too.
161.H1100: 1100 hours. This morning's mission is coming to an end. Let us do our best.
161.H1200: 1200 hours. Here is your lunch. It is army rations. It is good to try these things now and again.
161.H1300: 1300 hours. Admiral, did you find your lunch palatable? Your expression is hard to read.
161.H1400: 1400 hours. Such a large amount of resources!
161.H1500: 1500 hours. You could build a battleship with what you used for myself, yes?
161.H1600: 1600 hours. That was quite reckless Admiral. One such as I is specialised in amphibious operations. Now that you've spent so much I shall have to....what!?
161.H1700: 1700 hours. Admiral, land or sea which is it to be...
161.H1800: 1800 hours. Are you going to have dinner?
161.H1900: 1900 hours. Dusk has fallen. Naval Base is nice at night too.
161.H2000: 2000 hours. A submarine belonging to the land forces? I do not know. Maruyu!? Good gracious!
161.H2100: 2100 hours. We have an early start tomorrow. We should finish off for today soon.
161.H2200: 2200 hours. Thank you for all your hard work today, Admiral.
161.H2300: 2300 hours. I feel that we shall meet someone important tomorrow.
161.2@Anniversary3: Officer, or rather, Admiral— congratulations on our third anniversary, sir. I am humbly pleased about it, sir.
161.2@Rainy: It's the rainy season, sir. It has been raining all day, sir. Today I shall maintain my built-in Daihatsu, sir.
161.2@Saury: So this is the saury fishing support mission. I would also like to participate, however... Admiral-dono, is it even possible for me to load the proper equipment?
161.2@Cold: Admiral-dono. As for me, my body aches a bit at this time of year. Is there something that can be done? Well, I'm sure there's nothing to worry about.
161.2@Xmas: So this is what people refer to as Christmas, sir? Well, I find festivals from foreign countries very interesting, sir. Personally, I have no issues with them, sir.
161.2@Setsubun2019: It's Setsubun. This event is an important one. I will be sending out my Ka-type Squadrons out to collect the scattered beans.

166.Intro: I have enhanced myself for air combat potential, sir. I am now a carrier, sir.
166.Library: I am Akitsu Maru, of the Army's Hei class, sir. I was the pioneer of the modern amphibious assault vessel, able to operate new weapons such as auto-gyros, sir. We may not do so well in anti-submarine warfare. I most humbly look forward to working with you sir.
166.Poke(1): There are Ka-type and also fixed-wing aircraft, sir.
166.Poke(2): I have got caught up in this fleets atmosphere lately... I shall reflect on this, sir.
166.Poke(3): Admiral, you're touching my flight deck and... I would prefer it if you didn't touch the Ka-types, sir.
166.Ranking: Admiral, the liaison officer has arrived.
166.Join: Akitsu Maru, Daihatsu and Ka-types are ready to go.
166.Equip(1): Sir, I desire on full inspection of the Ka-types, sir.
166.Equip(2): The people in the factory are hard workers, sir.
166.Docking(1): I am getting quite familiar with this dock, sir.
166.Docking(2): Forgive me. I request to be repaired again, sir.

166.Battle: It's time for me, Akitsu Maru to unleash her evolved capability, sir!
166.Attack: Now, fellow Ka-type Autogyros, move out!
166.Yasen(1): Hmhmhm, I have good night vision.
166.Yasen(2): I won't allow submarines to get close...I think!
166.MVP: My flight deck has been useful, sir. I am quite pleased for it, sir.
166.Damaged(3): I can't show myself to the officers or the admiral in this condition, I'm too embarrased!
166.Sunk: I see...this is what...people call pride...I un...der...stand...now...

621.Intro: I'm the special IJA ship, Shinshuu Maru. Built with the capability of combined-arms force projection during landings, I'm the predecessor of all amphibious assault ships. Please leave the landing operations to me.
621.Library: I'm the first ship of the landing craft tenders - known in modern times as an amphibious assault ship - built by the Imperial Japanese Army, Shinshuu Maru. I can be fully loaded with daihatsu that carry fully armed IJA units. With my floodable deck, they can be launched simultaneously. I worked hard in landing operations at the start of the war and transport operations near the end. Admiral, please remember me.
621.Poke(1): R... No wait, are you calling for me?
621.Poke(2): A landing operation? Or a transport operation? Then, I'll take it into consideration.
621.Poke(3): Admiral, you look interested in my stern boat launch ramp. Would you like to inspect it? Here, look. I can launch multiple daihatsu at once. ...Admiral? That's my side.
621.Idle: GL... God Land. Even though it's pretty much the same, having a secret alias still feels really deep. Whew.
621.Married: Admiral, I tried making some military rations... Could you try it... Ah, thanks. I-is it good?
621.Wedding: Admiral, is this for me? ...Really? ...I'm happy. I... I'll go and change.
621.Ranking: Information is important. I'll get it for you.
621.Join: Army Special Ship, Shinshuu Maru, weighing anchor. Everyone, I'm counting on you.
621.Supply: I've begun to think that paying attention is important.
621.Docking(1): My apologies. I'll need to retreat for a while.
621.Docking(2): Admiral, my apologies. I'll need to hurry to get repaired.
621.Construction: Construction is finally complete. A ship has been commissioned.
621.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned. The operation is complete.
621.Sortie: I, MT, will now weigh anchor. Let's go.
621.Battle: Enemy spotted ahead. No doubt about it. Battle stations!
621.Yasen(1): It's night. Don't stop being vigilant.
621.MVP: I have the greatest achievements? I share this honour with my comrades.
621.Damaged(3): Damage report. There are... no shallows to beach on.
621.Sunk: So it's finally... time for me to sink... The sea... is cold...

626.Intro: I'm the upgraded special IJA ship, Shinshuu Maru. Capable of combined-arms force projection during landings, I'm the predecessor of all amphibious assault ships. Now with my abilities improved even more. Please leave the landing operations to me.
626.Poke(1): GL... No wait, are you calling for me?
626.Poke(3): Admiral, you look interested in my stern floodable well deck. Would you like to inspect it? Here, look. I can launch multiple daihatsu at... Ah, Admiral? That's not my stern, that's my side hatch.
626.Equip(2): No, that's not a room for horses. That's my hangar.
626.H0000: Today my humble self will be your secretary ship. The time is now 0000.
626.H0100: The time is now 0100. All's well in the Admiral's room.
626.H0200: The time is now 0200. All's well in the corridor outside the Admiral's room too.
626.H0300: The time is now 0300. Admiral, I'll be resuming the midnight patrol. All's well in the main bath.
626.H0400: The time is now 0400. All's well in the cant... Hmm? An airplane silhouette? What was it? A reconnaissance plane from a friendly tender? Hmm...
626.H0500: The time is now 0500. It's time to wake everyone up. Can I use the bugle? *deep breath*
626.H0600: The time is now 0600. Admiral, since you had a bit too much to drink yesterday, I've made you some of my special gruel with my mess kit. Have some pickled daikon and vegetables too.
626.H0700: The time is now 0700. Admiral, shall I get you another cup of tea? Please wait a moment.
626.H0800: The time is now 0800. Well, shall we return to port? Everyone is waiting.
626.H0900: The time is now 0900. Hmm, you're CruDiv7. Mogami and Mikuma.
626.H1000: The time is now 1000. Oh, don't worry about it, Mogami. What's important is what happens from here on out.
626.H1100: The time is now 1100. Admiral, it's almost time for lunch. Yes, we'll make it here.
626.H1200: The time is now 1200. It's noon. It's time for lunch. Our rice balls will be large ones today. They are a bit large. Here is your tea. Please help yourself.
626.H1300: The time is now 1300. Admiral, doesn't it feel great being at sea?
626.H1400: The time is now 1400. Oh, you're Akitsumaru. How are you? Aha, well we'll need to support each other!
626.H1500: The time is now 1500. Admiral, would you like something sweet? Here's some milk toffee. Go on, it'll make you happy.
626.H1600: The time is now 1600. It's almost evening. The night is dangerous. We should return the fleet to port.
626.H1700: The time is now 1700. Admiral, look at that. The sun setting on the sea is beautiful. Ah, so beautiful.
626.H1800: The time is now 1800. Admiral, what are we having for dinner? Eh, we have a guest? Who is it?
626.H1900: You're BatDiv2... no wait, you're CarDiv4 now. Hyuuga, Ise. The time is now 1900.
626.H2000: Hyuuga, thank you for your cooperation in the chimney matter. What? You don't remember? I can't believe it. The time is now 2000.

626.H2300: We're finally home. Admiral, we drank a bit too much, huh? Here's some cold water. The time is now 2300.

460.Intro: Good morning!　I'm Hayasui, an oiler equipped with seaplanes!　I'll do my best to support everyone!
460.Library: Fleet escort oiler, Hayasui. Best regards! I'm a multi-purpose refuel vessel that can supply a variety of different materials and am also designed to carry carrier-based aircraft. With a change of plans after the Battle of Midway, I also became able to launch Ryuusei.
460.Poke(2): A supply mission, Admiral? I'll do my best!
460.Poke(3): Admiral, my turntable is... um... well... it's nothing. I'm fine!
460.Idle: Excuse me, aren't we suppose to go for our next mission? Oh, not yet? I'm sorry. Is there anything I can help... Yes. I'll be on standby.
460.Married: Admiral, Ryuusei is fine, but seaplane is good too. Zuiun is also... Ah...No! Not about me...I was talking about... Mogami-san or Hyuuga-san...

Wedding.0: Admiral, did you call for me?
Wedding.2930: Hm? This box is for me?

460.Ranking: The recent report right, Admiral? Yes, right away!
460.Join: Yes sir. Combined Fleet commanded oil tanker Hayasui, setting sail!
460.Equip(1): This equipment is... Ah, yes! It is compatible with me!
460.Equip(2): With this... Perhaps with this I can fight alongside the others in the fleet.
460.Supply: That's right. Even I needed to resupply too. Thank you as always, Admiral!
460.Docking(1): I'm sorry, My armaments and my supply equipment is... Yes, I'll get it fix.
460.Docking(2): Oh no! There's a hole in my petroleum tank? Eh!? The Powder magazine and the provisions too? I'm sorry. I'll fix it up.
460.Construction: A new ship is ready for commission. I'm looking forward to it.
460.Return: The fleet has returned! Ahh... thank goodness everyone's fine.
460.Sortie: First Supply Force, flagship Hayasui, setting sail! The fleet is sortieing!
460.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted!? Ah... umm... I'm attacking! Hayasui Air Group, commence takeoff!
460.Attack: Is the flight deck okay? Air Group, take off!
460.Yasen(1): Night battle? Hmm... We have to do this! Cannons, ready for barrage. Charging in!
460.Yasen(2): Hayasui Air Group, it's up to you!
460.MVP: Ehh!? The Hayasui Air Group accomplished a lot? I'm sincerely happy about this. I'm so happy!
460.Damaged(1): Hyaaah! Oh no... Is the crude oil tank OK?
460.Damaged(2): I-It hurts! Ahh... Not my precious supply goods...!
460.Damaged(3): I'm hit. I don't have much protection, so I'm having a bit of trouble right now.
460.Sunk: Ah...? My body is tilting forward...? Eh? Hayasui is... sinking...? No...
460.2@NewYears: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I'll be counting on you again this year!
460.2@Setsubun: It's Setsubun. Yes, I brought lots of beans, too. Let's throw them together! Ei!
460.2@Valentines: Admiral-san, th-this chocolate... please accept it! I-I made it myself...
460.2@Anniversary3: It's the third anniversary Admiral! Amazing! Hayasui is very happy.
460.2@Rainy: The rainy season is humid, so I don't really like it. But, don't worry! I will always support the fleet and the admiral! You bet!
460.2@Summer: Summer is here for the year. Every year, when this season comes around, I get stomach aches. U... hehehe... I wonder why...?
460.2@Fall: Admiral, it's fall! Fall! I really like fall for some reason. Want me to bake us some sweet potatoes?
460.2@Xmas: Admiral! Merry Christmas! I made a cake, too! Okay, open wide. Say "ahhh~"
460.2@YearsEnd: It's already the end of the year, Admiral. Cleaning... we really need to clean up! Irako-chan and the others look busy, too! Alright! I will do my part as well! Aye!
460.2@Spring: Admiral, it's Spring. I can feel the breath of spring! Alright! Let's work hard together this Spring! Yes!
460.2@WhiteDay: Eh, this is for Hayasui? A return gift for the chocolate? Admiral... Thank you very much! I'll make sure to eat them with great care!
460.3@Setsubun2018: You want to order a supply of beans for Setsubun, Admiral? Roger that, I'll take care of it.
460.4@Setsubun2018: Admiral....the beans for Setsubun, umm, there, put them there. Yup.... Thanks so much!
460.3@Valentines2018: This torpedo... urmm... It's not a torpedo, uhm... Ooi-san? Ah, yes! Roger that! Resupplying!
460.2@Valentines2018: Please accept this chocolate, Admiral! I-it's handmade.
460.4@Valentines2018: Operation Sho-1 is almost here. That means it's almost time for me to do my best to support the final battle with air power. I'd like to demonstrate what an auxiliary fleet oiler with aviation support can really do!
460.2@Spring2018: Th-this feeling is!? The Naval Base being out of the ordinary... must mean it's that! It's happening again, right? The Zuiun Festival!
460.3@Spring2018: Zuiun, check! Hayasui Jersey, check! Everyone's happi coats, check! All supplies for the Naval Base Zuiun Festival accounted for, Admiral!
460.2@Saury2018: Yup, yup, saury fishing support, right? Roger that! Bringing the proper equipment is important, right? Let's see...
460.4@Anniversary2019: Admiral, it's the 6th Anniversary. Amazing! It's really amazing! I'm really happy too. Yes!

352.Intro: Good morning. Aircraft carrying oiler, Hayasui, will do her best. Preparations for sortie of aircraft are perfect!
352.Poke(1): Yes! Hayasui, ready when you are.

352.H0100: Admiral, it is 0100. Yes. Hayasui is still fine. Look!
352.H0200: Admiral, it is 0200. No, I'm not feeling sleepy! Yes!
352.H0300: 03...0...0... H-huh? I'm awake! I'm totally fine!
352.H0400: 0...4... Mmph... I can't load any more...
352.H0500: Mmph... mmph... Wah! Come on, Admiral! Why didn't you wake me up! No!
352.H0600: It is 0600. Admiral... Yes, I'm sorry. I will start preparing breakfast.
352.H0700: 0700, and the breakfast is ready. Please, help yourself. Today's menu is barley rice with potato miso soup, dried fish and...
352.H0800: Admiral, it is 0800. Yes! It might not be as good as Mamiya-san's, but I have a storage so I am quite good at cooking.
352.H0900: Admiral, it is 0900. Well, let's work hard today as well!
352.H1000: Admiral, it is 1000. We will start with status check on the expedition fleet. Hmmm...
352.H1100: Admiral, it is 1100. Expedition should be good with this! Would next be exercise? Okay!
352.H1200: Admiral, it is 1200 and noon! I will bring the lunch! Please wait.
352.H1300: It is 1300. Admiral, how was Hayasui's Omurice? Hehehe, I might have gone a little over the line.
352.H1400: Admiral, it is 1400. Let's do our best for the afternoon as well.
352.H1500: It is 1500. Admiral, how about having some tea and sweets? Hayasui, will prepare them. Please wait.
352.H1600: Admiral, it is 1600. Eh? Kazahaya? No, I haven't meant her in a while. I'm pretty it's been since Truk or something. I wonder if she's doing well...
352.H1700: Admiral, it is 1700. Isn't the sunset beautiful. I want to watch it forever.
352.H1800: Admiral, it is 1800. What should we do about dinner. What will be good? Hayasui, will prepare it.
352.H1900: 1900! Yes! I did my best to prepare a Western style dinner. The main dish is beef steak! Yes, beef steak! It's special!
352.H2000: Admiral, it is 2000. Here is your after dinner coffee. Did the dinner suit your taste? Really!? I'm glad.
352.H2100: Admiral, it is 2100. The third torpedo squadron seems to be lively. I wonder what's going on? Eh, don't worry about it? Ah, okay.
352.H2200: Admiral, it is 2200. Eh? Taiyou-san? Yes, I believe we'll meet here someday. For sure.
352.H2300: 2300. Admiral, good work today as well. Let's do our best tomorrow too! Yes!

499.Battle: It's the enemy fleet? Can't be helped. Fleet, prepare to engage! Everyone, please get ready.
499.H0000: Admiral? It just turned midnight. For today, I will be the one serving as your secretary. Is that acceptable?
499.H0100: It is now 0100. Admiral? Want me to put on some tea? Shall I bring you a highly aromatic black tea?
499.H0200: It is now 0200. Admiral, around this time, the naval base gets really quiet. It's peaceful.
499.H0300: It is now 0300. Admiral, please have a short rest. Want me to wake you up in an hour? Roger that. Please rest easy.
499.H0400: 0400. Admiral? Wake up... ...Wake up, please. ...Admiral? Ad- ...Ah! Don't do that!
499.H0500: It is now 0500. Admiral, you were only half-sleeping, weren't you? You scared the daylights out of me. No, it's okay. Don't worry about me. It's almost morning.
499.H0600: It is now 0600. Admiral, I'll sound Reveille for the fleet, okay? *deep breath* ...Everyone! It's morning! All hands, arise! It's mo~orning!
499.H0700: It is now 0700. Admiral, your breakfast is ready. It's a bit simple, so I hope you don't mind. It's wakame miso soup, dried horse mackerel and a large serving of rice!
499.H0800: It is now 0800. After I finish cleaning up, shall we go over our plans for the day? Please wait.
499.H0900: It is now 0900. Admiral? To start with, could you confirm the expeditionary fleets? Or are we doing exercises first?
499.H1000: 1000- ...Oh, Shigure-san, nice work out there! You're looking well. Yeah, me too— see, like this!
499.H1100: It is now 1100. That one convoy? I fell under an air raid en route, and even though I avoided sinking... The convoy's progress toward the destination was... ... ...I'm... sorry...
499.H1200: It is now 1200. Eh? Mamiya-san's? That sounds great. Definitely! I'm looking forward to it!
499.H1300: It is now 1300. The food at Mamiya-san's... It was such a delight! Admiral, thank you for the meal. Thank you so much!
499.H1400: It is now 1400. Admiral? What are your plans for this afternoon? Are you taking a little time off?
499.H1500: It is now 1500. Admiral, let's have a cup of tea. This time around, why don't we have some Japanese tea? There are some delicious Japanese sweets. I'll get them ready.
499.H1600: 1600. Isokaze-san, Hamakaze-san, thanks for your hard work. Yes, that's right. I'm also working hard.
499.H1700: It is now 1700. Admiral, look! The setting sun is so beautiful... This time of day... It's lovely...
499.H1800: It is now 1800. For dinner tonight, would you like me to make it? It'll be something simple, sorry.
499.H1900: 1900. It's time for dinner. I tried making cutlets tonight! Doesn't that sound good?
499.H2000: It is now 2000. Admiral, would you like another helping of rice? Please have as much as you like.
499.H2100: It is now 2100. Look— it's a torpedo squadron... They must be on a night exercise. How enthusiastic.
499.H2200: It is now 2200. Admiral, as you might expect, it gets a little quiet around now. *sigh*
499.H2300: It is now 2300. Admiral? Thank you so much for your hard work again today. Let's do our very best tomorrow as well.

544.Intro: It's a pleasure to meet you. My name is Gambier Bay... hawaa! D-Don't shoot! Whew... thank goodness...
544.Library:
It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm the escort carrier Gambier Bay. I'm one of the mass-produced escort carrier sisters, who were also called "jeep carriers".
In the Battle of Leyte Gulf, I ended up encountering the main strength of Japan's navy, the Kurita Fleet, and engaging in surface combat within visual range. But I did the best that I could do! The name "Gambier Bay" - please remember me!
544.Poke(2): Huh, what is it? Catwalk? That's not it!

154.Intro: I'm Katori, a Training Cruiser. Don't you worry... I'll be gentle in teaching you various things.

I believe I'll be a great help in furthering what the fleet attains out of it's drills, for sure. Eh, my firepower in comparison to a battleship... is it? I wonder, tactics-wise, how it is.

343.H0900: 09:00. Ah... But if I were to navigate the ocean then... Who would be here with you...? Th-That's right, let's do it another time.
343.H1000: 10:00. About the torpedo squadron... Oh, this expedition is ok? And this is... Oh, we need to resupply, too... what should we do about development?
343.H1100: 11:00. Admiral... Thank you very much! I was nervous at things I'm not familiar with but... I'll get used to it soon.
343.H1200: 12:00. What shall we eat for lunch? Can I do it as long as it's simple?
343.H1300: 13:00. Do you want more of Katori's curry? It's different from others' curry, right? Ufufufu
343.H1400: 14:00. Ara? What's wrong, Maikaze? It's a little lonely...? Nowaki is not with you today?
