343.H1500: 15:00. Huh...about Maikaze? She's such a good girl! Of course, Nowaki is too.
343.H1600: 16:00. What? Ah...about this? It's not a main gun, it's a ceremonial saluting gun... Shall I shoot it?
343.H1700: 17:00. The sun is about to set... Let us return to the base.
343.H1800: 18:00. Good work today, Admiral. What do you wish for your dinner? Fufu... Roger that! I shall now prepare.
343.H1900: 19:00. Now then, eat up! It's different from Ashigara's, right? How does it taste?
343.H2000: 20:00. Can you wait, Admiral? I'm washing at the moment... Ara... It's as if we are a married couple... Ufufu
343.H2100: 21:00. Admiral? Is there a problem? You're putting on such a troubled face... 'Don't worry'? We're always with you, Admiral.
343.H2200: 22:00. Guu... That girl is being noisy again, today! Don't stop me, Admiral! I'm gonna teach her a lesson!
343.H2300: 23:00. Night time is here. Good work, Admiral. Shall we have some sake? And then good night.

465.Intro: Admiral-san, thanks for the hard work. Training cruiser, Kashima, checking in! Ufufu!
465.Library: Second of the Katori-class training cruisers— the little sister, Kashima. I was built at a time of peaceful waters in order to raise a new generation of capable fleet ships. The time spent on my original duty wasn't long, but I gave my very best both as a fleet flagship and escort. After the battle ended, for the sake of the future, I worked very hard! Please don't forget about my services, okay?
465.Poke(2): Oh? I'll be the Fourth Fleet's flagship, then? Not right now? Well, now...
465.Poke(3): This sensation... that's not big sis Katori, is it...? See! I knew it! Admiral-san! Fufu♪
465.Idle: Admiral-san? Admiral-san! Umm... I want to talk about the escort fleet... O-Oh, you look busy... don't you? Excuse me. Later is fine with me... okay.
465.Married: Admiral-san. Someday, when the waters are peaceful again, I would like to go on a deep sea cruise with you! There are so many places that I want to see! Will we? We'll go for sure, right? I'm looking forward to it.

Wedding.1650: Is this a briefing for a deep sea practice drill?

465.Ranking: Oh, do you want to see the stats? I'll get them for you, okay? Ufu♪
465.Join: Flagship Kashima, now sortieing! Everyone, please follow after me!
465.Docking(1): Uu... I got a little dirty. I'll go take a bath, okay?
465.Docking(2): I'm sorry. I... both my uniform and myself... I'll go freshen up a bit. Wait for me, okay?
465.Construction: Admiral-san, the new ship would like to introduce herself.
465.Sortie: Marine Escort Fleet flagship Kashima, now sortieing! Ehehe... I'll try!
465.Battle: Enemy? Is it the enemy? We have no choice but to fight. Fleet, make preparations to engage. Please hurry!
465.Yasen(1): You can't escape! Pursue them. Port and starboard engines, flank speed. I-I can do this!
465.Yasen(2): Don't underestimate a training cruiser! My equipment and proficiency are more than enough!
465.MVP: Eh? You're kidding... it's me? I had the best battle results? Really? No way... Admiral-san, I'm... a little... happy!
465.Damaged(3): Kyaaaa! I-I... won't sink... I have no intention of sinking... in this place...
465.Sunk: No way... it's so cold... Eh!? Seawater...? This is... I'm... eh...? I'm... sinking...? No way...
465.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the coming year, Admiral-san! I'll be relying on you again this year. I'll also be doing my absolute best!
465.2@Setsubun: Katori-nee, it's Setsubun, but what are we doing...? Ah... we throw them at Admiral-san! I understand! Demons, begone~! Ei! Ei! Oh, was that wrong?
465.2@Valentines: With this, the chocolates are finished! I'll give them a lovely wrapping and wait for the right moment!
465.3@Valentines: A-Admiral-san, if you'd like, please accept this chocolate. Ah... yes! They're sweet!
465.2@Anniversary3: Congratulations on the third anniversary, Admiral. It's your third anniversary, isn't it? This make me happy, too. Heheh~
465.2@Rainy: It's raining a lot lately. On a day like this, shall we stay indoors and plan strategies for future operations?
465.2@EarlySummer: It's almost summer. I wonder what Katori-nee will do about her swimsuit? I suppose I should get one as well? What should I do?
465.2@Fall: Admiral-san, it's a pleasant fall, isn't it? I was also launched in fall, you know? Ufufu♪
465.2@Saury: Saury... then...? I understand! I'll do my best to secure the fishing grounds! Eh...? Take this!?
465.2@Cold: Admiral-san, it's growing cold out. Would you like me to brew some hot coffee? Please wait just a moment!
465.2@Xmas: Admiral-san? Merry Christmas! This time of year somehow always ends up making me feel a little happy. Just for today, maybe it's okay to have a little drink. Right? Ehehe♪
465.3@Xmas: Admiral-san? Today is a special day. I'm so happy that I was able to spend it together with you! Ufufu♪
465.2@YearsEnd: And just like that, it's December. The fleet is so busy with the cleaning! I'll have to do my part as well!
465.2@Spring: Admiral-san, on a season like this, flower viewing is a great idea too, isn't it! I shall be preparing bento, look forward to it!
465.2@WhiteDay: Admiral? This is for me? Thank you very much! It looks delicious! Thanks for the food! Ehehe~
465.2@Anniversary2018: Today is a special day, Admiral. I'm happy I can spend it with you. Ufufu~

356.Intro: Admiral-san, thanks for your hard work. Kashima here. Let's do our best again today. I'm counting on you.
356.Join: Fourth fleet flagship Kashima, sortieing! Everyone, let's do our best!
356.H0000: Admiral-san, for today, I, Kashima, will be undertaking the position of secretary ship. Fufu, I'm so happy.
356.H0100: It's 0100, Admiral-san. Fufufu. How fun♪ ...Eh? "What was that", you asked? I-It was nothing... ehehe♪
356.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral-san. The night sure is long, isn't it. I'll make some tea, okay? Or is coffee better?
356.H0300: It's 0300, Admiral-san. You must be getting sleepy, yes? I've got some pretty strong coffee. I'll put it over here, okay? Ufufu♪
356.H0400: Admiral-san, would you like another coffee? This time, how about with plenty of milk and sugar? Ah, it's 0400 now!
356.H0500: It's 0500, Admiral-san. Night has given way to dawn! I'll get breakfast ready later, okay? Western... Japanese... which would you like this morning?
356.H0600: It's 0600, Admiral-san. I've done the "all hands, arise" call for the fleet. Hmm... being the secretary ship takes the fortitude for all nighters, doesn't it? Ufufu♪
356.H0700: It's 0700, Admiral-san. Breakfast is over here, okay? It's scrambled eggs, bacon, toast and hot coffee! Dig in!
356.H0800: It's 0800, Admiral-san. Since I think that we'll be busy at lunch, I'll get some sandwiches ready, okay? Ham and eggs, and then afterwards...
356.H0900: Admiral-san, it's now 0900. Shall we begin the practices for today? Have you already reviewed the status of the expeditions?
356.H1000: It's 1000. Oh my, that's everyone in Division 6. They're so upbeat... Aoba-san, you're on assignment, so taking photos right now is... eh? Bed hair!? No way, it can't be!
356.H1100: 1100. Honestly, that Aoba gave me quite a shock! Talking about me having bed hair... my hair is always... ah, i-it's nothing...
356.H1200: It's 1200, Admiral-san. How about Kashima's Special Sandwiches for lunch? Yes! Right here in the office... ah! There's coffee here, too!
356.H1300: It's 1300, Admiral-san. Did you have one of my sandwiches? Ah, yes! The largish bits of egg are their selling point, you see. I'm so happy that they suit your tastes~! Ufufu♪
356.H1400: It's 1400, Admiral-san. Yes, the marine escort fleet? That's true— anti-submarine warfare is so very important. I'll do my best!
356.H1500: It's 1500. Eh? About Admiral Inoue? Yes, while he is very controversial, I personally have a lot of respect for him. I believe he is a fine man.
356.H1600: It's 1600. How nostalgic they were... those days of the South Seas. So many things happened. Now with my new admiral in this new sea... I'll do my very best!
356.H1700: It's 1700, Admiral-san. The sunset is lovely, don't you think? I could watch it forever! I love that final moment when the sun slips below the horizon.
356.H1800: It's 1800, Admiral-san. Dinner will be a little elaborate, so please look forward to it! Ufufu♪
356.H1900: It's 1900, Admiral-san. Please wait just a little more. It will be ready very soon.
356.H2000: It's 2000, Admiral-san. I tried making my specialty, chicken gratin. It's piping hot♪ You can eat it together with this bread. Ufufu♪
356.H2100: 2100... Oh my, Katori-nee? Good work! Yes, I'm alright! I've done my job perfectly, right, Admiral-san? ...Admiral-san?
356.H2200: It's true... DesRon 3 is really so... active at night, aren't they? They're just so energetic. Ah, they're sortieing. It's 2200 now.
356.H2300: It's 2300. Admiral-san, thanks for a job very well done again today! Although I'm not very good in battle... I'll do my best with the flagship duties tomorrow, too!

445.Intro: I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! Make sure to remember me along with this Taitei-chan, alright!
445.Library: I'm the Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! That's right, I'm a Flying Boat Tender constructed for the sake of assisting Large-sized Flying Boat and refueling at sea, among other things! Eh? Is my "makeup" too heavy? You're rude, maybe! I'm not letting you have Type 2 Taitei-chan, kay!
445.Poke(2): This Type 2 Taitei-chan? I'm not letting you have her.
445.Poke(3): Heeey! Admiral, I hope you will not touch places that had nothing to do with you so much, maybe! Taitei-chan can't sleep like this, right!
445.Idle: This camouflage is flashy isn't it? Nah, that's not true, don't you agree, Taitei-chan? Don't you think so? Taitei-chan thinks so too, don't you? Ah, Admiral, is it time for our next mission?
445.Married: Admiral, why are you so lost in thought? Ah, are you tired? Times like these, the Akitsushima-style shoulder massage technique will be... Ufufu, hey, feels good doesn't it?

Wedding.2750: I'm not giving you Taitei-chan if it's about her.
Wedding.15450,18260: So, why are giving it to me?

445.Ranking: You wanna see the report? That's important, maybe. Here, help yourself.
445.Join: Flying Boat Tender Akitsushima, setting sail, maybe! Wait that's not it, setting sail!
445.Equip(1): Whoa, such good equipment! I'm happy, I think!
445.Equip(2): Admiral, you can't separate Type 2 Taitei-chan from me, maybe! I'm telling you!
445.Supply: Supply, this helps, I think... Ehehe
445.Docking(1): Uuu... my defenses might be on the low side, I think... I'll have a bath, maybe...
445.Docking(2): They got me good, I think-.. I'm not meant for the front line, maybe. Logistics might be perfect for me I think..
445.Construction: Somebody said a new ship girl has come! Who is she? Who is she?
445.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned I think!
445.Sortie: Now's the time, Akitsushima-style combat navigation technique, maybe I'll do it in a real battle!
445.Battle: Enemy fleet, sighted, I think! All fleet, prepare for battle!
445.Attack: Attack power, I might be low on that, I think...
445.Yasen(1): N-Night battle!? Me? W-well, I guess I have no choice but to go, I think...
445.Yasen(2): Do you say I wear heavy makeup? It's so rude!
445.MVP: E-Eh! I'm number one!? Is such a thing even possible... Eh...
445.Damaged(2): My camouflage pattern, might not have been very useful I think...
445.Damaged(3): T-..They got me good, I think. That's why I told you offense is not one of my fortes...
445.Sunk: I see, I'm sinking... Taitei-chan, bye, bye. I'm sure the future will be...
445.2@NewYears: Admiral, I think I wish you well for the coming year! Taitei-chan is counting on you again this year!
445.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, huh? Throwing these beans... Hmm... Who we'll throw them at might be a sensitive question. ...Choukai? No way. There might be a problem with that.
445.2@Valentines: Admiral, maybe I'll give you this chocolate! This is my very own Akitsushima handmade chocolate, so maybe I want you to savor every bite!
445.2@Anniversary3: Admiral! It's the third anniversary kamodesu, third anniversary. Alright, I will make a really, really big cabbage roll to celebrate this happy occasion!
445.2@Rainy: Admiral, the rainy season is a bit unpleasant, isn't it? It might be troublesome for Taitei-chan, too.... I wonder if I should make a teru teru bozu.
445.2@EarlySummer: Yay! I think it's almost summer! I just have to swim with Taitei-chan! You're coming too, right, Admiral? I think I'll look forward to it!
445.2@Summer: Yay! I think summer has arrived! Admiral, come on, come on, hurry up and change into your swimsuit. Let's go swimming! I'll even let you hold on to Taitei-chan, just this once~♪
445.2@Fall: Fall, huh...? I don't think I really like the fall. I mean, the sky is kind of ominous. Right, Taitei-chan?
445.2@Xmas: Yay! It's Christmas! Maybe I'll go make a whole lot of food! Huh? Zuikaku? What's wrong with you?
445.2@YearsEnd: Uwaaa...! I think it's cleaning time...! Time for my end of year cleanup! I have to thoroughly clean up the cranes and everything! It's okay, Taitei-chan, you don't need to worry!
445.2@Spring: Admiral! It's the season of cherry blossoms! Cherry blossoms! It makes you feel happy, right?
445.2@WhiteDay: Eh? Is this for Akitsushima? Admiral, thank you! I'll have some right away then, maybe! *munch munch* It's sweet!
445.2@Anniversary2018: Admiral, today's a special day, probably, yes. I'm a bit happy that I can spend the day with you.

450.Intro: I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! Have you already remembered Taitei-chan and I?
450.Poke(2): This Type 2 Taitei-chan? Like I said, I won't let you have her.
450.Poke(3): Admiral~ I hope you will not touch such strange places so much, maybe! How long will Taitei-chan have to wait to go to sleep?
450.Equip(1): Aaa they even have those equipments . I'm happy
450.Attack: I was renovated but... attack power, I don't have any
450.Yasen(2): You still say my makeup is heavy? It's really rude!
450.H0000: Admiral, the date might have changed! Today I, Akitsushima will be your secretary, maybe. Ok?
450.H0100: 0100. Is it fine like this? It might be fine? Okay!
450.H0200: 0200. Maybe I've a knack for this. Aren't I the perfect secretary?
450.H0300: 03...0...0. But I might be a bit drowsy. It's this late, after all.
450.H0400: 04...00... Eh, I'm ok. I'm perfectly awake... maybe...
450.H0500: Oh no! I'm awake! 0500! It might already be morning! I need to get it together!
450.H0600: 0600. Admiral, what would be good for breakfast? You know, I'm unexpectedly good at cooking!
450.H0700: 0700. Admiral, have some breakfast, maybe! Look, this miso soup for example... isn't it good? There's also some dried fish!
450.H0800: 0800. Alright, once we're done with cleaning up, we should hurry and put the flying boat to use! We might have a long-distance recon expedition!?
450.H0900: 0900. Taitei-chan? Heh, cute right? But no matter how much you praise her, I won't give her to you.
450.H1000: 1000. Admiral, what will you do next? Maybe check as many missions as you can?
450.H1100: 1100. Alright, we have to prepare for lunch. If it's lunch, then it should be curry after all, maybe. Is curry fine with you?
450.H1200: 1200. Tadaa! It's Akitsushima's deluxe curry! It's definitely good, maybe! Try some, try some!
450.H1300: 1300. How was it? Akitsushima's curry. I have an unexpectedly large food warehouse. Ehehe.
450.H1400: 1400. As expected, this camouflage might be strange? Really? I rather like it though...
450.H1500: 1500. Admiral, are you maybe getting hungry? I made some food like Inari-zushi but, will you maybe take some?
450.H1600: 1600. It might be sunset soon for today as well. Ahh, I might be tired.
450.H1700: 1700. It might be dusk. Taitei-chan, too, good work today. Afuun.
450.H1800: 1800. Alright, I shall prepare for dinner, maybe. Admiral, is there something you'd like to eat?
450.H1900: 1900. Here, tonight I've tried to make my deluxe cabbage roll, maybe. The plentiful potatos and onions are the main point of the flavor!
450.H2000: 2000. Admiral, how was the cabbage roll? It tasted a bit like a croquette and was delicious, right? Yep, yep. Thank goodness, maybe!
450.H2100: 2100. Alright! It'll be the end of the day once I've done the dishes. I might be tired!
450.H2200: 2200. Oh, somehow it's noisy from the direction of the torpedo squadron even though it's nighttime, maybe. Eh? It can't be helped? I see, so that's how it is.
450.H2300: 2300. Admiral, thanks for your hard work today, maybe. Let's do our best tomorrow too.

451.Intro: Admiral, thank you for your hard work. Seaplane Tender Mizuho has now arrived. It is a pleasure to meet you.
451.Library: I am a seaplane tender, Mizuho. Together with Chitose and Chiyoda, I am capable of utilizing the Kouhyouteki midget submarine. Although I was not bestowed with the latest model engine, I manage to participate at the start of the Southern Operations. I shall do my best to meet your expectations.
451.Poke(1): Did you call me? I'm so happy for it.
451.Poke(2): Hehehe... What's the matter, Admiral? Did you happen to forget something?
451.Poke(3): Admiral, I am happy that you take good care of me. Don't worry, I am ready for sortie anytime.
451.Idle: How strange, I was supposed to have a new model engine, but why... Ah, Admiral!? It's nothing. I am okay.
451.Married: Admiral, Are you tired? Goodness gracious, I shall make something tasty for you. Let's see... What would be nice...?

Wedding.4940: Did I make a huge mistake?

451.Ranking: You want to look at the intel? A moment, please. I'll sort it out for you.
451.Join: Seaplane Tender Mizuho, Ready! Forgive me if I'm a bit slow.
451.Equip(1): Should I take the seaplanes or Kouhyouteki? I'm at a loss...
451.Equip(2): I never saw this armament before. Is this a new weapon? Thank you very much.
451.Supply: Admiral, I am grateful for this.
451.Docking(1): I am slightly covered with soot. My apologies. I shall lay down for a while.
451.Docking(2): My apologies for being in this state... I shall take a bath now. I'm sorry.
451.Construction: Admiral, The construction of a new ship has completed.
451.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned. What a relief for everyone to return to the dock safely.
451.Sortie: Fleet Command Mizuho, Sailing out! Let's go, everyone.
451.Battle: E-enemy fleet has been spotted!? What should I do? R-ready for battle... is it?
451.Attack: Mizuho, moving in! Commencing assault. Ready the guns!
451.Yasen(1): It is now nighttime. I wanted to pursue the enemy, but it ended up in a night battle... What should I do?
451.Yasen(2): I must... pursue the enemy... Get your bearings, Mizuho!
451.MVP: Ehh...!? I... I have excelled in battle? Admiral... I... I'm lost for words.
451.Damaged(1): Hyaah! It... It hurts. Was that a torpedo?
451.Damaged(2): Nooo! I-I am fine. Don't let me sink, please!
451.Damaged(3): Hyaaaaaah! For me to be in this state... But I am still able to cruise!
451.Sunk: Am I... Sinking? But, this time I am able to be useful. I... am glad...
451.2@NewYears: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! The 11th Carrier Division and I will be counting on you for another year!
451.2@Setsubun: Setsu... bun... is it...? Eh? Maya-san, you'll be the demon? Y-You want me to throw it...? Ah... ehhh??
451.2@Valentines: Admiral, I... tried making some chocolate candies...! Would you... like to try one?
451.2@Hina: Admiral, it's becoming a bit warmer. Spring will come visit this year again. I'm getting emotional.
451.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, it is the third anniversary. Congratulations. I, too, am happy for it.
451.2@Rainy: This season feels a bit melancholic, doesn't it? Because of submarines? Maybe so... even now, I still feel a bit conflicted about them...
451.2@EarlySummer: It's getting hotter and hotter. This year... summer is back for the year... Mizuho thinks summer is too much...
451.2@Summer: What a strong heat wave this is. Admiral, how are you feeling? So I see. You're so energetic... aren't you?
451.2@Fall: So it's autumn. Admiral, it's the season of delicious food. Shall I make something for you? What would you like?
451.2@Xmas: Christmas. It's fun, don't you think? I've made rice croquettes as well. ...How does it taste...?
451.2@YearsEnd: It's already the end of the year. Admiral, the year really flew by, didn't it? I shall do my part the cleanup as well.
451.2@Spring: Admiral, it's becoming a bit warmer. Spring will come visit this year again. I'm getting emotional.
451.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, this is? A return present for the chocolate sweets? Thank you so much... I am so happy for it.
451.2@Anniversary2018: Today is an important anniversary, Admiral. It's great... that I can spend it with you.

348.H0000: Admiral. I, Mizuho will be by your side announcing the time for today. It is a pleasure to be of use
348.H0100: Admiral, it is now 0100. The fleet during nighttime feels really serene.
348.H0200: Admiral, it is now 0200. Thank you for your hard work, even in this late hours.
348.H0300: Admiral, it is now 0300. Would you like me to make supper for you? Something as simple as an Ochazuke?
348.H0400: Admiral, it is now 0400. I've prepared my specialty Ochazuke. Do you like it? ...Really? I'm so glad.
348.H0500: Admiral, it is now 0500. The sky has started to get a bit bright. It's going to be morning.
348.H0600: Admiral, it is now 0600. Let's do a reveille call to all fleet.
348.H0700: Admiral, it is now 0700. I shall serve you your breakfast. It is white rice and smoked fish with a side dish of vegetable and tofu miso soup. Bon appetit.
348.H0800: Admiral, it is now 0800. I will be making Onigiri using our rations for lunch. A moment, please.
348.H0900: Admiral, it is now 0900. We are starting our fleet training? Affirmative. Would you like to see our fleet's composition first?
348.H1000: Admiral, it is now 1000. Cruising on the sea feels great. I too, am doing my best.
348.H1100: Admiral, it is now 1100. Shall we have lunch after one more push? Today's ration is my specialty onigiri.
348.H1200: Admiral-! It is noon 1200. Please enjoy my specialty onigiri. As for miso soup... Here it is. I shall pour it on this cup.
348.H1300: Admiral, it is now 1300. Let's do our best for today. I shall assist alongside you.
348.H1400: Admiral, it is 1400... Oh, Chitose. Thank you for your hard work. I am glad that we were to work together once more. It is a pleasure.
348.H1500: Admiral, it is 1500. Miss Chitose? Yes, I was together with her as part of the 11th Aviation Fleet. Yes, she is preciously a wonderful person.
348.H1600: Admiral, it is now 1600. Ah, Naka. Good day. Eh, your autograph? Ahh.. Th-Thank you very much. I shall treasure it.
348.H1700: Admiral, it is now 1700. It is almost the end of service for the ship planes. Let's send our fleet back to the home port.
348.H1800: Admiral, it is 1800. I will now prepare dinner. What should I cook? How about seasoned rice with sardine soup?
348.H1900: Admiral, it is now 1900. Dinner is served. Bon appetit. Would you like more seasoned rice?
348.H2000: Admiral, it is 2000. I have made too much seasoned rice, so i'll roll the rest into an onigiri. Please have some if you want.
348.H2100: Admiral, It is 2100... Oh my. Takao, Maya. Thank you for your hard work. You have helped me a lot back then. I am ever grateful for it.
348.H2200: Admiral, it is now 2200. Jintsuu and Sendai really worked hard in this hours. How admirable... *yawn*
348.H2300: Admiral it is 2300. Thank you so much for today. I kept the onigiri inside the shelf. Please have some if you're hungry.

581.Intro: You're my admiral? Ahh, you have a fearless look. I'm Nisshin, a seaplane tender. I'll be in your care.
581.Library: I'm the newly modelled seaplane tender Nisshin, and I was born in the Kure Naval Arsenal. I'm the final completed model of the seaplane tender, designed by the Japanese navy. I had strong diesel engines, and thanks to that I can go fast! I was also used for reinforcement transport operations to the front lines of the Solomons. Man~ there were a lot of enemy planes that time... I sadly couldn't test out my newly equipped midget submarines.
581.Poke(1): Hey admiral~ Me? It's my time~? Can't be helped I guess.
581.Poke(2): Despite my appearance, I can run pretty fast, you know?
581.Poke(3): What're you doing? Oh... you're going to massage my shoulders? Ahh~ right there~, that feels good.
581.Idle: Admiral... You seem busy... oh? Mizuho? What's up? You made some rice balls? How kind of you, thank you. Nom...Mmm~ it's great!
581.Married: Dear, it's good to drink some hot tea and eat some sweets when you're tired... Let's see, I'll pour you some tea myself. Hmmm~, where's the tea kettle... or tea pot? Oh, is this it?
581.Wedding: Admiral, what's wrong? ...Ah, you need Chitose and Chiyoda? I'll go and look for them... No? Then Mizuho? ...That's not it either? Huh? Me? Oh, me! Sigh~ you scared me! Don't worry, I'm doing well. You have an eye for people.
581.Ranking: What're you looking for? This kind of information?
581.Join: Nisshin, the seaplane tender. Preparing for sortie!
581.Equip(2): I can equip a lot of stuff.
581.Docking(1): Well, I'm going to use the bath.
581.Docking(2): Sorry, I broke a couple parts. Better heal all this up.
581.Construction: Well look at this... a new ship is done?
581.Sortie: I've stocked up on a lot of materials... I would like to deliver them... Everyone, Weigh Anchor!
581.Battle: ...Hm? Oh...? That's... enemies spotted! Everyone prepare for battle! Hurry!
581.Yasen(1): The battle of the night. I'll be taking all the good parts!
581.MVP: What? I did the best? Well, it can't be helped. I'm just always good at stuff.
581.Damaged(1): Ow ow... that hurts... who's throwing stuff at me?
581.Damaged(2): Ouch ouch... how many times will you attack? You heretics!
581.Damaged(3): Ow...ow... You heretics... I'll... I'll show you! I won't lose to such things! I'll beat all of you up!
581.Sunk: This... this is the end... I'm... sinking again... no...
581.2@Setsubun2019: It's Setsubun. You can leave Setsubun to me too. Nisshin Seaplane Squadron, begin takeoff! Mizuho Squadron, you too!
581.2@Valentines2019: It looks like it's a custom here to give out these "chocolate" things. Then, I'll do it too!
581.2@Hina2019: Whoaa. It's cold. I want to get under the kotatsu too. You there, you light cruiser cat! Move over! Shoo! Shoooo!
581.2@WhiteDay2019: I'm happy you got this extravagant return gift for me. Thank you.
581.3@Anniversary2019: I hear it's the fleet's 6th Anniversary. That's amazing. Admiral, congratulations, and thank you. This is great.
581.2@Anniversary2019: I see, it's a big festival. So it's the Zuiun Festival. I want to take part too. The Zuiun Group... Can I, Hyuuga?
581.2@Rainy2019: It has rained incessantly as of late... I need to equip an umbrella as well, I suppose. Maybe I should take two... yes?
581.2@Summer2019: It's getting hotter and hotter... Summer is here again...
581.2@Fall2019: Summer is finally over and it's autumn now. I've been looking forward so much to this. Autumn is full of delicious things to eat and the autumn festival is great too. It's a season full of good things, don't you think?
581.2@Saury2019: It's the season for saury. Fresh saury is delicious. Hmm? I'm more suited to eating... What's that? What's with all those searchlights? Eh? I'm going fishing too?

690.Intro: Hey admiral~ you're looking fearless as ever. Nisshin, the seaplane tender, will weigh anchor today as well!
690.Poke(2): Despite my appearance, I can run fast along with equipping a lot of stuff, wouldn't you say I'm a pre~tt~y good ship?
690.Friend43(2): Nisshin Squardon has reached the operation area! We'll now begin the attack!
690.H0000: Well, I'm the secretary today? Leave it to me!
690.H0100: The time is, 0100. Hehe~, how's that? Being a secretary is easy peasy!
690.H0200: It's 0200. It's more boring than I expected.
690.H0300: It's 0300... Yawn~...I'm getting sleepy... Tea... I need tea.
690.H0400: Gulp gulp... phew~ I'm revived. Thanks for pouring in some tea. Ah, the time? Uhh, it's 0400! It's almost morning!
690.H0500: 0500. The night is almost over. Guess I should start waking everyone up... alley-oop.
690.H0600: It's 0600, morning time! Fleet~ group~ wake-up~! It's morning! Everyone, wake up! It's morning! Morning morning!
690.H0700: It's 0700. Where's breakfast? ...what? I have to make it? You should've told me sooner... I'm actually pretty good at cooking. You think I'm kidding? You don't believe me, do you?! Just watch me!
690.H0800: It's 0800. How is it? How do you like my Nisshin breakfast special? Is it good? I even added some meat into the miso soup this morning! There's more if you want seconds! There's plenty of variety here. I used a lot of ingredients!
690.H0900: 090... Oh... Chiyoda! Looking great today! I'd like to be in the same fleet with you again... Oh? What did you say?
690.H1000: It's 1000. Oh? Ohh... The midget submarines? I can equip a lot of these, and with the latest equipments, they're very good to use! You want to try? You'll be able to do it.
690.H1100: 110... Ahh, I forgot! I don't have lunch prepared... Huh? I can have these rice balls? You're a splendid admiral!
690.H1200: Hey! These rice balls are super good! I knew I liked you admiral! Amazing! Oh? The time? It's currently noon! It's 1200.
690.H1300: 1300... Eating all that made me sleepy...
690.H1400: 140... Nowaki! Maikaze! You guys look like you're doing well! I'm doing well myself! The food is tasty everyday!
690.H1500: It's 1500. Oh? It's Chitose! Good work today... Chiyoda was looking for you in the morning... Oh, then that's good! You sisters are so happy together.
690.H1600: It's 1600. I heard Mizuho is getting a Kai next time... Well, it doesn't matter to me. No... It's not like I'm excited... don't tell anyone!
690.H1700: 17... The sun is falling behind the seas... beautiful, isn't it...
690.H1800: 1800. I'll make dinner. I got some good white rice from Mizuho, and how about some golden-eye snapper boiled in soy sauce? Alright, I'll even put out two bottles of pon wine!
690.H1900: 1900. How is it? Barley rice is good as well, but nothing compared to white rice, right? Eating it with that golden-eye snapper that's been boiled in soy sauce... it's so good! It goes well with the alcohol as well!
690.H2000: 200... Oh! Isokaze! Arashi! Hagikaze! What's up? Oh? Hagikaze you're giving some of your healthy stewed foods to us? Thank you! ...This is... are these Isokaze's... cooked fish? Oh~ no no! I appreciate it.
690.H2100: It's 2100. Admiral, drinking some alcohol in this silent night and silent sea really makes it delicious. I'm truly thankful of this peaceful night.
690.H2200: That's why, we need power! That's why we're... Ahh... Seems like I've gotten drunk a bit. I'm going to go outside for a bit... Ah... The time is... just about 2200.
690.H2300: It's 2300. Admiral, thanks for today. We need to get ready for tomorrow as well. Good work today. Rest up a bit... Good night.

586.Intro: Hey admiral~ you're looking fearless as ever. Nisshin, the midget submarine tender, will weigh anchor today as well!
586.Join: Nisshin, the midget submarine tender. Ready... to Weigh Anchor!
586.Equip(2): This is some nice equipment, everyone will be happy.
586.Attack: Nisshin, midget submarine fleet, start launching! I'm going to take all the good parts! Begin the attack!
586.Friend43(1): Nisshin Squadron has reached the operation area! We'll now begin the attack! Midget Sub Squadron, begin launching!
586.Friend44(1): Ready? We shall carve victory onto dawn's horizon!
586.Friend44(2): Nisshin squadron, arriving on the field of battle! The time to strike is upon us!

491.Intro: Bonjour. Enchanté. Je m'appelle Commandant Teste. Admiral, I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Library.0: Originating from the country of freedom, equality, and fraternity,
Library.4300: I am the seaplane tender, Commandant Teste.
Library.9260: I was born as a fully-fledged seaplane tender capable of repairing my aircraft and various on-board machinery.
Library.18310: Don't you find my firepower to be on the level of a cruiser?
Library.22330: Eh? My accomplishments in live combat?

491.Poke(2): Pardon? Admiral, are you curious about my cranes?
491.Idle: At times like these, we should make progress with the seaplanes' maintenance. Oh? Hyuuga? Eh...? This is a... Zuiun? Eh... I may have a few? Merci.
491.Married: Comment allez-vous? Ah... is that so? What a relief. Indeed, sometimes, taking a break is also an important duty. Let's have some wine. Wait just a moment.
491.Ranking: Please give me a moment. I shall retrieve it for you.
491.Join: Commandant Teste, setting sail. Bonne chance.
491.Equip(1): Trés bien. This is good equipment.
491.Docking(1): Excusez moi. I really must apologize.
491.Docking(2): Merci beaucoup. I shall rest for a while. Thank you very much... for your concern...
491.Construction: A new navire seems to have been completed.
491.Return: The flotte has returned to port. C'était un bon travail.
491.Sortie: Flotte, now sortieing. Everyone, please follow me.
491.Battle: I have spotted an enemy fleet. Everyone, how are your preparations?
491.Yasen(1): En avant toute! Everyone, we should make haste.
491.MVP: Eh? Am I... la meilleure this time? That's wonderful. Merci beaucoup.
491.Damaged(3): Ah... ...I won't... sink... just yet... but... ugh... stop shooting...!
491.2@Setsubun: This is... what those girls called, "C'est tout bon"? This wonderful tradition has such profound sentiments. It's splendid.
491.2@Valentines: Admiral? I made this myself. Please accept it. Merci!
491.3@Xmas: Joyeux noël! Here, please have some of the gâteau de Noël I made.
491.2@YearsEnd: The winter here is rather cold. Mizuho, what is this? A broom? A bamboo broom, is it? So it's time for the year end clean-up. Understood.
491.2@EarlySummer: Admiral? In order to match with the rest of the fleet, I have also dressed for summer. ...Is that weird...? ...Ah... merci.
491.2@Kessen: Are you doing pre-operation maintenance on the seaplanes, Mogami-san? Yes, please let me help too. They're good planes.
491.2@WhiteDay2018: Is this for me, Admiral? A return gift? I'm happy. Thank you.
491.2@Spring2018: Kamoi? Cherry blossom viewing with the seaplane tenders? Yes, that sounds nice. Please let me join too.
491.2@Anniversary2018: Yes? The fleet's 5th Anniversary is here? I'd like to join in the celebrations, Admiral.
491.3@Summer2018: This summer is really hot. But, this ice cream is delicious. Would you like some too, Admiral? Here you go.
491.2@Saury2018: Yes, I'll take part in the Saury Festival too. A sonar, lookouts, searchlight... Depth charges will... just scare the fishes away.
491.3@Saury2018: Is this salt-grilled saury? It's good, it's delicious.
491.4@Saury2018: So this is the flagship restaurant... It's so lovely. I wonder what seafood I should have.
491.3@LateFall2018: Yes? Yes, I'm all organised. Look, I've gotten all the alcohol together. Next is... the cocktail recipes, right? Ah, Ashigara, Nachi... Eh, this is...? Thanks, it helps.
491.2@LateFall2018: Excuse me? Gambier Bay, Tashkent, how are the preparations?
491.3@EventShingle: Oui, Admiral. Please leave this operation to me.
491.4@Saury2019: Oui? Admiral, please allow me to provide aviation support for sardine fishing with my seaplanes this year.

372.Equip(1): Trés bien! This is impeccable equipment.
372.Docking(2): Kh... this is unbelievable... I shall retire. Merci beaucoup. Thank you very much for your concern.
372.Attack: Oui! Let's go. Bomber Squadron, begin takeoff!
372.Friend42(1): I'll support you even though I'm not that capable. Feu!
372.Friend42(2): Merci. Even I have managed to make it to the battlefield. Begin the attack.
372.Friend45(1): Yes, I understand. Please leave this operation to me.
372.H0000: It is now midnight. For today, I have been given the responsibility of putting the directives into practice.
372.H0100: It is now 1 a.m. This truly is a time when one should already be in bed.
372.H0200: It is now 2 a.m. I would recommend taking at least a short rest. Otherwise, tomorrow will be difficult.
372.H0300: It is now 3 a.m. Aye. I will stay awake, so you may go ahead and sleep. Bonne nuit.
372.H0400: It is now 4 a.m. It's nearly morning. I don't particularly mind the hours before daybreak.
372.H0500: It is now 5 a.m. Admiral, I intend to awaken everyone in the fleet momentarily. Is that alright?
372.H0600: Oui! It is now 6 A.M. All fleet members, please awaken! It's morning! Bonjour!
372.H0700: It is now 7 a.m. Have a freshly baked croissant and some café. Or perhaps you would prefer wine? ...Bon appétit!
372.H0800: Now, let us commence fleet movements for the morning. To start with, would you like to verify the expeditionary fleets? Or perhaps fleet exercises?
372.H0900: It is now 9 a.m. Admiral, would you like to drink some wine as well? Or would that interfere with your work?
372.H1000: It is now 10 a.m. Admiral? Here, it's your wine. I've poured red for you. Bon appétit.
372.H1100: It is now 11 a.m. What will you be doing for lunch? Would you like me to prepare it for you?
372.H1200: It's noon. Non? Ma... mi... ya? Mamiya? Is that a cafétéria?
372.H1300: It is now 1 p.m. C'est bon! It was delicious. Thank you for the meal!
372.H1400: It is now 2- Oh... Mizuho. Ça va? I see. Good to hear. I'm feeling rather lively myself.
372.H1500: It is now 3 p.m. Oh, Mizuho, you mean? Yeah, she's a good friend. I've met so many wonderful people in this fleet. It makes me happy.
372.H1600: It is now 4 p.m. Yes, it's true. My birthplace has a variety of splendid battleships as well. I'll introduce you to one next time.
372.H1700: It is now 5 p.m. Admiral, take a look. The sea is so very... Oui. It's beautiful.
372.H1800: It is now 6 p.m. For tonight, would you like me to try my hand at dinner? Then please wait for just a bit.
372.H1900: It is now 7 p.m. Excusez moi, but I am in the process of making it. Please wait a little longer. It's almost done!
372.H2000: It is now 8 p.m. De la cuisine française! Please, have some. Bon appétit!
372.H2100: It is now 9 p.m. Admiral, voulez vous du vin?
372.H2200: It is now 10 p.m. Seeing that you ate so much of my food makes me very happy. Merci!
372.H2300: It is now 11 p.m. Thank you for your hard work today. Let's do our best tomorrow as well! Bon soirée.

128.Intro: Guten Tag ... ah, my mistake... sorry, please call me "hachi".
128.Library: I made it to Germany as the second submarine sent on the transoceanic voyage. Then, I received a U-boat. This operation was carried out 5 times, but because of mines and other events, I was the only one who was able to successfully complete the return trip... yeah, I really hate mines!
128.Poke(2): Hmm, if it's easier for you, call me "Hacchan". Yes.
128.Poke(3): Ah! ...You've surprised me, touching me all of a sudden and making these loud noises.
128.Idle: I think... I'd like to read a new book now...
128.Wedding: Admiral? Hacchan wants to read a new book... oh, things I like outside of books? Hmm~ I'd like to try Stollen sometime, yeah? Ah, but it's a Christmas confectionery. Eh? Mamiya will bake it? Today's a special day!? Wow, I'm so happy♪
128.Ranking: A report for the admiral. Let's see...
128.Equip(2): That's right. I think upgrading is essential...
128.Docking(1): May I entrust you with the servicing?
128.Docking(2): Looks like repairs will take some time... I wonder if I can take a lot of books with me into the docks?
128.Construction: It seems a new ship has been constructed.
128.Sortie: I won't lose to anyone on long voyages!
128.Battle: I don't really like fighting.... but I've no other choice!
128.Yasen(1): Come on! Torpedoes loaded... oh... not yet...
128.Yasen(2): I'll keep resisting even if I surface! I'll shower you with these 20mm machine guns I brought back!
128.MVP: Oh my? Did Hacchan do it? Well then, as a reward, I'd like to eat Stollen.
128.Damaged(1): It's glossy black... and its eyes are glaring...
128.Damaged(2): The hydraulic pressure is rising...! Ah, leaking...!
128.Damaged(3): I have to surface, and re-position myself...
128.Sunk: I always knew I'd sink, some day... Admiral... everybody... I'm glad that I met you all...
128.H0200: 0200. Still fighting even at this time?
128.H0300: 0300. If you keep going now, you wont last through tomorrow. Admiral?
128.H0400: 0400... Aa, sorry, I nodded off there...
128.H0500: 0500. Do you like German bread? I was just thinking about it, so I'll go make some.
128.H0600: 0600. I'll have some German bread ready for after breakfast.
128.H0800: Eight!... no wait, 0800. The roggenmischbrot, freshly baked!
128.H0900: 0900. How was the German bread, Admiral?... Too sour? Admiral... I don't get you...
128.H1000: 1000. It's time to refocus on my reading!
128.H1100: 1100. Once, I gave Hibiki some freshly baked bread, and she was so happy! What a good kid...!
128.H1300: 1300. Let's keep on reading, shall I?
128.H1400: It feels refreshing to not be submerged.
128.H1500: 1500. I'm a bit distracted, so I can't focus on reading....
128.H1600: 1600. Admiral, what do you usually do around this time?
128.H1700: 1700. What should I make for dinner..?
128.H1800: 1800. I really like the atmosphere the sun setting over the sea creates.
128.H1900: 1900. I want to try something other than swimsuits... like the uniform everyone is wearing... maybe?
128.H2000: 8-8! Wait, 2000. Admiral, here are some ham, cheese, and potato. Eat up!
128.H2100: 2100. Admiral, are you feeling better now?
128.H2200: 2200. Admiral is playing Kancolle! I am reading! Eheh~
128.H2300: It's 2300. It's getting late, isn't it. I'm a bit tired...
128.2@NewYears: Admiral? Best wishes for the new year. Hacchan and the Submarine Fleet will be counting on you again this year.
128.2@Setsubun: It's Setsubun? ...No, Hacchan will pass. ...Admiral? Why do you have such a sad expression...? Ah, okay. I'm throwing it, then... ...eii...
128.2@Valentines: Admiral? Since it's Valentine's, Hacchan tried finishing up a chocolate stollen cake. How is it? Does it taste good?
128.3@Valentines: I'm glad that the chocolate stollen was well-received. I learned about panettone from that new girl, so I'm thinking about trying a chocolate cake version of that, too.
128.2@Anniversary3: Three years. Amazing, isn't it? It's the third anniversary! Hacchan is a little surprised too. It's a celebration.
128.2@Rainy: It feels so humid. After all, it's the rainy season. Hacchan is still fine even in rainy season, you know?
128.2@EarlySummer: Eh? A swimsuit? Hacchan is fine staying with this swimsuit, but if you insist on a change... Glasses. Wouldn't you like to see me with new glasses?
128.2@Summer: It's summer. Acht-acht! It's already August and we haven't gone swimming together. Ah, Hacchan goes swimming every day, of course. Would you like to go swimming, too?
128.2@Fall: It's autumn. Autumn is for reading. The amount of reading I get done goes waaaay up in autumn. I'd like a new book. Admiral, would you buy me one?
128.2@Xmas: Admiral? It's Christmas. We haven't baked any Stollen. So then, Hacchan won't be able to sortie right now... Eh? Denied?
128.3@Xmas: But... it's not Christmas without Sto- Eh? You'll make me some? Really? Danke! Hacchan is looking forward to it! Ufufu...
128.2@YearsEnd: Admiral? Hacchan will also be participating in the cleaning. First, the Admiral's desk's drawer... eh? You're going to clean it yourself? Mm... so I see.
128.2@Spring: Spring...Hacchan's final sortie ensued during spring, too, Admiral...um...that was all history now, though.
128.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, is that the return gift for the chocolate Stollen? Danke! I'll accept it.
128.4@Valentines2018: The fleet is so busy now. This must mean that's happening.
128.2@Anniversary2018: The 5th Anniversary. Amazing, isn't it? It's the 5th Anniversary. I'm pretty surprised too. Let's celebrate with hot wine.
128.3@Anniversary2019: I'm shocked. It's the 6th Anniversary. That's amazing. The 6th Anniversary. I'll celebrate too. Admiral, here. Cheers.

494.Intro:
Large submarine aircraft carrier, born for the purpose of complementing the Sentoku-class...
I-13-class submarine, I-13 here. Um... I'm... Hitomi is also...
...No... it was nothing...
494.Library:
From the class of revised I-9 class-submarines, the I-13-class submarine, I-13 here. Alongside with my younger sister, I-14, I was born in Kobe...

That's right... In line with that submarine class, I was a submarine carrier able to make use of Seirans. I had secret capabilities that were ahead of its time.

Us sisters participated in the Saiun transport operation, Operation Hikari. However, from around Ogasawara, my recollection... I can't remember... ... ...I'm sorry...
494.Poke(1): Admiral...? Did you call for me...? ...Was I mistaken...?
494.Poke(2): My hangar... you mean? ...A Saiun would... No... a Seiran would... um... ah...
494.Poke(3): Ah...! Admiral, that place is... Um... that place is for the Seiran... so... treat it carefully... please...
494.Idle: Iyo-chan... Even if you're off duty... you shouldn't let loose so much, so don't... You really shouldn't... The admiral will... The admiral will get worried... So, then... ...A-Are you listening? ...Listen to your older sister... once in... a while...
494.Married: Eh...? Iyo-chan? ...I see... Yeah, I also... like my sister. When I'm with her, I feel at ease... ...But... you, too... u-um... As for you, I also... like you. When I'm with you, I feel at ease... At... ease...
494.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me? ...Okay, I'm here, but... I don't really... Ah...? This is...? This is... M-Me... For me...? You're okay with it being me? ...Y-You are...?
494.Ranking: Admiral, what is it? ...Ah, the intelligence. I'll... go get it.
494.Equip(1): Ah...! This is... it's in good condition...
494.Equip(2): This equipment is... With this... Even I... Even I...!
494.Equip(3): I have a bad feeling about this...
494.Docking(1): Excuse me... um... I'll go treat my wounds... ...Excuse me...
494.Docking(2): I'm so sorry for this. It's a lot of damage... I... Sorry, Admiral... Sorry...!
494.Return: The fleet has returned... safely... I'm so relieved... thank goodness.
494.Sortie: The cargo is fine... Okay... First Submarine Squadron, I-13... going.
494.Battle: They found us... Not good... There's no choice... Prepare for battle...!
494.Attack: Let's fire... Opening torpedo tubes... Tube 1... Tube 2... Ready...! ...Fiire!
494.Yasen(1): Night... We're still... going to? ...I see...
494.Yasen(2): I have... no choice...! Torpedoes... ready? ...Going...! Fiire!
494.MVP: No way... That can't be... It's me? ...You mistook Iyo-chan for me... I'm sure of it... Yeah... ...Huh...?
494.Damaged(2): No, ah, no way...! Hurry up and dive...! Ah, hurry...!
494.Damaged(3): I had a bad feeling about this... I... I don't think I can...!
494.Sunk:
Huh...? It's... no use...? I'm... in a place like this... again...!
P... Please... no...!
494.2@Spring: Flower viewing with the 1st Submarine Squadron...? Sounds good, let's go! Iyo-chan... don't drink too much.
494.2@Xmas2017: Iyo-chan, you're drinking...you're drinking too much...aaah...that's way too much...ahh... Admiral, I'm so sorry.
494.2@YearsEnd2017: Wow, it's the end of the year, huh. Oh? Shioi-san, what's that? I see, you're cleaning like that? I'll give it a try too. Hyaa! What? Wh-wh-what?
494.2@NewYears2018: Admiral, I hope you have a happy New Year. Yup, my fortune... for this year is...whaaat?
494.2@Setsubun2018: The Oni for all of us here in Maizuru is...Ro-chan? It's fine? You sure?
494.2@Valentines2018: I'll make some chocolate... No, this is my responsibility as an older sister... Ah!
494.2@Anniversary2018: The 5th Anniversary? No way. That means we're in our 6th year? It's hard to believe. The Seiran and I are thankful.

374.Intro:
Large submarine aircraft carrier, born for the purpose of complementing the Sentoku-class...
I-13-class submarine, I-13 here. Please call me Hitomi.
This time... I'll make it.
374.Poke(2): I said my hangar is... A Saiun...? No... a Seiran is... um... you know...?
374.Equip(1): Ah...! This is... no way... ...Good condition...
374.Docking(1): Excuse me... um... I'll go treat my wounds. ...Wait for me... please...
374.Sortie: First Submarine Squadron, I-13... Starting the sortie! ...Alright... Fleet, please follow me...!
374.Battle: This time I'm the one who found you first... Let's go... Prepare for battle...!
374.MVP: No way... That can't be... It's me? ...Not Iyo-chan...? ...Is that so...? Me... huh...? I see... Me!
374.H0000: Midnight... ... *whew* ...Admiral? Today it'll be me... okay? ...It is...?
374.H0500: 05... 00... Look, it's the morning sun... Another day is starting... once again... ... *sigh*
374.H0600: 06... 00... Good... morning... Breakfast... I'll go make it... Please wait...
374.H0700: 07... 00... Admiral... it's breakfast. ...Eh...? Barley rice...? No... it's buttered rice... Is it bad?
374.H0800: 08... 00... I'm almost done with... cleaning up breakfast... ...Please wait...
374.H0900: 09... 00... Admiral, thank you for waiting... ...The morning exercises... should we do them...?
374.H1000: 10... 0- ...Oh...! Ro-chan... How are you? I see... That's good... The anti-sub exercises... Do your best...  okay?
374.H1100: 11... 00... It's almost... noon... Admiral... for lunch...? I made... some rice balls...
374.H1200: 12... 00... ...Here. My special... rice balls. Ah... are they... a little too salty...?
374.H1300: 13... 00... Truk... anchorage... I'd like to try going there some... time... ...I...
374.H1400: 14... 00... Eh...?! You'd like to... go with me... to Truk...? No way... You really... mean it...?
374.H1500: 15... 00... What should I do...? Me... and the admiral... going to Truk... What should I do...? What should I wear...? I... Oh, right... I should bring a Saiun with me... maybe... ...What should I do...?
374.H1600: 16... 00... Admiral... the sunset... The sunset at Nanao Bay was also... beautiful... Next time... let's go there...? Okay...?
374.H1700: 17... 00... Admiral, the sun is setting. Let's call the fleets... back to port. Another peaceful day... thank goodness...
374.H1800: 18... 00... For dinner... um... ...Eh...? Mamiya...? The one they talk about...? No way...... I want... to go...!
374.H1900: 19... 00... So this is... Mamiya... Wow... it smells good... ...That heavy cruiser... is really something...!
374.H2000: 20... 0- ...Huh? Huuuh!? Iyo-chan, what are you doing? Y-You're drinking so much...
374.H2100: 21... 00...! Iyo-chan, stop it...! The admiral is here, so... sheesh... Okay! No more alcohol...!
374.H2200: 22... 00... Admiral, I'm terribly sorry... I'll give... Iyo-chan... a thorough scolding... On behalf of the Revised Type AM submarine sisters... I humbly... apologize...
374.H2300: 2300. Thank you... for your hard work... today... ...Someday... Someday, I'll go with you to Truk... I'm... looking forward to it... Tomorrow, too... I'll do my... best...

495.Intro: I'm I-14, a 1st Class submarine born to carry Seiran. You can call me Iyo if you want. Nice to meet you, admiral!
495.Library: I'm I-14, second ship of the Type AM submarines! I was built for the purpose of forming a submarine aircraft carrier fleet that was meant to carry out operations. However, by the time I was actually born the situation wouldn't allow that anymore. I never got to play an active part in the war with the Seiran squadron of the 631st air group, but even as the war was taking a turn for the worse I was still able to contribute to the success of Operation "Hikari".  So please don't forget about me, and I-13.
495.Poke(1): You called?  Hohoho~, so what is it?
495.Poke(2): Yep!  My hangar is nice, isn't it! I'm doing my best after all, ehehehe.
495.Poke(3): Ah, Aaaa!  Jeez!  It's not really good to mess with my hanger like that!  It's pretty fragile.  You need to be careful around the vents you know?
495.Idle: Umm...Admiral...Huh?  He's not here.... Does this mean I'm on shore leave? I guess..  Alright! I'm off to drink for a bit!  Turning the lights on.  Getting hyped!  Cheers! Hohoho~
495.Wedding: Huh?  Is that... for me?  You're giving it...to me?  Woah...what is it?  Can I open it?  I'll open it then...  Ahh!  Admiral, this is... are you really really serious about this?  Really!?  Yiss!  Don't worry, I'll make sure to treasure it as much as I can!  Hehehe~! I'm not giving it back, you know!  Yay~!
495.Married: You're looking a bit under the weather, admiral.  Are you okay? Well then, how about we have a few drinks together? You know, as a charm to get you out and about again.  Just for a bit...!  ...Okay, cheers!  Ah, there, yup.  That'll help you get better.
495.Ranking: Ah, really?  The status report, isn't it?  Wait a minute, I'll go fetch it right now.
495.Join: First Class submarine I-14!  Preparing to sortie!  Weigh Anchor!
495.Equip(1): This is pretty good.  I like it!
495.Equip(2): I guess this works too.  Hehehe~ Just leave it to me!
495.Docking(1): Yup, minor repairs are important too.  Ah, what a nice bath!
495.Docking(2): I do like the bath.  Admiral, want to take one... together?  Ehehehe~ Just....kid...ing.
495.Construction: Hehehe~  Admiral, a new girl just arrived!  What's she like?
495.Return: I'm back home!  I'm back here safe and sound!
495.Sortie: Everyone in the 631st Air Group, are you ready to go?  Okay, Let's do it!  I-14, heading out!
495.Battle: Prepare for battle!  Descend to periscope depth.  Open torpedo tubes 1 to 4!
495.Yasen(1): I'm not done yet!  Commence running battle!
495.Yasen(2): Hehehe~, Here comes my attack!  Take this!
495.MVP: Woohoo!  I did it!  Come on, you can praise me if you want, Admiral.  Ehehe~, I really did it!
495.Damaged(1): Waaaaaa!  I'm... I'm still okay, right?
495.Damaged(2): Ah, I-I'm flooding...! I'm still... still fine though!
495.Damaged(3): Oh no..I-I'm flooding...! Emergency ascent!  I'm not going to sink because of this!
495.Sunk: Water is...it keeps flooding in...it won't stop!  I'm going to sink here... right?  Bye...bye...
495.2@Spring: Alllll riiiiight~! It's spring! Delicious alcohol!! Big sister~! Let's invite Shioi-chan and the rest to go out~!!
495.2@Xmas2017: Main tank blow, diving to periscope depth, magazines filled with champagne! My body is...huh?
495.2@YearsEnd2017: Shioi-san, what're ya up to? Wha- cleaning? Roger, I'll help out with all I got! Yay!
495.2@NewYears2018: Admiral, have a happy New Year. I'll leave the 1st Submarine Division in your care this year too, yay!
495.2@Setsubun2018: Setsubun, huh~ Ah, I sense bloodlust! Full stop! Crash dive! Hatches checked, vents open! Whew, that was close, so close!
495.2@Valentines2018: Jeez, big sis, give that here. This is how you make chocolate. Eh!? Why are you crying!? Why!?
495.2@Anniversary2018: Main ballast tank blow! I-14, surfacing! It's finally the fleet's 5th Anniversary! I'm throwing myself into celebrations too!

375.Intro: I'm I-14, a 1st Class submarine born to carry Seiran.  Yup, today's gonna be another great day! Let's get cracking, admiral!
375.Poke(2): Yep!  My hangar is nice, isn't it! Saiun is fine too, but of course nothing beats Seiran!  Yay!
375.Poke(3): Ah, Aaaaa!  Jeez!  Please stop fiddling around with my hanger that much!  It's very sensitive...  Ahh, Jeez! The negative tank too...heeeey! What do you think you're doing!
375.Docking(2): Taking a bath sure is nice. Come on, admiral. How about you join me? Ehehehe~ Juuuuust kidding.
375.Sortie: Everyone in the 631st Air Group, are you ready to go? All right then! I-14, heading out!
375.MVP: Aww yiss!  I did it again!  You know, you can praise me if you want, Admiral. Yay! I really did it!
375.H0000: We've just passed 0 o'clock. I'll be your secretary today! That's fine, right?
375.H0100: 0100, yay! Is this how I'm supposed to do it? Ha ha~, easy peasy! Ehehehe~
375.H0200: 0200. It's a bit cold tonight, don't you think? Let's get some drinks! I'll keep us warm. How about it?
375.H0300: 0300. Oh, it's fine if it's just a little bit?! Now we're talking, admiral! I expect no less! Ehehehe~, alright, cheers!
375.H0400: 0400... Oh... uh... whoops, it's already morning! You alright, admiral...? Wake up~!
375.H0500: 0500. Just look at the sunrise...! So pretty... Don't you think? So pretty... Ehehehe~... so, how about a drink or two while watching it?
375.H0600: 0600. Iiiiit's moooooorning! Everyone, wake up, wake up! It's morning, mooooorniiiiiiing! Ehehehe~
375.H0700: 0700. Hey, I made breakfast! It's a simple meal, but very nutritious! Dig in!
375.H0800: 0800. Alright, time for some morning exercises! Where should we start? I'd say... hmmm... maybe this one?
375.H0900: 0900... Oh! Shioi! Good morning! Wanna have a Seiran match? Ehehe~ You wanna?
375.H1000: 1000! Woah, Shioi. The way your Seiran takes off is so beautiful~. But I ain't gonna lose here! Alright, my 631 buddies, let's do this! Yay!
375.H1100: 1100. Ugh... launching Seiran sure makes me hungry. Oh, you're also hungry, admiral? Still?
375.H1200: 1200. Ehehehe~ Ta-da~! My special light rice balls! What light, you say...? Oh well, don't sweat the details. Come on, just try them! Ehehehe~
375.H1300: 1300. So, what do you think of my special rice balls? They look small, but are really nutritious! Alright, let's keep it up this afternoon! Yay!
375.H1400: 1400. Oh, my sister? Hmm, I wonder... I hope she's doing fine... I'm... a little bit worried.
375.H1500: 1500. Me? Hmm... I guess I'm quite the optimist. Like, everything's gonna be fine. Ehehehe~
375.H1600: 1600. Shioi's sister? Hmm, we were together at Nanao Bay. She's a nice boat. ...now that you mention her, I haven't seen her in a while. Oh well, we'll probably see her soon. It's okay, no need to be impatient.
375.H1700: 1700. Hey admiral, look! The sun is setting right now! Right now! Did you see it? Did you?! Ehehehe~, beautiful, wasn't it? I like it. How about you, admiral?
375.H1800: 1800. Hmm, I worked hard today! Hey, admiral. Buy me a round today! Pretty please?
375.H1900: 1900! Woohoo! Shore leave! Let's go to Mamiya! Where the food is delicious and the fun never stops~! Ehehehe~
375.H2000: 2000. Aaah, the food is so delicious! Not to mention the booze! Those surface ships sure can drink a lot! Yay!
375.H2100: 21...00... Oh look, it's Hitomi! Wanna join us for a drink? ...huh? Dunno whaddaya talkin' 'bout. Right, admiral? Ehehehe~ Oh shit--
375.H2200: 2200... ouch ouch... Hitomi, you don't have to keep hitting me while crying, you know~ ...Ouch...
375.H2300: 2300. Alright, the early bird catches the worm. Let's go to bed early, we have a lot to do tomorrow! Good work today.

191.Intro: Such a great admiral makes me happy. I'm I-19. Yep, calling me 'Iku' is fine!
191.Library: I'm the submarine I-19. Yes, Iku! I sunk the carrier Wasp with my pride and joy, my oxygen torpedoes! I was even able to hit a battleship and destroyer that was waaaay ahead of the carrier! Don't you forget Iku, Sniper of the Ocean's great abilities... 'kay?
191.Poke(1): Admiral! You're not allowed to look away from Iku!
191.Poke(2): Nnfu~, you won't get mad no matter what I do, so I like you.
191.Poke(3): Admiral? Are your shoulders sti~ff? How's thi~s? Does it hurt? Ehehehehe.
191.Idle: Admiral~! What were you thinking, keeping Iku waiting? Do you want to be punished again~?
191.Married: A~dmi~ra~l! I'll massage your shoulders! ...Uuu, they're all stiff...
191.Wedding: Admiral, what i~s it? You wanna dive with Iku? Oka~y...here, a wetsuit! Doesn't that look great on you♪ Well now, let's dive together! ...Fufu, make sure you absolutely don't let go of my hand. Ready and splaaash!!
191.Ranking: Admiral, there's a message for you.
191.Equip(1): Fufu~. My sniper soul is burning~.
191.Equip(2): With this, I'll get all of them in one go!
191.Docking(1): Just a li~ttle bit of repairing~
191.Docking(2): Nn, I got beat... Once I'm better, I'll pay them back twice over!
191.Sortie: Iku's torpedoes are itching to go!
191.Battle: Iku's torpedo strike, off it goes!
191.Yasen(1): Admiral, I want a reward if I beat that one.
191.Yasen(2): "Aim at me!" is what it feels like it's saying!
191.MVP: Iku had a great, dazzling victory! I'm expecting a reward from you~
191.Damaged(2): Kuh! Is that the one targeting me?
191.Damaged(3): Did you think you'd back me into a corner? It gets me fired up instead!
191.Sunk: Iku...is sinking...? Hey...Admiral...even if I'm not there...please...don't worry...okay...?
191.H0400: 0400. Really, didn't you fall asleep a bit there? Iku knows it.
191.H0500: 0500. Hey... right now, you fell asleep, yeah?
191.H0700: 0700! The beginning of a new day! ...I'm hungry~
191.H1300: 1300! After lunch, I always want to take a nap~
191.H1400: 1400. The weather this afternoon is great, so I want to go for a walk! Truthfully, I'm always in the water though~
191.H1500: 1500. Admiral? What do you normally do at this time?
191.H1700: 1700. Somehow, I'm itching to do something, you know?
191.H2000: 2000! It was great to spend Iku's favourite time with you!
191.H2100: 2100. So~ It's nearly time for tonight's performance!
191.H2200: 2200. Whoops, I got all fired up~
191.H2300: 2300. Almost time for Iku's sleep time, isn't it?
191.2@NewYears: Admiral? Have a Happy New Year, nano! Iku is gonna be counting on you again this year!
191.2@Setsubun: It's Setsubun! Let's see, Iku and everyone's demon's is... it's Taigei! Target acquired! Surface depth for Setsubun battle! Fire~! Demons, begone! Ei, ei~!
191.2@Valentines: Admiral? Iku did her very best to make this handmade chocolate! Try some of it! So...? Isn't it good? Mhm! There's still some more!
191.3@Valentines: Admiral!? What's the matter!? You don't look so good... Eh? You ate too much chocolate? That's not good at all... I made some medicine-filled chocolate! Here, eat this!
191.2@Rainy: Hasn't it been raining a lot lately? Iku is always underwater so she didn't really notice. So it's the rainy season.
191.2@EarlySummer: Summer is almost back! Eh? Admiral? You want to see me wear a different swimsuit? I'm okay with that, but... hmmm. I dunno what to do.
191.2@Fall: Iku wants to shoot a whole lot of torpedoes this fall. At a carrier, or a carrier, or a carrier... but a battleship is fine, too!
191.2@Xmas: Admiral? This cake is delicious! Give me more, more! Christmas puts Iku in a really good mood!
191.2@Spring: Admiral, it's spring! Come on a picnic with me! Where? Out at sea, of course!
191.2@WhiteDay: Admiral? This, is the return gift for the chocolate? Thank you! I'm happy, so I'll bring this on a trip to Orel! This has put Iku in a good mood!
191.2@LateFall2017: It's getting cold when I dive. Me? I don't catch things like colds! How about you, Admiral?  Oh, do you have a fever? Eh? You don't?
191.4@Valentines2018: The fleet is preparing for the operation. I'm so nervous!
191.2@Anniversary2018: It's finally our 5th Anniversary, Admiral! Well done! Keep looking after us!
191.3@Anniversary2019: Admiral, it's our 6th Anniversary. Thank you. Please keep looking after me.

483.Intro: Hey, hey, hey! So you're the admiral! I'm the submarine, I-26, but you can call me Nimu! Nice to meet you!
483.Library: I'm an I-class from Kure! Hey, hey, hey, I just remembered something about me! Of course commerce raiding is my specialty, but I can also eat up heavy cruisers and aircraft carriers! Leave it to me!
483.Poke(1): Hmm? Did you call for me?
483.Poke(2): What, what, what? My turn? ...A commerce raid battle? Leave it to me, Admiral!
483.Poke(3): Eh? It's not Nina— it's Nimu. Admiral, make sure you remember my name properly, okay? Because I'm worth it!
483.Idle: Torpedoes loaded, fuel okaaay. Potatoes and onions, loaded up, loaded uuuup. Okay! Now I'll be ready when it's my turn!
483.Married: *whew* Today is all work, work! Hmm? Oh, oh? What's wrong, Admiral? What, what, what? You don't look so good. Okay! You can use my lap as a pillow and rest. Yup! Come, come, come!
483.Wedding: Admiral, what, what, what? You wanted me? ...Hm? What? That box and that face... Eh? Could it be? Could it be? Could it really be!? Hey, hey, hey! ...So it is! Thank you. I'm happy!
483.Ranking: What, what? You want to look over the intelligence? Okay.
483.Equip(1): Ah, this equipment is nice. Thanks!
483.Equip(2): Hey, hey, hey, listen! This armament? It looks great! Yay!
483.Equip(3): It's here, it's here, it's here!
483.Docking(2): Sorry! I'm gonna take a long bath.
483.Construction: Hey, hey, hey! It's a new girl, you know?
483.Return: *whew* We came back! Everyone worked hard, and I worked hard, too!
483.Sortie: Flagship of the submarine squadron, I-26 Nimu. Setting sail!
483.Battle: Enemy ship spotted! Periscope depth... torpedoes armed... ready!
483.Yasen(1): I-26, commencing pursuit of enemy remnants. You-won't-get-away!
483.MVP: Eh? No way... I got the best results this time? I did it! Okay! What big fish should I eat next? Maybe an aircraft carrier? Admiral, look forward to it!
483.Damaged(1): Kyaaa...! Not good! Dive! Hurry up and dive!
483.Damaged(2): N-Nooooo! Water is... this is bad!
483.Damaged(3): Th-They got me...! Emergency blow! I'm not finished yet! Preparing for surface shelling!
483.Sunk: Th-They got me! Emergency blow! To the surface! ...Huh? I'm not rising...? I'm going to sink...? No way... no way...
483.2@NewYears: Admiral, Happy New Year! The submarine fleet and I will be counting on you for another year!
483.2@Setsubun: Hey, hey, hey! Ah, what, what? Ah, Setsubun? I get it now. So the demon for us submarines is... Ah, Taigei... That's so rough...
483.2@Fall: Awww... summer is over. It's fall. This season is... ummmm... Ah, Fusou-san? Eh? Breakthrough training? Ah... ummmm... errr....
483.2@Saury: *sniff sniff sniff* This smell... could it be saury? You're grilling saury? I wanna eat, wanna eat, wanna eat!
483.2@Xmas: Ahh~ so this is that Christmas thing. Hey, hey, Saracchi, is Christmas where you come from even more amazing? Ah, I see. Hweh...
483.2@Spring: It's spring! Hey, hey, hey, Admiral, can we invite the rest of the submarines and Taigei to go flower viewing together? Hey, can we go?
483.2@Kessen: Ah, it's the Nishimura Fleet! Yoohoo! Hey hey hey, where are you going? Eh? Eeeeh? Seriously? Mmm, why not put it off till next year?
483.2@Anniversary2018: Hey hey hey! Isn't it the 5th Aniversary, Admiral? Hey, isn't that amazing? Congrats! I'm really thankful.
483.3@Anniversary2019: Hey, hey, hey! Isn't this amazing? To keep going like this. I'm really grateful. Thank you, and congratulations.

367.Intro: Hey, hey, hey! Admiral, how are you today? I'm submarine I-26, and I'm doing great, of course! Let's work together again today☆
367.H0000: It's now midnight. Admiral, I'll be keeping you company today. Aren't you happy?
367.H0100: It's 0100 nooooow! Ah! Was that too loud for this time of night? Sorry.
367.H0200: It's 0200 nooow. Is this a little better?
367.H0300: It's 0300 n- ...Ah, I don't need to use such a soft voice? Okay, got it.
367.H0400: It's 0400 nooow. Admiral, it's almost morning. I'm a little sleepy, but I'll pull through!
367.H0500: It's 0500 nooow. Look, look, look! Hey, the sunrise! Isn't it pretty? Admiral, the day is starting up.
367.H0600: It's 0600 nooow. Admiral, isn't it time for the morning call? Leave it to me! I'll wake everyone up. It's mooorning! Morning!
367.H0700: It's 0700 nooow. Admiral, I'll put your breakfast here, okay? It's steaming hot rice, miso soup and some pickled veggies. Hey, hey, is it good?
367.H0800: It's 0800 nooow. Okay, now that we're all full, want to sortie? What are we going to attack today? Heeey?
367.H0900: It's 0900 nooow. Ah, I see. A quest, right? I'll go check the quests, okay? Here I go!
367.H1000: It's 1000 nooow. Ah, aircraft carriers? Okay. Somehow I feel a sense of pride when I see them! Let's go! Want me to?
367.H1100: 1100. Ah! It's almost lunchtime! Admiral, I'll go make lunch, okay? Please wait!
367.H1200: 1200. It's time for luunch! Today's lunch is luxurious! Cooked white rice with canned beef, and also boiled dried vegetables!!! Okay, dig in!
367.H1300: It's 1300 nooow. Admiral, what did you think of lunch? Wasn't it luxurious? Wasn't it? Wasn't it? Yup, yup, yup!
367.H1400: 140... Ah, isn't that... isn't that girl a Lexington-class? Could it be Saracchi? Saracchi...?
367.H1500: It's 1500. Well, it wasn't really mistaken identity. Maybe more of a misunderstanding? She looked so similar. Oh well!
367.H1600: It's 1600 nooow. Admiral, what should we do? It's a tough battleground, but do you want to go patrolling the southern waters? Hey, hey, let's go?
367.H1700: It's 1700 nooow. Hey, hey, hey, look, look, look! Admiral, the sun is setting. Isn't it pretty? It almost feels like the fighting is a distant memory.
367.H1800: It's 1800 nooow. Okay, tonight's dinner will be super extra luxurious! It's my ultimate secret dish. Admiral, please look forward to it!
367.H1900: It's 1900 nooow. Admiral, look, look. Ta-daah! Dinner is the super extra luxurious, Nimu Special Curry! See, the potatoes are really big, right?
367.H2000: It's 2000 nooow. So, Admiral, after we finish washing up, want me to go on a night sortie? What will be my prey for tonight? Will they be there?
367.H2100: It's 2100 nooow. Let's get started with the night sortie! My torpedoes and everything are all ready, so let's go full power!
367.H2200: It's 2200 nooow. *whew* Tonight's work is all finished up. It went perfectly again tonight. Admiral, you were great, too!
367.H2300: 2300 nooow. Admiral, for today and every other day, thank you very, very much for your hard work. Tomorrow, let's work hard together again! Oh, oh!

127.Intro: Hello! I-58 here! You can call me Goya. I'm not bitter!
127.Library: I have fought hard from the beginning to the end. Even when the war had became harsh, I managed to take down that heavy cruiser! After fulfilling my mission and everything was all over, I managed to make it back safely to Kure, my home port.
127.Poke(1): Hello from beneath the sea! Goya here!
127.Poke(2): Phew! It's lovely good in the sea. Nothing begins unless I dive!
127.Poke(3): If it's armour, it has to be a school swimsuit! Look, it's efficiently smooth!
127.Married: Do your best with your KanColle study!
127.Wedding: Being with the admiral is so much fun! You know, there are lots of fish that only live in the south, they're worth seeing, yeah? This time, I'll take you there!
127.Ranking: Communication for the admiral? Lemme see!
127.Equip(2): Admiral, I don't really need this...
127.Construction: A new ship has been finished! Anyhow, it's an above-water ship, isn't it?
127.Battle: Wa~ I found a lot of scary things!
127.Yasen(2): Goya's torpedos - they're clever little things!
127.MVP: Goya, she did her best, yes? Eh? Chanpuru? I'm not a side dish, you know~
127.Damaged(3): My swimsuit, a functional beauty and designated by the admiral, is...
127.Sunk: Someday, Goya wants to dream of the day I met you all... diving deep....
127.H0200: 0200. Oh... There is something behind... Ah well, forget it.
127.H0700: 0700. If nothing else, eat some breakfast.
127.H0800: 0800. What kind of day will today be, I wonder?
127.H0900: 0900. 9 o'clock. Where are you taking 58 today?
127.H1000: A~dmiral. 1000. I'd like a new swimsuit soon~
127.H1100: 1100. A~dmiral~, I wanna try on this fluttery swimsuit too~
127.H1200: 1200~. After lunch, let's look at more swimsuits!
127.H1300: 1300. Ah, Admiral, why don't we take a nap?
127.H1900: 1900. I should study sometime... It's gotta be German, yeah?
127.H2100: 2100. Ice-cream for dessert is great, yeah? Mamiya-san, come o~n!
127.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, dechi! Rising to Setsubun combat depth. Taigei spotted! Beans one through four... Fire!
127.2@Valentines: Admiral, Admiral! This is for you, dechi! It's Goya's special Goya chocolate, dechi!
127.3@Valentines: Admiral, Admiral! Did you finish your Goya chocolate yet? ...Eh, why not!? It's good, though! Hurry and eat it, dechi!
127.2@Hina: Us I-class be the five court musicians? Goya will do it! Who'll make the outfits? Eh? Imuya will? Will it be alright...?
127.2@Rainy: It's a season with a lot of rain, dechi! But! If I dive underwater... it doesn't matter anymore, dechi!
127.2@Summer: Hello from beneath the sea! It's summer, dechi!! Is it time for Goya and the others to have their summer vacation, dechi? Admiral!? Where did you go!?
127.2@Fall: It's fall, dechi! This is the season of delicious food, dechi. But if I eat too much... The swimsuit designated by the admiral might get too tight if I'm not careful, dechi.
127.2@Saury: It's the saury festival, dechi! Sauries like to gather around where it's bright, so you should bring something that shines reaaally bright when you fish, dechi!
127.2@Spring: Goya likes spring-dechi! It's a season that somehow brings out one's spirit-dechi. Alright! I'll work hard today too~! I'll do it-dechi!
127.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, is that Goya's return gift? Really? Wow! Thanks for the food, dechi!
127.2@LateFall2017: It's definitely getting cold wearing just a swimsuit. I'm going to request some cold weather equipment from the Admiral.

126.Intro: I'm I-168. What? It's hard to say? OK, just call me Imuya. Nice to meet you!
126.Library: I am a submarine born and raised in Kure. After that battle of Midway, I managed to land the final blow to Yorktown who defeated Hiryuu! Our carriers were avenged! I also worked hard running transport missions to that terrible island.
126.Poke(1): Commander, are you used to my name? It's I-Mu-Ya, you know?
126.Poke(2): I may be riding on a float right now, but I'm actually an amazing diver!
126.Poke(3): Ah, were you looking at me from behind? It's not like I'm playing with a smart phone or anything!
126.Idle: Commander, did you come to hate Imuya?
126.Married: Commander, let's take a break if you are tired.
126.Wedding: Commander, I can dive to about 100m. Won't you come dive with me this time? I, will guide you with all my strength. When this fight is over... it's a promise, okay?
126.Ranking: There seems to be a report addressed to the commander.
126.Join: It's time to deploy, I'll show you the power of a Kaidai-class submarine!
126.Equip(1): If it's the commander's desire, then this is alright too...?
126.Equip(2): No way, I keep getting stronger!
126.Docking(2): This wound is nothing serious! ...D...don't make it too sore...
126.Construction: A new ship has been created! I wonder what kind of ship it is?
126.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned.
126.Sortie: I'm gonna put some big holes in the enemies' hulls!
126.Attack: Load torpedoes from 1 to 4. Let's go get a win!
126.Yasen(1): The night is our world! I'll finish you!
126.Yasen(2): I'll approach stealthily, sinking you for certain.
126.MVP: I did it! You can rely on Imuya, the sniper of the sea! I'll even finish off aircraft carriers!
126.Sunk: Ahh, I wanted to bathe in the sun more... I've had enough of... the seabed...
126.H0100: 0100. Night-time. Will you be okay at school or work tomorrow?
126.H0300: 0300. Is it okay? You really don't have anything planned for tommorrow?
126.H0500: 0500. Eh, did you want to hear Imuya's voice?
126.H0600: 0600. Commander, it's morning before you knew it!
126.H0800: 0800. I'm pretty strong in the morning, you know!
126.H0900: 0900. Let's get to work let's get to work!
126.H1000: 1000. Let's go with all our strength until lunch!
126.H1100: 1100. If we work hard I'm sure there will be delicious lunch waiting for us!
126.H1300: 1300. Lunch with the commander, I'm really happy!
126.H1400: 1400. Well then, let's give it our best and sortie even in the afternoon!
126.H1500: 1500. The 3 o'clock you... the disaster of yours... it's somehow scary!
126.H1900: 1900. I can only make curry, is that okay? Alrighty, let's make it together! We can eat together in an hour!
126.H2000: 2000. Did you make the curry properly? Well then, let's eat together!
126.H2100: 2100. Somehow after eating dinner and getting full, I get sleepy...
126.H2300: 2300. Commander, thanks for another day's hard work!
126.2@NewYears: Commander, have a Happy New Year! The Sniper of the Sea, Imuya, will be counting on you again this year!
126.2@Setsubun: Ah... Year after year, Taigei-san gets pelted with beans... Ah- Ahhh... Look, see what I mean? I'm so sorry...! please don't cry.
126.2@Valentines: Commander, this is Imuya's bridge-shaped, smartphone-sized chocolate! Here! Just so you know, Imuya made it herself! It was actually pretty hard work!
126.3@Valentines: Commander, did you finish all of Imuya's chocolate? ...Eh, you used it as a decoration? That's not what it was meant for! Hurry up eat it, geez!
126.2@Hina: Now, it's the awaited Hinamatsuri! We I-class subs should go as the five court musicians, right? Imuya here already made the outfits! Aren't they cute?
126.2@Anniversary3: Commander! It's the third anniversary, the third anniversary! So cool! Imuya is a bit surprised too. Please take care of me from now on, too!
126.2@Rainy: It's been raining a lot recently, hasn't it? It's the rainy season, so it can't be helped. Ah, Iku! So you're making a teru teru bozu! Show me, show me! ...That's very unique.
126.2@Fall: Goya... even though fall is a time for eating, if you eat that much, the beautiful and functional swimsuit designated by the admiral won't fit anymore, you know? Is that fine?
126.2@Saury: So we're supporting the saury fishing! I'm not sure if us submarines are really the right choice, but... okay! Let's give this a try! I'll cheer them on! I can do that much!
126.2@Spring: Commander! Spring has finally come. Mmm, winter was long this year. When the season gets warmer, how about taking a dive into the ocean with us, Commander?
126.2@WhiteDay: Wow! Commander, thanks for the return gift! If I eat too much, might I gain some weight, though? Should Imuya prepare some tea?
126.2@LateFall2017: It's getting a bit colder. Being dressed like this while on the surface is kind of rough. I'm fine when I dive, though.

493.Intro: Nice to meet you, Admiral. I'm the eldest of the Sentoku-class, the 1st ship, I-400. Hmmm... You can call me... Shio... Err... Shion.
493.Library: I'm the 1st ship of the Sentoku-class, I-400-class submarines, I-400. I wasn't made for anti-ship operations but was a submarine carrier made with a new philosophy for strategic operations. Of course, my planes are Seiran. Please remember us sisters whose journeys ended before they began.
493.Poke(2): Ehe~ Are you going diving? I'll come too!
493.Poke(3): About the Seiran? Hmmm... So you're that interested, huh. Yes! These are the floats... Hmmm... Right?
493.Idle: Hmm, that's right, it'd be nice to go to a canal with Shioi. You're welcome to come along too, Admiral! I'm looking forward to it. That's right, we'll definitely go one day.
493.Married: Ummm, are your shoulders stiff, Admiral? Shall I massage them for you? I'm pretty good at it. Ngh... Ah... your shoulders... Ngh... Ngh... H-how was that?
493.Wedding: Did you call, Admiral? Hmm, is this for me? Can I open it? Eh... Is this... ummm, for real? Jeez, you shouldn't have.
493.Ranking: Hmm... You want to see it? Understood. Intelligence is important.
493.Join: 1st ship of the Sentoku-class, and I-400-class submarines, I-400, sortieing!
493.Equip(2): Do these good equipment suit me? Hmm, that's great!
493.Supply: Yep, I'm happy. This is important.
493.Docking(1): I'm gonna jump into the bath! Eh, sorry, I'll go in quietly. *plop*
493.Docking(2): I love baths. They just warm you up. Aaaah~ haaa~ Nice warm water.
493.Construction: Yamato's dock is huge, huh. Yup, the construction of a new ship is finished.
493.Return: The fleet has returned. Good job.
493.Sortie: A canal? Or an anchorage? Yup, shall we get going? Set sail!
493.Battle: I've found the enemy ships. All ships, please prepare for combat!
