493.Attack: Ngh, alright. Let's get this started!
493.Yasen(1): Beginning pursuit. Let's do this, everyone.
493.MVP: Oh, me? I'm glad that the Sentoku-class was able to be of use. H-huh, oh no, my tears are... Ahahaha... Why... Jeez, no.
493.Damaged(1): Ow! That hurt! What was that!?
493.Damaged(2): Awha! There's so much water! S-stop it! Because I don't like this!
493.Damaged(3): I-I'm hit! I-I need to surface. Ngh, I'm going to keep fighting!
493.Sunk: Ngh, I see... so I'm sinking... I'm going on ahead, alright, Shioi? Give this... bell... to that person...
493.H0000: It's now, hmmm, exactly 12am, Admiral. I'll be by your side today.
493.H0100: It's 0100. Am I sleepy? Nah, I'm totally fine!
493.H0200: It's 0200. Ngh, I'm a bit sleepy... No, I'm fine! I'm just fine! Because I'm the eldest, something like this is...
493.H0300: 03...00. I'm a bit... Not sleepy at all! I can't be like this. I need to get it together! Yes, I'm ready and waiting!
493.H0400: *sleeping sounds* 0...4... *sleeping sounds*... 00... Admiral... *sleeping sounds*... Shioi... wait up... *sleeping sounds*...
493.H0500: Ngh... Ah! O-oh jeez. It's 0500. You should've woken me up, Admiral! I just dozed off a little, right?
493.H0600: It's 0600. I'm going to do it now, alright, Admiral? *deep breath*... Fleet, all hands assemble! All hands assemble! It's morning! It's a wonderful morning!
493.H0700: It's 0700. Breakfast is ready! Today is... fufun... A heaping serving of butter rice, dried daikon miso soup, and potato stir-fry! Help yourself!
493.H0800: It's 0800. *humming~* Water is important~ Water is important~ Alrighty, I'm finished cleaning up the galley!
493.H0900: It's 0900. Now, Admiral, the 1st Submarine Flotilla of the 6th Fleet is sortieing! Where are we going? To a canal? ...Eh? On an exercise?
493.H1000: It's 1000. Roger that, Admiral. Leave it up to the 1st Submarine Flotilla. Even at Nanao Bay or Sanza... Eh, that's not it, it's an OpFor exercise?
493.H1100: 1100. So-somehow I was able to do the fleet manoeuvre exercise with the fleet assembled with Shioi. *whew~* Hmm, next is finally time for Seiran.
493.H1200: It's 1200. It's lunchtime, Admiral! It's my special rice balls for lunch! Of course, it's made with butter rice! Now, help yourself! Go on~
493.H1300: 1300. Oh, what's wrong, Admiral? You're looking a bit... Eh, open my heart? Wh-why? I'll go get some tea first, okay. Tea... Aaah!
493.H1400: 14...0... Aaah, I'm sorry, Admiral. I got your uniform dirty... I'll go and wash it! Please strip! Eh, it's fine. Ngh, why? Why are you resisting, Admiral? Jeez!
493.H1500: It's 1500. I'm sorry, I didn't mean it like that... I've caused you so much trouble, Admiral... Ummm, I'll do my best with dinner...
493.H1600: 160... Ah, Iyo, Hitomi, good work. Yup, we did form a submarine carrier fleet as the 1st Submarine Flotilla along with Shioi. My tears just flow when looking at the beautiful sunset for some reason. Yep, am I right?
493.H1700: It's 1700. I want to keep watching the sunset on these peaceful seas along with the rest of the submarine carrier fleet, Admiral. Yeah... Always.
493.H1800: It's 1800. The sun has set, Admiral. Hmmm, that's right, I need to prepare dinner. Please look forward to it, Admiral.
493.H1900: It's 1900. It's time for dinner. I'm sorry to have kept you waiting, Admiral. It's fine, don't worry, it's my special Submarine Curry on the menu tonight. Of course, the rice is butter rice! Now, help yourself!
493.H2000: It's 2000. You're sweating so much, Admiral... Ah, it's fine, there's enough for seconds. It's fine, don't be shy! Here's a large helping for you. Ehe, please help yourself to all of it.
493.H2100: It's 2100. You don't look so good again, Admiral... Are you feeling sick? ...Hmmm, I know I have a special onion. Shall I get you a piece? It's very valuable.
493.H2200: It's 2200. Thank goodness you're feeling better, Admiral. Yeah, I was worried. Eh? Me? I'm just fine. I can even go on another dive.
493.H2300: It's 2300. Thank you so much for your hard work today, Admiral. Let's do our best tomorrow, too. Now, please get into your futon. Just sleep for a while. See you tomorrow.
493.2@Xmas2017: Merry Christmas, Admiral. ...Oh, Ro-chan, what's this? ...Ooh it's delicious! Is this a cake from your country?
493.2@YearsEnd2017: Yes, it's time for the Naval Base's o-souji, isn't it! We of the 6th Fleet will be sure to lend a proper hand. The back of my Seiran hangar also needs...
493.2@NewYears2018: Happy New Year, Admiral. I hope you'll take care of the 6th Fleet, 1st Submarine Division this year too.
493.2@Setsubun2018: It's not "SEtsubun", it's pronounced "Setsubun."  You see the first sound is like Setsubun and...oh...uh...
493.2@Valentines2018: Please accept my handmade chocolates, Admiral! I made it pretty fancy. Open it up here, and then...
493.2@WhiteDay2018: How were my hangar-like chocolates, Admiral? Were they to your liking? Ah, that's great.
493.2@Spring2018: The cherry blossoms are beautiful. Hmmm... I know, let's go cherry blossom viewing! We can go with the other members of Nanao Bay. I can't wait~
493.2@Anniversary2018: I heard the news, Admiral. It's the fleet's 5th Anniversary! Isn't that wonderful? I'm thankful to everyone. I want to be together with you again next year.
493.2@Rainy2018: I won't say it's just because of the rainy season but... This season somehow... just makes me want to hide... Why? Open the vents! Crash dive! Shion, hiding!
493.2@LateFall2018: It's gotten really cold. It's the time of year when we submarine carriers want to get under the kotatsu too. Hmmm... I want to... dive right in! Whoaaa... Aaaah, it's warm... Mmmm.

606.Intro: Good day, Admiral. I'm the eldest of the Sentoku-class, the 1st ship, I-400, Shion. Have you gotten used to calling me by that yet? Hmm? Really? Then let's keep each other company today too!

155.H0100: 0100. I'm a bit sleepy... oh, I'm still awake.

155.H1900: 1900. Admiral, the night view here is great too. I really like it.
155.H2000: 2000. Let's have dinner now. I can't wait to find out what we're having!
155.H2100: 2100. Phew, this sure was a tiring day. Guess I'll sleep after maintaining my Seiran.

155.H2300: 2300. Admiral, shouldn't you sleep now? Sleep is important, you know?

403.Intro: A good day to you, Admiral. It's the upgraded I-401, of the special submarine class.
403.Library: I'm I-401, the second ship in the I-400 submarine series. I'm a submarine carrier capable of making a round trip around the world, and carries 3 units of the special attack plane "Seiran". Yes, it's a secret tactical weapon... it's a secret, okay?

163.Intro: Nice to meet you... Maruyu, reporting for duty. Huh? You haven't heard about it? ...Oh no...!
163.Library: Maruyu isn't from the Navy shipyards, so I don't have any friends from home. I'm a little different from everyone else... I mean, the first thing Kiso-san said to me was “What are you. Can you actually go underwater?”... I'm starting to wonder if Maruyu can survive out here…
163.Poke(1): Maruyu will be carrying your luggage. Yep, we'll be doing a mole run.
163.Poke(2): I-I shouldn't be afraid...of the Fleet Girls...you say?
163.Poke(3): No! Don't look at me like that, please!

163.Married: Oh, are you tired? Why don't you relax with Maruyu?
163.Wedding: S..Sir. To care for Maruyu this much... Maruyu is touched! I'll keep on doing my best!

163.Equip(2): I'm not going to let people call me a mole anymore!
163.Equip(3): Don't call me Moley. I'm Maruyu!
163.Supply: Now I can go back underwater!

163.H1300: 1300 hours. Hmm, today's swim went pretty well!
163.H1400: 1400 hours. Having a late lunch. Oh these? These are combat rations!

163.H2100: 2100. Here is your curry, sir! Kiso-san taught me how!
163.H2200: 2200. That was good, wasn't it sir!
163.H2300: 2300. Sir, friends are nice, aren't they!

163.2@Xmas: Captain, this poultry is really good! It would go really well in curry! Ah... I guess curry wouldn't make sense to have on Christmas, huh? Eh? It's okay!? Then I'll go make some of my Maruyu curry!

436.H1800: 1800. It's dinner time, Admiral! Let's see, let's see... what should we have?
436.H1900: 1900. Lebe-chan, what's that? Kaltes essen!? Rye bread with sausage and ham??? It looks so good...! It's okay!?
436.H2000: 2000. Lebe-chan's dinner was really good! Admiral, Ro-chan is really full, too! Ehehe...
436.H2100: 2100, Admiral. What's that, what's that? It's not beer? Foam...? Uu... I can't see the difference... it just looks like beer...
436.H2200: 2200, Admiral! Anyway, do you want to try some real German beer? I'm pretty sure we have... ...There isn't any...
436.H2300: 2300. Admiral, thank you so much for your hard work today! Let's do our best tomorrow, too! Gute nacht.
436.2@Setsubun: I heard it from Eugen-san. Setsuboon! It's an important tradition!
436.2@Anniversary: Admiral, you did it! Today is a festival, right? Ro-chan is happy, too! Yup!
436.2@EarlySummer: It's gotten hot. Admiral! You should a wear swimsuit, too. I want to see it!
436.2@Summer: She said summer is here! She said we're going swimming! Splash! Splaaash! Shioi's the one who told me!
436.2@Xmas: Frohe Weihnachten! Admiral, this turkey is delicious.
436.2@Spring: Admiral, admiral! I heard that it's spring! Ro-chan likes this season, maybe!

535.Intro: Ciao! I'm Luigi Torelli. That's right, Torelli... Hmmm, just Lui is fine!
535.Library:
I'm from the Regia Marina, a submarine from the Country of Pasta, Luigi Torelli.
I worked pretty hard at commerce raiding. But that's not all, I also experienced plenty of things. I also participated in a submarine transport operation and lots of other things, my allegiances even changed.
...Hmmm, I guess it feels like I've been through a lot. Remember my story, yeah?
535.Poke(3): Huh, was someone poking me just now? Was it my imagination? Oh well!
535.Idle: Ah, me? Ah, that's right, there were incidents when I was caught by the enemy. Ah, but I got away so it's fine! Eh, you want to hear more about that? Hanya, hanya~ Well, a lot happened. So you see...
535.Married: Ah, me? That's right, I can do anti-air fighting, surprisingly enough! Well, I'm still just your standard submarine. Of course, I don't like planes, that's why I shoot them down. Hmmm, but I'm fine, because I especially like you, Ammiraglio.
535.Wedding: Hmmm, that's right, I've had my name and allegience changed many times; if I accept this, I'll have to change my name again... I just feel like, "Oh well". Well, that's not it. More like thank you? Grazie!
535.Ranking: Ah, you want to have a look? Understood, here.
535.Docking(1): Sorry, I'll take a short bath.
535.Docking(2): Ah, I'll be in the bath for quite a while.
535.Sortie: I'm sortieing. It's fine if you want to follow, you wanna come?
535.Battle: Enemies spotted~ Shall we do this?
535.Yasen(2): That didn't work, huh. Ah, it did?
535.Yasen(1): Hmmm, persistence is a virtue, yes!
535.MVP: Really, it's me... You're kidding... Eh, seriously? Really? Even though everyone was going at it seriously? That's fine. Ehe~
535.Damaged(1): Hyah! I really don't like this!
535.Damaged(2): Stop it, this isn't good... I don't like this!
535.Damaged(3): Oh boy, this isn't good. Whoa, let's run away, yeah?
535.Sunk: No way, I'm sinking... Eh, the water won't stop... Eh, no way... I don't want this...
535.2@Fall2017: *sigh*~ Summer is over. Hanyanya~ It's kind of lonely. Oh well!
535.2@Saury2017: Hmmm, saury? What's "saury"? Oh well, I'd love to help. I'll do my best!
535.2@LateFall2017: Brrr, it's a little cold. Where's this kotatsu I've heard about? I want to get inside it quickly. Where is it?
535.2@Xmas2017: Eh? What's that over here? It's great, it's delicious! Here, U-chan, I mean, Ro-chan try some too, it's good!
535.2@YearsEnd2017: Oh, what's this? "O-souji"? Huh? Roma, what are we supposed to do? Hmm, hmm, hmm.
535.2@NewYears2018: Happy New Year, Ammiraglio-dechi! Oh, shoot, I'm saying it too now.
535.2@Setsubun2018: This is that Setsubun I've heared about! This'll be fun! The target is...hmm....there she is! The one they call Taigei over there! Take that! And that and that!
535.2@Valentines2018: Hum, yup, you can have this. Hanya, hanya.
535.2@WhiteDay2018: A return gift! Thank you! Mmmm, it's delicious.
535.2@Spring2018: Huh, I see. So this is the "cherry blossom viewing" I've heard so much about. What is it? Iyo, Hitomi, you want me to take a drink from this bottle? Mmm, that sounds fun!
535.2@Anniversary2018: Thank you! It's the fleet's 5th Anniversary. Amazing! Congrats! And thanks!
535.2@Rainy2018: Haha, so this is the season called "Tsuyu". There's so much rain but the dollmaking looks fun! Teach me, Goya! Hmm, hmm, I got it-dechi!
535.2@Summer2018: Hmmm, I see. Is this ths special summer rigging? I'll think about it. Hanyanya.

605.Intro: Buongiorno! I got a small remodel. How is it? Is it useful?
605.Poke(2): Ah, I'm a transport submarine now.
605.H0300: 3 o'clock. *yawn* I'm a bit sleepy, can I go to sleep? Hanya, hanya~
605.H0500: I'm shleepeh... Think it's 5 o'clock...*sleeping sounds*
605.H0600: *sleeping sounds* Achoo! Gah, oh no, it's morning, it's 6 o'clock, gah!
605.H0700: Buongiorno. *yaaaawn~* I need to wake up. Hanya, hanya~
605.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. Where's my food, Ammiraglio?
605.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. *yawn* I'm still a bit sleepy so can I go out to sea for a while? Yes.
605.H1000: 10 o'clock! Ah, ciao ciao! Are you doing well Yuu-chan? Ah, you're Ro-chan now? Hmmm, I'm now...
605.H1100: It's 11 o'clock. Hmmm, ah yeah, I know her. Yup, she's a good girl yeah.
605.H1200: 12 o'clock! Lunchtime! What's for my lunch?
605.H1300: 1 o'clock. Onigiris are nice but pasta is nice too. Make some next time, Ammiraglio. I like it rosso!
605.H1400: It's 2 o'clock. Oh... Ah, Libe, ciao! Long time no see! Eh, the other girls? I wonder where they are... I can sense their presence.
605.H1500: 3 o'clock! It's your 3 o'clock snack! Eh? Ah, I heard the battleships from this fleet saying that. What time is that?
605.H1600: It's 4 o'clock. I'm hungry. Aren't you hungry? You're working a bit too hard.
605.H1700: It's 5 o'clock. I'm... I'm already tired so can we return to port? Rest is important! Yes.
605.H1800: Urgh~ 6 o'clock. I'm hungry, so hungry~! Eh, I can't make that. EEEH! Then what will we do!?
605.H1900: A trattoria? Yes, that sounds good! Let's go! Pasta, pasta! Alright!
605.H2000: *nom nom*... It's 8 o'clock. My, the heavy cruisers and submarines here are a bit rowdy but... it tastes great! It really does!
605.H2100: 9 o'clock. Grazie mille. Mamiya's is great. I want to come again! Eh? Ah, we're amici now.
605.H2200: 10 o'clock. Hmmm, I'm already tired today. Can I sleep? *yaaaaaaaaawn* Buona notte.
605.H2300: 11 o'clock. Huh, you're not sleeping yet? Eh, we're going to be working all night tonight? Eh~ I don't wanna. We need to get a good rest! Let's go to sleep together! Ngh, buona notte.

539.Intro: Buongiorno... That's not it, guten morgen! Hmmm, since my name has changed, how does Ui sound? No?
539.Library:
I used to be the Regia Marina submarine Luigi Torelli. Now I'm the U-boat named UIT-25.
It was great that I unexpectedly gained experience in anti-air combat but that's not all. I had lots of different experiences. I participated in a submarine hunting operation and also changed my allegiance a lot. Sigh. It definitely feels like I've been through a lot. Remember my story, yeah?
539.Poke(3): Huh, was someone poking me just now? Was it my imagination? Oh well! Ah, did you remember my new name? It's Ui, remember that!

530.Intro: Buongiorno... That's not it, guten morgen... That's still not it, good morning! My name is... Ummm, argh, Go-chan is fine!
530.Library:
I'm from the Regia Marina, a submarine from the Country of Pasta, Luigi Torelli... is what I should say. In the end, I'm now the I-type submarine 504. I worked hard to the end.
I experienced lots of things you know, I participated in a submarine transport operation and changed my allegiance a lot. Hmmm, it definitely feels like I've been through a lot. Remember the story of how I worked hard, yeah?
530.Poke(2): Yes! The remodelled-type armed transport submarines are great!
530.Poke(3): Huh, was someone poking me just now? Was it my imagination again? Oh well! D-do you remember my... That's right, it's Gou-chan!
530.Equip(2): Surprising, right? Anti-air combat is just hanya, hanya~!
530.Battle: Enemies spotted~ Now, shall we do this?

59.Intro: I'm Furutaka. I'll be happy to show how all the good points of heavy cruisers.
59.Library: Heavy cruiser, Furutaka. Selected by Vice Admiral Mikawa to be a member of the eighth fleet, I took out a lot of enemies at the first Battle of Solomon! This is what a heavy cruiser can do!
59.Poke(1): This is a really great unit, you know?
59.Poke(2): The next operation area's data, is it okay to show me?
59.Wedding: Admiral! How was the Heavy Cruiser team's performance? Did we make a difference? Awright, that's great! I'm so happy!
59.Ranking: Looks like there's a notice for you, Admiral.
59.Equip(1): With this night battles will be a cinch!
59.Equip(2): With Team Mikawa's comrades, I can boast.
59.Supply: Night battle will be easy with this.
59.Docking(1): My weapons need some repairs, yeah?
59.Docking(2): That last battle, I overdid it a bit, yeah?
59.Construction: A new ship has been constructed.
59.Sortie: Seize the enemy transport ships. Want to defeat them, right?
59.Yasen(1): I'm pretty good at night battles, you know!
59.MVP: We only stood out by chance. That's what being a heavy cruiser is about.
59.Damaged(3): Ah, they got me... I'm not sunk yet!
59.2@NewYears: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I'll do my best to show you all the good points of heavy cruisers again this year!
59.2@Valentines: Admiral? H-Here, please accept this! Th-Thank you very much!
59.2@Anniversary: Today is a wonderful day, Admiral! Furutaka is honored to be with you! Thanks as always!
59.2@EarlySummer: Summer is really coming along this year, isn't it? I wonder where a good place would be to buy a new swimsuit with Kako.
59.2@Fall: At this time of year, the naval base calms a bit down and the atmosphere is a little laid back, isn't it? Fall kinda gets me into a strange mood.
59.2@Xmas: Admiral, Merry Christmas! To be able to spend this time of year together with you... I feel so happy!
59.2@YearsEnd: Another year is already ending. Admiral, I'll clean up the room, so just leave it to me!
59.2@WhiteDay2018: This is... Thank you very much, Admiral. I'm happy.
59.2@Anniversary2018: The fleet and I have reached our 5th Anniversary, Admiral. I'm honoured to be with you. I will be forever grateful.
59.2@Rainy2018: It's raining... I like how the rainy season brings the calm. Ah, what's that, Hatsuyuki-chan? A handmade teruteru bouzu? Ah... Eh?
59.2@Summer2018: Hey, Kako... Does this look weird? Really? Yeah, alright! Then I'm going to where the Admiral is! Alright!
59.2@Anniversary2019: It's the fleet's and my 6th Anniversary. Admiral, I'm honoured that I can spend it with you. I'm always thankful.

262.Idle: The admiral's, busy... uh... what to do...? I wonder what's Kako doing?... Admiral, what should Furutaka do!?
262.Married: Admiral? The good points of a heavy cruiser... have you come to a better understanding of them? Really? Then, then that's great! I'm glad!
262.Supply: Supply is important. This is welcome.

416.Intro: I'm Furutaka! I'm a little small for a heavy cruiser but... Heavy cruiser Furutaka will do her best today too!
416.Poke(2): Aoba? Would you sto... Ah, it was you Admiral, g, good work!
416.Poke(3): A~o~ba~! ...Ah, it's you again Admiral? Sorry, I thought it was Aoba again...
416.Ranking: Admiral, information analysis is important, isn't it.
416.Damaged(1): E, enemy radar guided attack!? N, not yet...!
416.Damaged(2): I-I've been hit... I, can still fire!

60.Intro: Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, name's Kako! Nice to meetcha!
60.Library: I'm the Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, Kako. I achieved quite a feat during the Battle of Savo Islands! Ah, the way back? Well, the verse "Going in is easy, but returning is scary" was no joke!
60.Poke(2): Strategy meeting? I'll just ask Furutaka about it later, can I not do that?
60.Poke(3): Yeah, yeah! I hear ya! Now stop pulling my skirt!
60.Wedding: Aaaahhhh, another scolding, yeah? Sorry for my carelessness, yeah? Wha- that's not it? Admiral… why is your face red?
60.Ranking: A letter for the admiral... I'm awake, I'm awake!
60.Equip(1): Woah, I'm wide awake now. I can feel the energy from this!
60.Equip(2): Somehow, I feel cooler now, hehe
60.Supply: Whoa, I feel awake. The power is surging!
60.Docking(1): Stop it...so sluggish...the fitting...ah, forget it...
60.Docking(2): Aah, I'm seriously gonna die...let me pass out in bed!
60.Construction: Got a report that a new ship is do~ne.
60.Return: The sortie's done, here's the report... *snore*
60.Sortie: Kako, ready to sortie! Furutaka, you're coming too.
60.MVP: See, I can really do it if I try! So, when I get back, let me sleep a bunch!
60.Damaged(1): Damn, and we were just about to leave!
60.Damaged(2): The gun battery has blown off!?
60.Damaged(3): Youuu! You perverted son of a bitch!
60.Sunk: Yeah, Furutaka always scolded me for getting carried away too much...
60.2@NewYears: Best wishes and Happy New Year~! Admiral, let's power through another year!
60.2@Valentines: Hm? Well, what was it...? That chocolate thing? I kinda did end up making some... Here.
60.2@Anniversary: To be able to spend such a day with the admiral— I'm happy!
60.2@EarlySummer: Finally, it's gotten hot out, hasn't it? Summer is coming, isn't it? Ehehehe. That's great. Summer. Awesome!
60.2@Summer: Great! Summer has arrived! Alright, I'm gonna take lots of naps! Ehh... I can't?
60.2@YearsEnd: Kuh... it's already the end of the year? That was fast... ...Can we... just do the cleaning next year? ...Hey?
60.2@WhiteDay2018: Ooh, you listened to me, Admiral. You prepared a return gift for me. Nice. Just what I needed before bed. Thank you.
60.2@Anniversary2018: It's already the 5th year? Well, you know, I'll be happy to spend this year with you too. *yawn*
60.2@Rainy2018: It's the rainy season... Well, I do kind of like it. It's just kind of calming. Right, Furutaka? Ah, what's that?
60.2@Summer2018: Ah, isn't that nice, Furutaka? Ah, it suits you... I think. Ah, that wasn't vague. Ngh, what a pain. I said you're cute!
60.2@Xmas2018: Whoaaa, it's good! Ahahaa, this giant roast chicken is great. Aaah, I can't finish it... Furutaka, you have some too. ...Ah, what? A carrier? Huh?
60.2@Anniversary2019: It's already the 6th Anniversary, huh. Well, how do I say this... I'm happy I can spend the day with you, Admiral. Please keep looking after me.

263.Idle: Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzz... Nya... mfufufu. Whoa! I'm not sleeping! I was awake, I was.
263.Married: What's up, Admiral. Why the red face? Hm? That's lack of sleep! Alright. I'll take a nap with you. I bet you'll have a wonderful dream!
263.Supply: Torpedoes and ammunitions, Load them up well. Ah, don't forget the fuel too, okay?
263.Damaged(2): What!? A sub? Not good, not good!
263.Sunk: Yeah, Furutaka always scolded me for getting carried away too much...

417.Intro: Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, name's Kako! Ah, you know, hello again!
417.Ranking: Admiral... when you see stuff like these... don't you get drowsy? I... zzz... zzz...
417.Join: Haha! Alright. I guess it's my turn. Let's go!
417.Damaged(1): Ow! I ain't just gonna take that. Here goes the Kako Special!

61.Intro: Hi, thanks for your time, I'm Aoba! Please can I have some words!
61.Library: I'm Aoba. Advancing into the Truk Islands area, I supported the Pacific Front. With a war correspondent on board, the staff also had reporting as part of their job. At my last moment, I was at Kure. Even without fuel, I did my best!
61.Poke(3): Are you interested? I've got some good news, you know?
61.Wedding: Aoba, all she really wants to do is look at the commander rather than the enemy… J-just kidding!
61.Ranking: Some news? What is it, what is iiiit?
61.Equip(1): Okay! I can work better now!
61.Equip(2): This'll let me do so much more reporting... ah, no, make fighting easer.
61.Supply: Okay! I can work better now!
61.Docking(2): I seem to have gotten too deeply in the matter.
61.Construction: According to the data, there seems to be a new ship launching, yeah?
61.Return: The fleet's back, could I have an interview?
61.Attack: The enemy still hasn't noticed us!
61.Yasen(2): Searching, barrages, torpedoes - leave them all to me!
61.MVP: Happy to be of service, thanks again.
61.Damaged(3): Firepower... Is firepower just not enough, I wonder...
61.Sunk: Sunk, huh... I wanted to sink at Kure....
61.2@NewYears: Hello and Happy New Year! This is Aoba! Thank you for your cooperation in another year of interview coverage!
61.2@Valentines: Commander, sorry to intrude! I'd like you to have some of my chocolate! ...Ah, nice face. Don't mind if I do!
61.3@Valentines: Eh? The picture just now? Ah, I took it for the fleet newspaper... Eh? I can't? Waah!
61.2@Anniversary3: Good day, Commander! Excuse my intrusion! With it being the fleet's third anniversary, we are heading off into our fourth year of battle! For commemorations, one photo please! Once again, pardon my intrusion!
61.2@Rainy: Oh, Gassa! That dejected expression of yours looks nice. Yoink! Huh? Hey, give me my camera back! Why are you taking pics of me!? Ones of me are no good!
61.2@EarlySummer: It's getting hotter and hotter. So summer is coming back for the year. This season reminds me a little of the last summer at Kure.
61.2@Summer: Oh...! It's the middle of summer! So many ship girls are out wearing fashionable swimsuits...! Great, huh? How flashy! Eh, 'Gasa? Ah, I should, too? No, I'm good...!
61.2@Fall: Somehow it's fall already, isn't it~ Fall is the season for tasty food. Well, isn't that great~
61.2@Saury: Saury fishing is now in full swing! I'm here providing coverage of the saury fishing support fleet. Aoba, sortieing- no, providing coverage!
61.2@Xmas: Uwawawa... you're right! This turkey stuff is really good, Commander! Eh? "Watch the skies"? Wha... what is this? Why are friendly planes...!?
61.2@YearsEnd: Gasa, that expression is great. Mini skirts and brooms go surprisingly well together. Just give me a minute! Ah, Commander, no, we're about to start wiping the dust.
61.2@Spring: Oh, flower viewing with the sixth squadron was it, sounds nice! Aoba shall participate as well to keep the record! Ooo, the food's pretty gorgeous as well aren't they! It was by Houshou-san? What a surprise!
61.2@WhiteDay: This is in return for the chocolate? Ah, sorry! I want to take a photo of you giving it, so do you mind giving it to me again? Ah, right there! Fu~!
61.2@Anniversary2018: Hello, and thanks for your time. Commander, according to my information, today is a very important day.
61.2@Setsubun2019: It's Setsubun. Let's see, this year's Oni is... O-ow! Gasa!? I'm not the Oni! Look at this armband, I'm doing a news report! E-eeeek!

123.Intro: Ye~s, It's Miss Kinugasa's debut! Together with Aoba, take good care of me!
123.Library: First to have a catapult equipped, Miss Kinugasa! Great to meet you. I performed magnificently in the capture of Wake Island and the Battle of the Coral Sea, and even the Solomon's Ironbottom Sound! But... planes, you know? I'm not really a fan...
123.Poke(2): Let get to work today too!
123.Poke(3): If you keep touching me, I'll touch you back~ Hey hey!
123.Idle: Oi! Ooi! Oh, you're not Ooi? Ah, he glared at me.
123.Wedding: Admiral, so that I can protect you, I'm gonna get stronger and stronger! But, if it get dangerous, you have to promise to get away, okay? I don't want to lose someone important to me.
123.Ranking: Hm-hmm~ How's it? May I look?
123.Equip(2): Hey! Don't be watching me modernise!
123.Docking(2): Ow-w-w~ Aoba's going to laugh at me again~!
123.Construction: A new ships built! So fast~
123.Battle: Naval battle! I'm gonna start, yeah?
123.MVP: Hm-hmm, isn't Miss Kinugasa the strongest! When we get back, I'm gonna boast about it to Aoba!
123.Damaged(2): Hawawa! The bridge is looking bad!
123.Damaged(3): Geh! Direct hit!? ... Admiral.. erm... could you not look?
123.H0000: It's midnight. Miss Kinugasa's sound asleep. Zzzz...
123.H0100: ...nya~ It's 1 A.M.? Not going to sleep?
123.H0300: It's 3 A.M. Hey? Just when will you go to bed?
123.H0400: It's 4 A.M.! So it's come to this... Just do it! All-nighter!
123.H0500: 5 A.M! The weather report's starting, you know?
123.H0700: 7 A.M, somehow, the world's in such a rush now.
123.H0800: 8 A.M, how about watching the morning soaps?
123.H0900: 9 A.M. You done the daily quests?
123.H1000: It's 10 A.M. Won't you redecorate the room soon?
123.H1100: 11 A.M. Oh, there's such a nice smell coming from the mess~
123.H1200: Beep-beep-beep-pom~! 12 midday, time for lunch! My lunch is curry! What are yo~u having?
123.H1300: 1 P.M, how about taking a siesta? Zzz...zzz...
123.H1400: It's 2 P.M. Admiral, work hard this afternoon too!
123.H1600: 4 P.M., it's almost evening, isn't it~
123.H1700: 5 in the evening! What are you doing 'After Five'? Eh? People don't use that anymore?
123.H1900: 7 P.M, I'm having dinner~ Still curry!?
123.H2000: 8 P.M. Now then, it's getting heavier, yeah? Ah, I'm not talking about my weight, yeah?
123.H2100: 9 P.M, oh? Someone's coming. Ah! It's Aoba! Good work today!
123.H2200: 10 P.M, Aoba, I heard that she did some reporting. She can be both a reporter and a warship~
123.H2300: 11 P.M. Admiral? It's about time for bed, you know? ...eh? Your best performance starts now? Aren't you energetic~
123.2@Setsubun: Admiral, how've you been? Is that so? You can just leave this Setsubun up to me! Ei!
123.2@Valentines: Here! It's my specialty, heart-shaped chocolate! Savor it when you eat it, okay?
123.3@Valentines: About my special heart-shaped chocolate— have you tried some? Mm... so, how's the flavor? Oh...? That's a relief!
123.2@Hina: Hina dan, huh... they are so cute. Huh? Kinugasa's hina doll isn't here. Why? Won't someone make one for me...
123.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, congratulations! Our fleet has finally reached its third anniversary! The sixth fleet, along with Kinugusa, will be in your care!
123.2@Rainy: Hmm, somehow these rainy days make me feel down. Ah? Ugh! Now's not the time to take pics of me, Aoba! How about I take some of you instead!
123.2@EarlySummer: Aoba, it's getting hot. Summer is on the way, huh... eh? A swimsuit? Hmmm, what should I do? Hmmmm.
123.2@Fall: Fall, huh? This time of year is just a little... I don't really like it, ya know? I feel like I have to watch the skies. Maybe I'm worrying too much? Ahahaha...
123.2@Saury: It's saury fishing season! Alright, even I, Miss Kinugasa, shall be lending a hand! Searchlights and lookouts are in place!
123.2@Cold: *whew* I feel like I've overcome something again this year. *sigh* ...Alright! Mood change! Time to face the end of the year at full sail!
123.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas! Admiral, are you having fun? ...Are you okay? It's a stomachache, isn't it? Should I bring you some stomach medicine? Hold on!
123.2@YearsEnd: It's the End of the Year cleaning! End of the Year cleaning! Hey, Aoba, stop taking pictures and help me. Admiral, please say something to her too!
123.2@Spring: Yay! It's gonna be Spring soon! Spring really fills me with energy! I know! Admiral, want to go watch the flowers with the sixth fleet? It'll be fun!
123.2@WhiteDay: Oh! Could this be? A gift in return for Kinugasa-san's specialty chocolate? Hooray! Admiral, thank you!
123.2@Anniversary2018: Isn't today a very important day, Admiral? Being able to spend a day like this with you puts me in a bit of a good mood. Hooray!

142.Poke(1): Are you ok? You're not tired?

62.Intro: I am Myoukou, of the Myoukou-class Heavy Cruisers. Let us work on this together.
62.Library: A heavy cruiser built under the auspices of the Washington Naval Treaty. I'm a first-class warship of the Japanese Navy designed by Yuzuru Hiraga. This name has also been passed on to Aegis destroyers of the modern MSDF.
62.Poke(1): Admiral. Did you call for me?
62.Poke(2): Is there... something I can help you with?
62.Poke(3): If its something difficult to say, shall we talk over there?
62.Married: If the admiral falls, I...please at least rest a bit when you are tired. It is Myoukou's wish.
62.Wedding: I greatly respect the admiral's fabulous strategy and tactics, and always shall.
62.Ranking: It looks like there is a message for you from Command.
62.Equip(1): Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
62.Equip(2): Oh my. I'm getting stronger and stronger. What should I do?
62.Supply: Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
62.Docking(2): Are you sure that someone like myself would be allowed to rest?
62.Construction: Oh, I'll go greet our new addition.
62.Return: The fleet has returned. With wonderful results!
62.Sortie: We must not stand down from this battle!
62.Yasen(1): Then there's no other choice... Moving to pursue!
62.MVP: It's all thanks to everyone's hard work. Do commend them, would you please?
62.Damaged(3): What else... can I possibly do...?
62.Sunk: See you... in another life... good bye.

62.2@Valentines: Admiral, um... If it's okay with you, would you please accept these? ...Ah, these are from... me...
62.2@Anniversary: Admiral, I would like to show my appreciation for your spending time with I, Myoukou, on this important occasion.

62.2@Summer: It has gotten quite hot. It must be summer. Ah, Takao! You're cheerful as always. Eh? A swimsuit, you say?
62.2@Fall: Autumn. In some respects, it's a lonely season. Still, it's perfect for reading, isn't it? Admiral, what will you be reading?
62.2@Xmas: Admiral? Merry Christmas! I gave baking a cake a try. Please have some if you'd like.
62.2@WhiteDay: Eh, Admiral. These cookies are for me? Thank you very much! Let me dig in! Uhuhu, I'm happy!

265.Idle: The admiral seems very busy... In that case, I should do everything I can at hand, so that the admiral may call on me whenever I'm needed.
265.H0000: 0000 hours at night. It's already this late. The day goes fast, doesn't it Admiral?
265.H0100: 0100 hours. Admiral, pushing yourself too hard might be tough on your health.
265.H0200: 0200 hours. This Myoukou will look over the remainder, okay? Admi-... Oh...
265.H0300: 0300 hours. No, I was just taken by surprise when you put the blanket over me.
265.H0400: 0400 hours. Admiral, what should I do with this? Oh? Admiral, are you sleeping?
265.H0500: 0500 hours. I better take care of everything while the admiral's asleep.
265.H0600: 0600 hours. Hngh... It's morning. The admiral's job certainly is a tough one. Oh, a visitor?
265.H0700: 0700 hours. Coming! Oh, Ashigara, what's wrong? You look surprised?
265.H0800: 0800 ho-... Ah, good morning. Ashigara was here just... Admiral? You don't look so good.
265.H0900: 0900 hours. (Sigh) ...Admiral? You forgot your appointment with Ashigara for a discussion over breakfast, didn't you.
265.H1000: 1000 hours. Goodness. I'll make sure to apologize to her in your stead. By the way, about this document...
265.H1100: 1100 hours. Yes, I suppose we'll have an early lunch while we work.
265.H1200: 1200 hou- Oh... another visitor? Come in! Eh-... Haguro? Why are you so teary!? Ah, don't leave!
265.H1300: 1300 hours. Admiral, I see why you're so troubled... Very well. We'll chat after our work.
265.H1400: 1400 hours. Admiral, I don't mean to scold, but can we talk for a minute?
265.H1500: 1500 hours. Admiral, we'll leave out the fact that you're forgetful. But promises are things that are meant to be kept.
265.H1600: 1600 hours. All the girls look forward to seeing you. And forgetting that is... Are you listening to me!
265.H1700: 1700 hours. Now you have plans for dinner with someone as well, don't you?
265.H1800: 1800 hours. Wha-... You want me to make curry tonight? Okay... Very well.
265.H1900: 1900 hours. Here's Myoukou's Special Curry. The meat has been glazed with brandy, and...
265.H2000: 2000 hours. Well then, I'll go patrol the base perimeters. ...Admiral?
265.H2100: 2100 hours. I suppose all the Kanmusus love the admiral anyway. (Giggle)
265.H2200: 2200 hours. Everything is quiet on the base! Oh. Nachi? Where are you going with that bottle of sake?
265.H2300: 2300 hours. Hmm? You had plans to drink with the admiral? (Sigh) Goodness... Admiral, you are unbelievable...

319.Intro: Myoukou-class Heavy Cruiser, Myoukou. Let's do our best together until the end.
319.Poke(3): If it's rather difficult to say, let's move over to the room over there... shall we?
319.Equip(1): Thank you very much for the equipment switch.

319.Supply: Thank you very much for the equipment switch.

63.Intro: You are my commander? I'm Nachi. I appreciate your contribution.
63.Library: Born at the Kure Naval Yards. I am the second of the Myoukou Heavy Cruisers, who was the guardian of Shanghai. I was rushed out to the Pacific front as a flagship of the fifth fleet. Carrier-based planes? Ah, I'm a bit bad with those.
63.Poke(2): What? Do you have a plan?
63.Poke(3): Hmm? What's that you're doing? What kind of tactic is that?
63.Married: You, how are you doing? ...I see, it relieves me. We can sortie more together!
63.Wedding: Hey you… Somehow… I don't hate you…. Yeah, as long as I am with you, I can promise more great victories. Definitely.
63.Equip(2): Hmm, where did you get the blueprints for this remodeling?
63.Docking(1): Looks like I won't be appearing on the front lines for now, huh.
63.Docking(2): Apologies, but let me rest. Recess is part of a battle too.
63.Construction: Looks like a new ship has been launched. Looking forward to it.
63.Return: The report for the battle results is in. Want to hear about it?
63.Sortie: Let's go! Those who afraid just stay where you are!
63.Attack: Enemy to starboard! Take aim carefully!
63.Yasen(1): We will avenge our friends! Pursue them!
63.Yasen(2): One more time... This will be the critical hit!
63.MVP: I can't be getting all excited about this victory now.. we can't let our guard down yet. Nonetheless, tonight let's drink the night away!
63.Damaged(3): A wound like this... It's nothing...
63.Sunk: This is my end, huh... That's acceptable... Fare... thee... well...
63.2@NewYears: Admiral, Happy New Year! I'll be cruising the seas together with you again this year. Alright, first we have to liven things up!
63.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, huh? Well, just for today, why not try having Ponshu? Ashigara, Admiral, what do you think?
63.2@Valentines: I'm not... all that great... with this kind of thing, but... this stuff has a bit of alcohol in it. Here.
63.2@Anniversary: Ah, that's right. Today is a special day. Then I shall drink the night away. Of course, with you.
63.2@EarlySummer: Summer, huh? It's a bit hot, but it isn't unbearable. Well, why don't we open a bottle to rid ourselves of the heat!
63.2@Fall: When this season comes around, for some reason, I start to get a little lonely. That's so unlike me, huh?
63.2@Xmas: Christmas... huh... doesn't sound too bad. Tonight we'll be drinking all the way into the morning! Yes, indeed. Not bad at all!
63.2@WhiteDay: You, what's this? A return gift, right? Well.... This is already enough for the garnishes. *Munch* *Munch* *Chew* *Chew* Sweet....
63.2@Kessen: Alright! It's finally time for me to show you the Nachi-class'... No, wait, the Myoukou-class' true power. Let's do this!

266.Idle: No, I'm not bored. In fact i'm enjoying myself looking at what you're doing.
266.Supply: Supply? I really appreciate it to you.

192.Intro: You're.. still on combat duty? Alright, this Nachi will again, go on the battlefields with you!
192.Poke(2): Mm.. Well then, how about we drink some sake together tonight?
192.Docking(1): I'll rest for a bit, but is Ashigara alright?
192.Battle: Now, witness my very own war!
192.Yasen(1): Alright, we'll sweep up the remnants of the enemy in one go! Nachi squadron, charge!

64.Intro:
Ashigara here. My specialty is surface combat.
Fufu♪ Nice to meet you.
64.Library:
I, Ashigara, am the one who participated in the British Fleet Review.

I was acknowledged as the "Hungry Wolf". Of course I was, with this fearless body!

...Eh? It was a sarcastic remark that has nothing to do with sensuality? That kind of meaning is... There's no way...!
64.Poke(1): What's the matter? Did something happen?
64.Poke(2): What is it? Is it a sortie?
64.Poke(3): P-Please keep your hands to yourself. I can maintain my own equipment.
64.Married: Are you alright? Don't push yourself too hard, okay? Whether it's a rendezvous or a battle, the beginning is the most crucial part! Always face them in top condition!
64.Wedding: To have drawn out the full extent of my abilities... You are... ...I see. You're the first one to have done it!
64.Ranking: You have a message. What's it say?
64.Join: A sortie! The battleground is... Victory is calling out to me!
64.Equip(1): This moment when I become stronger... it's my favorite part!
64.Equip(2): It's magnificent! I can feel the power! Hey, you'll let me fire a test shot, won't you!?
64.Supply: This moment when I become stronger... it's my favorite part!
64.Docking(1): Are you saying my next battle makes you uneasy?
64.Docking(2): Well, you need proper rest if you want to be able to seize victory. Understood! I'll take a break.
64.Construction: Looks like a new girl has arrived. Let's go meet her.
64.Return: The fleet has returned. Looks like the operation is over.
64.Sortie: Ashigara, now sortieing! Look forward to the report of our victory and the results!
64.Battle: Flank speed! Ready the cannons! Aim! Fire!
64.Attack: Lay down a barrage! Fire! Fiiire!
64.Yasen(1): Now, the second act! All ships, charge!
64.Yasen(2): My ten cannons aren't just for show!
64.MVP: This is because I, Ashigara, am here! It's the natural outcome, you know. A major victory!
64.Damaged(3): Damn it... for me to have taken this much damage...
64.Sunk: Victory was the only... the only thing I took pride in...
64.2@NewYears: Happy New Year, Admiral. I'll score a crushing victory again this year. Yeah, absolutely! I'll do it!
64.2@Setsubun: Bean-throwing? That's fine, but try not to throw any at Myoukou-neesan on accident. ...Ah...!
64.2@Valentines: So then, go ahead and take it. This is my Victory Chocolate! If you eat it, victory is assured! Come on!
64.2@Anniversary: Oh my, today is an important occasion for us. And it's a good day to deep fry some Katsus. Right?
64.2@EarlySummer: Summer is on the way, isn't it? I have a good feeling. This is my year!
64.2@Fall: Fall is a lonely season. Alright! At times like this, we need the victory cutlet curry! Alriight! I'll make some!
64.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas! Tonight's main dish will naturally be cutlets! Victory on Christmas Eve. That's right!
64.2@WhiteDay: Ehh? What are these hands for? The return gift for the chocolate has yet.... Aahh.... Eh? Is that so?
64.2@Kessen: As someone known as the "Hungry Wolf", I feel that this will be an important battle! Let's sortie with all our might!

267.Idle: When is the next operation!? Hey, where's the next operation going to be!? Victory is... Battle is... Conflict is calling out to me!!!
267.H0000: Midnight. The date has changed. I, and also the naval base, will be starting up for real from here on!
267.H0100: 0100. The senses are sharper late at night. It's the best...
267.H0200: 0200. Alright~! Image training for the sake of victory! Good night~♪
267.H0300: 0300. zzZZzz... ... ...! Watch out, Admiral! Here, I'll... zzZZzz...
267.H0400: 0400... (...) ...I can take you... all on by myself...! ... ...You're all bark and no bi... ...zzZZzz...
267.H0500: 0500... (...) ...Is there no one with a little... more backbone... The unassailable Ashigara w... ...zzZZzz...
267.H0600: 0600... ...Ah! Huh!? The admiral's gone? Admiral, where are you? Maybe in the next room...?
267.H0700: 0700. Whoa, you surprised me...! Admiral, why are you with Myoukou nee-san!?
267.H0800: 0800. I'm surprisingly hungry. Mamiya-san, a Victory Set, please~!
267.H0900: 0900. Admiral, it goes without saying that breakfast has to be from Mamiya-san's! So good~♪
267.H1000: 1000. It's about time to sortie and score a victory! Heavy Cruiser Division, let's go!
267.H1100: 1100. A heavy cruiser is absolutely the best, you know... with a lupine frame like this! Right!?
267.H1200: 1200. Admiral, lunch is a cutlet sandwich. Naturally— "victory". This is my good luck charm!
267.H1300: 1300! Now, let's get nothing but wins here in the afternoon as well! Victory, here we go!
267.H1400: 1400. So my training wasn't enough... Just like Myoukou nee-san, I've got to get stronger and stronger!
267.H1500: 1500. Myoukou nee-san is incredibly strong. She doesn't look like it at first glance, but she's actually really scary...
267.H1600: 1600. Furthermore... one time when she got fired up, her lecture just went on and on! Eh? You already knew?
267.H1700: 1700. It's about time for everyone on the long expedition to return. How successful will it be?
267.H1800: 1800. Well then, I, secretary ship Ashigara, shall make curry for our victory celebration!
267.H1900: 1900. Okay! Keep the oil coming~! I'll fry them one by one~!
267.H2000: 2000. More than one hundred cutlets... What a sight to behold... This is great! It's going to come true!
267.H2100: 2100. Eh...!? My cutlet curry caused repeated cases of heartburn!? H-How could this happen!?
267.H2200: 2200. Admiral, you don't need to console me or anything... It's so strange... What went wrong?
267.H2300: 2300! Alright~! Mood change complete! I'll do my best again for tonight's battle image training!

193.Intro: Heavy cruiser Ashigara here. If there's surface combat, leave it to me! Let's seize victory together!
193.Poke(1): I, Ashigara, shall have my turn. Ufufu♪
193.Poke(3): Like I said, I can take care of my own equipment- ...Eh? I misunderstood? W-What? Then what is it!?
193.Equip(2): This is great... I can feel my power rising...! Hey! It goes without saying that you'll let me fire a test shot, right!?
193.Construction:
A new girl, huh? ...She's a rival. A rival!
Bring it on♪

193.Yasen(1): I can't just return like this...! Charge! Charge~!

65.Intro: I'm Haguro. I'm the youngest of the Myoukou-class heavy cruiser sisters. U-um... I'm sorry!
65.Library: I was born in Nagasaki. I participated in many battles, in the Battle of the Java Sea, the Battle of the Coral Sea, the Battle of Midway, the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, and the Battle of the Philippine Sea. Um... I try my best!
65.Poke(3): Um... excuse me... Is this some new way of communication?
65.Married: Commander… I hope this war will be over and the sea will get quiet. I pray for it. Commander… you will surely…
65.Wedding: After this battle is over… T-together with the commander..! Erm.. Ummm.. Errrmm…
65.Join: Picking even me... I'll try my absolute best!
65.Equip(1): I... don't need to receive this kind of strength...
65.Equip(2): Um... could you remodel the others too?
65.Supply: I... don't need to receive this kind of strength...
65.Docking(1): The other girls should go first.
65.Docking(2): Okay. Any more and I would have sunk instantly back there.
65.Construction: It seems a new comrade has been launched.
65.Return: The battle is complete... Um... Just reporting...
65.Attack: Guns and torpedoes engaged, I hope this is enough...
65.MVP: As it is, it would be better if all the fighting could end.
65.Sunk: The other girls, could they manage to hold on... Ah, no more, I can't see any more...
65.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the coming year! I'll be counting... on you... again this year...!
65.2@Setsubun: Commander-san, it's Setsubun. Umm... you would like me to be the demon? Eh...? But that's...
65.2@Valentines: U-Um...! Commander-san! Th-This chocolate... I-If it's okay with you, please accept it!
65.2@Anniversary: C-Commander, sir... today is anniversary day, right? I am so happy... Happy indeed. Yes.
65.2@Summer: It's summer, isn't it? ...Huh? "Aren't you going to swim," you asked? Well, I don't have a swimsuit... u-um... eh... ehhhh!?
65.2@Fall: Fall is... so peaceful, isn't it? I really enjoy this season. Commander, what about you?
65.2@Xmas: Commander... Merry Christmas! U-Um... It's a present... please take it if it's okay... Um...
65.2@WhiteDay: What? These lovely cookies - for me!? Commander.... Really, thank you! *Cries*

268.Idle: E, excuse me, Commander…? Haguro is waiting for you here in case of trouble...

194.Intro: Fourth ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Haguro. Together with everyone, I will support the front lines!
194.Poke(2): Commander? ... It's all right, I'm good!
194.Join: Haguro of The Fifth Squadron, heading out!
194.Equip(1): I will cherish the equipment I've received.
194.Equip(2): Please remodel... the other girls first.
194.Supply: I… I'm receiving it, thank you.

194.Damaged(2): I'm hit...second turret!?...I can still continue!

66.Intro: Hello. I'm Takao. I'm glad that you seem like an excellent Admiral.
66.Library: When it comes to heavy cruisers, there's no questioning it— my Takao-class is on top. As a member of Vice-Admiral Kondo's Fourth Division, I participated in many naval battles. Those terribly fierce battles concluded with a struggle to defend Singapore.
66.Poke(1): Feel free to ask me anything.
66.Poke(2): If something is on your mind, won't you please tell me?
66.Poke(3): Well, um... what should I do?
66.Idle: Alriiight, the preparations for the sortie are finished... that aside... I wonder if Atago is working properly... Oh? Admiral? Fufu♪ ...It's fine.
66.Married: Admiral, I'm right here with you... so rest easy.
66.Wedding: These words of praise... perhaps you could express them in a clearer way... Not a medal, but...
66.Ranking: What's this? A message has arrived.
66.Equip(1): What is this...? For such potential to be released from within me... What a wonderful feeling.
66.Equip(2): This power... is all thanks to you.
66.Supply: Thanks for the food. Now I can go back out there.
66.Docking(1): Let's watch over those girls from here!
66.Docking(2): To be forced to rest... even though I can still fight...
66.Construction: It's a new comrade. Let's give her a warm welcome!
66.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned!
66.Attack: Strike at the enemy ship on the starboard side!
66.Yasen(2): Nuts. That is all I have to say to you!
66.MVP: Admiral, were you watching my performance?
66.Damaged(3): W-What? Did you think you could win that way!?
66.Sunk: I'm... sinking, huh...? Good bye... Admiral...
66.Friend41(1): You're being cheeky, Maya. CruDiv 4, arriving on station! Fire!
66.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the coming year! The Takao-class heavy cruisers of the Fourth Cruiser Division will be counting on you again this year! Now, shall we make our shrine visit?
66.2@Setsubun: Atago, you're supposed to eat an amount of beans equal to your age. Eh? You don't want any? I see... Ah, Myoukou-san! Eh? Be the demon!? ...I'd rather not... ...Ehh?
66.2@Anniversary3: What do we have here? It seems to be our third anniversary! Congratulations! I'm also happy about it!
66.2@Valentines: Alright! With this, it's finished! Fufu... I wonder if they will like it? Ufufu...
66.3@Valentines: Ah... um...! If you... would like to... please have these! Ah, yes... I made them... myself.
66.2@Rainy: It's been raining a lot lately, hasn't it? I tell you, this surely is the rainy season! Ah, I-I'm sorry.
66.2@EarlySummer: Hgnnn... Summer is coming soon. Eh? Ah, well, maybe for a bit, I'll go on a diet. Hgnnn...
66.2@Summer: Atago, why are you so underdressed? Even in summer, you have to dress properly. Look, even the admiral is wearing his commander uniform properly... properly... Ahh... um... Admiral?
66.2@Fall: Fall! Fall is the time of year when the Fourth Division can't afford to get careless. Everyone, stay vigilant! In particular, your fall... appetites...
66.2@Saury: Come, Atago, let's go protect the fishing grounds. Fourth Division, sortieing! We're carrying out the saury fishing support operation!
66.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas! Admiral, just for today, you can forget about your commander duties and enjoy a party with us! Oh!? Ah... Atago! Don't interrupt me!
66.2@YearsEnd: Let's start with the cleanup. Please relay that to Choukai and Maya as well. Atago is... huh? She's gone!?
66.2@Spring: It seems a pleasant season has arrived, hasn't it. Flower viewing with the fourth squadron sounds pretty great too. I'll be preparing the bentou with Choukai, is there anything that you would love to have? Seems like things are getting fun!
66.2@WhiteDay: Eh? This is... for me? Return sweets? Thank you very much. I'm happy. Ah, no good, I'm tearing up.
66.4@Valentines2018: The fleet is gathering in port. It's almost time to start the operation.
66.13@Leyte: Cruiser Division 4 will definitely show you how we shine on the battlefield! ...We will!!
66.3@Leyte: Be on ASW high alert, Atago! They'll definitely be coming.
66.2@Homecoming: Thank goodness, Atago. All objectives for Operation Sho-1 have been achieved, Admiral! Our 1st Striking Force has succeeded in crushing the enemy fleet!
66.2@Anniversary2018: Goodness, it's our 5th Anniversary? Congratulations. I'm happy as well.
66.3@Anniversary2019: Aaah, oh my goodness! It's our 6th Anniversary. Congratulations. Admiral, I'm happy too.

269.Married: Admiral, is something wrong? Are you... perhaps a bit tired? I understand. Then, would you like to rest your head on my lap? It's okay if it's for a little bit, so please have a good rest. This is also one of your important responsibilities, after all.
269.Wedding: Admiral, the commander's responsibilities... are more than a little heavy. If you're feeling a bit tired, you're welcome to rest your head on my chest, alright? We can... stay together... from now on... right?

67.Intro: I'm Atago. Admiral, please remember that, okay?
67.Library: Second of the Takao-class, Atago. Ufufu! I was born at the Kure Naval Arsenal. Don't I have a well-balanced and heavily armed body? At the decisive Battle of Leyte Gulf, I deployed as the flagship of the Central Force... Well, things happened, you know?
67.Poke(3): Oh, you. You're just like a baby on the inside, aren't you?
67.Idle: Admiral? Well, now... it looks like Takao might be running a little low on calcium. I wonder if she should drink more milk. A-ouch! Hey... Takao!
67.Wedding: As a reward... for a little while, you and I can swap hats... and see how we look. *swap* Ufufufu♪
67.Equip(2): My upgrade is all done...! Huh? No, I didn't upgrade these. I've always had them!
67.Docking(1): I'm just going to take a quick break, okay?
67.Docking(2): My tanks are so big. They make my shoulders stiff, you know?
67.Construction: My, my. Looks like our circle of friends has grown!
67.Battle: Lots of enemies found! Commencing the attack, okay?
67.Yasen(1): A night battle... this is my specialty!
67.MVP: Do you understand what I'm capable of now~? Ufu♪
67.Sunk: My, my... what a shame... I wonder if Takao is taking this seriously...
67.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the coming year~! Admiral, I'm counting on you again this year, okay? Ufufu♪ Now, let's have a drink of New Year's sake!
67.2@Setsubun: Hmm...? So you're supposed to eat as many beans as your age, huh? Takao, you're surprisingly knowledgeable~ Well, Admiral, how many will you eat? I'll be watching♪
67.2@Valentines: Homemade chocolate is surprisingly hard, isn't it~ The ingredients were really expensive... but... it's done~!
67.3@Valentines: Admiral? We'll be having some of my homemade chocolate as teacakes today. Please look forward to it, okay? Ufufu♪
67.2@Anniversary3: Pan-paka-pa~n! Admiral, congratulations, on our third anniversary. Admiral, everyone, congratulations!
67.2@Rainy: Such a downpour. This is the perfect time for hot milk. No, really. Want to try some?
67.2@EarlySummer: Oh, my, Takao. You started dieting for the summer? It must be hard. Me? I don't need to.
67.2@Summer: This summer is as hot as always~ When it's this hot, I'll be more comfortable doing my job if I dress down some, right? Uu... uwa~h! Much better~♪
67.2@Fall: Fall is... let's see... I also get a little sad around now, you know... But! It's a time of year with really tasty food, you know.
67.2@Saury: My, Takao, aren't you excited to the support the saury fishing? The fishermen will be so happy.
67.2@Xmas: Admiral? Pan-paka-pa~n! I wish you a... Merry Christmas! Here, a present from me. Ah! Now, please open it~ There, it suits you perfectly~! I'm so relieved!
67.2@YearsEnd: I'm... not really good at things like cleaning~ Takao? I'll leave this to you, okay? Ufufu~
67.2@Spring: Spring! It feels nice~ Ah, that's right! Let's have Takao prepare us some bentou and go to the park with everyone! I think it'll definitely feels great!
67.2@WhiteDay: What would be a good gift in return for the Valentines? Let's see. Oh! How about a "1-day Date with Admiral Ticket"? Ufu~
67.2@LateFall2017: It's gotten a bit colder, huh. Shall I make you some hot milk, Admiral? Ufu~ He~re~
67.13@Leyte: I'll show you we can make it to the operation area. That's where the real show starts.
67.3@Leyte: Jeez! I know~ We even have airborne ASW support this time.
67.2@Homecoming: CruDiv4 Flagship, Atago, reporting that the operation is complete! Ehe, we're all safe and sound, Admiral! Thank you! Ehehe~
67.2@Anniversary2018: Panpakapan! Congratulations on the 5th Anniversary, Admiral. Congratulations, everyone. Ufufu~
67.3@Anniversary2019: Paaaanpakapakapaaaan! Admiral, congratulations on the 6th Anniversary. Admiral, Takao, everyone, my sincerest congratulations. Ufufu!

270.Married: Ufufu... Admiral, what's wrong? Huh? Are your shoulders stiff? What a coincidence— mine are stiff, too! Oh... you're going to massage them? Hah... that feels great...! Admiral, you're good at this. It feels really nice! I'll let Takao give it a try next time as well! Ahhh~ right there...
270.Wedding: Eh? This is for me... is it? Really? I'm... very, very serious about these things, you know! That's fine? I see... then... please place it onto this finger! Ufufu! It's beautiful...! Admiral, thank you! I will always, always treasure it.

68.Intro: Yo! Name's Maya, nice to meet you.
68.Library: Third of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Maya-sama! Kobe-built. I went hard in the Southern Ops and Solomon battles! Haah? Leyte? Nah, I'm not great with subs.
68.Wedding: Thanks for always using my full power, man. This too... I thank...you.
68.Equip(1): Yeaaah! I'm fired up! Here I go!
68.Supply: Yeaaah! I'm fired up! Here I go!
68.Docking(1): Pulling me back, will the fleet be okay?
68.Docking(2): Using me until I'm like this... dammit!
68.Construction: I heard there's a newbie. Let's take care of her!
68.Sortie: If you're afraid, just hide behind me.
68.Attack: Here comes my pain train, eat it!
68.Yasen(1): Looks like you're getting on my nerves, bub.

68.Friend41(1): Ah, let's go, Choukai. We'll show them our strength! Aneki, are you all ready too? Don't fall behind!

68.2@Setsubun: Here we go, Choukai! I'm throwin' the beans! Urya... uryaurya!! ...Why ya runnin' away!!?
68.2@Valentines: What now? Valentine's? Ugh, c'mon! Well, anyways... I kinda got ya some. Here!
68.16@Valentines: I can't stand sweet things! You can take this and shove it!!
68.2@Rainy: Lately it's been all damp and wet, huh. Would be cool if the weather would just clear up already. I wish!
68.2@Summer: Alright! It's summer! Summer! It feels great, huh? Admiral, let's take off our clothes and go for a swim!
68.2@Fall: Man, the summer I was looking forward to is over with. Now we're stuck with this gloomy season. Ah... achoo!
68.2@Xmas: Christmas, right? Well, whatever. This "champagne" alcohol is really... well, tell me what you think. ...So, Admiral?
68.2@WhiteDay: Oh. The return gift for the chocolate? Thank you, Admiral. Although I can't stand sweets, maybe I'll try to eat this?
68.3@Valentines2018: C'mon, Choukai, I know. We got our remodels for this day. We won't die in vain. This is why we're here.
68.3@Leyte: Go on ahead, Choukai. Go on... ahead of me.
68.13@Leyte: Let's do this! CruDiv 4, Maya, taking the stage!!!
68.19@Leyte: Huh!? As if an attack like that would work!
68.17@Leyte: Over there right? I got it. Take thiiiiis!!
68.2@WhiteDay2018: Oh, that's right. I did give you something. Thank you. Let's see~ *nom* Ooh, it's delicious. No way, it's handmade!?
68.2@Spring2018: Hey, what are you doing, Choukai? ...Ah, a lunch box for the cherry blossom viewing? Very nice. *Nom*... That's good! Now where is the booze... Ow!
68.2@Anniversary2018: So it's finally our 5th Anniversary? Admiral, Choukai, thanks for everything. Ah, yeah, I'm glad.
68.2@LateFall2018: Aaaaaah... This kotatsu is really useful. Even if you sleep in light clothes, it has this enveloping warmth... Aah, I'm seriously... sleepy...
68.3@LateFall2018: Aaaaaah... This kotatsu is really useful. Even if you sleep in light clothes, it has this enveloping warmth... Aah, I'm seriously... sleepy...
68.3@Anniversary2019: Seriously? It's finally our 6th Anniversary? Admiral, Choukai, Aneki, thanks for everything. What? You're making me blush.

271.Intro: Yo, Admiral! Working hard? Cause today is another day for me to kick some ass!
271.Idle: Hey! Admiral! Are you listening? Hey! ...Damn, he won't listen. The hell!? Sheesh...

428.Poke(2): Admiral~ calm down a bit will ya? Why dontcha just follow MY example! ...Eh? "You're one to talk"!?

69.Intro: My name is Choukai. It's a pleasure.
69.Library:
Fourth of the Takao-class ships, Choukai here.

Malaya, Solomon, Marianas and Leyte Gulf were among the operations I participated in.

My name is presently inherited by a JSDF AEGIS-equipped escort vessel, fourth in its class.
69.Poke(1): Ah... Commander! Thanks for the hard work.
69.Poke(2): Do you have any orders for me as of yet?
69.Poke(3): Ah...! Is this... also some kind of duty I must perform!?
69.Married: I'm... forever grateful to you. It's an honor to be with you.
69.Wedding: If you're ever perplexed by a strategy, you can always come to me. We'll analyze it— just the two of us!
69.Equip(1): So you're modernizing me...? That's wonderful!
69.Equip(2): This is... it has a good feel to it!
69.Supply: So you're modernizing me...? That's wonderful!
69.Docking(2): Indeed... it seems I went a little overboard.
69.Construction: A newcomer. Aren't you also... curious about her?
69.Return: I'm reporting in about the completed operation.
69.Sortie: Right, let's proceed! Let's do this!
69.MVP: This is in accordance with my predictions. Naturally, it was made possible because of your strategy.
69.Damaged(3): My predictions didn't... This shouldn't be happening...!
69.Sunk: There was... a flaw in my predictions... ...I'm so sorry...
69.Friend41(1): CruDiv 4, all ships have arrived on the battlefield. Ready, Maya? We'll blast them out of the water. Open fire!
69.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the coming year. Along with Maya, we'll be counting on you in the coming year!
69.2@Setsubun: H-Hey... Maya... Even though it's Setsubun, you shouldn't throw so many beans... I mean, where did...! C-Come on...! I'm getting angry!
69.2@Valentines: According to my calculations, this level of sweetness would be best. Ah... um... these chocolates... please accept them.
69.16@Valentines: Ah... this bulge... While I was making the homemade chocolate, did I eat a few too many?
69.2@Rainy: Commander. The rainy season is quite calming, isn't it.... Eh, am I wrong? I-I am sorry....
69.2@EarlySummer: It's summer, isn't it? Eh!? A swimsuit? Umm... no. For me, things like that are... ah... yes... Then, next time...
69.2@Fall: Autumn is such a calming season. I especially enjoy evenings in autumn. Commander, what about you?
69.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas! While it is a Western festival, it's quite a wonderful one, isn't it? Here, have some cake!
69.2@WhiteDay: This.... A return gift for the chocolate.... T-thank you very much, I'm so happy.
69.2@Valentines2018: It's almost time for Operation Sho-1. CruDiv 4, sortie at full force. Are you ready, Maya?
69.4@Valentines2018: Okay. Then, can you take this? It's fine, I have two. Would you please?
69.3@Leyte: Yes, Maya. I won't be careless! I'll do this with all my might.
69.2@Homecoming: CruDiv4, Choukai, operation complete! We can go home together this time, Commander... *sob*... Thank you.
69.2@Spring2018: Ah, Takao. Yes, lunch boxes for the cherry blossom viewing? Let me help you... Ah, hey, Maya! No sneaking a bite!
69.2@Anniversary2018: It's finally our 5th Anniversary. Congratulations, and thank you for everything.
69.3@LateFall2018: It's cold, but braving winter is a good thing, right? Right, Maya? Maya? Ah, jeez. You'll catch a cold.
69.2@WhiteDay2019: Uh-ummm... Thank you very much. I'm happy.
69.3@Anniversary2019: It's our 6th Anniversary, right? My sincerest congratulations. And Commander, thank you for everything.

272.Idle: I'm confident in my night warfare capability, but... about the enemy aircraft... I see... so I should act as Maya would... Uhm... but, but...
272.Supply: Right... For these precious supplies... as always, you have my thanks!

427.Intro: Choukai, reporting in. I'd be honored if could work with you again today.
427.Poke(1): Choukai, reporting in. It's my intention to return the favor of remodeling me through such things as night warfare.
427.Join: Eighth Fleet flagship Choukai, setting sail. Starting the sortie!
427.Battle:
Over there. They're exactly where I had anticipated.
Enemy fleet spotted! All ships, begin the assault!

427.Damaged(1): Ow...! The bridge was hit!? I... I'm fine! I can still fight!

70.Intro: I'm Mogami. It's alright, I won't collide with anyone this time. Really!
70.Library: I'm the heavy cruiser Mogami-class nameship, Mogami. Aren't Three-barreled main guns great? Yeah, yeah, I've got a habit of bumping into the other ships, I wonder why?
70.Poke(3): If you're too persistent, I'll get a bit mad, you know.
70.Idle: Admiral! Oh, you're busy? I'm going out for some workout.
70.Married: I'm always crashing because I've only got eyes for you, Admiral! Just kidding!
70.Wedding: Ah, Admiral? Somehow, my rear cannon feels a bit off. Hey, could you take a quick look? Yeah, that's the spot…hey, that's not it!
70.Docking(2): Dang, my stern cannons got damaged a little bit.
70.Battle: Hey, is it okay to start now?
70.Yasen(1): I'd better not have a collision...
70.MVP: I'm number one? Hmm, yeah... to be frank, I'm happy, thanks!
70.Damaged(3): Argh! This'll make it hard to keep going on...
70.Sunk: I'm sinking too... was it inevitable?...
70.2@NewYears: Admiral, have a Happy New Year! I and the other aviation cruisers are counting on you again this year!
70.2@Valentines: Here! Give my chocolate a try, okay? I can't guarantee the flavor, though... Oh? Thank goodness! That makes me happy, too!
70.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, I heard it's our third anniversary! That's amazing! Could it be because we are such shy people, Admiral? ...Just kidding! Hehe♪
70.2@Rainy: Mikuma, what's wrong? You don't look too great there. Ah I know, shall we invite Suzuya and Kumano and have a tea party or something? 'Kay?
70.3@Rainy: Admiral, hold still for a bit. See? Wearing your hat this way is cooler!
70.2@Summer: Mikuma, what's wrong? Why the long face? Ah, I know! How about we get some ramune? My treat.
70.2@Fall: So it's fall, huh? Ah, Michishio. This season... doesn't it make you a feel a little tightness in your chest? I wonder why that is.
70.2@Saury: Ehh~ Saury fishing, huh. Sounds good. I'll pitch in, too! What equipment do I need? First of all, I'll need something that casts a light!
70.2@Xmas: Admiral, Merry Christmas! Well, it sounds nice. I really like it. It's fun!
70.2@YearsEnd: Mikuma is really into the New Year's cleaning. I wonder if she really likes cleaning? Well, that's fine.
70.2@Spring: Mikuma, flower viewing? Sure! How about we invite Hyuuga-san too?
70.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, what is it? "What would be good gift in return for the chocolates?" Let's see. How about "a day to be fawned over by the Admiral"?
70.3@WhiteDay: Yeah, right. Just kidding. We all know the lonely one who wants to be pampered is you, Admiral. Haha, that was a joke too.
70.2@Kessen: The final battle, huh. We're heading to war again. Fine then, let's smash them!
70.2@Setsubun2019: It's Setsubun. Yep, I'll give it a shot since I have the chance. Demons begone! Fortune welcome! U-uhoh!

73.Intro: We meet again, Admiral. It's Mogami. How's my flight deck? Does it suit me?
73.Library: First of the Mogami-class heavy cruisers. By taking off my stern cannons and replacing them with an aviation deck, the Aviation Cruiser was developed! Equal fire and air power, howzat!
73.Poke(1): Admiral, have you got something for me to do?
73.Poke(2): You interested in my flight deck?
73.Poke(3): Yeaaah, well, I am different from the regular carriers. If you use me well, I think it'll be interesting, you know?
73.Wedding: Admiral, wassup? What's with that look? Is there something up with my flight deck?
73.Ranking: Looks like there's a notice for the admiral
73.Equip(1): Ooh, you're gonna make me even stronger?
73.Equip(2): So you use it like this... huh~
73.Docking(1): Going in for repairs. Why do I keep running into friends...? This sucks...
73.Docking(2): Aaah... my long-awaited flight deck came to nothing, damnit...
73.Return: The operation is over, the fleet has come back
73.Yasen(2): Gathering the rains of summer, how swift it is... Basho, right?
73.MVP: This is my true power, dude. 'cause I'm something like the pioneer of the helicopter destroyers, you know?
73.Damaged(3): Damnit! A direct hit... that's no joke...
73.Sunk: Ugh...I wonder if I can apologize to Mikuma in the other world...
73.H0200: 0200. Say, I didn't know I have to do night shifts.
73.H0300: 0300. *yawn* Eh? You're still working in this late time? Thank you for your work!
73.H0400: 0400. *big yawn* Man, Admiral sure works hard.
73.H0500: 0500. Huh? Ah, I was dreaming a bit just now.
73.H0600: 0600. What was my dream about? That's a secret!
73.H0700: 0700. Is it OK if I sleep now?
73.H0800: 0800. Oh, come on. Your office has a futon, right?
73.H0900: 0900. Ehh? You've packed the futon? Well, the kotatsu is fine too.
73.H1000: 1000. Your eyes are wide open when you're bustling.
73.H1200: 1200. Admiral, let's fill up at lunch, okay?
73.H1300: 1300. I'm stuffed! Dessert goes in a different stomach, though.
73.H1400: 1400. Mmm, Mamiya's ice cream is delicious! Admiral, you got cream on your face... Yep, there you go!
73.H1500: 1500. If the meal comes with dessert, I guess I can do the night shift.
73.H1600: 1600. I managed to eat a lot, but I'm sleepy now.
73.H1700: 1700. I'm so tired, I feel like I can sleep while walking...Oh, sorry!
73.H1800: 1800. This... This is the admirals office!? Why!?
73.H1900: 1900. The admiral carried me here!? I'm really sorry!
73.H2000: 2000. Wah! I'm supposed to make curry for dinner tonight!... Hm... this smell....
73.H2100: 2100. Admiral, As a backup, Kumarinko brought some curry she made. Well, let's dig in!
73.H2200: 2200. Eating curry together with the admiral makes it delicious. I could eat it every day!
73.H2300: 2300. So, Admiral, we're finished with everything, right?

120.Intro: Greetings, I'm Mikuma. I wonder where Mogami could be hiding?
120.Library: I get along very well with Mogamin, the first ship in the Mogami class, but we get along too well sometimes and collide often... Yeah... literally... I do watch where I'm going, okay?
120.Poke(2): Admiral, let's do our best today as well.
120.Poke(3): Admiral, you're too close, too clooose.
120.Idle: Really, Admiral... I thought you'd forgotten about me.
120.Wedding: Admiral, for taking such great care of me up until now, my gratitude is boundless. Umm.. If it's okay, afterwards, together with Mikuma…. Kumarinko!
120.Ranking: Well! Intelligence for the admiral? Would I be able to see it too, I wonder?
120.Equip(2): Admiral, how does it look? Does it suit me?
120.Equip(3): Would it be alright if I said 'Kumakuma'?
120.Docking(2): I will just take a short break...
120.Construction: A newcomer? It would be good if they were a good one.
120.Return: The fleet has returned safely. Phew...
120.Sortie: Where is Mogamin? I always have to watch out for her...
120.Yasen(1): Night battles are my specialty, you know!
120.MVP: Because the admiral chose me, I could do my best! I humbly accept your gratitude.
120.Damaged(1): Just how angry will you make me!
120.Damaged(3): Aaa... Kumarinko's western clothes..! That's going too far!
120.Sunk: Please... Don't look... I don't want anyone... To see me while I sink...
120.H0100: 0100. Admiral, are you you going to be staying up late tonight?
120.H0400: It is now 0400. Admiral, why don't you just go to bed?
120.H0500: It's 0500. Admiral, if you work too hard, you damage your body.
120.H0700: 0700. Admiral, what would you like for breakfast?
120.H0800: 0800. Let's do our best together today as well, okay?
120.H1100: 1100. What should would you like for lunch?
120.H1200: 1200. I want to have lunch together~
120.H1300: 1300. You always get tired after eating, don't you?
120.H1500: 1500. Admiral, you're still holding strong here!
120.H1700: 1700. Admiral, it's already evening, isn't it?
120.H1800: 1800. Admiral, do you wish to go for dinner? Or perhaps, off for a drink?
120.H1900: 1900. Well, Admiral, it is tasty? ...thank goodness.
120.H2000: 2000. How about having a bath now?
120.H2100: 2100. Is it okay for me to have a rest now?
120.H2200: 2200. Admiral, it's almost time for that. Tha~t♪
120.H2300: 2300. I did my best today as well.
120.2@NewYears: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! Mogamin and I will be counting on you again this year.
120.2@Valentines: Admiral, I would like to give you some of my special Kumarinko Chocolate. Here, this is it! You don't need to hold back.
120.3@Valentines: Admiral, what did you think of my Kumarinko Chocolate's flavor? ...Eh? You haven't tried it yet? Please don't hold back and have some soon, okay?
120.2@Hina: Hinamatsuri, Ohina-sama is cute! Odairi-sama is Mogamin, Ohina-sama is Mikuma, ufufufu... should I make it?
120.2@Anniversary3: Kumarinko! Admiral, it's our third anniversary! Congratulations!
120.2@Rainy: The rainy days are continuing nonstop. I'm a little bad with this kind of season. For some reason, this time of year brings a melancholy feeling with it. I can't go on like this, can I?
120.2@EarlySummer: I wonder what Mogamin is going to do for her swimsuit this year. I want to have new matching swimsuits.
120.3@Summer: In the end, we couldn't buy matching swimsuits. Eh? Admiral, you want to play beach volleyball? Kumarinko is... I'm fine.
120.2@Fall: Fall! It's a time of year when everything looks so appetizing! No... Mikuma, you can't lose to your appetite here! Mogamin wouldn't like it if you got fat.
120.2@Saury: Saury? Is that an upper class fish? Hmm... I'm not sure I really want any. ...Ah! Delicious! Saury tastes so good!
120.2@Xmas: A Merry Christmas to you! I really love Christmas Cake! Admiral, what about you? Okay, say "ahh".
120.2@YearsEnd: Admiral, Happy New Year. Please take care of Mogamin and me this year.
120.2@Spring: Admiral, it is almost Spring. Together with Mogamin, the three of us should prepare bento and go for flower viewing. Mikuma is looking forward to it!
120.2@WhiteDay: Admiral! This is in return for the Kumarinko Chocolate? I'm happy! Please look forward to the Super Kumarinko Chocolate next year, alright?
120.2@LateFall2017: It's gotten pretty cold out. My legs feel so breezy in this skirt. Ah, a muffler, Mogami? Thank you. Let's share it.
120.2@Anniversary2018: Today is a wonderful day, Admiral. Kumarinko~
120.2@Setsubun2019: I'll throw some beans too. Mi-kuma! Mi-kuma! Oh no. Mogami, I'm sorry.

121.Intro: Admiral, I've attained a new form!
121.Poke(1): I will be troubled if you believe that I am the same as before.
121.Poke(2): With this, I'll surely catch up to Mogamin.
121.Poke(3): Admiral, I wonder if you could please return my flight deck?
121.Ranking: Well, well! A new communique? Can I see it?
