121.Sortie: I want Mogamin to see this, my big performance!
121.Battle: Well now, let's begin my three-dimensional air AND surface actions!
121.Attack: Seaplanes, I'll leave this to you.
121.Yasen(1): To be honest, nighttime is a little scary...
121.Yasen(2): Next, the bombardment phase... Mi... Kuma!

124.Intro: I'm Suzuya! What a lively fleet this is. I'm in your care!
124.Library: I'm Mogami-class heavy cruiser #3. I was born at the Yokosuka Naval Arsenal. Hmhm♪ See, cruiser names come from rivers, so "Suzuya" comes from the Suzuya river in Sakhalin. Did ya know that?
124.Poke(3): I told you not to touch my deck knee socks like that! Geez!
124.Idle: Admiraaal, I am seriously bored here... aren't we gonna sortie? I-want-to-sor-tie!
124.Married: That girl, Kumano... I hope she's doing okay... right, Admiral?
124.Wedding: Admiral! I know I'm getting kinda serious on you, but thanks for trusting a ship like me with so many jobs! Just wanted to say thanks... ehe♪ ...Eh... ah... well anyway, as always, I'm in your care!
124.Ranking: Heeere. A written report addressed to you.
124.Join: Mogami-class heavy cruiser, Suzuya! Here I go!
124.Equip(2): Ooh~ I won't lose to Kumano with this!
124.Docking(1): Man, you really do get hungry after a workout, huh?
124.Construction: Looks like a cute girl is on the way, y'know?
124.Return: The fleet has returned~ Nice work~
124.Battle: Well, well... let's get this attack moving!
124.MVP: Well, it's only natural. I'm the type who lives off of praise. Praise me a lot, okay?
124.Damaged(3): Crap... This is seriously embarrassing... Don't look at me! Ugh... I'm so done with this mission...
124.Sunk: N-No way... my torpedo tube... exploded...? That... can't be good...
124.H0000: Twelve midnight. It's really gonna be night after this!
124.H0100: 1 o'clock, huh... Admiral, you're a night owl, too?
124.H0200: It's 2 o'clock! I'm getting the munchies...
124.H0300: 3 o'clock already! If it's this late, let's just do an all-nighter.
124.H0500: 5 o'clock, huh? Man, I wanna crash for a bit...
124.H0600: It's 6 o'clock! Now would be a good time for sleep!
124.H0700: 7 o'clock! Ahh... time to do the morning news...
124.H0900: It's 9 o'clock! Let's go get 'em again today!
124.H1000: It's 10 o'clock! Where we going today?
124.H1200: Yeeaaah, it's 12 o'clock! I wanna eat curry again today♪
124.H1300: Already 1 o'clock? It's not Friday, but we're having curry! Curry made just for us ship girls!
124.H1400: 2 o'clock! Admiral, I'm taking a nap! Nap time.
124.H1500: 3 o'clock... Ah... sorry. Nodded off there...
124.H1600: 4 o'clock. Hey, why don't we have some tea?
124.H1800: 6 o'clock! I'm getting the jitters for some reason~
124.H1900: It's 7 o'clock. What're we doing for dinner?
124.H2000: 8 o'clock, huh? Now we're starting the good part of the day~
124.H2100: Well, it's 9 o'clock. Are the expeditions done yet...?
124.H2200: Already 10 o'clock, huh? Another day passed right by...
124.H2300: 11 o'clock! Oh, yeah! My night engine is all fired up!
124.2@NewYears: Admiral, have a Happy New Year! I'm counting on you again this year, y'know! So! Where's my New Year's gift~?
124.2@Setsubun: It's Setsubun... Kumano, do you have any plans for Setsubun? Ahh... she's talking with her mouth full... ohh...
124.2@Valentines: Heeey...! Admiral, here's my chocolate, just~for~you~♥ Fufu♪ Looking forward to the return gift, nihihihi♪
124.2@Anniversary: Cheese! Isn't today an anniversary, Admiral? Suzuya is happy, too, yup!
124.2@Rainy: Ugh... it's all wet and humid... I won't be able to do aaanything in the rainy season.
124.2@EarlySummer: Argh. It's gotten pretty hot. Ugh, it's all hot and humid. Kumano, you don't mind it?
124.2@Summer: It's summer, isn't it! Summer! Kumano, let's go for a swim in our new swimsuits! Hm? Hmhm... are you coming, too, Admiral?
124.2@Fall: Fall, huh? This part of the year is kind of a downer... right, Kumano? Um, Kumano? Are you listening?
124.3@Fall: Ah, that sandwich? Yup, it turned out great, if I do say so myself. Ehehe♪ I put it together along with Kumano. Should I make more?
124.2@Saury: Saury? Yeah, I do like to eat them, but... Whaa... We're going fishing for them? Seems like it'd be really slimy work. I don't wanna do it...
124.2@Xmas:
Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas~ Admiral, it's a Merry Christmas!
Okay! So, my present... where's it at? Hm~?
124.2@WhiteDay: Woah! What's this package? You gonna give it to me? Ah hah, thank you, Admiral! What did I get, what did I get? Heehee....
124.3@Saury2017: Saury fishing? Fine♪ I'll lend you a hand! Ah, 'Bari! What equipment do I need?
124.2@Anniversary2018: Thanks! It's the 5th Anniversary! The~ 5th~ Anniversary~! Amazing, great, super! I know! Kumano, let's take a commemorative photo with the Admiral. For memories.

129.Join: Mogami-class aviation cruiser, Suzuya! Here I go~!

503.Join: 'Kay! It's the modified Suzuya-class' turn. Revised aviation cruiser, Suzuya! Here I go~!

125.Intro: Good day to you. I am the heavy cruiser Kumano.
125.Library: The stylish Kobe-born heavy cruiser, why, it can only be myself, Kumano. At the famous Malaya, Midway, Solomon and Marianas hard-fought battles, I, of course, participated. I did want to return to Japan at the end however...
125.Poke(1): Oh, is it time for work? Aren't you the lazy one...
125.Poke(2): My, Admiral, do you have something for me to do?

71.Intro: I am Tone! With my addition to the fleet, there will be no problems searching out the enemy!
71.Library: The last completed heavy cruiser of the Japanese Navy, oldest sister of the Tone-class, Tone. At Pearl Harbor and Midway, as the eye for the fleet, I unceasingly watched the length and breadth of the ocean. I ended out the war protecting the Kure Naval Yards as a floating fortress, fighting until my blades were broken, arrows were depleted.
71.Poke(3): Admiral, you appear to have copious free time? Battle preparations and logistics are important, are they not?
71.Wedding: That's right, my scouts have found the enemy fleet!! ...Eh? Enough of that? ...Then what is it? What is this?
71.Ranking: A communique has arrived. Shall you be confirming it?

71.Docking(1): Yes. Indeed. Frequent refits bring about triumphs!
71.Docking(2): Grr.... Even I get tired. For now... to sleep!
71.Return: Operation complete. The fleet has returned.
71.Attack: No way, you say the catapult is in bad condition?

71.MVP: As long as I'm here, it's victory as expected! Because I am "the" older sister, compared to that Chikuma!
71.Damaged(3): Direct hit!? ...I shall not sink with merely this!
71.Sunk: I have blundered...! I am sinking, no? The siesta of a million years...

176.Intro: Guten morgen! I'm the heavy cruiser, Prinz Eugen. I'll be in your care!
176.Library: Woah! You startled me! Ah... I am the German-born heavy cruiser, Prinz Eugen. Admiral Hipper-class, third ship. Along with Bismarck onee-sama, I took part in Operation Rheinübung. A lucky ship... ...me? I'll be fighting in this sea, too!
176.Poke(1): Woah! You surprised me! ...A-Aye! Setting off!
176.Poke(3): Admiral! Will we be doing the Rheinübung? ...Ah, huh? So we won't... Anyway, I'll still work hard! Leave it to me!

176.Married: Woah...! Admiral, if you're tired, you need to take a little break. Definitely! Got it?
176.Wedding: Admiral, you said you needed something? Wha- t-this is for me? U-Umm, Bismarck onee-sama is... a-ah... u-um... da... danke! I'll treasure it!!
176.Ranking: Fleet intelligence, right? Wait just a moment... Oh... oh, oh.... so that's how it is?

176.Damaged(1): Wha...!? I got hit! But still, I can...!
176.Damaged(2): Uu... I need to snap out of it...
176.Damaged(3): At this rate, Bismarck onee-sama is going to laugh at me...!

176.2@Setsubun: So this part of Japanese culture is "Setsubuuun~!" I should throw this bean at Nagato? ...Ei! Oh?!
176.2@Anniversary: Today is a wonderful day! Good work as usual, Admiral! Ehehe.

177.Poke(1): Oh...! Roger that! Prinz Eugen, sortieing!
177.Damaged(2): I won't sink from something like this...! Return fire!
177.H0000: Woah!? It's exactly midnight! For today, it'll be my duty to notify you of the time. Alright, I've got it! Leave it to me!
177.H0100: It's now 1 a.m.! Was that okay, you think? Ah, I see! Thank goodness!
177.H0200: It's 2 a.m. In this country, you say... ushi-mitsu-doki-tte-iu-no? Ahh, that sounds a little funny to me.
177.H0300: Woah, you startled me! Ah, my hairstyle... you mean? Ahh! It's now 3 a.m.!
177.H0400: *stretch*... It's 4 a~m. ...nn... As expected, I'm a bit tired... but... I'm fine.
177.H0500: It's now 5 o'clock! Guten morgen! And what a nice morning it is! Let's do our best!
177.H0600: 6 o'clock. Breakfast, huh... eh? M-Me!? G-Got it! Leave it to me! Umm... hmm, what should I make? I wonder if I should make some for Bismarck onee-sama, too? Should I?
177.H0700: Okay! Today's breakfast is bread, sausage, and cheese. There's also salad... and of course, have some hot coffee! It's fairly typical, but delicious, right? Ah, it's exactly 7 o'clock now.
177.H0800: It's now 8 o'clock. So then, Admiral, let's break down today's operations! Shall we start with exercises? Or maybe expeditions?
177.H0900: It's 9 a.m. Hm? Ah, it's Nagato! Heeey, Naagatooo! ...Hm? Do I remember where we met? Well, of course I do! ...Ah... that is... huh? Ehehe... where was it...?
177.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. A battleship? 'Course! Together with Bismarck onee-sama, we'll sink it in no time! Leave it to us!
177.H1100: It's now 11 a.m. It's almost lunchtime, huh? For today, let's have lunch outside, okay?
177.H1200: Ah, it's already noon! It's midday! For lunch, does having cheese and bread outside sound good? Since it's so nice, shall we have a beer, ☆too? Aha, maybe not...
177.H1300: It's now 13 o'clock. Time to start the afternoon operations. Let's do our best!
177.H1400: 14 o'clock. Eh? What, what? Sakawa? Ah! I know her. She's that cute light cruiser.
177.H1500: 15 o'clock. Ah, you mean this? Yup! This is my rigging from Operation Cerberus. What do you think? Does it suit me~?
177.H1600: It's now 16 o'clock. Woah! You startled me, Bismarck onee-sama! You'd like to sortie together with me? Yes, certainly.
177.H1700: 17 o'clock. It's evening now. It's going to start getting dark. *sigh* Such a beautiful sky... Ah, of course, Bismarck onee-sama is even more beautiful!
177.H1800: It's 18 o'clock. I'll start preparing dinner. For today, does kaltes essen sound good? Eh... not in the mood? You'd prefer something warm?
177.H1900: It's 19 o'clock. Well then, I tried to make Eisbein pot-au-feu for dinner. You don't mind if the flavoring soaks into the soup, right? And finally, if you add in rice to make it a porridge, it's delicious!
177.H2000: It's now 20 o'clock. Japanese heavy cruisers are pretty well-rounded, huh? Hmm, hmm... mmm, I see~... hmm, hmm...
177.H2100: 21 o'clock. Huh? A signature move...? Let's see... I spent a lot of time shelling hordes of advancing enemy tanks! I'm pretty good at that! Yup!
177.H2200: It's completely dark out— 22 o'clock. Admiral, as always, good work on today's operations!
177.H2300: It's 23 o'clock. Hm, it's about time I was relieved so I can rest... Gute nacht... Huh? I can't...?

448.Intro: Buon giorno! I am the first of the Zara-class Heavy Cruiser, Zara! "Tenacity" is my motto. Please to meet you, Admiral!
448.Library: I'm the first of the Zara-class heavy cruisers, Zara! I don't mean to brag, but I won't lose to any other heavy cruiser in a gunnery duel! I'm a little worried about my little sister, Pola, but that's neither here nor there... Admiral, I'm going to do my best! Heavy Cruiser Zara will join your fleet!
448.Poke(1): That's right, it's me, Zara. At the ready!
448.Poke(2): I wonder if Pola is alright... Ah... Yes, I'm ready anytime!
448.Poke(3): Even though I said tenacity is my strong point.... this is going too far ! Admiral, I'm going to get angry !
448.Idle: Eh? Pola? She still carries a bottle of booze? That's sounds typically bad. Admiral, where did you saw her? I need to look for her...
448.Married: Admiral, come sta? Good, I'm relieved! Of course, I'm worried about Pola too, but right now it's just us two, right? Hehe... Oh! I didn't mean it in that way, but...
448.Wedding: Admiral, what's the matter? This is... eh? A ring? Admiral, you want to remember me even more? I see... It seems my tenacity hits you as well, is it? Hehe... Grazie, Admiral.
448.Ranking: Intelligence? Yes! I have it with me.
448.Join: Zara-class heavy cruiser, Zara, set sail! Away to the fleet, sally go!
448.Equip(1): I'm actually a Treaty heavy cruiser... Ah, this is good! Good indeed.
448.Equip(2): Torpedo tubes...? No, I don't need it. It's not needed for me. But I don't mind equipping it.
448.Docking(1): They got me. Sorry. I'm going to the shower. Just a moment, I'll be done in a moment.
448.Docking(2): Sheesh... my clothes and equipment is in shambles! I still lack toughness! But next time I will succeed!
448.Construction: Admiral, A new ship has been constructed.
448.Sortie: Pola, you okay? No booze for you today. Zara's fleet, moving out! Follow my lead!

448.Yasen(1): Night battle... Sounds good. Finally we, the Zaras will show what we're made of. All fleets, follow my lead. We're breaking through!
448.Yasen(2): Battery number four, I'm counting on you. My tenaciousness is depending on this shot!
448.MVP: Eh? I'm number one? Grazie! I'll take the prize. Hehe...
448.Damaged(3): Kya! My plate won't fall off from just that!
448.Sunk: It's cold...water is... I see... Pola, don't drink too much... Okay?... I will...be going...ahead...
448.2@NewYears: Buon Anno! Admiral, Happy New Year. Pola and I are counting on you again this year!
448.2@Setsubun: Setsuuboon? That can't be it! That intonation is weird! Eh? Roma-san, what is it? Eh? Ehhhh? ...That's also a little...
448.2@Valentines: Here Admiral, my special espresso chocolate! It has a bit of a mature bitterness. Please taste it.
448.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, it's the third anniversary! That's fantastic! Allow Zara to celebrate too. Congratulations!
448.2@Rainy: "Tsuuyou" is what you call this time of year, right? With such a variety of names based on the season, Japan sure is an interesting place. No, I don't mind it at all.
448.2@EarlySummer: Swimsuit? No, I didn't bring one, but maybe I can buy one? Hmmmm.
448.2@Fall: I like autumn. After all, this is the time of year when I was commissioned. I like how it makes me feel a little at ease. Right, Pola? Wha... you're off drinking! I said you can't!
448.2@Saury: Saury! Yeah, it's great. It works well in pizza and pasta! I'll help! What should I do?
448.2@Xmas: Buone Feste! Admiral? Here! Your present! A present from you would be... um... I... it'd be nice!
448.2@Spring: The Japanese cherry blossoms... Hmmm, sounds good. I'll have to work hard on my new Spring pasta! Admiral, be sure to eat it!
448.2@WhiteDay: Admiral! Is this Zara's return sweets? Grazie! I'm looking forward to opening it later!
448.2@Summer2017: I bought a swimsuit. Hey, do you think it's a bit flashy, Pola? Wha, Pola! What are you doing!?

358.Intro: Buon giorno, Admiral! And welcome back. Zara of the Zara-class first heavy cruiser is ready for order. Please be of service for today as well!
358.Poke(1): Yep, I'm right there. Good to go whenever!
358.Poke(2): Pola, right? Yes, I'm worried. Admiral, will you help look for her with me?
358.Equip(1): I'm actually a Treaty heavy cruiser... Ah, this is good! Radar sure is great.
358.Equip(2): Is this really an oxygen torpedo? Yes! Grazie, Admiral!
358.H0000: Buona sera! Admiral, I'll be in charge of secretary duties today. Is that okay?
358.H0100: Um... Zero one... zero zero hours. Like that? That's how? Ufufu, good. Zero zero!
358.H0200: 02..00 hours. Yes, it's the middle of the night. I hope Pola's not still out drinking... I'm a little worried.
358.H0300: 0300 hours. Alright, I think I'm getting used to it. Admiral, aren't I doing it perfectly? Ehe~
358.H0400: 0400 hours. It'll be morning soon. I'm a little tired, but... I'll keep going, Admiral!
358.H0500: 0500 hours. Alright, it's morning! Admiral, we stayed up all night, didn't we? Now everyone in the fleet is getting up and going through their morning rituals too... yeah!
358.H0600: 0600 hours. Buon giorno. The morning sun feels good, doesn't it Admiral?
358.H0700: 0700 hours. Admiral, I made breakfast for you. It's just a simple espresso and a fresh croissant, but please enjoy.
358.H0800: 0800 hours. Admiral, would you like another espresso? R-really? Okay, I'll bring it right out!
358.H0900: 0900 hours. Okay, time to start making use of the fleet. First up are the expeditions... oh? You want to do something else? Roger!
358.H1000: 1000 hours. Which practice exercise did you want? I kind of want to take a crack at those Takaaao-class! Admiral, is that alright? Ehe... roger.
358.H1100: 1100 hours. Those Takaaao sisters surprised me. I took some hits, but... how do I say it... it wasn't that bad. I'll challenge them again any day!
358.H1200: 1200 hours. What would you like for lunch? I learned to make a new sort of pasta—would you want to try it? Do you prefer rosso or bianco?
358.H1300: 1300 hours. How was it? Since it has a strong flavor, it's best to drink some wine first. Oh! But don't drink too much.
358.H1400: 14—Ah, Ciao, Libe! How are you? That's good to hear. I made a lot of new friends. Eh? I'll introduce you next time!
358.H1500: 1500 hours. Oh, RADAR? Um, I think I might need it. They call it "dentaaan" here, right?
358.H1600: 160—Ah, Roma and Littorio! Ciao! Oh... yes, I'm still getting used to it. I'm sure there's a lot you both could teach me.
358.H1700: 1700 hours. Admiral, what do you want to do for dinner? You want to go to "Mamiiiya"? Mamiiiya! Is that some sort of bar?
358.H1800: 1800 hours. So this is Mamiiiya's Bar... wah, something smells really good. Oh, my order... I'll have what the admiral is having.
358.H1900: 1900 hours. Admiral, is thish what Japanesh food tastesh like? Making the bestsh use of raw ingredients. I should... mmm... mph!
358.H2000: 2000 hours. This is also tasty... wait, who's that! Po... Pola!? She's here.. it can't be! Admiral, excuse me! Wait up!
358.H2100: *pant* 21... *pant* 00... hours. I'm so sorry, Admiral. It turned out to be nothing. Nothing... at all...
358.H2200: 2200 hours. Admiral, you worked hard today. Is it alright if I turn in early? I'm just a little... tired.
358.H2300: 2300 hours. You've had a long day, Admiral, so don't work too late. Buona notte!

496.Join: Tenacemente! Zara-class Heavy Cruiser "Zara", setting sail! Starting the sortie!
496.Sortie: Pola, you good? You know, drinking real~ly isn't good for you! Alright, Heavy Cruiser Zara, Sally forth!
496.Battle: Enemy ships spotted, prepare for combat! Pola, you good? Look, the battle of the Zara-class starts now!

449.Intro: Buon giorno~. I'm the third ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers~, Pola~. I'm at an age where I want to challenge myself with everything. I'll do my best~.
449.Library: I'm the third ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers, Pola. Everyone, be sure to remember me. I'm an excellent heavy cruiser focused on armor and defense. I participated properly in surface combat, but I wasn't able to have outstanding military results. I can only drink it away.
449.Poke(2): What is it?? Wanna have a drinking party??
449.Poke(3): Zaaara nee-sama, it's alright. I wasn't drinking. Oh, it's you, Admiral~
449.Idle: Hmm... Where did I hide that vintage wine...? Oh yeah, it's over there! Huh? Zara-neesama? Um... I'm not on duty right now. Umm... um..
449.Married: Admiral, did something bad happen to you? I see. Poor thing... I know, how about a little drink between the two of us? It's the best thing to do when things are falling apart. Cheers~!
449.Wedding: Admiral, are you saying that... really? It's for me? Hehehe~ Then how about a drink? Cheers~
449.Ranking: Information? Wait a bit. I'll get the files. Whoa... thanks, Admiral.
449.Join: Zara nee-sama. Don't worry so much. I'm gonna be fine~ I'm sortieing just fine~♪
449.Equip(1): Grazie, grazie~ A magnificent remodeling, Admiral. I'm getting good~.
449.Equip(2): A torpedo refit? Umm, that's fine, but can't we fit some more wine bottles?
449.Equip(3): Admiral, do you want to drink, too? It will make your body feel warm.
449.Docking(1): Admiral, I'm going to the bath~.
449.Docking(2): There are two Admirals... ehehehe. I drank a little. My clothes are in the way.
449.Construction: Admiral, I heard a new girl came.
449.Return: Admiral, the opera is over~. I mean, the operation is over~.
449.Sortie: Zara-class number 3, Pola, heading out~. Everybody, let's go together~. Aye~!
449.Battle: Eh? An enemy? Where, where? Oh, you're right... Oh, no... get ready for shelling~.
449.Yasen(2): I'm a Zara-class as well. My surface shelling skill is bar none~ ...supposedly...
449.MVP: Me? I'm number one? Can I drink the wine of victory~?
449.Damaged(1): Ow ow ow ow! O~wh ga~wd~!
449.Damaged(2): No, no. It hurts so much.
449.Damaged(3): Arrgh. It hurts too much. I can't go on without drinking! I'm getting hot.
449.Sunk: It's actually colder when you're bare naked... Zara, looks like this is goodbye for me... my...sister...
449.2@NewYears: Admiral, Buon Anno~! Best wishes~ for the coming year~ Let's have a drink~!
449.2@Setsubun: Zara nee-sama, this event is "Setsubunga", right? I'll go ask Roma-san, then. ...Eh? Eho roll fest? Really?
449.2@Valentines: Admiral, it's my special wine chocolate that'll heat you up. Eat it up~. Go on~. Ehehe~, there's still plenty you know~
449.2@Rainy: It's been nothing but rain late~ly... This must be the "Tswo-yoo" Zara told me about. Maybe I should go and make some "Terre-Terre Bouse".
449.2@EarlySummer: Zara nee-sama, what are you doing for this year's swimsuit? I spent all my money on booze, so I'll pass on this year~.
449.2@Fall: Ehh~ Mizuho-san, what's this white wine? Japanese sake? It's got a weird taste and smell~ but it's delicious. Do you want to be friends? Ehehehe~
449.2@Saury: Sauryfest...? I don't really get it, but Zara nee-sama, I'll help you out~
449.2@Wine: Uwaa~ it's getting so cold... At times like this, even drinking won't warm you up~ Nachi-san, this is...?
449.2@Xmas: Buone Feste~! Admiral~ Christmas is so fun, isn't it~? I'm not sure how many drinks I've had today, but I'm perfectly fine~ Ehe, huhuhuhu...
449.2@Spring: The important event during spring is flower viewing, right? I'm really, really looking forward to it. When? When are we going?
449.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, thank you for the returning gift. Grazie, grazie~.
449.2@Summer2017: Chilled white wine in summer is delicious. Ah, hey, you drink up too, Admiral. Ehehe~ this is fun. But my clothes are in the way. I'll just lose them~!
449.2@Anniversary2018: Grazie, grazie, Admiral. I feel days of celebration are best with a toast. So cheers!

361.Intro: Buon giorno~. I'm the third ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers~, Pola~. With the admiral, I'll challenge anything~. I'll do my best.
361.Poke(2): What is it~? I'm ready for a sortie or a drinking party~.
361.Join: Zara nee-sama! Stop worrying. I'm okay! I will serve as flagship properly! Weigh anchor~♪
361.Equip(1): Admiral, grazie, grazie! But, um... could you leave my third turret like this...?
361.Equip(2): What a nice modification! I'm feeling wonderful~! Do you think I can store more bottles of alcohol?
361.Docking(1): Admiral, it's fine! I won't bring alcohol into the bath! Don't worry!
361.H0000: Admiral, buona sera! Today I, Pola will do various things by your side. Leave it to me~
361.H0100: Uhmm... Zerooooo-Oneeeeee-zerooo-zerooooo... zerooooooo-zerooooooooooouh.... How's that, Admiral~?
361.H0200: Too long? Hmm... very well. Oh-twooooooo-ohhhhhhh-ohhhhhhhh.... How bout that~
361.H0300: 03...00. How's that~ It's good, eh? Yeah, I get carried away once I start drinking~ Ehehehe~ I'm warmed up~
361.H0400: 0400. Ahh... it's so hot. I need to get rid of these clothes... Eh, Admiral? Why are you stopping me? I'm getting hot in here!
361.H0500: 0500. What's that, Admiral? I should drink some water? I'd prefer booze over... Okay, down the hatch. *gulp*
361.H0600: Ghood Mornin' Admiral~ Somehow I don't remember anything... and right now is 0600. Oh, it's already morning.
361.H0700: 0700... Admiral, for some reason my head hurts so bad. Ah, I smell the fragrance of espresso. Thank you, Zara.
361.H0800: 0800. Zara's espresso and croissant is delicious. *nom* Thifh ishf goohfd bhrfsfhasft
361.H0900: 0900. Yes, Zara. No need to worry. I won't drink any booze to make me feel relaxed. Am I right, Admiral~?
361.H1000: 1000. Admiral, do you have any preference for this fleet composition? Will it be Maauuse transport? Or Fuleet Escort~?
361.H1100: 1100. That's right. I have some interest in Oxygen Thorpidos~. But all I got is shelling exercise...
361.H1200: 1200. Zara's new creation pasta tastes good~ *nom* The shmell of this bhianco whith gohs vehry whell~ Shoo ghood~!
361.H1300: 1300. Fleet battle? Yes, I have some experience. But those tea drinker battleships sure are powerful...
361.H1400: 14- Hmm...? For some reason she looks like that tea drinker battleship I've met. She's a Japanese Battleship? Is that so? Hmm...
361.H1500: 15. Oh, Miss Littorio. A job well done. Eh, you changed your name? Oh, I see... By the way, about that battleship...
361.H1600: 1600. So that powerful Japanese battleship is called "Congo". I'm starting to have an interest in her.
361.H1700: 1700. Admiral, the sunset over the horizon sure is beautiful. It's like the color of Rosso red wine~ Hehehe...
361.H1800: 1800. About dinner... Ah, we're eating out? Ehehe... I'll accompany you. And the store is... Maamiya? Is that a Trattoria?
361.H1900: 1900. Admiral, Trattoria Maamiya is the best. The food and drinks are delicious. Ah, can I have more wine?
361.H2000: 2000. Hey Admiral, wanna drink~? Ahh~ I can't hear you over the sound of my full stomach~ Drink up~ Ahahahahaha~ This is fun, isn't it~?
361.H2100: 21... Ahhh... Too troublesome. One more bottle of red and white wine, please! Ah... It's hot! My clothes are in the way! Eh... Zara! I-uh...
361.H2200: 22...00 I got scolded so, so, soooooo~ bad by Zara. Did I drink too much~? How strange...
361.H2300: 2300. The day has almost ended without anything bad happening. Buona notte, Admiral~

595.Intro: My name is Houston. I served as part of the backbone of our forces in the Pacific, and as flagship of the Asiatic Fleet. Admiral, I'll be in your care.
595.Library: I'm Houston, the Northampton-class heavy cruiser assigned to the Asiatic Fleet. I fought alongside Perth, De Ruyter, and the other girls as the ABDA Fleet. The last thing I remember was being off Batavia, but my soul and name lived on in a new light cruiser.
595.Poke(1): Don't worry, we haven't forgotten to prepare anything.
595.Poke(2): Being part of a multinational fleet is somewhat rough. We must persevere.
595.Poke(3): Admiral, you seem uneasy. Has something happened? Was there a strategy meeting at ABDA Command? No? Hm? Something about improvements for heavy cruiser equipment? That is very intriguing. Please let me participate as well. Yes, by all means.
595.Idle: The Admiral seems to be occupied. Let's hold an ABDA Fleet joint strategy meeting in the meanwhile. Perth, De Ruyter, everyone, what do you think?
595.Married: Admiral, are you tired? I'll pour you some coffee. It's hot, please let it cool. Shall I make some pancakes as well? Mine are delicious. Wait just a moment.
595.Wedding: Admiral, is this...? For my service? No? Feelings? Yours? I'm honored, Admiral. I'll gladly accept it.
595.Join: Asiatic Fleet flagship, Houston, weigh anchor. Sortieing!
595.Supply: That does it for combat preparations. I'll be ready anytime.
595.Docking(1): My clothes have gotten somewhat dirty. Give me some time.
595.Docking(2): My favorite uniform's ruined. I'll remember this.
595.Return: The fleet has returned to port. Everyone is safe.
595.Sortie: I, Houston, will take charge of the ABDA Fleet. Fleet, forward, sortie!
595.Battle: Enemy in sight! We'll have to fight. Everyone ready?
595.Yasen(1): Night battle then? Just what I wanted!
595.MVP: Admiral, what is this? In recognition of my service? Thank you very much. It's an honor. I accept.
595.Damaged(2): Oh my god... they got me.
595.Damaged(3): This... isn't enough to stop me. I can still fight!
595.Sunk: Oh god, so much water! The ship is listing... All hands, abandon ship! Hurry! Perth, you have to escape. Promise me!

600.Intro: I'm Houston, of the Northampton-class. Admiral, let us protect the tranquility of the Pacific and the seas of Asia together. This time... this time I believe we can do it.
600.H0000: Sir! Admiral! Today, I, Houston, will be serving as secretary ship.
600.H0100: It's 1 o'clock. I am reporting that it is 1 AM.
600.H0200: It's 2 o'clock. I am reporting that... Eh? I'm being too formal?
600.H0300: It's 3 o'clock. Admiral, it's past three. It sure is quiet.
600.H0400: It's 4 o'clock. 4am. Admiral, it's almost dawn.
600.H0500: It's 5 o'clock. Admiral, look, the sunrise is so beautiful. Let's get ready to wake everyone up.
600.H0600: It's 6 o'clock. It's morning. Good morning! Everyone, it's time to wake up!
600.H0700: It's 7 o'clock. Come, Admiral, I've made my special breakfast for you. Is coffee fine with you?
600.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. Admiral, would you like another cup of coffee? Here!
600.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. Alright, let's deploy the fleet. Asiatic Fleet, weigh anchor!
600.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. That's... that's an allied fleet now, right? Prepare response to hail!
600.H1100: Elevens. Admiral, it's about time to start preparing lunch. Today, I'll be making my special Javanese sandwich. Please look forward to it.
600.H1200: It's noon. Here, my special sandwich. Would you like some coffee? Here, enjoy!
600.H1300: It's 1 o'clock. Admiral, I'm glad you liked it. Would you like another cup of coffee?
600.H1400: It's 2 o'clock. Admiral, it's almost time for the ABDA Fleet to link up..
600.H1500: It's 3. Perth, and De Ruyter confirmed to fore. Admiral, it's an allied fleet. Linking up.
600.H1600: It's 4. Oh! There's a destroyer astern of the Allied Fleet! It's a Fubuki-class! Followed by two Mogami-class! ...T-they're allies!
600.H1700: It's 5 o'clock. Admiral, the sun is setting below the horizon. Such a quiet, peaceful sea. It's wonderful.
600.H1800: It's 6 o'clock. The sun has set.
600.H1900: It's 7 o'clock.Admiral, leave dinner to me too. I'll make some steak.
600.H2000: It's 8 o'clock. Admiral, how would you like your steak? Steak is my specialty.
600.H2100: It's 9 o'clock. Admiral, would you like some bourbon afterward? On the rocks? Understood.
600.H2200: It's 10 o'clock. Oh no, it's already this late? I'll clean up.
600.H2300: It's 11 o'clock. Admiral, good work today. Well, I'll be counting on you tomorrow as well!

51.Intro: My name is Tenryuu. Heheh. Ya scared?
51.Library: First of the Tenryuu-class, Tenryuu. Along with some destroyers, I led raids in a torpedo squadron. My partner of the same class is Tatsuta. That girl... I wonder if she's alright? Well, whatever.
51.Poke(2): Don't leave me out if there's a night battle, alright?
51.Poke(3): Checkin' out my weapons? They easily surpass any others in the world! ...What? They're old, ya say!? Dumbass.
51.Wedding: Haha! Did ya fall in love with my power? Huh? Not my power, but me!? Ha! This is some kinda messed up dream, right!?
51.Ranking: Letter's here. Hurry up and read it.
51.Equip(1): Ya sure ya wanna power me up this much...?
51.Equip(2): That's it, that's it! I've always wanted something like that! Hurry up and hand it over!
51.Supply: Ya sure ya wanna power me up this much...?
51.Docking(1): Hey! Don't pull me back from the front lines!
51.Docking(2): Hey! Don't withdraw me from the battlefield! Let me fight 'til my dying breath!
51.Return: This fleet finally cleared the mission. Come on... let's get moving!
51.Battle: This is the mighty Tenryuu's attack! Hell yeah!
51.Attack: Too scared to speak, huh? Check this!
51.Yasen(1): Charging into night battle! Ya best be scared!
51.Yasen(2): The smell of gunpowder is the best, ain't it?
51.MVP: It's only natural. I'm the strongest, after all!
51.Damaged(3): To be able to take me down this far... you're good. I'll give ya that.
51.Sunk: Damn it... I can't advance or retreat. Tatsuta... hate to say it... but I'm goin' on ahead...
51.2@NewYears: Admiral, Happy New Year! Countin' on ya again this year! Well, I'll be showin' ya plenty of my strength this year! Hmhm, that's right.
51.2@Setsubun: Ow! Owowow! Why the heck is everyone throwin' beans at me!? Hey! Don't just say, "you're the demon, nanodesu"! This isn't even a horn! H-Hey, Tatsuta! Stop handin' 'em beans!
51.2@Valentines: Yo, Admiral. Been waitin' for ya. My chocolate tops even world-class stuff... My hands are cold? I-I didn't wait that long, ya know...
51.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, 'grats on the third anniversary! Well, ya did good endurin' my strength for the past 3 years. Not bad!
51.2@Rainy: Admiral, are ya headin' out? You better take an umbrella with ya. Well, so my radar says.
51.2@Summer: Hell yeah! It's summer! Everyone's meetin' up at the beach in their swimsuits. We're gonna do some special training usin' a ball. Make sure the net ain't too high for the destroyers.
51.2@Fall: The signs of fall are everywhere... it's completely fall now. Maybe I'll write a poem. Uh... Hey, Tatsuta, you're laughing too much!
51.2@YearsEnd: The year is finally about over with. Admiral, we're hittin' the New Year's Eve bell together this year. Right?
51.2@WhiteDay: Ah, Admiral. What is it? You got something for me? Um... th- th- thank you.
51.2@Anniversary2018: Oh, today is a special day, huh. How is it special? How am I supposed to know? Fine then, I'll spend it with you. Can't be helped.

213.Idle: Hey, hey! Put me in an operation right now! I'll lose my edge.
213.Married: Ahh? Well, that's just the kinda guy you are. It's all good!

477.Yasen(1): Alright, it's time to show you my grand charge!

52.Intro: Nice to meet you, I'm Tatsuta~. I hope Tenryuu-chan hasn't been causing you trouble?
52.Library: Light cruiser Tatsuta, second of Tenryuu class. I come from Sasebo. I hope Tenryuu-chan hasn't been causing everybody trouble? You really can't take your eyes off that girl, right? Huh? Me? Well, I'm not particularly fond of submarines~
52.Poke(1): Is there something on your mind?
52.Poke(2): Waah, it's dangerous if you suddenly talk from behind me, you know.
52.Poke(3): Touching is forbidden~ That hand, don't blame me if it falls off.
52.Wedding: Having favour from the admiral is nice. B~ut, if I'm all friendly with the admiral, Tenryuu-chan will be all alone, you know~. I'm sorry, okay~?
52.Ranking: A message for you~. It'd be nice if every message brought good news~.
52.Join: Time for a sortie. Now where's a ship who wants to die?
52.Equip(1): Oh~ It seems I've become stronger again.
52.Equip(2): Thank you. Don't tell Tenryuu-chan about it. That girl gets sulky easily.
52.Docking(1): I want to relax like this for a while~
52.Docking(2): A~Ah, I'm all tattered~ I'll sleep in the dock for a while, futons are happiness~
52.Construction: Looks like a newcomer has arrived~
52.Return: The fleet has returned? Looks like the operation has ended~
52.Sortie: Where is the enemy? My torpedoes are anxious.
52.Attack: Oh~ have you lost your voice?
52.Yasen(1): Let's give chase~ They absolutely will not escape.
52.Yasen(2): Aren't I more skilled than Tenryuu-chan~?
52.MVP: Eh, me? I've still got more to go~ Hey, Tenryuu-chan's got such an ama~zing glaring face, ufufu~
52.Damaged(2): Noo, my clothes~ ...I won't forgive you...
52.Damaged(3): Don't tell me you thought you'd won with just this~? Attacking all out even at your own expense...Fufu...Ufufufu..
52.Sunk: I was killed in such a flashy way~ Oh? I can see Tenryuu-chan fighting... That's good~
52.2@NewYears: Admiral, it's New Year's. A year has passed by. Happy New Year. Along with Tenryuu-chan, we'll be counting on you again this year, okay?
52.2@Setsubun: Girls~? "Demons, begone~ Fortune, welcome~" is what you say when throwing the beans. Just say so if you're out of beans to throw, okay~? Make sure you aim well at the demon, okay~? Ufufu♪
52.2@Valentines: Why are you gazing at me with such wanting eyes~? Such a needful person. Be sure to savor every bite~
52.2@Anniversary3: Congratulations on the third anniversary. For sure, even though it's a happy occasion, touching is prohibited. Oh, can't you hear me? Do you want to die?
52.2@Rainy: I wonder when it will stop raining. When it's this humid, wounds will start to ache.... ufufu.
52.2@EarlySummer: It's becoming the hot part of the year, isn't it? You wish you could have air conditioning in your office? Why are you trying to joke around...? Those clothes of yours... I'll make them cooler for you, okay?
52.2@Fall: Fall appetite. Fall reading. Tenryuu-chan has fall inspiration~ May I see? Ufufu... ahaha... ahahahahaha!!
52.2@YearsEnd: It's the end of year, so how will you spend the night? Hitting the bell with a certain someone? Or maybe... with me? Ufufu~
52.2@WhiteDay: Oh my, is this for me? I wonder if this is fine... I shall gratefully accept it. Of course... you'll be giving this to me only, right?
52.2@Anniversary2018: Oh my, today is a special day. Congratulations. I'd better do something special with Tenryuu. I wonder what I should do.

214.Idle: I'm a little bored~. Well, it's okay because I'll do what I want to~

478.2@Leyte: Admiral, I'm not really that cold, but please take care of Tenryuu-chan. Mmfufu.
478.Battle: You're going to make me get serious? What a bad kid you are, do you want to die? Mmmfufufu.

99.2@Valentines: Admiral, this is for you, kuma. Don't worry, kuma. It's made of chocolate, kuma. You can eat it with peace of mind, kuma.

99.2@Rainy: I hate the rainy season, kuma. Kuuuumaaaa... kuuuumaaaa... Aah! I hate the rain, kuma. Kuuuumaaaa...

99.2@YearsEnd: Cleaning time, kuma. I will do my best, too, kuma! ...But I'm already tired of it, kuma. Running away, kuma!
99.2@Saury2017: Saury-kuma? Not salmon-kuma? Oh well-kuma... Let's do this-kuma! Kuma~

99.2@Anniversary2019: I really can't believe it's the 6th Anniversary-kuma! I'm really surprised-kuma! But, I'm happy-kuma! Kuuumaaa! Kuma, kuma!

100.Intro: Light cruiser, Tama. I'm not a cat, nya.
100.Library: Second of the Kuma-class light cruisers, Tama nya. I did my duty as a torpedo squadron flagship, nya! Nya? Tama's my name, but I'm not a cat!
100.Poke(2): Ha! Without thinking, my hand... stop teasing me~!
100.Married: Thanks for the hard work, nya. Take a break with Tama, nya. Nyaa~

57.H0900: 0900. Eh, shouldn't I return to my post? But...

57.H1600: 1600. Um... For the expedition, what should the fleet do, Admiral?
57.H1700: It's 1700. Oh my, It's nearly dinner time. I'll prepare dinner food for a while.

22.Library: Isuzu was built in the Taisho period (1912-1926) as the second of the Nagara Class light cruisers. As you might expect my speed is top-rate; the admirals that commanded me in history include Admiral Yamamoto Isoroku, Admiral Yamaguchi Tamon, and many other pillars of the Navy. Amazing, huh?
22.Poke(3): Huh? I got distracted. What was it you wanted?
22.Married: Idiot, don't worry so much. It's fine to take a break.
22.Wedding: The admirals I've had as my partners have all had great success. Isoroku, Tamon... I wonder what will become of you? I'm looking forward to it.
22.Ranking: There's a report for you. Read it well.
22.Equip(1): That modernization... saved me. Now I can work harder!
22.Equip(2): Heheh, that'll do. Now I'm more ready to fight!
22.Supply: Heheh, that'll do. Now I'm more ready to fight!
22.Docking(1): To be my best again, I'll have to go for a little.
22.Docking(2): It's okay, if I rest a little, one way or another I'll be better.
22.Return: It seems the fleet has returned to base.
22.Sortie: Admiral Yamamoto and Admiral Yamaguchi were my captains, you know!
22.Yasen(1): A pursuit battle is Isuzu's speciality!
22.Yasen(2): Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
22.MVP: Huh? Isuzu is No.1? Well, that's what you'd normally expect. Ain't it good?
22.Damaged(3): It's only the equipment on the surface that's damaged at most. The engines are still fine!
22.Sunk: I overdid it slightly, huh...? Nagara, Natori, be well...
22.2@Anniversary2018: Hooray! Don't worry, I'll stay by your side this year too. Just leave it to me.

219.Idle: I-It's not like I'm bored! I'm not! Okay!?

141.Intro: It's Isuzu, remodelled. Leave anti-submarine and anti-air roles to me!
141.Poke(2): Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
141.Idle: I-It's not like I'm bored! I'm not! Okay!?
141.Supply: Oh, supplies... I can fight on with these!

141.Sortie: Well then, I will show you the strength of remodelled Isuzu!

23.Intro: Fourth ship of the Nagara-class Light Cruisers, 'Yura'. Pleased to make your acquaintance!
23.Library: I'm Yura, the fourth ship of the Nagara-type Light Cruisers. I was the first out of all of us to be equipped with seaplanes. I've served as the flagship of torpedo and submarine squadrons. I'm not so good with Dauntless and B17 planes.
23.Poke(3): Admiral-san, do you really like my single barrel guns so much?
23.Married: Admiral, it's definitely my single mounted guns, right? Right? Eh, what's that? You like my... hair too? Th-thanks... Umm... I, like you, too.
23.Wedding: Did you, ummm, call me, Admiral? Eh, is it about my seaplanes? Ah, yes... I guess not? Ummm... is it about...? Eh?! About me...! No way... Eh... Really... No way... *snivel*
23.Join: Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Yura, heading out.
23.Equip(1): That's right, my firepower will become stronger, right?
23.Equip(2): Is my catapult... in the way?
23.Supply: Oh yeah, I've strengthen my firepower. Nice work!
23.Construction: They say a new ship has been completed.
23.Return: Seems like the fleet has returned. I wonder if they achieved any results?
23.Sortie: Now, I guess I shall show off a little.
23.MVP: Yura is the best? Really? Hurray!
23.Damaged(2): It will take more than this to sink me...
23.Damaged(3): Not yet... I won't sink from just this!
23.Sunk: I guess this is better... than being scuttled...
23.2@NewYears: Admiral-san, Happy New Year. I'll be counting on you again this year. Okay?
23.2@LateWinter: Admiral-san... it's the winter season, you know? Shall we grill some mochi? ...Or is it too fattening...?
23.2@Setsubun: Admiral-san, it's Setsubun... ...These beans are meant for throwing, Admiral-san? You're really that into this?
23.2@Valentines: Admiral-san, do you really enjoy chocolate... that much? Then, I'll give you my chocolate as well... okay?
23.2@Anniversary3: Admiral-san, it's the third anniversary, the third! This year, Yura and also the rest of the fleet will be in your care! Okay?
23.2@Rainy: The rainy season. Admiral-san, would you like to spend some time with me in my room? I'll make you some tea. Well?
23.2@EarlySummer2015: Admiral-san. You can really feel the summer when the rainy season ends, can't you? I would like to get... a new swimsuit, too.
23.2@Summer: Admiral-san, it's summer, right? Right! Ah... Yuudachi-chan. Your swimsuit is cute. Mine will be next year, too.
23.2@OldFall: Fall, huh? ...The further we go into fall, for some reason, I... start to feel a little more lonely, you know...
23.2@Fall: Admiral-san, the season is... fall, you know? Hey... would you mind going with me... to the naval base's Fall Festival this year?
23.3@Fall: Admiral-san, that handbag... is very nice. It's really lovely. I wish I had one, too...
23.2@Saury: Admiral-san, it's the time of year for delicious salt-grilled saury, right? Right? I wish we could grill some tonight.
23.2@Cold: Admiral-san. Fall this year is coming to a close. It'll be getting cold. So that you don't catch a cold, make sure to stay warm at night, okay?
23.2@Xmas: Admiral-san, Merry Christmas! Isn't it nice having Christmas with me? Now, say "ahh~"
23.3@Xmas: Admiral-san, this food looks really good. Here, say "ahh~" This is fun! Right?
23.2@Spring: Admiral-san, it's spring! Let's bring bentos and go flower viewing together! Okay?
23.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, thank you for returning the gift for the chocolate. The considerateness is what brings the joy. Right?
23.2@EarlySummer: It starts to feel like summer after the rainy season is over, Admiral-san. Right? I guess I should... Hmmm, wait to get a swimsuit right? What should I do? Hmmm...
23.2@Anniversary2018: It's the 5th Anniversary, Admiral-san. The 5th! Please continue to look after me and the fleet. Alright? Alriiiiight?
23.2@Saury2018: Admiral, ASW is definitely important, right? Right? Is it alright if I be a teacher again? Really? Hooray!
23.3@Anniversary2019: Admiral, it's the 6th Anniversary. Please keep looking after the fleet and me in the 7th year too, alright? Alright? Alriiiiiiight?
23.2@Summer2019: I wanted to wear a swimsuit this year, but... Admiral, what do you think? ...Hey?
23.2@Summer2019_2: Admiral, would you... like to go... to the summer festival with me? ...Well?

220.Idle: Admiral-san... um, I... ah... Admiral-san, you look so busy... I know, while you're busy, I'll take your personal belongings and wash them for you. Well... this is washed... and this is washed... ...This is... ...mh...! This one, too! I've washed them for you, okay? Hey...
220.Supply: I'm thankful... for this... you know?
220.H0000: Admiral, I'll be staying by your side to support you tonight, alright? Alright? ...is that fine? ...yup, yay♪ It just turned midnight.
220.H0100: Admiral, it's 0100. This place is quiet at this time of day, isn't it? Umm....oh, right, why don't I go fetch you some tea?
220.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral. Here is your tea. It's a great first harvest tea. Here you go, it's hot though, be careful. Heeeere. *giggle*
220.H0300: It's 0300, Admiral. Ah, yes, I like green tea too. I'm glad that we're the same, Admiral. Eh, you like black tea and coffee too? Ah... eh?
220.H0400: Admiral... um... are you that tired?  It's 0400, Admiral. *giggle* You're sleeping face is so cute. Yay, I got something nice. I got to see the admiral's sleeping face. Make sure you have a nice rest, okay? Alright?
220.H0500: Oh, I know! While the Admiral is taking a nap, I'll go do his laundry. Let's see... I'll wash this, this one too... oh... this one... is... yup... I will wash this one too, okay? Right! The time is... ah... 0500, I better get started.
220.H0600: Admiral, it's time to get up. Admiral... a... ah...  Admiral, you're awake. Yes, the time is now 0600. I'll go and wake up everyone else too, alright?
220.H0700: 0700. Alright, isn't this nice? My specially made breakfast is ready, Admiral. I made barley rice, pickled cucumbers, daikon miso soup and for an extra treat this morning, some dried horse mackerel. Do eat up!
220.H0800: Admiral, it's 0800. I'll clean up the dishes quickly, alright? Wait a moment, please. Now, I'll work hard!
220.H0900: It's 0900, Admiral. DesRon4 and I have finished our preparations for setting sail. Shall I show you my strengths?
220.H1000: Ah, Yuudachi-chan, you're looking lively today too. Good morning. Murasame-san and the rest of DesDiv2, let's get going. It's 1000. Fleet, set sail!
220.H1100: It's 1100, Admiral. It's almost time for lunch. Don't worry, leave it to me. Here, a bento. I made it earlier this morning. Enjoy the contents for lunch... alright?
220.H1200: 1200. Admiral, it's lunchtime. Go on, open up my bento box. Okay? Okay? Yes, I'll go get some tea. Eat up, eat up.
220.H1300: Admiral, it's 1300. How was my special bento box? Hmmm... is that so? I'm glad! If you like it so much, I'll make you one again next time, alright?
220.H1400: 140... ah, Akizuki-san. Thanks for your hard work. That's right, anti-air power is important. I've also had my anti-air capabilities upgraded. *giggle* Watch me next time.
220.H1500: It's 1500, Admiral.. I'll go prepare the 3 o'clock snack now. Admiral, do you like sweet things? ...that's good, please have these then, alright?
220.H1600: Admiral, it's 1600. It's almost evening. Let's bring the fleet back to port. Ah, it's the submarine fleet. Thanks for your hard work, everyone. Let's start heading back.
220.H1700: It's 1700. Admiral, here, please take a look at this. The sunset is so... beautiful. It's so pretty, isn't it? Eh, what's that? Did you just say something?
220.H1800: It's 1800, Admiral. I'll go begin preparing dinner alright? What should I make tonight? Is there anything you'd like to eat, Admiral? Eh....EHHH?!
220.H1900: 1900. Your request is rejected for now, Admiral. But, I've made some stew tonight. Admiral, do dig in.
220.H2000: 2000. Huh, DesRon3 is definitely busy at this time. Ah, Sendai-san. Ah, yes, please be careful. The rest of you too, be safe.
220.H2100: Admiral, it's 2100. Eh, my night battle? That's right, since there are planes flying about during the day, ah, no, I guess that's it? Eheh...
220.H2200: It's 2200. Admiral, I'll get you a new cup of tea, alright? Ah, Yuubari-san. This is? Some refreshments? Thanks. Let us three eat it together, alright? ...yes.
220.H2300: Admiral, it's 2300. Thank you so very much for your hard work today. Do your best tomorrow, too. I'll do my best too, alright? *giggle* Good night, Admiral.

488.Intro: I'm Light Cruiser Yura. Admiral, I'll still be with you today. Okay, Yura will be right there.

53.Intro: I'm called Natori... I'll do my best not to trouble you!
53.Library: Third ship of the Nagara-class, Natori. I'm a bit of an older model, but there is much use for a high-speed light cruiser too... Y-yes, a Destroyer squadron, it'd be best if I was assigned to one, please. I-I'll do my best!

53.Married: Yeah! Then... that's all from me...

53.Equip(3): Yeah! Then... that's all from me...

53.2@Xmas: This cake is really good...! Ah, Isuzu-nee, did you want to try some? Er... ah... you must really like it... Eh? Fwehh!? Are you okay?

221.Supply: Umm... th... thank you very much.

113.Intro: I'm here, I'm here! Kinu has arrived at long last!
113.Library:
I was born in Kobe!

I trained hard in the School of Maizuru. After a whole lot of tough things happened, I worked hard in the southwestern region. ...Well, that was tough, too... Kuma-chan was a big help out there. But still... Panay Island was pure madness!
113.Poke(1): I'm gonna work hard again today!
113.Poke(2): When I look at your face, I start to get all motivated~
113.Poke(3): Hm? What's up? You wanna sweat it out together?
113.Idle: Admiral...! Can't we go train or something soon~?
113.Married: Admiral! You want a shoulder massage? Or maybe you wanna go train?
113.Wedding: Admiral! We're always just training together, so maybe it's a sign that we should spend more time... together... Eh!? No, I didn't mean it that way. I mean the one closest to you should protect you... I just want to... ohhh... ... ...whatever!
113.Ranking: What's that— the intelligence report? Lemme see!
113.Equip(2): It's important to put on some anti-air, you know?

113.Yasen(1): Now then, let's get this pursuit battle moving!
113.Yasen(2): You enemies to port— take that!
113.MVP: This victory is the result of all that training, you know? Yeah! I'll keep working hard, Admiral!
113.Damaged(3): Even like this, there's no way I'll sink...!
113.Sunk: Admiral... I'm sorry... looks like... this is it for me... Please let the other girls retrea-

113.H0200: It's 2 o'clock. It's the time of Ushimitsu. This is scary~!
113.H0300: It's 3 o'clock... I wanna go to sleep soon, though...

113.H0700: It's 7 o'clo~ck! What you wanna do for breakfast?

113.H1200: It's 12 o'clock now! What're you having?
113.H1300: It's 13 o'clock. Let's take it a bit easier, okay?

113.H2000: 8 o'clock! All members, er... Nothing! I didn't say anything at all.

113.H2300: It's 23 o'clock. Honestly, Sendai-san is just so freaking annoying!

113.2@Valentines: I made these truffles! Admiral, have one! Ehehehehe, how is it? Spicy? Sweet? Only one is sweet— it's Russian Chocolate Roulette!
113.2@Anniversary3: III~YAA~HOO-HO-HOO~!! Third Anniversary! You know? You know!? I am so happy! Cheers to our fleet and Admiral! Huzzah!
113.2@Rainy: It's the rainy season. It seems like almost every day it's raining~. Ah, let's play shiritori to kill time! Let's see, 'Teitoku', Ku....'Kuchikukan'.... Ah, It's over!
113.2@EarlySummer: So hot... So it's already summer... Summaht. *buzzing cicadas* Huh? That's no good?
113.2@Summer: Summer is definitely all about festivals, right? We should have a naval base summer festival. Let's get this work done quick and start preparing!
113.2@Fall: Fall means different things for everyone, doesn't it? Admiral, what about you? As for me, fall is a time when I have lots of chances to make people laugh! Uh... what's with that look?
113.2@Xmas:
Er... here's a haiku:
Kurisumasu
together with Admiral
just the two of us
Just kidding! Ahahaha! Ehehehe... ehe... heh... heh... it's not... funny? It's not!?
113.2@YearsEnd: So many things happened this year. You were a pretty good admiral this year! I hope you'll be able to be one next year, too.

113.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, is this cookie for me? Yaay, thank y- Uuuh, it's spicy. Eh? It's the return gift for the chocolate? Dammit, this sucks!
113.3@Setsubun2018: Guh... I'm going to fight back! You're going to get it first, Abu! Alright, direct hit! Next is... Yura-nee! Get ready! Fire!
113.2@Homecoming: A poem: "Admiral and I; The Final Battle; Have totally finished it". Huh, there's no punch line. But, I feel so refreshed!
113.2@Anniversary2018: Yyyyesssss! It's the 5th Anniversary! I, I'm really happy! Cheers to the fleet and you, Admiral! Hooray!

114.Intro: H-hello, I'm Abukuma, a light cruiser.
114.Library: I'm Abukuma of Nagara-class light cruisers. Yes... to be honest, I don't like Kitakami. What's with her... but, I endured and fixed my beautiful bow! Ushio too, thanks.
114.Poke(1): Abukuma's name, have you remembered it?.
114.Poke(2): My name, can you write it in kanji?
114.Poke(3): Ow-owww! Please don't touch me too much! My bangs are fragile you know! Admiral, you're a bit like Kitakami.
114.Idle: Geez! I thought you might have forgotten about me!
114.Married: Admiral, please don't overdo it, okay?
114.Wedding: Admiral~, thanks for waiting! I want to say couple of words of thanks to you… because you looked after me with such care, I got a bit more confident. Admiral, thank you.
114.Ranking: Admiral! It's a written report! How's the results?
114.Join: Huh, no way, me!? I-I can go but...
114.Equip(1): Looking forward to it? I really am!
114.Equip(2): I understand! My strength is necessary, right?
114.Docking(2): Seems a bit long for a bath, don't you think?

114.Sortie: I'm waiting for this! B-but it's not like I'm looking forward to it that much.

114.Yasen(1): Well then, it's night battle, but I will not lose to some night battle idiot somewhere.
114.MVP: Even someone like me can do it if I try! Hey, Admiral, thank you so much.
114.Damaged(2): Stop it! My bow has barely recovered!
114.Damaged(3): Am I really just no good? But, I don't want to lose like this!

114.H0100: It's 1 o'clock already? My skin is getting chapped... I'll go sleep first~
114.H0300: A late night 3 o'clock snack is not necessary
114.H0400: 4 in the morning!? You've got to be kidding
114.H0500: Admiral, it's 5 o'clock. It's not bad by now
114.H0600: It's 6 o'clock already. I'll go do my hair
114.H0700: It's 7 in the morning. Hey, how's my bangs?
114.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. Admiral, shall we also go together today?
114.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. What should we do today?
114.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. Time for real life?
114.H1100: It's 11 o'clock. A bit more to lunch!
114.H1200: It's 12 o'clock. Hey, I want to eat delicious food.

114.H1600: It is now 4 o'clock. The fatigue is slowly settling in
114.H1700: It's 5 o'clock! I'll go fix my hair~
114.H1900: It's 7 o'clock! Study, work! And then Kancolle!
114.H2000: Evening 8pm call! Admiral, how are you doo-ing-?
114.H2100: It is now 9 at night, soon it will be time for a night battle
114.H2200: It's 10 o'clock! Let's take a short break
114.H2300: It is now 11 o'clock. A very critical time!
114.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the coming year! I and everyone in the First Torpedo Squadron will be counting on you again this year!

114.2@Valentines: Admiral, I tried making homemade chocolate this year. So how is it...? It seems pretty OK to me.
114.2@Anniversary3: Third anniversary! Third anniversary, it's third anniversary! It's ultra OK for me! Admiral, congratulations!

114.2@EarlySummer: It sure is taking longer for the sun to set, isn't it? Looks like summer is right around the corner. *sigh* ...And when it's here, those girls from the Third Torpedo Squadron will be a whole lot noisier.
114.2@Summer: This scorching sun... it's certainly summer. I'm a bit worried that my skin's getting dry. Um... Admiral, are you listening?

114.2@YearsEnd: Uwaaa, I'm so busy! Hey, Admiral you should also help out with the naval base's cleanup! Here, hold this! Ah! Dust spotted to starboard!
114.2@Spring: This year too, the naval district's sakura bloomed wonderfully as well, didn't they~ Admiral, let's go flower viewing with us too! I'm looking forward to it~!
114.2@WhiteDay: You're giving this to me, Admiral? Your handmade gift? Ufufufu, the clumsiness makes it cute. If you ask me, I gratefully accept it.

114.3@Setsubun2018: Ouch! What's this? Eh... M...me? Stop that already! Stop throwing beans... Please stop! Ouch!

137.2@YearsEnd: Eh? Noshiro...? Why are you so busy...? ...Cleaning? Cleaning is... cleaning isn't something I'm good at. Eh? I still have to do it? You're kidding, right...!?

137.2@WhiteDay: Admiral! What is it? Ah... This is the return gift for my state-of-the-art chocolate? Can I open it? Wow, it looks delicious! Admiral, thank you!

137.2@Leyte: Ah, jeez, you're being too enthusiastic, Noshiro. It's worrying me. Eh? Me? Ummm, I'm...
137.2@Sasebo: Aaah~ Sa~Se~Bo is so nostalgic. I was born at Sasebo Arsenal. Ah, Noshiro was different. Yahagi is...

137.4@Setsubun2019: I'm warming it up~. Ding! Thanks for... Ah, Noshiro, why are you stopping me?
137.3@Anniversary2019: *Sparkle*! Admiral, it's our 6th Anniversary. Admiral, congrats. I'll shine even more!

305.Married: Admiral, how have you been? That's good to hear. If you're not feeling well, I'll use my Kirarin Beam! Hah...! You want me to? Alright... Agano, kirarin!

138.Intro: Second light cruiser of the Agano-class, Noshiro, has arrived. Glad to meet you!
138.Library: Second of the newly-developed Agano-class Light Cruisers, Noshiro. The lone aircraft rail is my charmpoint. Even in Leyte Gulf, I did my best as a main member of Kurita's task force!
138.Poke(1): Yes Admiral! Did you call for Noshiro?
138.Poke(2): Yes! Let's get the work done promptly and efficiently!
138.Poke(3): Geez, Agano-nee! Stop stroking my thighs!... Huh? ...Admiral? My apologies for being rude!... H-huh? Huh?
138.Idle: Um... Did the admiral forget about Noshiro? It's not like taking care of Agano-nee is the only thing on my mind...
138.Married: Admiral, just one more push. Come on!
138.Wedding: Admiral, sorry to bother you at such a busy time. There's something that I've wanted to say to you… Everyone thinks that I just want to care for Agano-nee, but I… I really… want to care for the admiral… I think… Really!? This is like a dream! Admiral! Noshiro will do her best!
138.Join: Roger. Light cruiser Noshiro, setting off.
138.Equip(2): This is... many thanks! Noshiro will not sink!
138.Equip(3): Is Agano-nee going to be okay with this?
138.Docking(1): Noshiro will take a small break.
138.Construction: Admiral! A report of completed construction.
138.Sortie: Second torpedo squadron flagship, Noshiro. Setting sail.
138.Battle: Starting the naval battle. I'll leave the formation to you.
138.Attack: How unfortunate, this is already in our hands! Fire!
138.Yasen(2): Remaining shells is sufficient! All fire!
138.MVP: Noshiro was the best during this battle? Well, I'm an Agano-class, so it's only natural... But, I'm glad, you know.
138.Damaged(1): Gehh... I can still keep going!
138.Damaged(2): This is nothing compared to Sibuyan island!
138.Damaged(3): Ku.... Even if you say that, I'm still a light cruiser... B-but, I'm not sunk yet... I can still fire!
138.Sunk: Again, Noshiro has sunk, huh.... Agano-nee, will you take it easy this time...? Okay...?
138.Friend41(1): DesRon2 is attacking. All fleets, check your formation. Please and thanks.
138.H0000: It's 0 o'clock at night. Timekeeping, is it like this?
138.H0100: It's 1 o'clock at night. Admiral's room has this kind of taste... Ah, I didn't mean it in that way
138.H0200: It's 2 o'clock at night. If you're going to be up anyway, how about redecorating the office?
138.H0300: It's 3 o'clock at night. Are you not tired? This is so different from training with Agano-nee!
138.H0400: It's 4 A.M. No matter when an enemy attacks, Noshiro is always ready to go!
138.H0500: 5 A.M. We, the shipdaughters, no matter what the time... Eh? The other shipdaughers are... asleep?
138.H0600: 6 A.M. Today's dailies are done? Ah, as expected from the admiral!
138.H0700: It's 7 A.M, huh. Isn't it about time for Breakfast? Agano-nee's making it, so let's go eat together!
138.H0800: It's 8 A.M. Admiral, let's do our best today too!
138.H0900: 9 A.M. Admiral! This morning variety show, it's pretty interesting, right?

138.H1100: 11 A.M. The ingredients have been gathers. Onion, potato, carrot, and...
138.H1200: It's just on lunch! Well, I'll serve up some Noshiro Curry! It's Agano-nee's favourite!
138.H1300: It's 1 P.M. Ah, I was found out, huh. The truth is, Noshiro can't cook anything except curry.
138.H1400: It's 2 P.M. I'll clean up after lunch... Ah, I have to clear up after Agano-nee's too...
138.H1500: It's 3 P.M. Sorry Admiral, I made Agano-nee a promise, so I'll be heading off for a bit.
138.H1600: It's 4 P.M. Even though I waited at the meeting spot for an hour... yeah...
138.H1700: It's 5 P.M. Agano-nee forgot about the promise... Well, she does that often...
138.H1800: It's 6 P.M. Agano-nee, after an earnest apology, invited me to dinner. Well, it can't be helped, you know?
138.H1900: It's 7 P.M. I'm going to head off, but I'll prepare tonight's curry in advance.
138.H2000: It's' 8 P.M, well then, see you later!
138.H2100: 9 P.M. I'm back. A dinner between sisters is nice to do sometimes, yeah?
138.H2200: It's 10 P.M. Admiral, are you night battling tonight as well? Doing all-nighters all the time is bad for your health.
138.H2300: 11 P.M. Noshiro expresses the opinion that you should go to sleep earlier.
138.2@NewYears: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! The Agano-class will be counting on you again this year. I'll do my best as well!
138.2@Setsubun: Here, Agano-nee. Throw these beans. Demons, begone~! ...Just like that. Ah, that way is...! ...Ah, aah... U-Um, Yahagi? ...Well, you see...
138.2@Valentines: Agano-nee's portion is... there we go. Admiral's portion is... Ufu♪ It may be small, but I did my best. Alright, I'll definitely give this to them! Time to practice!
138.2@Anniversary3: Congratulations, Admiral! It is the third anniversary as of this spring. Noshiro, along with everyone else of the Agano class, will do her best from here on.
138.2@Rainy: The hydrangeas are pretty... Admiral, what do you think? About this season? It fills me with a sense of tranquility. I like it.
138.2@Fall: Agano-nee, you've enjoyed the fall foods enough. You won't be able to fit in your uniform! Eh? Wearing a yukata is good enough? That's not good at all!!
138.2@Saury: It's a saury fishing support mission! Noshiro, ready for action! Searchlight, skilled lookouts... and...  For detecting schools of fish... ... ...I wonder if this is enough...
138.2@Xmas: Christmas... is it? This isn't an event I'm familiar with... I'm kind of looking forward to it. Ah, Admiral, this poultry dish is really good!
138.2@ChristmasOld: Agano-nee, don't just idle around under the kotatsu! You'll get fat! Hey, stand up, stand up! Why not try going out to do some exercises?
138.2@YearsEnd: *sigh* I need to clean up the admiral's desk, too... I also want to get the storehouse organized... ...Ah! Agano-nee? What am I doing? I'm cleaning, of course! Cleaning.

138.2@WhiteDay: I got a return gift from Admiral for my chocolates. What to do... Eating it would be a waste, but if I don't it will go bad... Uuuh
138.2@EarlySummer: Eh, you're going to buy a new swimsuit, Agano-nee? Isn't last year's fine? You can't go soliciting! In the first place, we're here for the sake of the Admiral...*nagging fades out*
138.2@Xmas2017: It's Christmas? I can't afford to act like a spoiled child, but I suppose I could have a little fun. Ah, Admiral, this cooked bird, it's delicious.
138.3@Valentines2018: 1st Striking Force, 1st Section, *sigh*, 2nd Torpedo Squadron, please begin preparations for sortie.
138.13@Leyte: It's finally the Decisive Battle. There is no turning back from here! Only forward! Forwards, everyone! Let's go!
138.3@Leyte: Now, let's get going. I'll leave the rest to you, Yahagi.
138.2@Spring2018: Eh, what? We're having this festival... again. The Zuiun is a good machine but... Yahagi... Wait? ...What!?
138.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations, Admiral. It's the fleet's 5th Anniversary. Please continue to lead the Agano-class, me included.
138.3@Setsubun2019: This is for your sake, Agano-nee. All for you.
138.3@Valentines2019: Please take this! ...Something is off... Hmm... These are my feelings! ...Hmmm, what do I say...
138.4@Anniversary2019: Admiral, congratulations. The fleet has reached it's 6th Anniversary. I, and the rest of the Agano-class, will keep working hard.

306.Friend44(1): All fleets, check your formation. Please and thanks.

139.Intro: Light Cruiser Yahagi, reporting for duty. Let's work at it together to the end, Admiral!
139.Library: Yahagi, the third ship of the Agano-class light cruisers. I've participated in most of the major sea battles during the latter part of the war, including the Mariana Straits, Leyte Gulf, and Bonomisaki. That's right, I fought it out to the very end. I wonder what happened to Yamato, after my memories trailed off. Oh well... This time, I'm going to protect everything!
139.Poke(1): So, what kind of plan are you making today?
139.Poke(2): Hmm, that's thoughtful. I don't mind that.
139.Poke(3): Haha, interesting. If you want to do thi~s, then maybe I'll do the same then, how about that?
139.Idle: Right... If there can be another life for me after this one, I guess becoming something other than a warship wouldn't be such a bad idea.
139.Married: Admiral… The fleet girls are complimenting you for your hard work, you know? ...he isn't listening...
139.Wedding: Wha-, Admiral, you.. What's wrong? Your face... you have a rather serious expression. ...Eh, this is for me? Not for someone like Yamato or Yukikaze? For me!? W-what should I do... hu-hum.... What should I do..I-I...
139.Ranking: There's a report for you, Admiral. How is it?
139.Join: Leave the Second Torpedo Squardon to me. This is Yahagi, raising anchor!
139.Equip(2): Okay... With this modification, we might be able to do this!
139.Supply: Resupply please, we're going back out!
139.Docking(1): This wouldn't even count as a wound, you know.
139.Docking(2): I do want to go out there prepared, so thanks.
139.Construction: A new ship is taking the water.
139.Return: All ships of the fleet have returned to base.
139.Attack: Have to draw them in more this time... All right, fire!
139.Yasen(1): Aha! A night battle then? Not so bad!
139.Yasen(2): Don't you dare think of the Agano-class as just some cruiser!
139.MVP: I'm the top of the fleet? Well.. that actually feels pretty nice.
139.Damaged(1): This is where I get serious!
139.Damaged(2): Did you think I was going down with just a few hits?
139.Damaged(3): If you want to sink me, you will need 5-6 torpedoes... otherwise, that won't do!
139.Sunk: That's enough, get away from me... I can see Yamato and Yukikaze again... that's not so bad...
139.Friend41(1): Roger, 1st Strike Force, 2nd Section, BatDiv10, flagship Yahagi, has arrived. Now, let's attack. Get them!
139.H0000: 0000. Midnight. Don't push yourself too hard
139.H0200: 0200. It's a quiet night tonight, isn't it.
139.H0300: 0300. Aren't you going half-watch ashore for the day? Hmm?
139.H0400: 0400. Hey, don't push yourself too much, okay? I can take care of the daily quests for you tomorrow.
139.H0500: 0500. It's the beginning of a brand new day at Kancolle!
139.H0600: 0600. Let's see, make equipment three times at the factory, and then go sortieing, and umm...
139.H0700: 0700. Okay, then construct three new ships, and... Urgh!
139.H0800: 0800. I'm exhausted. Daily quests aren't easy, are they Admiral... Oh, ehem.
139.H0900: 0900. Arms Reduction Treaty? Scrap two ships? ... I can't do that! ...I mean I will, but still...
139.H1000: 1000. Whew, I'm exhausted. Admiral, now I understand how difficult this is. I respect you a bit more now.
139.H1100: 1100. I think I'm better suited for seaborne combat. Let me head out there!
139.H1200: 1200. Doing things I'm not used to sure makes me hungry. So, what should we have for lunch?
139.H1300: 1300. They say this is popular in my hometown nowadays. A big round-meat sandwich... I guess?
139.H1400: 1400. Hm, hm, hm... that's pretty good! They call it a "Hamburger", apparently.
139.H1500: 1500. Now let's go sortieing again! Let's push on.
139.H1600: 1600. Oh, this? It's a sake cup with a Hagi flower and an arrow as a design. Nice, isn't it.
139.H1700: 1700. Almost sundown. I want to enjoy night battles too.
139.H1800: 1800. How did the exercises go today, by the way?
139.H1900: 1900. Admiral, I wonder what we will have for dinner tonight. I'm looking forward to it just a bit!
139.H2000: 2000. Well, it's time for night battles. How about it? Shall we go?
139.H2100: 2100. I'm still good to go, Admiral. I, Yahagi, will do my best!
139.H2200: 2200. Admiral, Yahagi Torpedo Squadron is going at it full strength! I'll crush those flag-BBs!
139.H2300: 2300. Ugh, battleships sure are tough... And enemy carriers... yes, I don't like them.
139.2@NewYears: Admiral, Happy New Year! Counting on you again this year! Now, let's sortie once again this year!
139.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, huh. This is pretty nice... er... ow!? Incoming fire!? Wh-Who...!? ...A-Agano-nee!?
139.2@Valentines: Nee-san and the others seem busy... Making chocolate... huh...? I should give it a try. ...Mm. ..I'll ask Noshiro-nee to teach me how to make some!
139.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, congrats. It is our third anniversary. Thank you for your hard work, Admiral! I'll be in your care from here on too!
139.2@Rainy: It's really pouring. Oh, Isokaze. Is that your special teru teru bozu? It has an unusual shape. Maybe I should make one.
139.2@Fall: Fall, huh? The food at this time of year is certainly delicious. However, Agano-nee is enjoying this a little too much!
139.2@Xmas: Christmas... it isn't too bad, from the sound of it. Admiral? I think I like... ...I may be a little tipsy.
139.2@ChristmasOld: It's become a little cold, huh... This is perfect for training. Tenth squadron, assemble. We're doing exercises!
139.2@YearsEnd: Sakawa, what's the matter? Ah... you want me to get that ship down from there? ...Here! I see, so you're cleaning. I'll help out.
139.2@Spring: So it'll soon be the season of that sortie again... Heh, how unlike me. Ah, Yamato! How does a drink while enjoying the cherry blossom sounds?
139.2@WhiteDay: Is this the return gift, Admiral? Thank you. I guess I should thank Noshiro-nee as well later.
139.2@EarlySummer: Isokaze, are you practicing? I see, training from fall to summer... must be hard, huh?
139.2@Summer2017: Summer is a great season for training, right? Eh? Why don't we go to the ocean? But we go to the ocean every day.
139.3@Valentines2018: Operation Sho-1... We'll need to halt the enemy advance here. DesRon 10, prepare for operations... *sigh* Noshiro-nee...
139.18@Leyte: Fleet, line ahead formation, move out. Yahagi's torpedo squadron, setting forth!
139.4@Leyte: Don't be too energetic, Noshiro-nee. Yes, just...just do it like the exercises. We'll be fine!
139.2@Leyte: 1st Striking Force, 2nd Section, DesRon 10, Yahagi, sortieing. Your orders, Admiral?
139.3@Leyte: Let's give the enemy all we have, Kongou. But, when...when things seem just out of each... No, never mind!
139.2@Sasebo: Sasebo, huh. How nostalgic. I've treasured this sake cup too. Mmm, hometowns are definitely great.
139.2@Spring2018: Hmmm, the Zuiun Festival. It's nice. So this is a Zuiun. I wonder if we can equip it. Just like Yamato.
139.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations, Admiral. It's our 5th Anniversary. We've come so far. Thanks for your hard work as well, Admiral. Please continue to look after me.
139.3@Setsubun2019: Agano-nee, it hurts if you suddenly throw those at me so hard. Ow, that hurt! Eh, Sakawa?
139.3@Valentines2019: Agano-nee, thank you. Yup, even I can do it with this. Alright!
139.4@Anniversary2019: Admiral, congrats. It's our 6th Anniversary. Umm, when we first met... Well, that's fine. Good work, Admiral. Please keep looking after me.

307.Married: Admiral, what the matter? You looked reddish. Taking care of yourself is important, you know. Hmm... You had slight fever. Right, I'll make you something nutritious. I'm off using Mamiya's kitchen for a while. Wait for me, okay?
307.Idle(2): Admiral… The fleet girls are complimenting you for your hard work, you know? ...he isn't listening...
307.Friend44(1): Fleet, line ahead. Let's go. Yahagi Torpedo Squadron, setting forth!

140.Intro: Pyan♪ The fourth Agano class Light Cruiser, Sakawa! Commander, nice to meet you!
140.Library: I'm Sakawa, the fourth ship and the youngest of the Agano-class light cruiser sisters. I was born too late, so I couldn't go outside much. I wanted to go together with Yahagi-chan... but I ended up guarding Maizuru.
140.Poke(1): Pya! You called for me? Whats the matter? An order?
140.Poke(3): Commander! I like you! Cross...roads? What's that? I don't know what it is...but don't think I like it!
140.Idle: Sakawa...will always be here waiting for you, Commander, always, always waiting...
140.Married: Commander, aren't you working a bit too hard? If you're tired, wanna have some rest together with Sakawa?
140.Wedding: Commander, I'm always saying things like PyuUu or PyaAaa to you but...what I'm actually trying so hard to say is I'm really thankyouthankyouthankyou!...eh? You can understand? Really!? I love you too! Pyaaaa~!
140.Join: Light Cruiser Sakawa, setting sail! Watch me closely!
140.Docking(2): Rest a little bit~, Eh? I looked like a special transport ship? No, no!
140.Construction: Someone newer than me has arrived!

140.Damaged(3): Pyaaaaa, the turret, the turret is gone!
140.Sunk: Why...I wanted to...go together with...Yahagi-chan and everyone...

140.H0400: 4:00A.M.? Eeh...4 O'clock. is fine?...OK! It's 4 O'clock.
140.H0500: 5:00A.M...It's already 5 huh...What are you working so hard for Admiral? What's a daily?
140.H0600: 6:00A.M...by the way..! Aaah! Sakawa should be responsible for the hourlies today.
140.H0800: 8:00A.M.! Today Admiral is awesome as well.
140.H0900: 9:00A.M. Today Sakawa will stick with you as well.
140.H1000: 10:00A.M. Sakawa quiz~ the thing Sakawa likes, what might it be~
140.H1100: It's 11 A.M. what about your lunch? Eh? The answer for the quiz? What was it again...?
140.H1200: It's noon~! Wanna grab something to eat? Heey Admiral~...good idea right?
140.H1300: It's 1 P.M.! The answer for the quiz?...Erm...well...it's right in my sight...right?
140.H1400: It's 2 P.M. dummy dummy Admiral~! The answer is not ramen! It's you Admiral!
140.H1600: It's 4 P.M. Admiral~ keep it up~! Keep it up~!!
140.H2000: 8:00P.M. Admiral, wanna take a bath? Dinner? Or...wanna have Sa~ka~wa? Eh..? That's not good? Whyyy~!
140.H2100: 9:00P.M. That's right...you should be tired now. How about a rest?
140.H2200: 10:00P.M. Sakawa will be having her supper. Munch...munch...
140.H2300: 11:00P.M. It's already 11 P.M.! Should we do a night battle then go to sleep soon?

140.2@Setsubun: Pya...! Ah... Yahagi-chan seems mad for some reason... I wonder what happened... Eh? Houshou-san. This is... ehoumaki? So I eat this in one go?
