183.Intro: Admiral, light cruiser Ooyodo has entered the line of battle. Please entrust the fleet directives and administration to me.
183.Library:
Designed specifically as a fleet flagship, I am the newly produced light cruiser, Ooyodo.

There were issues with the new recon seaplane I was intended to carry and the war situation changed, so I was unable to serve as the Combined Fleet flagship.

Nevertheless, I was able to participate in Operation Kita and Operation Rei-Go. I, too, will do my best on the front lines.
183.Poke(1): Aye! Please leave it to me.
183.Poke(2): Admiral, is what you're doing some method of communication? I believe speaking normally would be sufficient. Yes...
183.Poke(3): Admiral, that is not a telecommunications device. Careless touching will interfere with the fleet commands.
183.Idle: Admiral, it's time for the next mission. Ad... Admiral...? Admiral? Are you listening? Hey...
183.Married: Admiral, I truly cannot thank you enough... for always keeping me in your heart. I've... been watching over you all this time. Did you notice?
183.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me? Eh...? Is this for me? Thank you so much, Admiral. I will always cherish this.
183.Ranking: Admiral, I've organized our fleet's intelligence.
183.Equip(1): Are you remodeling me? Thank you so much.
183.Equip(2): That's true. I do want to load torpedoes, but on the other hand...
183.Supply: Supplies and logistics... they're very important.
183.Docking(1): I apologize for this. I'll fall back a little.
183.Docking(2): I can't apologize enough. I hope you can afford me a short leave of absence.
183.Construction: A new ship has been completed.
183.Return: Fleet, the operation has concluded. Thank you for your hard work.
183.Sortie: Combined Fleet flagship, Ooyodo, casting off!
183.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Ready the cannons, if you would, please!
183.Yasen(1): Never forget Operation Rei-Go. All ships, attack!
183.Yasen(2): The fleet's movements... Right. Keep it up, everyone.
183.MVP: Eh...? My accomplishments were the greatest? My... how unexpected... ...but I'm a little proud of myself. Ufufu♪
183.Damaged(2): No way... I'm listing to starboard... Begin counterflooding!
183.Damaged(3): Gh... they got me... b-but... I won't sink just yet. I absolutely refuse... to sink...!
183.Sunk: Hurry with the drainage! Eh...? Not working...? It's not working!? Admiral... this is the end of the line... we'll reunite someday, somewhere... surely...
183.2@NewYears: Admiral! Best wishes for the coming year. I'll be counting on you again this year.
183.2@Setsubun: For Setsubun this year, the demon target of each fleet is... well... Huh? The demon role personnel file isn't here... Huh? How strange. I was sure I'd put everything in order yesterday...
183.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, our fleet has now reach its third year of service. Congratulations! Please be of service as well for next year.
183.2@Rainy: It's been raining a lot as of late, but our fleet is ready to deploy at any time. Admiral, how do you plan to utilize the fleet? Eh? You're giving everyone the day off? Really? Admiral, are you sure?
183.2@Fall: Admiral, it's really starting to feel like autumn.
183.2@Saury: Light source, check! Sonar, check! My equipment loadout is all set! Preparations complete to set sail to the northern sea as well as the adjacent waters for the saury fishing support fleet.
183.2@Xmas: Admiral, it's Christmas, isn't it? Merry Christmas!
183.2@YearsEnd: Admiral, it's almost time for Operation Rei-go. I shall do my best as well!
183.2@Spring: Admiral, it's spring. The cherry blossoms at the naval base have started to bloom, this season is definitely great. This was the season when I was launched. The season... of cherry blossoms.
183.2@EarlySummer: What is it Akashi? A swimsuit? Eh, I have duties to do around the Naval Base so... Eh, you have them too? They don't matter? Ummm, that's not right.
183.2@Summer2017: Ah, jeez I got influenced by Akashi. I'm sorry, I'll get changed right away. I can't do this after all!

321.Intro: Admiral, flagship Ooyodo shall be accompanying you. Please leave the front line fleet directives to me.
321.Poke(2): Admiral, is what you're doing some method of communication? Is it code? Is it really?
321.Poke(3): Admiral, that is not part of the headquarters' facilities. Please, do not obstruct the fleet commands!
321.Idle: Admiral, what do you think of my remodel? I asked you what you thought of it...! Geez...
321.Ranking: Admiral, would you like to see the fleet intelligence?
321.Join: Combined Fleet flagship Ooyodo, now sortieing!
321.Equip(1): You're remodeling me further? Thank you so much.
321.Equip(2): I would like to load up on torpedoes, but maybe I should load recon seaplanes...

321.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Ready the cannons. Everyone, let's go!
321.Yasen(2): That's right... this is the true power of the Ooyodo-class!
321.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. We'll be counting on you today as well.
321.H0100: Admiral, the present time is 0100. Please leave the responsibility of announcing the time to me.
321.H0200: Admiral, it's 0200. Oh? Admiral, are you tired, perhaps?
321.H0300: 0300. While the admiral takes a break, I'll reexamine the fleet operational plans we've put together.
321.H0400: The present time is 0400. The admiral's sleeping face is so cute. Ufufu♪ This was worth it!
321.H0500: It's 0500. Admiral, it's morning. It's time to do the morning call. All hands, arise!
321.H0600: 0600. Admiral, I've finished preparing breakfast. I tried putting gluten in the miso.
321.H0700: The present time is 0700. Admiral, have you finished your breakfast? I'll clean up, okay?
321.H0800: It's 0800. Okay! Fleet exercises, then! Let's make sure they're strict!
321.H0900: Admiral, it's 0900. After exercises comes sorties. The sortie schedule is over here.
321.H1000: It's 1000. Tone-san has come here again today. Tone-saaaan!
321.H1100: 1100. Tone-san and Chikuma-san are such good friends... I envy them just a little...
321.H1200: 1200. Admiral, let's have curry for lunch. We'll have a military band to go with it.
321.H1300: It's 1300. Admiral, what did you think of my curry? Don't you find it unique?
321.H1400: The present time is 1400. Oh... Ashigara-san. What is it? Hmm.
321.H1500: It's 1500. She's a heavy cruiser, but Ashigara-san and I are strangely on the same wavelength. Ufufu♪
321.H1600: It's 1600. Admiral, it's Ashigara-san. She's requested a large amount of pork sirloin and cooking oil.
321.H1700: The present time is 1700. Admiral, the sunset overlooking the sea is lovely.
321.H1800: Admiral, it's 1800. What would be good to have for dinner? Something like Sashimi...?
321.H1900: It's 1900. Admiral? Something went wrong with dinner. Let's go for cutlets instead. How about it?
321.H2000: It's 2000. Admiral, I'll put your after-dinner tea right here.
321.H2100: The present time is 2100. It's almost time... for night warfare. Ufufu♪ I won't be night battling, though. Look— there's still a lot of paperwork to do.
321.H2200: It's 2200. Admiral, isn't it almost time to close out the overtime work and take it easy?
321.H2300: Admiral, it's 2300. Thank you very much for another hard day's work. Let's do our best tomorrow, too.
321.3@Fall: Admiral, it's time for the naval base's Fall Festival. I tried a change of outfit, too. How do I look? Admiral, how about wearing a jinbei as well? I'll make the arrangements, if that's okay with you?

574.Intro: I'm the aviation cruiser from the Nordic Country of Sweden, Gotland. Admiral, I'll be in your care from now on. I'll work hard to do whatever I can for reconnaissance missions or surface battles.
574.Library: I'm the aviation cruiser that was born in Sweden, Gotland. I'll be in your care, everyone. I don't have much in the way of equipment because I'm a light curiser. I do have one catapult though. Sounds cheap right? No, it's fine. My equipment is the best. Sweden's weapon technology is the cutting edge. So, remember me, okay?
574.Poke(3): Ah, that's not my hangar. Ah, stop it! That's dangerous, Admiral. Honestly, I don't dislike skinship but... I'd like it if you could please be more smooth, alright?
574.Idle: The Admiral is... Oh, he looks busy. Alright! I've got some free time then. I wonder what I should do... Should I mess with Mogami? Wha, Admiral! What do you want? You surprised me.
574.Married: Aaah, the Hein Mat? I like it despite its flaws. How do you express that feeling over here... Ah, I got it! "Wabisabi"! Eh, that's wrong? I see...
574.Wedding: What are you waiting around for? Aren't we pretty close? Why are you being so formal all of a sudden? Eh, you have something important to say to me? Hmmm, well, okay, it'll make a good memory. Wow, this is beautiful. I'll gladly accept. Was it expensive? I see. Thanks.
574.Ranking: Wait just a moment, I'll get it for you.
574.Join: Aviation cruiser Gotland, weighing anchor. Watch me do my best.
574.Equip(1): Mmm, I wonder if this is alright...
574.Equip(2): Nordic equipment is definitely good, don't you think? Yes, they're the best.
574.Equip(3): It'd be good if... I had one more... catapult.
574.Docking(1): I got a little dirty. Can I take a bath?
574.Docking(2): I got really dirty. Japanese baths are really nice. I like them.
574.Construction: It looks like the construction of a new warship has completed?
574.Return: Operation complete, the fleet has returned. Whew, I'm glad.

574.Yasen(2): Hmm, I wonder if this will work... Please hit!
574.Yasen(1): You want us to press the attack? Really? We have to do this then...
574.MVP: Huh? I'm the best? Well, my homeland's equipment is good quality. Yes, our furniture is good too. I'll show you next time, alright?
574.Damaged(2): Unyayayaya! Whoaaa, that hurts! You're getting me dirty!
574.Damaged(3): Unyaa! Ngh, jeez, skirts are so drafty! I knew I should've worn pants. Jeez, this is awful!
574.Sunk: Huh? I'm...sinking? No way... It's cold... This can't be true... Aah... Someone please... take my hand... Ad-...miral...
574.Friend42(1): Aviation cruiser Gotland. We'll be backing you up now!
574.Friend42(2): European Combined Fleet representative flagship, Gotland, has arrived at the operation area! We'll now back up the friendly fleet. All ships, increase speed. Attack!
574.2@Saury2018: So this is saury? Salt-grilling? It's good! This is delicious, Admiral! I have to help out too!
574.2@Fall2018: Oooh, it's the Naval Base Autumn Festival. This atmosphere is nice. Hey you, the French seaplane tender, what's good to eat? This? Hmmm...
574.2@Xmas2018: Even here in the orient, Christmas is celebrated. Isn't this wonderful? Let's drink tonight! Admiral, cheers!

574.2@Valentines2019: Ehe, Admiral, guess whaaat? This is a custom of this fleet, right? I made sure to make it myself. Want it? Well?
574.2@WhiteDay2019: Ah, you remembered the return gift. Admiral, thanks. Isn't equality nice? I don't dislike it. I'll just help myself.

574.2@Rainy2019: Rain? Operating aircraft is going to be tough if the weather is too violent... huh? It's doable with the right parts? Oooh, is that so?
574.2@Summer2019: Aaaaaaah, it's gotten so hot. Summer here is too hot. Eh, what was that? ...Mizuho? Summertime heat-resistant equipment? I see, I see...

579.Intro: I'm the aviation cruiser remodeled into an anti-air cruiser from the Nordic country of Sweden, Gotland. I'll be in your care once again, Admiral. Oh, you'd prefer it if I turned back into an aviation cruiser?
579.Poke(1): Did you call for me, Admiral? I see.
579.Poke(3): Ah, that's not my hangar. Ah, stop it! That's dangerous, Admiral. Honestly, I don't dislike skinship but... I'd like it if you could please be more smooth, alright?
579.Married: Are you tired? Then do you want to swap? Swap what? Command of the fleet. Eh, I shouldn't joke about that? Isn't it fine once in a while? Here, it's some saft I made. Try some. It perks you up, right?
579.Join: Anti-air cruiser Gotland, weighing anchor.  Watch me do my best.
579.Equip(2): Yes, they're good, right? The weapons from my homeland. I wasn't wrong, right?
579.Sortie: Fleet flagship, anti-air cruiser Gotland, sortieing! Attack!
579.Friend44(1): It's fine, let's work hard together.
579.H0000: Now, today, I, Got, am on duty. Well, it's okay, right? Hey, Admiral, are you glad? Oh? He turned away from me. It's now exactly 12am.
579.H0100: It's 0,100. My intonation is a bit off? Well, that much is fine? *Yawn* So sleepy...
579.H0200: It's 0,200. You really do get sleepy around this time... I know! Shall I make some blÅbÄrs soppa? I'll go and get to it.
579.H0300: It's 0,300. It's done! I made it cold. Here, drink up. Do you feel reenergized? I see, that's great.
579.H0400: It's 0400. It's almost morning. I like how the nights here are short. Ah, but long nights have their good points too, right?
579.H0500: It's 5:00. It's morning! Ah, too soon? Roger. I'll wait a bit longer. Ah, look! It's the sunrise! Isn't it beautiful?
579.H0600: 0600. It's morning now. Hey, wake up, everyone! It's a wonderful morning! Mornings just feel sooo good, right?
579.H0700: It's 0700. Now, who's going to make breakfast? What about you, Admiral? You're good at it after all. I can't wait!
579.H0800: 0800. Oh wow, this is delicious. Hey, this is really delicious! Not bad, Admiral. You must be popular. Oh, really?
579.H0900: It's 0900. Yeah, that's right. I like people who are good at cooking. People like that are really amazing. Right?
579.H1000: 1000. Eh, it's about time I got it, right? Jeez, isn't it fine to let the small things go sometimes? Jeez... Uhmm, 10...
579.H1100: 11...0...0. Mmm, did I get it? Really? Great. Well, this is easy once you get used to it.
579.H1200: 1200. Look! Since you made breakfast I made lunch! Doesn't it look good? Help yourself!
579.H1300: It's 1300. Oh wow, the coastal defense ships here are so small and cute. The ones in my Navy were battleships. Coastal defense... battleships?
579.H1400: 1400. That's right, the coastal defense battleships were the flagships of my Navy. Well, they weren't... very big though...
579.H1500: 150... Oh, Gangut? I can see you're full yourself as usual. That's good in it's own way I guess. Hmph, I won't lose to you.
579.H1600: 16,00. Oh, I slipped up again. Well, it's fine. It's almost evening. Time sure flies by. Strange.
579.H1700: 1700, Look, the sunset is so beautiful. It's beautiful...
579.H1800: 1800. Okay, can I leave dinner to you, Admiral? Yes, that's fine right? I can't wait. This daily life is wonderful.
579.H1900: It's 19:00. Wha? You're already done? I should have expected as much! Let's see how it is....wow! Delicious! Admiral, you're a really good cook!
579.H2000: 2000. Aaah, that was so good, I ate too much! I'll get fat. I should exercise a bit afterwards. Will you join me, Admiral?
579.H2100: 2100. Oh, welcome back, Mogami. This little thing is... Oh, a Zuiun? Ah, I've heard about it! I've heard it's amazing.
579.H2200: 2200... Admiral, It seems that I can join the seaplane tender gathering next time. It seems that aviation cruisers are allowed to join them.
579.H2300: It's 2300. No matter what happens, I'm excited for the days to come! Right, Admiral? Thank you. Let's work hard tomorrow too. Good night.

589.Intro: Good day! I'm the up and coming light cruiser from Italy, Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi. Ufuu, it's long, isn't it? I'm fine with just being called Abruzzi. Admiral, my sister and I are looking forward to your guidance.
589.Library: I'm the Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi-class light cruiser, Abruzzi. Apologies for my long name. With my state-of-the-art body, I have confidence in my firepower and acting ability. After the war, I was an actress in a film. Did you see it? Admiral, please take good care of me.
589.Poke(1): Are you fine with me? Ufu, roger that.
589.Poke(2): My sister? Aah, she's so... please excuse her.
589.Poke(3): Ah, this earring on my right? Ehe, this is the pair... yes, it's the pair I split with my sister. Eheh... Eh, does it look odd? Ah, I see. That's good. Admiral, we sisters will work hard.
589.Idle: I wonder if my sister... if Garibaldi is doing her job... Ah... Yeah, I'm sure she's fine. It's her after all. Right?
589.Married: Admiral, how does my skin look today? Ah, is that... so. Great! I wonder if it's because I"m with you. Ufufu.
589.Wedding: Ah, I'm sorry. With my sister, I'm... Eh, even then... even then, you're fine with me? ...Thank you very much, Admiral. I gladly accept this honour. Yup, I accept!
589.Ranking: Information? Roger that. I'll go get it.
589.Join: Fleet, sortie! Cruiser Abruzzi, weighing anchor! Everyone, please follow me.
589.Equip(2): This feels good. I'm sure it'll suit my sister too.
589.Docking(1): I'll go take a shower first... Yes, thank you very much.
589.Docking(2): Ah, I'm so sorry. They got me... in some weird places...
589.Construction: Yes, a new ship has entered service.
589.Return: Reporting that the fleet has returned.
589.Sortie: I, Abruzzi, will be the flagship. Fleet, forwards! Sortie!
589.Battle: Everyone, make ready. We've cornered the enemy. Begin combat!
589.Yasen(2): How about we settle it here?
589.Yasen(1): We'll pursue them. Fleet, increase speed. Charge!
589.MVP: Thank you! Everyone, thank you very much. I gladly accept this honour.
589.Damaged(2): Oh no! My face is... Ah, jeez, please stop that!
589.Damaged(3): Aaah! My face is... Jeez, I won't forgive you!
589.Sunk: It's cold... Haa... So this is where I'll sink... Garibaldi... I'm sorry... I'll be... going on ahead... Haa... I'm sorry...
589.2@Fall2019: So this is the Naval District Autumn Festival. Ah, it feels so amazing. There are so many new Japanese foods... This smells strange but... it's delicious. Gari, is there anything you'd like? You want some wine to start?
589.2@Saury2019: Saury? What's that? Ah, so it's a fish. Does it go well with pasta? What about wine? Ah, that's wonderful. Then I'll have to work hard. Gari, let's give it our best!

693.Intro: Good day! I'm the up and coming light cruiser from Italy, Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi. Ufu, Admiral, just Abruzzi is fine. Please continue to give my sister and me your guidance.
693.Poke(2): "The Exiled Cruiser"? My, that's a nice sounding title. Hey, Garibaldi, what do you think? ...Gari? Did she fall asleep?
693.Equip(2): This feels good. Gari, how do I look? Does it suit me?
693.Sortie: I, Abruzzi, will be the flagship of the Italian Fleet. Fleet, forwards! Sortie!
693.Attack: Get out of the way of Gari and me!
693.Friend45(1): Garibaldi, understood. Let's show them what we're really made of. Increasing speed. Main guns towards the enemy!
693.Friend45(2): Ready, Garibaldi? We'll now support the allied forces. Fleet, increase speed. Please follow me!
693.H0000: The date has just changed. Admiral, please leave the secretary duties to me again today.
693.H0100: Admiral, announcing that it is now 0100.
693.H0200: Admiral, announcing that it is now 0200.
693.H0300: Admiral, it's 0300. Are you asleep? I'll bring you a blanket.
693.H0400: It's almost morning. I wonder if I should wake the Admiral up. The time is 0400... Ah, just a little bit longer?
693.H0500: Admiral, it's 0500. It's morning. Wake up. Admiral, wake- up-. Ufu, now, good morning. Buon giorno!
693.H0600: Everyone, it's 0600. It's morning! Good morning! All hands assemble! All members of the fleet, it's morning! Admiral, let's work hard today too.
693.H0700: Admiral, it's 0700. Here is breakfast. It's my specially made biscotti, fruits yoghurt, and freshly brewed caffe latte. Here you go.
693.H0800: Admiral, it's 0800. Would you like another cup of caffe latte? Alright, I'll go get some.
693.H0900: Admiral, it's 0900. Ah, I'm sorry. The time changed while I was dressing myself. Now I'll go and put on some make-up to go out.
693.H1000: Admiral, it's 1000. Thanks for waiting. I've made a lunch box for lunch too. Look forward to it. Ufufu.
693.H1100: Admiral, it's 1100. Eh, I took a long time to do my make-up? Ah, I'm sorry. I'm an acrtress after all. What did I appear in? A film. A- film-. Ufufu.
693.H1200: Admiral, it's 1200. It's time for lunch. Now, please help yourself to my specially made lunch box. First, the pasta is delicious even if it's cold. Today's is a white sauce.
693.H1300: I'll open a bottle of wine. Is white fine with you? We have plenty of ham, cheese, and crostini. My, you're good at drinking. As I expected of you. Here, have another glass. Would you like to have some fruits too?
693.H1400: Admiral, it's 140... Oh, Zara, Pola, good day to you. Would you like to join us? Eh? Oh my, look at the time. This isn't good. Admiral, it's almost time to begin the fleet operations.
693.H1500: Admiral, it's 1500. Eh? About the movie that I appeared in? Ah, that's right. I played the role of a battleship. Yes, I was offered the role.
693.H1600: Eh? An Italian battleship? Roma? Aha, no. I played a British battleship. "Why"? Hmm, I wonder why... Ah, the time is now just past 1600.
693.H1700: Admiral, it's 1700. Look, the sunset is beautiful. The sunsets here are wonderful. The sunsets on the Mediterranean are wonderful too, you know? Ehe, one day I'd like to go together with you, Admiral... Eh, now? Alright, it would be my pleasure.
693.H1800: Admiral, it's 1800. I should get started on making dinner. I'll get my sister to help me today. I'll go and get her, alright? ...Eh? Why are you here? How?
693.H1900: Well, I won't get hung up on the little things. Garibaldi, we're making acqua pazza. Give me a hand. Oh my, you're good at this. Eh? You make it now and then? Where? Here? Eh... why?
693.H2000: That's it, you soak the leftover soup up with the bread... Admiral, you know how to eat my acqua pazza. Eh? My sister did? What? Ah, the time is now 2000 though...
693.H2100: I'm getting a bit tipsy... Ah, Grecale, what's wrong? I can see three of you. The time is 2100... Oh it's still early. Let's have another bottle of wine.
693.H2200: Hmmm, who is it? There's been so many girls coming to the Admiral's room today. You're... I'm sure you're... Zuikaku? Ah, I know you. You acted in a movie too, right? Come, have a seat. Let's drink together.
693.H2300: 23... 00... Huh? What happened? My head hurts... Did I drink too much? Me? I couldn't have been... Ah, thanks for the water... *gulp*... *gulp*... Ah, I feel great again... Eh, I was drunk? No way, I couldn't have been. I'm fine now, Admiral.

590.Intro: Hello, I'm the state-of-the-art light cruiser from Italy, Giuseppe Garibaldi. It's too long? Well then... Just Garibaldi is fine. Nice to meet you.
590.Library: I'm the Luigi di Savoia Duca Degli Abruzzi-class light cruiser, Giuseppe Garibaldi. Whoa, my sister's name is so long... But, I'm a genuine state-of-the-art light cruiser with great firepower and armour! I may have held back quite a bit, but this time I'll work real hard. Just you watch!

590.Poke(2): Alright. It's finally my turn. I'm itching to get going.

590.Married: I made some cafe latte. How is it? Ah, it's hot.
590.Wedding: Whoa, sorry, my sister and I are kind of... Eh, that's still... fine? Seriously? Th-then, I guess I'll accept.
590.Ranking: Information? That's important. Wait a minute. Here we go...
590.Join: Sorties really get you pumped up. State-of-the-art Abruzzi-class light cruiser, Garibaldi, heading out!
590.Equip(2): Nice... I want to show this to my sister.
590.Docking(1): Tch, I'm going to take a quick shower. I'm dirty.
590.Docking(2): Owow... Those bastards bit me in some funny places...
590.Return: I'm back home. Haah, that was tiring.
590.Sortie: I, Garibaldi, am now the fleet flagship! Weigh anchor! Now, everyone follow me!
590.Battle: Now, begin the battle. I'm itching to get started. Everyone, let's get started!
590.Yasen(2): You know, I'm quite state-of-the-art. The real deal.
590.Yasen(1): Aaah, it's night. Well, that's fine. Let's do this!
590.MVP: Thanks! Is it alright for me to take it? Sorry, everyone. Well, that's that. Hoooray!
590.Damaged(2): Ow! Owowowow! They managed to hit me? Seriously!?
590.Damaged(3): Ngh! I won't sink but, I can't let my sister see this!
590.Sunk: No way... I'm seriously... gonna sink... This can't... be happening... Seriously... Sister!
590.2@Rainy2019: Roma! What are you doing? Teroo Teroo Bozuu? Hmm, lemme see... Some kinda charm? Nice! I'll make some too!
590.2@Fall2019: Whoaaa. I'm going to get a heaping pile of that delicious looking thing. The Admiral's Naval District Autumn Festival is not bad. Whoa! This is delicious too! Keep the wine flowing! Right, Pola?
590.2@Saury2019: It's the Saury Festival! This is it... right? Alright then, I'll help out too. So equipment is important. Aaah, Zara, teach me all about it!

691.Intro: Hello, the state-of-the-art light cruiser, Giuseppe Garibaldi, reporting for duty. Ah, just leave it all to me! I got this!
691.Poke(1): My motto is "I obey". Ah, but you knew that.
691.Equip(2): Thanks! I'd like my sister to get a matching one.
691.Friend45(1): Ah, not bad. Let's do this!
691.H0000: 00... What was the rest... So this is what I'm supposed to do here? I can do that easily.
691.H0100: Ah, you know... it's that time... 00... Mmm, no... 0100... Hey, Admiral? I got it, right?
691.H0200: 0200. Alright, I knew I could do it. I got this!
691.H0300: 0300. Hey, Admiral, want something to drink? You liked the cafe latte, right? I'll go make some.
691.H0400: Ah, Sister? Yeah, well, I do like her. Her name is damned long though. I'm sure you'd like her if you met her too, Admiral! 0400.
691.H0500: 0500. It's morning. Ahh, you pulled an all-nighter, didn't you? I'll get breakfast ready. Just like Sister... Well, leave it to me.
691.H0600: 0600. Good morning! Now, I'm going to wake the fleet up. I'm going to do it my way, alright?
691.H0700: 0700. I've prepared breakfast. Hot cafe latte, my special biscotto, and fruits yoghurt. How's that?
691.H0800: 0800. How was my attempt at my sister's style of breakfast? Eh, it was a bit bland? Whaattt!? Seriously!?
691.H0900: 0900. I see... What's done is done. I'll make a fancy lunch box for lunch. Get ready for a lunch box like my sister makes it!
691.H1000: 1000. Admiral, just a little more... It's done! My attempt at my sister's fancy lunch box. Whew, that took a while.
691.H1100: 1100. Well, why dont we do some exercises this morning. Admiral, are there any good challengers? Ah, those girls. Nice.
691.H1200: Now, it's 1200. Let's enjoy my Sister's Fancy Lunch Box to the fullest! First, this pasta...
691.H1300: Hey, it's good right? Now, take this ham, cheese, fruits, and crostini. There, it's perfect, right? Want some wine too?
691.H1400: 14... Ah, Pola, Zara! Long time no see. What's this, you got lured here by the smell of wine? Ehe.
691.H1500: 1500. Pola, it'll be a pain if you collapse again. I'll take a picture of you. Ahahaha, Zara, I'm just joking.
691.H1600: 1600. "Don't make fun of heavy cruisers"? What are you saying? There's not much of a difference! Don't be such a square.
691.H1700: Ah, it's sunset. The sunsets on the Mediterranean are nice, but the sunsets here are beautiful too. Yup, I like it. Ah, the time? It just turned 1700.
691.H1800: 1800. Now, it's time to make dinner. Maybe I should use the fish the destroyers gave me from their F-work today.
691.H1900: Ah, almost done. It's done. 1900. Now, help yourself. It's acqua pazza like my sister makes it. It's delicious!
691.H2000: 2000. Now, soak up the leftover soup with bread and eat it. Well, it's good, right? Shall I open another bottle of white wine? Well?
691.H2100: 2100. That noisy fleet of pipsqueaks have gone quiet all of a sudden. It's a bit early, but did they go to bed?
691.H2200: Urgh, the noisy runts are back. Is that a light cruiser? She's small. Well, she is cute though. The time is now 2200.
691.H2300: 2300... We did a lot today. Good work. Admiral, let's work hard tomorrow too. Someday my sister will be with us too, right?

604.Intro: Hi! So you're the Admiral of this fleet I've heard about? I'm the Dutch CL, De Ruyter. Do you recognise the name? Do you? Do you? That's right! I'm pretty good, after all! Just leave it to me.
604.Library: I'm the light cruiser from the Netherlands, De Ruyter. With my new model main gun and powerful concentrated anti-air gun emplacements, I was a new kind of light cruiser that was deployed to the Dutch East Indies. I fought as the flagship of the ABDA Fleet but... Japanese CAs are bad news. They really are.
604.Poke(2): Ah, time for me to head out? Alright. Gimme a sec.
604.Poke(3): What is that? It's very different from what we have in the Netherlands. So are they normally like this here? Ah, not really? Ah, it's used as an anti-air gun emplacement? Nice! I like it!
604.Idle: Admiral, what's that blueprint? Hmmm? "Dentan"? Eh, so the same thing as RADAR? I'm kinda interested in it. I'd like to try it out sometime... Can I?
604.Married: Ah, it's really time for me to head out? No, no, I'm fine with it. Alright then, give me a sec. I'll be ready in a flash.
604.Wedding: Really... You're sure? ...yeah, I... I do too! I love you!
604.Join: CL De Ruyter, heading out! Come on everyone, follow me. Let's sortie!
604.Docking(2): Oh man... This is the worst. Ah, don't worry.
604.Sortie: I'll be leading the ABDA Fleet. Got it? Fleet, head out! Follow me. Let's go!
604.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Everyone, battle stations.
604.Yasen(1): Oh woooow. We have some night work to do? I don't think I'm ready for it yet, but... I'll just do it.
604.MVP: Eh!? I'm the highest achiever? Yaaaay! Hey, can I do a toast? Can I? Really? Then... Cheers!
604.Damaged(3): Oh no, this is bad! I don't feel like I'm sinking, but... it's bad.
604.Sunk: Oh... no... I'm sinking... I don't want it to... end here... but... Goodbye... everyone...

609.Intro: Hi! Admiral, how are you today? I see, I see. I'm the Dutch CL, De Ruyter. That's right, just leave it to me again today.
609.Poke(2): Aha, it's really time for me to head out? Alright. Gimme a sec.
609.Sortie: ABDA Fleet, flagship De Ruyter. Let's go! Fleet, head out! Follow me. Sortie!
609.H0000: Oh wow! Apparently I, De Ruyter, will be your secretary ship today. That's fine right?
609.H0100: 1 AM. It's kinda exciting. Huh, you don't think so?
609.H0200: 2 AM. I'm kinda sleepy... aren't you, Admiral?
609.H0300: 3 AM. Don't you feel kinda hungry? Shall we have some stroopwafels? Not now?
609.H0400: Oh shoot, it's almost morning. Oh no. I need to catch some shuteye.
609.H0500: It's 5 o'clock. The sunrise is beautiful. Hey, take a look. I love this time of day.
609.H0700: It's 7 o'clock. Want stroopwafels for breakfast? Just put it on top of your coffee cup like this... Ah, yep. Just like that. See, doesn't that look good? Enjoy the stroopwafels and coffee!
609.H0800: It's now 8 o'clock. Now, shall we get ready to head out?
609.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. Let's goooo! Hey, which sea are we heading to today?
609.H1000: 10 o'clock. Being at sea feels so good. It does, it does. Yup.
609.H1100: 11 o'clock. I wonder if Java is doing well. Admiral, do you know? ...I see. I hope to see her again one day.
609.H1200: 12 o'clock. It's noon. For lunch we're having... this! Take this fried egg, ham, and cheese, then sandwich it between some toast... and done! Here you go! Hey, it's great, right? You feeling me?
609.H1300: 1 PM. Admiral, would you like another cup of coffee? Here you go. Be careful, it's hot.
609.H1400: 2 P... I-is... that a Japanese heavy cruiser squadron!? Fu-full alert!! Eh, oh... it's just Houston and the others.
609.H1500: Houston, Perth, good work. How are you doing? Ah, me? I'm fine as usual! Ah, perfect, 3 o'clock. Want to have tea?
609.H1600: Hmm, that's right. The Japanese girls sure are amazing at night. I totally get that. I'll need to be careful around them... The time? It's now... 4 PM.
609.H1700: 5 o'clock. Look, it's the sunset. The sunset in the Netherlands is nice, but this time of day is beautiful in Japan too. I like it.
609.H1800: 6 o'clock. It's time for dinner. Admiral, what do you want to have? Maybe something with potatoes? Eh, you'll cook for me? Really?
609.H1900: 7 o'clock. Hmmm, so this is a Japanese dinner? Digging in!. Mmm! It's good! What is it called? "Nikujaga"? Hmmm, what an interesting dish. No, no, it's delicious. Teach me how to make it sometime!
609.H2000: It's 8 o'clock. I'll do the cleaning up. You just stay put, Admiral. Ah, I'll get you some more coffee, okay? Yup, to thank you for your cooking.
609.H2100: It's 9 o'clock now. Hmm? That's... Japan's strongest, DesRon 2? Oh, they're not? Ah, so it's DesRon 3. Hmm, they're very lively.
609.H2200: It's 10 o'clock. Nnnggh, whew. I'm beat. Admiral, want a shoulder massage? You do?
609.H2300: Admiral, it's 11 o'clock now. Today was a long day. See you tomorrow. Good night.

613.Intro: How are you? I'm the Perth-class light cruiser, Perth. The HMAS Perth. I was born in England and raised in Australia.
613.Library: I'm the Perth-class light cruiser, Perth. I was born in England and raised in Australia. I was part of the Allied Forces' ABDA fleet when we were intercepted by the Japanese Navy heading south during the Southern Strategy. I fought to the last together with the CA Houston... Our feelings of protecting each other were mutual.
613.Poke(3): Well, that's fine. But first we should have a strategy meeting. Listen, for a multinational fleet, communication is the most important... Hey, Admiral, are you listening to me?
613.Idle: Houston? What's the matter? ...What? An ABDA Fleet strategy meeting? Here and now? Well, I don't mind. Right here?
613.Married: How are you? ...Fair enough. That's good. I'm alright, thanks.
613.Wedding: How's it going? Admiral, what is it? ...Is this for me? Re-really. I'll gladly consider it. N... No... I accept.
613.Ranking: Information? That's necessary. Here you go.
613.Join: Amphion... No wait... Perth, CL Perth, sortieing. Everyone, follow me. Let's go.
613.Supply: Thanks. I'll get them this time.
613.Docking(1): I'm stepping back a bit. What else can I do?
613.Docking(2): They really did a number on me. I'll go get this all fixed up right away.
613.Sortie: ABDA Fleet, CL Perth, setting off. Everyone, follow me. I won't lose this time.
613.Battle: Enemy in sight. Shall we get started?
613.Yasen(1): The fleet is moving to night battle. Beware of enemy torpedoes. Charge!
613.MVP: Couldn't be better. Well that's how it is. I'll have to accept this then.
613.Damaged(3): Aaah, gah! I'm hit? Throw the inflammables overboard. Hurry with the fire fighting. I won't sink to anything less than a direct torpedo strike!
613.Sunk: I've... taken a direct hit... I see... I'm sinking... I don't mind... But, there's something important... I haven't told you yet... Ahh... Admiral, I... I...

618.Intro: How are you? I'm the Perth-class light cruiser, Perth. HMAS Perth is here. Don't underestimate my strength - I was raised in Australia. Well, shall we get started?
618.Join: CL Perth, sortieing. Everyone, follow me. Let's go.
618.H0000: So I, Perth, will be your secretary ship? Understood. What's that look for? I'll be alright. Just watch.
618.H0300: It's 3 o'clo... What's that look for? If you have something to say, out with it.
618.H0400: It's 4 o'clock. Oh, you just wanted some tea? You should've said so sooner. Here.
618.H0500: It's 5 o'clock. Would you like another cuppa? No worries, I'll get you one.
618.H0700: It's 7 o'clock. Here's my special continental breakfast. Would you like some Earl Grey? Here you go.
618.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. Did you like breakfast? That's great.
618.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. Ah, Houston has left port. We should go too.
618.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. ABDA Fleet, sortie. Ehe, this formation makes me feel safe.
618.H1200: It's noon. Have some of my special lunch sandwiches.
618.H1300: It's 1 o'clock. Was it good? ...What? Ah, that's a kind of fermented food that's good for you. Maybe.
618.H1400: It's 2... Admiral, there's a silhouette up ahead, the class is... a light cruiser... De Ruyter. ABDA Fleet, linking up.
618.H1500: It's 3 o'clock. CA Houston is up ahead. We're linking up. Great, she's alright.
618.H1600: It's 4 o'clock. Admiral, there's another friendly fleet up ahead. CA class, Mogami, Mikuma. Behind them, destroyer Shikinami. Our fleet will continue on and link up with them.
618.H1700: It's 5 o'clock. What peaceful seas... The sunset is beautiful. This era... this time... is precious, isn't it?
618.H1900: It's 7 o'clock. You... made this, Admiral? It looks good. I'll help myself... *nom*... Mmm! It's good!
618.H2000: It's 8 o'clock. Admiral, you're good at cooking. Where did you learn how to cook?
618.H2100: It's 9 o'clo... Hmmm? Who is it? ...You're... Shikinami? What are you doing out this late? You brought... some snacks? Thanks. I appreciate it.
618.H2200: It's 10 o'clock. They're such good girls. I don't mind. What's that look for? What's wrong with that?
618.H2300: It's 11 o'clock. Admiral, good work today. Let's work hard tomorrow too. Good night.

471.Intro: I've kept you waiting, Commander. First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Kamikaze, has arrived. Are you ready, everyone? Follow me.
471.Library: I am the first of the Kamikaze-class Destroyers, Kamikaze. I am the nameship of a fleet of destroyers designed during the Eight-Eight Fleet Program era. We may be an older model compared to the Mutsuki-class, but I managed to run through that battle to the very end. I hope you'll remember who we are.
471.Poke(1): Commander, did you call me? I am prepared.
471.Poke(2): I'm an old type? Silly you. A destroyer's capabilities aren't about her specs.
471.Poke(3): Stop it, Harukaze. I'm not fond of such things... eh? It's you, Commander. What's the meaning of this? I desire an explanation.
471.Idle: Destroyer-1? Ah, I was once called that a long time ago. But I am now Kamikaze! That's my nameship! Be sure to remember it!
471.Married: Commander, you look tired. Okay, I'll pour something warm for you to drink. One moment, please. Here you go. So, are you warming up? Really? That's a relief.
471.Wedding: Yes, Commander? Another escort mission? I don't mind that... Eh, no? What is that on your hand? It's... for me? Wow, really? Thank you. I'll treasure it... I will treasure it for sure!
471.Ranking: Looking at intel? It is vital. I'm glad that you're an able Commander.
471.Join: Destroyer Division 1 Flagship, Kamikaze. It's time to weigh anchor!
471.Equip(1): Am I getting stronger? Th-Thank you. I'm glad, but...
471.Equip(2): Mm, this is good. I can survive till the very end with this. Thank you.
471.Supply: Right. Refueling complete! What's next? Fleet escort?
471.Docking(1): Just a little... let me rest a little. No peeking. I'll be done in an instant.
471.Docking(2): Ahh... this is awful in many ways. Commander, I'm taking a break for a while. Hurm...
471.Construction: New ship construction has completed. Good!
471.Return: Commander, the fleet has returned. In any case, I'm glad that they're all okay.
471.Sortie: Flagship Kamikaze, setting sail. Are you ready, everyone? Follow me.
471.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Right, ready for battle. On me, everyone.
471.Yasen(1): Pursuing the enemy fleet. Battle speed 5. Charge! Follow me!
471.MVP: Yes! Ah, but please don't praise me. I'm only doing my usual routine. T-that's right.
471.Damaged(3): I'm hit? Where? I-I won't sink!
471.Sunk: No way. It can't be! I'm filling with water... No...
471.2@NewYears: Happy New Year, Commander. The Kamikaze-class can count on you again this year, right? Hmm? Right!
471.2@Setsubun: Naturally, I will be the demon for the Kamikaze-class. After all, the name ship- Ow! Ow, ow, ow. Come on!
471.2@Valentines: At last, my special chocolate cake is done! I hope the commander likes it. This is fine, right...?
471.2@Rainy: Miss Haguro, please be careful at this time of year! Ah, you too, Miss Ashigara! If you're heading somewhere, I'll accompany you.
471.2@Fall: Commander, it's autumn! This time of year makes me feel so excited! Commander, how does autumn make you feel?
471.2@Saury: There's been a rumor about a saury fishing support... fleet... Umm, what equipment should I start with, I wonder...? I'll need something bright, perhaps... and then...
471.2@Xmas:
Commander, here. Say "ahh" ...I asked you to say "ahh".
...And after I made this Christmas cake myself. You don't want any?
471.2@YearsEnd: The New Year's cleaning doesn't change no matter the era. Even during the Taishou... Eh, no, it's nothing.
471.2@Spring: Harukaze, what's with that stacked lunchbox? Ah, could it be a Kamikaze-class flower viewing? That's nice. You're coming too, right, Commander? Great!
471.2@WhiteDay: Was that chocolate cake delicious? The returning gift are so big...S-score!
471.2@EarlySummer: Eh?  I should wear a swimsuit this summer... Absolutely not!  There's no way I can do that! I won't!

476.Intro: Commander, I'll do my best! First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Kamikaze, has arrived. Let's face our battles head-on!
476.Poke(3): Is that Ashigara? I'm a bit busy right now... Eh? Commander!? What's the meaning of this? I would like an explanation of what it is you think you're doing.
476.Equip(1): You're going to make me stronger? Thanks. Don't forget the anti-sub equipment!
476.Equip(2): Huh? It's for a transport mission? I guess. Actually, I'd rather not remove my torpedoes...
476.Sortie: Even if the war outlook is bad, we've got to do something! Flagship Kamikaze, setting sail. Fleet, weigh anchor!
476.H0000: Right! Today I'll be taking care of you as your secretary. Is that ok? It is now 12 midnight. Leave the hourly announcements to me!
476.H0100: 0100. *yawn* I'm a bit sleepy... but I'll be fine. You can rely on me.
476.H0200: 0200. It's the hour of Ushimitsu. What? You're scared, Commander? Guess you do have an adorable side.
476.H0300: 0300. Umm... do you feel like... going to the washroom? I'll accompany you there. How's that...?
476.H0400: 0400. Oh, thank goodness. It's going to be morning. Eh? The night? I don't... find it... scary...
476.H0500: 0500. That's not it! I'm completely fine on the ocean. It's not the same as night time on dry land. Geez...
476.H0600: 0600. Commander, I'll be performing the morning call. Fleet, arise! It's morning. The morning has arrived. Rise and shine, everyone!
476.H0700: 0700. Right! Commander, allow me to cook. Wait a moment, please... Okay! Sorry to keep you waiting. I had to watch the barley rice.
476.H0800: 0800. What do you think of my cooking? Mmm! Right! So, after this, let's begin on with fleet operations.
476.H0900: 0900. What shall we start with this morning? Expeditions? Quests? Mmm, I can't decide with such a wonderful fleet. Commander, what do you think?
476.H1000: 1000. Right! Now then, we should begin with an expedition. Put me in charge of a convoy escort. Hey! I can say with confidence that I won't return with less than one shou's worth.
476.H1100: 1100. Geez, it's almost lunch time... what should I do? I don't mind cooking again, but... how about cooking together? It can be the commander's solemn duty, mmm?
476.H1200: 1200. Okay, I've decided. We'll have salted rice balls for lunch...is that ok? I'll prepare some miso soup to go with it. It matches with the salty flavor.
476.H1300: 1300. How was it? Lunch, I mean. There's a shortage of vegetables. Fresh vegetables have gotten so expensive.
476.H1400: 1400. Didn't my salted rice balls turn out well? What? Did it take long to make....? ...Ah, no, not at all! I am very efficient cook.
476.H1500: 150— Ah, Haguro! Thank you for your hard work. You look great... eh... ah... Well, I'm feeling great too. Look, look! I'm fine!
476.H1600: 1600. A transport operation? Right, then. Though I do feel a little worried without torpedoes... I'll be fine, so don't worry!
476.H1700: 1700. Ah, Commander, the sun is setting. How beautiful... this reminds me of the sunset I saw in Singapore. It's nostalgic. Is Nokaze....all right?
476.H1800: 1800. Commander, it's past sunset, isn't it? The fleet has returned to port? Let me cook dinner, then. Please look forward to it.
476.H1900: 1900... Here, Commander! Kamikaze special pork miso soup with fresh vegetables. It'll go well with the barley rice. Bon appetite!
476.H2000: 20— Oh!? Ashigara? Mmm, mmm... You are preparing pork cutlet curry rice here? Wow, that's wonderful... Commander, can you eat? Ah, you ate it. That's great.
476.H2100: 2100. Mmmmmm... delicious. Ashigara, thank you for the victory pork cutlet curry rice. *sigh* I overate.
476.H2200: 2200. Eh... Commander, what is it? What makes me feel afraid? Mmm...submarines are a nightmare for a convoy escort, you know? Eh, you don't believe me?
476.H2300: 2300. I can't do it! Submarines are terrifying. Of course, any enemy is horrible... Night time? The sea at night is not so frightening.

472.Intro: Morning. It's Asakaze. Second ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Asakaze. Commander? Please memorize it soon. Okay?
472.Library:
Kamikaze-class destroyer, second ship, Asakaze. I was born in Nagasaki.

Along with my younger sister Harukaze and the others, I formed the historic Fifth Destroyer Division. I was naturally the flagship. I took part in landing operations in the early stages of the war. Of course, I was also reliable and punctual with convoy escorts.

Mm! If it was there, I did it!
472.Poke(2): Yes...? A fleet escort...? Leave it to me, if you would, please. It'll be fine.
472.Poke(3): D... W-What are- Don't make a fool of me! Eh? You're not... trying to...? Ah... sorry. I misunderstood. Right! That makes us even!
472.Idle: I'm so bored... Harukaze, doesn't talking like that put you to sleep? I mean, look at Matsukaze. Ah... Matsukaze, you're wearing that hat again. It'll get in the way in battle, so take it off. Ah... what? What's that? You're picking a fight with your big sis? Bring it on! I'm not going to hold back!
472.Married: What's this? You're so undisciplined. You're worn out from this? *sigh* Commander, haven't you lacked motivation recently? I have no choice, then. I'll help you get your fighting spirit back. Look this way for a moment. Ready? Close your eyes. ...Ah, they opened! You opened your eyes! I'm not doing this anymore!
472.Wedding: What is it, Commander? To call me out to a place like this... I'm very busy right now. Well, with fleet escorts and such. Convoys and such. Eh? What's this? For me...? W-Well...! I suppose I'll accept it. I-It's beautiful... and the size is just right...
472.Ranking: Hm? The intelligence? I'll go get it for you. Hold on.
472.Join: Fifth Destroyer Division, setting sail! Ready? Everyone, follow me!
472.Equip(2): How is it...? Well, anything would work well on me!
472.Supply: Well, I'll have some. It's essential.
472.Docking(1): Sorry. Is it okay if I fall back for a bit?
472.Docking(2):
Hmm... I'm sure Kamikaze-nee is going to scold me for this...
Well, I suppose I don't have to tell her?
472.Return:
Commander? The fleet has returned. *whew* I'm so tired...
Would you mind massaging my shoulders?
472.Sortie: DesRon 5, heading out! All DesDiv 5 members, are you ready? Sortieing!
472.Battle: So the enemy fleet was spotted? Everyone ready? Let's do this.
472.Yasen(1): DesRon 5, charging in. Fall into formation behind me! We're going in!
472.Yasen(2): Yes! You took the bait. I'll finish you!
472.MVP: Please observe! I, Asakaze, am the greatest. My eloquence and training are on a whole other level! Uh...? Commander? Why are you laughing? What's with you!?
472.Damaged(3): It's not as if I took a torpedo! This isn't... enough to sink me!
472.Sunk:
It can't be... I'm... sinking once again...
Matsukaze... where are...? Please come and... find me...
472.2@NewYears: Commander, Happy New Year! ...What? What is it? It's not like that. This is important. It really is.
472.2@Setsubun: I see, so it's Setsubun? Alright! Kamikaze-nee w- Ow! St-Stop it! What are you doing, Matsukaze!? Uu- Hatakaze, I just saw you jump in! Ugh, now you've done it!
472.2@Valentines: Commander? Well, uhm, you know... here's some chocolate for you. Yep, here you go! And now that have it, take responsibility and eat it already!
472.2@LateWinter: Hatakaze? Now that you mention it, I haven't seen her. That girl doesn't handle winter well. She'll show up eventually once it gets warmer. Eh? That's wrong?
472.2@Xmas: *sigh* ...So this is Christmas! Looks good. I love these types of things. So this is Champagne...? *gulp* Wait, this is alcohol! Huh? Matsukaze!?
472.2@YearsEnd: Right, everyone here, the season for New Year's cleaning has come again. First we'll start off beating the dust, then we'll form a sweeping brigade, then finally wiping with a dust cloth. The three key steps! Let's go!
472.2@Rainy: Geez... we've had nothing but rain lately. Well, rainy mornings are also good. Hey, Commander, what do you think? Oh, Commander?
472.2@WhiteDay: Ah, I see. Just give that returning gift to me for now. Thanks, Commander, I will gladly receive it. Well, it's not like I'm happy or anything. I would still eat them though.
472.2@EarlySummer: Ah~, it's almost summer again this year, huh? I don't really like the end of summer. It somehow feels...a bit lonely?
472.2@Summer2017: Ah, jeez, it's summer now. I hate this season. But when it's over I always feel so sad. Why is that?
472.2@Fall2017: Heh~, heheh~, ahaha~! I did it! I got through summer. I won! It's autumn now, autumn! Autumn mornings are great too, right~? I love them a lot!
472.2@Saury2017: *sigh* Is this what you mean? When you said "saury fishing"... If you ask me, I'd prefer just to do fleet escorts... Oh well, I'll give it a shot! Leave it to me!
472.2@LateFall2017: Oh no, it's gotten really cold lately~ I'll catch a cold if I'm not careful. Let's set up the kotatsu in your room, Commander. I'll help you take it out.
472.2@Anniversary2018: Hey, did you say it's the fleet's 5th Anniversary? Eh, wait a minute. That means we're in our 6th year? Whoa, that took me completely by surprise. But congratulations, and thank you so much.

370.Intro: Morning. It's Asakaze. Second ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Asakaze. Commander, have you come to appreciate the morning? You already liked it? Ehe♪ ...Alright!
370.Join: First Surface Escort Division, heading out! Harukaze, are you ready? We're going to protect everyone this time! Don't let the enemy subs come near them! Sortie!
370.Equip(2): Isn't this nice? Commander, have you come to understand me a little?
370.Supply: Of course I'll have some. Let's keep at it!
370.Sortie: DesRon 5, heading out! Is everyone ready? Matsukaze? If you fall behind, I won't let you hear the end of it!
370.MVP: Please observe! I, Asakaze, am the greatest, am I not? Well, haven't I known the Commander for a long time? And my training is on a whole other level! Uh...? Commander? Why are you still laughing? What's with you!?
370.Friend42(1): 2nd ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Asakaze, charging in!
370.H0000: Midnight. *whew* I'll be the one to accompany you today. ...What? Is there a problem? ...Oh, so I see. Then I guess it's fine.
370.H0100: 2 a.m.! Er... what, you want it the other way? How pretentious... Well, whatever. Aye! 0100. Is that fine?
370.H0200: 3 a-! ...Oh, right... 0200. Well, I guess it's fine. It's 02. 02. Hey, are you even listening?
370.H0300: 0300. Commander, you're not even listening, right? If you're not listening, I'm-going-to-stop. He~ey!? ...Ah, you reacted. I guess you were listening.
370.H0400: 0400. *stretch* It's finally morning...! Morning, morning. Hmhm♪ I love mornings! Mornings are really nice, you know? Right, Commander?
370.H0500: 0500. It's here! The morning! It's morning! The morning breeze feels so good~♪ Right, Commander? ...Eh? Close the window because it's cold? *sigh* ...Our Commander really doesn't get it at all.
370.H0600: 0600. We're going full throttle this morning. First of all, you have to start the day with a delicious breakfast! I cooked up a huuge batch of barley rice. Now, eat up!
370.H0700: 0700. Commander, what's this? You haven't gotten through much of your meal at all! No, no, this won't do at all! You have to eat properly in the morning. Here— a big helping of barley rice! ...It can't be helped. I'll give you some of my pickled radish.
370.H0800: 0800. We're going to start the morning exercises. Div 5, form up! Hatakaze? Harukaze? Matsukaze? ...Oh well. We'll do the morning exercises with those who showed up. Destroyer Division 5, we're setting sail this morning!
370.H0900: 0900. *whew* I worked up a good morning sweat! Alright! It's still morning, so let's keep going! What's next? An expedition? A sortie?
370.H1000: 1000. Uuu... Morning is ending... However, we're still in the a.m. hours! It's technically morning! Wh-Why are you eying me like that, Matsukaze!? What is it?
370.H1100: 1100. I get it already. I suppose it is almost lunchtime. I ate quite a lot in the morning, but I'm already getting an appetite. And you, Commander...?
370.H1200: 1200. It's noon. Hm? Harukaze, what is that? ...Eh? A sandwich? What's that? Destroyers should eat barley rice! Right, Commander? ...H-Huh? You don't feel that way?
370.H1300: 1300. Hmmm... Sandwiches aren't bad, but they're not something I'd eat too often. Still, thank you, Harukaze. Thanks for the meal!
370.H1400: 140- Ah, Mogami-san, Mikuma-san. Hi there. Um... what's that you have? Eh? A model? Hmmm... so you build them. Eh~ how eccentric. ...Ah! No, I didn't mean it like that! If it comes out okay, would you show it to me?
370.H1500: 1500. Well, I guess everyone has their hobbies. Matsukaze, what do you do on your days off? ...Eh? Ahh... I see. Fu... how eccentric. It's fine, though.
370.H1600: 1600. Ah, Nowaki? What's up? Ah, I see. Nah, I haven't seen her. Right, got it. If I see her, I'll let you know.
370.H1700: 1700. And so it ended up being evening. Eh? What about the sunset...? Ha! What are you talking about? The morning sunrise is many times more lovely. Right?
370.H1800: 1800. Ah, geez, after saying all that, it's already night— night! Night is somehow... How to put it... I have no motivation.
370.H1900: 1900. Commander, well~ ...I know it's wrong, but I don't really feel like working at night... ...Eh? You're ordering takeout for dinner? Ah, then I wanna order something! Umm... I'll have...
370.H2000: 2000. Mmm... even Mamiya's takeout is delicious. I'm so full! Treating ourselves can be nice sometimes. Every day would be... hmm... that would be quite the luxury, huh? Yeah.
370.H2100: 21... 00. ...Night is... I don't like the night. I especially dislike the sea at night. I like mornings. I like being out on the sea. I like the clear blue skies. Eh? DesRon 3? No, I'm a part of DesRon 5.
370.H2200: 22... 00. The First Surface Escort Division? ...Yeah. I fought hard, but... I wanted to protect them, but... it was too intense. That's why I hate the night.
370.H2300: 23... 00. It's well into the night. There's no avoiding it, though. ...It's fine! The morning sun will always rise again. Hey, Commander? Let's do our best tomorrow morning!

473.Intro: My name is Harukaze, third ship of the Kamikaze class of destroyers. Commander-sama, I am pleased to make your acquaintance.
473.Library: I am Harukaze, the third ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. I was born in Maizuru. I used to be called Destroyer-5, but I later got a real name, "Harukaze". I was in Destroyer Division 5 and also belonged to the first Maritime Escort Flotilla, in which I helped protect everyone. Even if the fighting ends... I will still protect you.
473.Poke(2): Hm? Oh? Commander-sama, thank you for today.
473.Poke(3): Commander-sama, is there something wrong with my rig? Ah, there was a flower petal? Ufufu, I find it elegant.
473.Idle: I wonder what is Asakaze doing now. If it's her, she's probably frolicking around, Commander-sama. Hm? Commander-sama? You look tired. Wait, I'll give you a blanket. Good night.
473.Married: Commander-sama, do you want to hear about my dream? I was injured and then... Commander-sama? Did you fall asleep?
473.Wedding: Commander-sama, you called for the fifth destroyer group? Eh? Only me? Ah, yes. This is for me!? Thank you very much. I will cherish it.
473.Ranking: You want to look at the report, right? I will bring it to you.
473.Join: Harukaze of the Fifth Destroyer Division. Thank you for the privilege of sortieing. Setting sail.
473.Equip(1): This is for me? You have my thanks, Commander-sama.
473.Equip(2): This is... really great equipment! I'm really happy.
473.Supply: Refueling. I confirm that I have received it.
473.Docking(1): Commander-sama, I am going to freshen up. Please wait a bit.
473.Docking(2): Commander-sama, I am so sorry. I'm going to heal my injuries.
473.Construction: I should go and meet the new ship.
473.Return: Commander-sama, I'm here to report in. The fleet has returned to base.
473.Sortie: Flagship Harukaze, setting sail. Everyone, please take care of me, okay?
473.Battle: What do I do... enemy ships have been spotted. Everyone, please get ready.
473.Yasen(1): It has come to a night battle. Everyone, please continue to follow me.
473.Yasen(2): Oh, my. The enemy is still here as well.
473.MVP: I am...? Really? Thank you, I'm glad to be here. I am delighted.
473.Damaged(3): Aaaaah! In this shape I can neither do battle nor escort...
473.Sunk: I'm going... to sink here... Asakaze, Matsukaze, Hatakaze, goodbye... surely... somewhere we will...
473.2@NewYears: Commander-sama, I owe you so much for what you did for me last year. I hope you'll allow me to rely on you again this year. The Kamikaze-class, the fleet, and I all ask this of you.
473.2@Setsubun: It is Setsubun, isn't it? It makes you feel as though your will to fight has returned, doesn't it? The one acting as our demon is... Kamikaze onee-sama...? Ah... everyone, you're throwing so hard...! Ah... awawa...!
473.2@Valentines: Well, it is Valentine's Day, so I took the liberty of making a little bit extravagant chocolate. Commander, if you don't mind, would you like to have some? *swoon*
473.2@Rainy: Rain... I'm well aware that not many are fond of the rainy season, but I love it. It fits well with my umbrella. I adore it so much. Don't you agree?
473.2@Fall: Commander-sama? Autumn is a time of delicious food. If I may, I would like to show you my skill and prepare you some delicious food, okay? Ufufufu.
473.2@Saury: You said that we'll be supporting the saury fishing, didn't you? Orders acknowledged. I'll be heading out to fish as well.
473.2@Xmas: So this is... what is known as "Christmas". I see a lot of dishes I am unfamiliar with. This large piece of meat is... I see, so it is poultry.
473.2@YearsEnd: This was the season when I was launched. I like doing the end of year spring cleaning. It feels good, right?
473.2@Spring: Spring... spring is my season. The wind feels good, doesn't it? Would you like to go out and feel the spring breeze? Ehe~
473.2@WhiteDay: Commander, is this for me? Thank you very much! I'll go and decorate the household shrine... Eh? I shouldn't? Oh, okay. In that case I'm going to eat it before it perishes
473.2@EarlySummer: I see, in the Taishou Era, showing that much skin would be...no it wouldn't be like that.  These swimsuits today are... how should I put it... they are a bit indecent.
473.2@Anniversary2018: The fleet's 5th Anniversary is here, Commander-sama. I'd like to be together forever... No, it's nothing.

363.Intro: My name is Harukaze, third ship of the Kamikaze class of destroyers. Commander-sama, I am pleased to make your acquaintance. I will support you until the end.
363.Sortie: First Escort Fleet, Harukaze, setting sail. Everyone, please take care of me.
363.Yasen(2): Oh my, there are enemies over here... and over there as well...!? It can't be... a wolf pack!?
363.H0000: Commander-sama, I think for today, I will be serving as your secretary ship. Is that all right with you? I'm glad.
363.H0100: Notifying you that it's 0100. Commander-sama, you still intend to continue working? I am going to make tea.
363.H0200: Notifying you that it's 0200. I finished making the tea. I'm going to put it here. There are tea-cakes as well.
363.H0300: Notifying you that it's 0300. Commander-sama, the late night is completely silent. I would like it... if it was always like this.
363.H0400: Notifying you that it's 0400. Commander-sama, was it not because you did your duties all night that you got tired? Here, let me give you a shoulder massage.
363.H0500: Notifying you that it's 0500. Commander-sama, look at how beautiful the sunrise is. No matter the season, the dawn is wonderful.
363.H0600: 0600. It is now morning. I woke up all of the members of the fleet. Commander-sama, what would you like for breakfast?
363.H0700: Notifying you that it's 0700 and time for breakfast. Here is the breakfast I prepared. It's my specialty, so please enjoy it.
363.H0800: Notifying you that it's 0800. Commander-sama, here is a second helping. I tried my very best to make it.
363.H0900: Notifying you that it's 0900. Commander-sama, what kind of work will you have the fleet do today? Please give us any order.
363.H1000: 1000... Oh my, Asakaze-san. Good day to you. You are as lovely as ever. Second platoon? No, I haven't seen them.
363.H1100: Notifying you that it's 1100. Is this about Asakaze-san? Yeah, it's as you say, she is my most cherished friend.
363.H1200: Notifying you that it's 1200 and time for lunch. Commander-sama? Today for lunch I'll prepare some western sandwiches. I'll also make a fragrant black tea.
363.H1300: Notifying you that it's 1300. Was the sandwich to your liking? It's a native English food made for the sake of eating in a hurry.
363.H1400: Notifying you that it's 1400. Someday I would like to sortie with the fifth destroyer group in the midst of a naval battle. Someday...
363.H1500: Notifying you that it's 1500. Commander-sama, how does afternoon tea sound? I also made cookies.
363.H1600: Notifying you that it's 1600. I made black tea again. Did you eat the cookies I made?
363.H1700: Notifying you that it's 1700. Commander-sama, please look at this. The setting sun... is so red... I have been mesmerized by it. So beautiful...
363.H1800: Notifying you that it's 1800. Commander-sama, if it's fine with you, I will go prepare dinner.
363.H1900: Notifying you that it's 1900 and time for dinner. Today, dinner is pilchard dumplings, boiled barley rice and also miso soup with vegetables. I was taught recently. It's delicious, right? Please eat a lot.
363.H2000: 2000... Ah, I am so glad I learned to cook that lovely dish the other day. Eh? Night battle, is it? Umm, I am a fleet escort.. Umm, thats...
363.H2100: 2100... Ah, Kamikaze-oneesama! Yeah, I'm serving properly as the secretary ship. Yes, leave it to me.
363.H2200: Notifying you that it's 2200. Commander-sama, this fleet has many lovely ships collected in it. I am happy.
363.H2300: 2300. Commander-sama, I am happy. If perhaps this body can't move anymore someday, I would still want to protect everyone. Always and forever...

474.Intro:
I'm Matsukaze, the 4th ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. So you're my commander, huh?
Sweet. I'll leave everything to you then! All right, let's go!
474.Library:
I'm Matsukaze, the 4th ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. What do you mean, we're outdated? Are you kidding me?!
Don't you dare to forget how we provided support at the front, from capture operations at the Southern Solomon Islands to escorting fleets.
Seriously, don't just forget about us Kamikaze-class, not to mention me.
474.Poke(3):
I guess that's a thing now. Huh. I'm okay with this.
Oh, my sister? Don't worry, I bet she likes you too. No problemo.
474.Idle:
You look busy. Oh well. Time to annoy sister dearest.
Hey~! ...Huh? Aaaand she's already scolding me. What gives?
And seriously, why do hers have to be so big? Anyway, don't piss her off!
474.Wedding: This isn't like you, calling me out someplace like that?  It couldn't be, you plan to make a once-in-a-lifetime confession?  Aha!  I wonder if that's it?  It is?  Haa...thank you.  Wait just a moment...you kept me waiting too long!
474.Married: You look a bit pale don't you?  Let me take a closer look and see.  Yup, you have a bit of a fever don't you?  Well I guess it can't be helped.  Let me carry you for awhile.  Alright then, full power!  Heavy...ha...lift!  Ugh!
474.Ranking: Ah yes, the report...... it's pretty important. Wanna have a look at it?
474.Join: DesRon 5, Matsukaze, heading out. Follow me, guys.
474.Equip(2): Hmm, this doesn't fit. ......No wait, it might actually. Huh, nice sense you have there!
474.Docking(1): 'Cuse me, gotta hang back for a bit.
474.Docking(2): Whoops, I failed. Sorry for giving you trouble.
474.Return: All right, fleet's returning to port. I just love my timing.
474.Sortie: Matsukaze, heading out. Ahaha, nailed it. Let's move!
474.Battle: Uh-oh, we've got a visitor. Get ready to engage, fleet! All right, let's go!
474.Yasen(1): I kinda like pursuit battles. Let's go then!
474.Yasen(2): There you are! Sorry, but gotcha!
474.MVP: Wait, me? Nah, it's fine, I don't need that. But thanks, it's the thought that counts.
474.Damaged(3): Now you've done it. I can be surprisingly stubborn, you know. I ain't gonna sink here!
474.Sunk: ....Huh?  This can't be.  I'm sinking again?  I couldn't protect them this time either, could I....?  Hey...big sis...
474.2@Rainy: That's right, this isn't like me at all. This season makes me have all sorts of thoughts. And despite all this thinking, I'm not finding any answers. *giggle* Well, that's fine too, isn't it? It's like that sometimes.
474.2@WhiteDay: Hey Sis, I tried baking some of those cookies. Sooo, are they edible? ...Yes~, alright. You there! Here, for you. It's just a small thank you for the usual stuff. No special meaning behind it, you got that?
474.2@EarlySummer: Alright, it's here, huh.  Ah, I was a bit nervous too.  Alright, let's go, heading out!
474.2@Summer2017: You're nervous, Sis? I'm here so you don't need to worry. I won't go anywhere. Everything will be alright.
474.2@Fall2017: Autumn, huh... I don't dislike it, but Sis goes... a bit overboard. Well, there's something refreshing about this. What do you think?
474.2@Saury2017: It's here? I was really waiting for the Naval Base Saury Festival! That's right, these coastal waters are special. Leave the piloting to me.
474.2@LateFall2017: What're you up to, Sis? A kotatsu? Heh, you'll get fat if you spend too much time under there. Ah, it's surprisingly nice. Whoa, can't underestimate this.
474.2@Xmas2017: Fu, Christmas, huh. This frothy layer at the top is the best. It's a bit different, but I'll drink as much as I can. How about you? Want to have a drinking contest with me? There's no way I'll lose, though.
474.2@NewYears2018: You don't have to force me, sis! I know, you have to take New Year's seriously. I hope the New Year brings you cause to rejoice, Commander. How was that? Ow! What was that for?
474.2@Setsubun2018: Setsubun, huh. It's all good, I don't dislike it. Let's go, sis! Are you ready? Aim, fire! Bracketed! Load the next shot! Now, fire!
474.2@Valentines2018: What's with all these chocolates? What use is it giving it to me? Right? Hmm, what's wrong? Hey?
474.2@Anniversary2018: It's kinda hard to believe, you know. So the fleet is entering its 6th year. A 5th Anniversary - it's really impressive.

371.Intro:
I'm Matsukaze, the 4th ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. And of course you're my commander.
Naturally, that means you've got my back! All right, let's go!
371.Join: 5th Torpedo Squad, Matsukaze, heading out. Follow me, guys.
371.Sortie: We're a special escort fleet, full capable of defending too!  I'm well used to painful battles!
371.MVP: Ah, me?  Nah, it's fine, I don't need that. But thanks, it's the thought that counts and I'll accept that, okay?
371.H0000: Today it's my turn to help you out. Sounds good?
371.H0300: 0300. Eh?  Talk a bit more?  Well aren't you hard to please, are you...
371.H0400: 0400.  you're a bit sleepy too, aren't you?  How about you lie down for a bit?  I'll join you if you want. Ahaha, nope, just kidding!
371.H0500: 0500.  It's almost morning.  Should we go wake everyone up?  Aah, the morning glow.  It's beautiful, isn't it?  Not bad at all.
371.H0600: 0600.  Everyone, it's morning.  Ah, good morning, sis. Still early and already full of pep, aren't we?
371.H0700: 0700. What would you like for breakfast? Sis and me could make something for you if you want.
371.H0800: 0800.  I see....her meals aren't quite enough for you... Well, how about I try making some this time?  How does that sound?
371.H0900: 0900...!  Huh?  Why I'm breathing so heavily?  Well, it's my dear big sister's morning practice after all.  *sigh*.....If there's one thing I have to put up with, it's that.
371.H1000: 1000. You know, my sister... she'd be such a nice woman if she just shut up for once. So, what do you think?
371.H1100: 1100.  Alright then, what'd you like for lunch?  I heard Mamiya has something new on her menu. Wanna try it?
371.H1200: 1200.  Ah, this is it!  Mamiya's new special Hayashi Rice.  Let's get this!  Could I get a bite of yours too?  Oh, this is also great!
371.H1300: 1300.  Done eating.  Now we gotta exercise.
371.H1400: 1400..oh, Mina, Mika!  Are you doing well?  Where's Sacchin?  I see, that's cool!  Glad to hear that!
371.H1500: 1500.  *yawn*....I always get a little sleepy around this time.  Should I lie down for a bit? Eh, a little bit wouldn't hurt.
371.H1600: 1600.  Oh, U-chan!  Have you seen Yūzuki?  She sure is shy.  Oh well, I'll just wait patiently for her!  Kay?
371.H1700: 1700.  Hey you?  The evening sun sure is red.  It looks just like blood.  Aha!  I'm joking, I'm joking!
371.H1800: 1800.  What should we get for dinner?  Would you like me to make something myself? Or is it still too early?  What do you think?  Ah, sorry.  I didn't mean it like that...it's nothing.  Huh...... hey you, I bet you're pretty good at cooking, no?
371.H1900: 1900.  Aha!  This looks really delicious!  Good job!  Can I dig in?  Haha, here I go!  *Chew* Oh wow, it really is delicious!  You're awesome!
371.H2000: 2000.  Ugh...I'm so full.  Thanks for the meal.  Home cooking sure is awesome!
371.H2100: 2100. Ah, I see. It's that time. Well, I used to be part of Desron 3, sooo... yeah, I suppose this is nice.
371.H2200: 2200.  But it's night now.  Let's take it easy.  What's with that look on your face?  This time isn't bad at all, don't you agree?
371.H2300: 2300.  Hey you, good job today.  Keep it up tomorrow too.  I had fun today.  G'night and sweet dreams.

475.Intro: The Kamikaze-class destroyer Hatakaze has arrived, Commander. I'll be accompanying you. Please take care of me.
475.Library:
I'm the 5th ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Hatakaze.
I formed the 5th Destroyer Division together with my elder sister Harukaze and others.
I exerted myself escorting capital ships and convoys. We lost a lot of escort ships in the second half of the war.
475.Poke(2): Did you need me for something, Commander? Is it for a fleet escort?
475.Poke(3): Stop that, Haru-neesan, save it for later... Eh, ummm, Commander? Eh, anti-air weapons? Ah, yes. I'd like to have a few more...
475.Idle: Is there anything I can help you with, Irako-san? Ah, yes. With the tea? Leave it to me. Yup, alright. Everyone, Commander, the tea is here. Yes, it's over here.
475.Married: Haru-neesan? Ah, Commander. I beg your pardon. Ummm, I express my humblest thanks for, umm, you always opening your heart to me. I'll do my best.
475.Wedding: The documents have been sorted, Commander. Was there anything else... Ah, this is? For me? Ah... Ummm, I express my humblest thanks. I'll, umm, treasure this, Commander. Always and forever.
475.Ranking: Intelligence, Commander? Please wait. I'll get it.
475.Equip(2): I think... I think I can protect the fleet with this. A-alright!
475.Supply: I express my humblest thanks. The fleet and I are heading out!
475.Docking(1): I beg your pardon. I'm going to take a bath.
475.Docking(2): I-I'm sorry, Commander. I beg your pardon. I'll try to be back as soon as possible.
475.Construction: A new person has arrived. That's good, right, Commander?
475.Return: The fleet has returned safely. Thank goodness. Safety is a priority.
475.Sortie: Under my leadership as the fleet flagship, fleet, set sail.
475.Battle: Enemies, huh? There's no choice but to fight now. Ready for battle.
475.Yasen(1): Be careful at night. I'll take the lead. All ships, follow me. Let's charge!
475.MVP: Eh, me? I...see. I'm glad I was able to be of use to the fleet. I'll continue to put forwards my best efforts. Please watch me too, Haru-neesan.
475.Damaged(2): Aaaah... A bomb? A torpedo? No way.
475.Damaged(3): Hyaaah... That hurts. My legs are... No, I still need to defend... the fleet...
475.Sunk: It's cold... I'm sinking... again... I'm... sorry... Haru-neesan... No...
475.2@Fall2017: What's that, Isokaze-san? Huh... you're practicing? U-ummm... you've cooked it too much... Ah, pardon me. Please do your best.
475.2@Saury2017: Saury... you mean that kind of saury? Ah, yes! I understand! I may be of little use but I'll help out too. First... I see, we need lights?
475.2@LateFall2017: Winter is getting closer and closer. It's cold. Ah, I'm fine. I'm sorry, Commander. I'll be imposing myself on you. It's warm.
475.2@Xmas2017: Hm...Oh?...This is good! What is this cuisine called? I-It's called Haikara? I'll try to make it next time. Right!
475.2@YearsEnd2017: Why does Harukaze nee-san look so happy? Is cleaning really that fun? I'll try my best too. Commander, I'll by start cleaning up this room, okay?
475.2@NewYears2018: Commander, I hope you have a happy New Year. Please take good care of me this year too.
475.2@Setsubun2018: Setsubun... This afternoon's Oni is... Kami-neesan I see. Roger that. I'm starting to throw! Take this, a direct hit! Take this, hmm? What is it, Haru-neesan?
475.3@Valentines2018: Commander, Haru-neesan, please have some of this if you like. Help yourself. Th-thank you very much! Alright!
475.2@Valentines2018: What's that, Ryuuhou-san? "Chocolate"? I-I see. So that's the occasion. I'll work hard too. Alright!
475.2@WhiteDay2018: It's delicious. My humblest thanks, Commander. Did you make these yourself, Commander? You're quite good at making sweets. It's a bit surprising.
475.2@Spring2018: Cherry blossom viewing this afternoon? That sounds nice. What should I make to bring along? I wonder what Haru-neesan likes... Tell me what you like too, Commander.
475.2@Anniversary2018: The fleet's 5th Anniversary is here, Commander. My sincerest congratulations. I'll continue to do my best to be of service.
475.2@Rainy2018: It's been pouring recently. Eh, what's that, Shigure-san? A teruteru bouzu? How cute. I want to try making one too. Please teach me.
475.2@Summer2018: It's quite hot now, Commander. Please wait a moment. I'll make some tea and chill it for you. Here, it's delicious right? I had some good tea on hand.

387.Intro: The Kamikaze-class destroyer Hatakaze has arrived, Commander. I'll be accompanying you today as well. Yes, please take care of me.
387.Equip(1): Ah, I'm happy. I express my humblest thanks.
387.Equip(2): I can protect the fleet with this. Alright!
387.H0000: It's now 12 a.m., Commander. I shall be putting forth my best effort to serve by your side today.
387.H0100: It's 0100. The temperature gets a bit low at night, right, Commander?
387.H0200: It's 0200. I'll go... I'll go make some tea, alright? Ummm, the teapot is... Ah, here... Eh, it's not here... Huh?
387.H0300: It's 0300. Ah, that's it. I express my humblest thanks, Commander. I beg your pardon, I'll get the tea ready now. Please wait a moment.
387.H0400: It's 0400. Here is the tea. Be careful, it's hot. Oh, ah, it's almost morning. Almost morning.
387.H0500: It's 0500. It's morning, Commander. I'll begin preparations to wake everyone... Ah, Asa-neesan is... Ah, yes, she's an elder sister that's always lively.
387.H0600: It's 0600. Wake up, everyone. All hands... assemble! It's morning. Please wake up. ...Good morning, Commander.
387.H0700: It's 0700. Here's breakfast, Commander. It's miso soup and kinpira this morning. Do you like burdock? Whew, thank goodness.
387.H0800: It's 0800. How about seconds, Commander... Ah, yes, wait a moment. I'm happy that you're eating so much. Here, please eat.
387.H0900: It's 0900. Ah, are you going for morning exercises, Asa-neesan... Ah, yes, yes. I'll do my best as a member of DesDiv5.
387.H1000: It's 1000. Matsu-neesan and Asa-neesan sure do get along very well. I'm jealous. ...Eh, I've got it wrong? Eh, ah, yes...
387.H1100: It's 1100. Yes, I think it's wonderful that my elder sisters get along so well... I'd like to with Haru-neesan... It's nothing...
387.H1200: It's 1200. It's lunchtime. I made some sandwiches that I leared from Haru-neesan, Commander. I you don't mind... Whew, here is some hot tea. They go surprisingly well together.
387.H1300: It's 1300. How were Haru-neesan's sandwiches, Commander? They have a Japanese twist to them. There was even Japanese mustard in it, you know? Ah, thank goodness. Now I beg your pardon.
387.H1400: 14... Ah, Kami-neesan. Thanks for your hard work. Yes, I'm doing fine. I humbly express my thanks. ...I will continue to put forth my greatest efforts.
387.H1500: It's 1500. Shall I get you some tea, Commander? I have some youkan too. Here, please help yourself. Please take a break.
387.H1600: 160... Ah, Shigure-san. Thanks for your hard work. Yes, I express my humblest thanks. That's right, I get the feeling that I'll be able to meet Mikura-san and the others soon. I can't wait. Yes, I'll do my best.
387.H1700: It's 1700. Commander, the sunset is... Eh, what was that? What did you just... That is, no. I beg your pardon. On no...
387.H1800: It's 1800. Commander, I'll handle dinner too... Eh, Haru-neesan already... N-no way... Ah, yes. It would be my pleasure to accompany you... I express my humblest thanks.
387.H1900: *nom*... It's 1900. These fish balls are really delicious, Haru-neesama. As expected of Haru-nee... Eh, is that so? Ah, so that's how... I want to try making them too.
387.H2000: It's 2000. Ah, the DesRon3's... I beg your pardon, I'm currently doing a fleet escort... Yes. No, that's not the reason... Ah, yes. I understand.
387.H2100: It's 2100. The night sea is... But, rather than the day when I will meet with planes... the night is... N-no... I didn't mean that... I don't really want to night battle... You've got it wrong...
387.H2200: It's 2200. Whew, I finally feel liberated. Even though I feel calmer at night than I do during the morning or day... night battles are... Ah, yes, I'm fine. As long as you understand.
387.H2300: It's 2300. I humbly thank you for all your hard work today, Commander. Please go and rest a while. Good night, Commander, Haru-neesan.

1.Intro: I'm Mutsuki. Let's show some enthusiasm!
1.Library: The first Imperial Navy destroyer to be loaded with the large and powerful 61cm Torpedo Mounts, Mutsuki here! While I'm an older model, I gave it my all on the frontlines!
1.Poke(1): Oyo? Admiral? You called for me?
1.Poke(2): What is it~? What is it~?
1.Poke(3): Are you that interested in me~? Ehehehe♪
1.Wedding: To tell the truth, I wanted you to praise me, so I did my very, very best.
1.Ranking: Looks like... some kind of letter has arrived?
1.Equip(2): I don't plan on losing! Teehee♪
1.Docking(1): I want to take a little break.
1.Docking(2): Weh... I couldn't do anything... I was so miserable...
