1.Sortie: Everyone! Are you ready for the sortie, nyaa~n?
1.Yasen(1): I have this battle under control!
1.Yasen(2): I have both a main gun and torpedoes!
1.MVP: Praise me more and more~! I'm the type that grows when praised, nyashi~! Ehehehe♪
1.Damaged(2): Weh... my armor is as good as paper...!
1.Damaged(3): Nya!? Th-This much won't stop me...!
1.Sunk: I hope... I helped... a little... gh... nya...

1.2@Setsubun: Oyo? Is it Setsubun? It is Setsubun! I'm going to throw! Eii!
1.2@Valentines: Here, Admiral. You can have this chocolate from me! Ehehe, please do♪
1.2@WhiteDay: Umm, I made some cookies for Kisaragi and the admiral.... Would you like to try some nya~?
1.2@Anniversary3: Oyo!? It's the third anniversary! Ehehe, Admiral, Kisaragi-chan, it's the third anniversary! The third anniversary!
1.2@Rainy: Kisaragi-chan, it's been raining a lot recently. Ah, let's make some teru teru bozus! One for Kisaragi-chan and one for me!
1.2@EarlySummer: Oyoyo? It's almost summer time, nya? Kisaragi-chan, for this year's summer vacation, what should we do? I will~, I will~!
1.2@Summer: Oyo? Admiral, you're going for a dip in the water, nya? I'm coming, too! Swimsuit, swimsuit!
1.2@Fall: Yaaay! I got through summer, nyashii~! Now it'll be relaxing for a little while, nya~! Alright, I'll do my best for fall, nya~! Admiral, expect a lot from me.
1.2@Saury: Kisaragi-chan, we're saury fishing! Saury fishing! The Mutsuki-class will also do their best to participate, nyashii. Come on, let's move out, nya~! Ohhh!!
1.2@Wine: Oyo? This is... the special wine available only at this time of year, nyaa. Maybe I'll have just a little, too! Ah...? Kisaragi-chan, that much!? ...Haa, Pola-san, nyaa...
1.2@Xmas: Kisaragi-chan, it's Christmas! This cake is so sweet and delicious, nya! Here, here~!
1.2@YearsEnd: So fast, nya~ It's already December, nyashi~ I have to do the cleanup with Kisaragi-chan... *sigh*
1.2@Summer2017: Everyone's having so much fun in swimsuits. Mutsuki wants to wear one too, but it's okay. I'll do my best at watermelon splitting. Right, Kisaragi-chan?
1.2@Anniversary2018: Oh ho ho? Could it be the 5th Anniversary-nya? Admiral, Kisaragi; congratulations-nyashi! I want us to enjoy the sunshine together forever and ever. Ehehe~

254.Idle: Nya... Admiral... I'm a little bored, desu...
254.Married: Admiral? I can fight really well too when I get serious...! Oyo? What's with that face, nya!?
254.Supply: I'm so moved by the resupply~!

2.Intro:
My name is Kisaragi.
Please keep me by your side.
2.Library:
Mutsuki-class destroyer— the second ship known as Kisaragi.

At Wake Island, I fought bravely while I was bombed by annoying F4F Fighter planes.

Nooo~ I mean it... the sea breeze is going to damage my hair...
2.Poke(2): Eh? Hmmm... I'm ready any time.
2.Poke(3): Geez... You must like it, too.

2.Equip(2): Ufu♪ Both stronger and more beautiful, don't you think?

2.Damaged(3): What are you... going to do to me!?
2.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the new year! Please take good care of us again this year, okay~?
2.2@Setsubun: We throw this bean, right? Eii~♥ Oh, my! Did I hit somewhere strange?
2.2@Valentines: Heeere~♥ They're chocolates filled with my feelings, so make sure you eat every last one, okay?
2.2@WhiteDay: Huh, Mutsuki, you're giving these cookies to me? Thank you. I'll eat them with appreciation. Fufufufu.

2.2@Rainy: My, Mutsuki-chan's teru teru bozu is cute. There's one for me, too? Thanks!

2.2@Fall: Fall sure is nice. Mutsuki-chan looks a little happy, too. Commander, what does fall mean to you? Is fall for appetites? Or perhaps... ufufufu

2.2@Xmas: Ufufu♪ Mutsuki-chan, Christmas cake is delicious, isn't it? Try some of this turkey, too.
2.2@YearsEnd: I see, so it's already December, huh? It's cleaning season. Oh, no... my hair will get ruined.
2.2@EarlySummer: Oh, I know, a vacation to the sea on a beautiful island would be lovely this summer.  Eh, no good?  Mutsuki-chan, you prefer a resort in Japan?  Is that so?  Well, let's do that then.
2.2@Summer2017: Highland summer resorts are good too. It's nice everyone splitting watermelons on the beach. It really makes you feel like it's summer. Right, Commander?
2.2@Anniversary2018: Ufufufu~ It's finally the fleet's 5th Anniversary. Commander, Mutsuki, congratulations. I'm thankful for everything. I hope to be able to continue spending time with you. Alright?

164.Intro: Yayoi, reporting for duty... Pleased to meet you. Please don't be too concerned about me...
164.Library: Third of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, 'Yayoi'. I was born at Uraga, Yokosuka. Mutsuki, Mochizuki and I did our best as a task force. I dislike dive bombers. Please take good care of me.

164.Poke(3): Like I said, I'm not angry... Please don't be so concerned about me...
164.Idle: Yes, I'm fine... Please take your time. Yayoi will be here... Yes, I'll be...
164.Married: If the commander is upbeat, that's good. Yayoi's good too, then.
164.Wedding: Commande~r. Com...mander... It's hard. Hawawa!? W-were you listening? I see... thank goodness. No, that's good. Commander... Erm... thanks for everything. Let's keep going together... okay?
164.Ranking: Uhm... A report for the commander...
164.Supply: Is it alright for me to get this?

164.Sunk: I'm... sinking... Mutsuki, I'm... joining you... as well...

164.2@LateWinter: Uzuki, I'm glad you're okay. ...Eh, is that so? I shouldn't worry about you...? Mh... Ah, I'm not... angry... ...Maybe a... little...
164.2@Valentines: Commander... here, t-these are for you. They're sweet. Don't worry about getting... me... anything...
164.2@Anniversary3: Commander... congrats... on three years. Yayoi... is happy... too. Yes.
164.2@Rainy: Rainy season.... Ah, this teru teru bozu....is cute.... Ah, please....don't mind me....
164.2@Fall: I don't... really like... fall. I'm not... angry. I'm not really... angry, but...
164.2@Saury: Saury is... I like it... saury festival... I... it's good... in my opinion...
164.2@Wine: This is... the taste of the season... the special wine. Is that so? Grown-ups sure... like having so many... festivals.
164.2@Xmas: Christmas... Ah... I'm... not mad or anything... Cake... I'll have some.
164.2@YearsEnd: Mochi... Mochizuki...! We're doing cleaning, so... ah, there, wipe that down with water... Ah, it's not... I'm not angry... at all...
164.2@WhiteDay: Commander, this is...? Eh? Is it alright? T-Thank you. I'm... happy.
164.2@EarlySummer: It's gotten hotter. Uzuki, what's with that look... Your summer best?  Is that so, hmmm.
164.2@Kessen: Uzuki. Ummm, be careful during this season. Ummm, I'm not angry. Yeah, be careful, alright?
164.2@Anniversary2018: Ummm, it's the fleet's 5th Anniversary... So, congratulations, Commander. Of course I'm not angry. ...I've always thought that... our hearts are always one.

165.Intro: Yay~! I arrived-pyon! My name is Uzuki, you can call me U-chan!
165.Library: Fourth of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, 'Uzuki'-pyon. From convoy escorting to capture operations, I worked re~ally hard! Near the end I was loaded up with lots of machine-guns to down them all! U-chan won't be sunk by bombers!
165.Poke(2): Commander... you're wonderful today... nah just kidding pyo-n!
165.Poke(3): ohohoh? Tickling is U-chan's specialty pyon! Commander~, I won't let you run away pyo~n!

165.Construction: A new ship daughter is born~... who is it pyon?

165.Yasen(1): U-chan is ama~zing at night pyon!
165.MVP: nnnYay! Great success pyon! This is the real power of the Mutsuki-class! *smug*!
165.Damaged(3): I got beat-pyon... huu..., I want to take a bath-pyon...
165.Sunk: This is farewell... for U-chan pyon? Commander... don't cry, okay?
165.2@NewYears: Commander, Happy New Year, pyon! I want my New Year's Gift, pyon!
165.2@LateWinter: Pukupuku~! I'm not too good in winter, but I managed to clear it and then some, pyon! Ehehe. Yayoi, you worry too much, pyon!

165.2@Anniversary3: Commander~!!! It's third year anniversary pyon! U-chan is happy pyon! Splash!
165.2@Rainy: I don't like rainy days, pyon. Puppukupu....
165.2@Fall: Yayoi is looking down, pyon... At times like this, U-chan will do something funny! Here we go... Pupukupuu! ...Huh? Why are you angry, pyon?
165.2@Saury: Saury~! Leave the saury to me, pyon! It's Ucchan's secret double searchlight challenge, pyon! What's it mean? It doesn't really mean anything, pyon. It's fashion, pyon♪
165.2@Wine: Ohhh~? Is this the wine I've heard so much about, pyon? U-chan wants to try a little bit too, pyon♪ *gulp* *gulp* ...Phaaah! Puppukupu~! It's too soon for U-chan, pyon.

165.2@WhiteDay: Commander! What is this? Eh? Sweets for Uzuki? I'm happy pyon!
165.2@EarlySummer: Summer sure has gotten summerlike-pyon.  Eh, it sure would be nice if it got cooler-pyon. Right, Commander?
165.2@Kessen: Yayoi? Why are you frowning-pyon? Are you angry about something-pyon!? It's fine-pyon! I'm unsinkable-pyon. I won't sink-pyon!
165.2@Anniversary2018: I'm impressed! The fleet has finally reached it's 5th Anniversary-pyon! I'm super duper thankful-pyon! Let's celebrate together-pyon, Commander!

28.Intro: I'm Satsuki. Good to meet ya!
28.Library: I kept getting injured again and again on missions, but I fought bravely to the end as the fifth of the Mutsuki-class destroyers. After the war began, I did my best to escort the fleet and guard areas of the ocean. I really did!
28.Wedding: Commander! I'm sorry for always making you fret… but… it was a little on purpose… just kidding!
28.Equip(1): Looks like you made me stronger. Thanks, Commander!
28.Equip(2): Yeah, I'm different from the everyday me!
28.Supply: Looks like you made me stronger. Thanks, Commander!
28.Docking(2): Woah~ I thought I was really gonna die~
28.Construction: Looks like a new friend has arrived.
28.Battle: You gonna fight with me? Ain't that cute of ya!
28.MVP: Ehehee!! Are you reconsidering me now?
28.Sunk: H-hey? What's this... the ocean... is dark... I can't see anything... why?

28.2@Valentines: Commander, some chocolate for ya! Handmade by me! ...Huh? I didn't get help from Irako... None, okay? I-I really didn't!
28.2@Anniversary: Apparently, today's a special day. But to me, every day's a special day if I'm with you, Commander....
28.2@Rainy: The season of May.... Eheh, it's my season, isn't it? Ufufufu!
28.2@EarlySummer: Its getting hot, Commander! I'll bring you something to cool you down!
28.2@Summer: Commander, splitting watermelon with everyone is fun! Eh... you gonna challenge me? Hehe, ain't that cute of ya♪

28.2@WhiteDay: Eh? You're giving this to me? As usual, it's cute! Thank you, Commander!
28.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations, Commander. It's finally the 5th Anniversary. I'm grateful for you. That was embarrassing to say.

418.Equip(1): Thanks for the enhancement! With this I can protect the admi—I mean, I can protect everyone!

481.Intro: Sixth ship of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, Minazuki here. Sorry I'm late. Commander, take care! ...Ehehe.
481.Library: I'm the sixth ship of the Mutsuki class, Minazuki. I was born in Uraga near Yokosuka. Along with my older and younger Mutsuki-class sisters, I participated in battles at the start of the war. I also served as a convoy escort a bunch of times. Oh? Submarines...? They're really annoying enemies. *sigh* Don't I know it.
481.Poke(1): Oh? Did you call me? It's fine.
481.Poke(2): Sacchin...? ...Ah, my bad. Nah, it's nothing. Ehehehe...
481.Poke(3): Commander, what's wrong? Are you getting hungry? No helping it... want me to go make you something? It's fine.
481.Idle: Heeey. Hey, heyheyhey, heee~ey! Huh? Commander, can't you hear me...? He looks so busy. No helping it... I'll go over to Sacchin's, then. Okay~ off I go.
481.Married: What's wrong? You're looking pretty worn out. Commander, you don't look so good. Ehe... Alright! I'll cheer you right up. Ehehe♪ How's this! Eh? It didn't work? Alright! It's time to get serious...!
481.Wedding: Commander, what is it? You called? Oh, okay. ...What's going on? Ehehe... what's that thing you're hiding? Nice, nice, what is it, what is it? Ah, this? Can I open it? Then... I'll open it. Whoa...! Is this seriously...? Fufu... whooaah♪
481.Ranking: Oh, okay. The intelligence, huh? I'll bring it right away! Wait right here. ... ...Here.
481.Join: Mutsuki-class destroyer, Minazuki, going ouuut! Ehehe♪
481.Equip(1): This is great. I'm happy... Ehehehe♪
481.Equip(2): Ohhhh... I get it now. So it's like this.
481.Docking(1): Sorry. I'll take a quick bath. Commander... no peeking, okay? Er... he left.
481.Docking(2): Ahhh... sorry. This is a little bad, huh? I'll go get cleaned up. Please wait. Whew...
481.Construction: Commander, it's a new ship! I'm so happy!
481.Return: Commander, the fleet's back! Everyone is safe. That's the most important thing.
481.Sortie: Fleet flagship, destroyer Minazuki, setting sail! Everyone, follow me!
481.Battle: The enemy... I've spotted them. No helping it... let's go! Alright, everyone?
481.Attack: This isn't a convoy escort... it's a naval battle! I'll be fine... just stay calm...! Alright! Let's goooo~!
481.Yasen(1): Time for pursuit, huh? I understand. Let's do it. Fleet, form up! I will lead the assault!
481.Yasen(2): Even against submarines or surface ships... this time... I won't lose!
481.MVP: Ehehehe! I was the biggest help? Yeah! Go me! Mutsuki-class power! Go ahead and praise me more! Fufu♪
481.Damaged(2): That hurts...! Ugh... I'm getting ticked off!
481.Damaged(3): Owowow... What's up with that? This is the worst! I-I can still move! I won't sink!
481.Sunk: Eh...? I'm sinking...? No way... Sacchin... Fumi-chan... sorry...
481.2@NewYears: Commander, Happy New Year~! Ehehehe... I hope you'll let me rely on you again this year. So, you can let me have my New Year's money any time now~ Hmm~? Hmm~?
481.2@Setsubun: Ufu♪ It's Setsubun! Nice, nice! Eh? "Setsuboon"? Your pronunciation is off... Eh? Why do you look so full of confidence? Eh...?
481.2@Valentines: Somehow the whole base smells sweet. This is...? Ah, that's right, chocolate making. That's right~! Oh no, I wonder if there's any ingredients left in the PX now? I better hurry...!
481.2@Fall: Fall has arrived. Commander, what does fall mean to you? ...For Sacchin, fall is for food. For Fumi-chan, fall is for reading. For Naganaga, fall is for sports, I think. What about you, Commander? Maybe fall is... the season of love?
481.2@Saury: *sigh* Did you hear the rumor, about the Naval Base Saury Festival? What's up with this fleet... and after they just went out saury fishing. This is too much for me... uhehe...
481.2@Wine: Eh? A special wine? Is that so? World-famous? Whoa, this is... ah, it reeks of alcohol! Wha, Pola-san!?
481.2@Xmas: Sacchin, Sacchin!! This is delicious♪ Ah... this, too♪ Uuu~ This Christmas must be a trap♪ I'm gonna grow a bulge, a bulge~♪
481.2@YearsEnd: Eh, End of the Year Cleaning? Ah, that's right. It's already that season. It can't be helped, shall we get stared? Sacchin, Fumi-chan, Naganaga, let's do this! Grab broom and go!
481.2@Spring: I like spring. I mean, it's the season I was commissioned in, and the cherry blossoms are beautiful too. Ehehe~ Wanna go flower viewing with the others? It'll be nice~
481.2@Rainy: This season.... I don't like it. Yeah, somehow I just can't keep my spirits up. Oh, of course, I'll do my best to sortie with a mission. You don't have to worry about me. Heh heh....
481.2@WhiteDay: Commander, this is the returning gift for Minazuki's chocolate? Thank you, I'm glad.
481.2@EarlySummer: Yeah, that's right. Back then, this season used to be known as 'Minazuki'. Isn't this name interesting?
481.2@Summer2017: Ah, jeez, everyone is playing around in swimsuits. Honestly, what's up with this fleet? I mean...that's so nice. Tch.
481.2@Anniversary2018: Wha, it's finally the 5th Anniversary? Amazing. I'll congratulate you too. Congratulations, Commander... Mmm, thank you. I'm kinda... yeah, happy.
481.3@LateFall2018: *Achoo*! It's really gotten colder. Commander, don't catch a cold. Eh, me? I'm todally fide... *Achoo*! Oh? Uhoh.

366.Intro: Sixth ship of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, Minazuki here. Commander, let's have another lively day. Take care! ...Ehehe♪
366.Equip(2): Ohhhh... I get it now. So it's like this. Got it, got it.
366.H0000: Commander, it just turned midnight. Tonight we're going to stay up late together, huh? Well, sounds good to me. *whew* Fuhehe♪
366.H0100: It's 0100. It's the middle of the night, huh? Want me to pour some tea? You don't? You do? Which one?
366.H0200: 0200. It's the hour of Ushimitsu. Commander, do you believe in ghosts? Ah, I see. Hmmmm... that's so boring... it's not even...
366.H0300: Ah! I think the commander fell asleep. Good, good♪ 030... What the...! He woke up. How boring. Ah, geez! He went back to sleep!
366.H0400: Commander, it's now 0400. It'll be morning soon... *yawn* I'm as tired as you'd expect. I'll brew the tea this time. Or is coffee better? Okaaay♪
366.H0500: 0500. Here, it's your coffee. Commander, is black ok? How mature♪ This aroma is nice. I like it~ Ehehe♪
366.H0600: It's 0600. It's morning. I'll go wake everyone up. Everyooone!! It's morniiing!! Wake up, waaake up!! All hands, ariiise!!
366.H0700: 0700. It's almost breakfast time. I'll go make a simple one, okay? Simple is fine, right? It is? Well then, wait just a bit.
366.H0800: 0800. Here. It's only a simple one, but breakfast is ready. I'll leave it here, okay? Oh, yeah, you wanted some ochazuke. There's a kettle of tea here... okay, just pour it all in. So...?
366.H0900: It's 0900. Okay, now that we're done with breakfast, let's get started on our morning duties. Ufufu♪ Want to clear some missions? Or manage the expeditions? What should we do?
366.H1000: 1000. Oh, Fumi-chan. How are you? Ah, is that so? Good, good! Oh, hey, want to go on an expedition with us girls in the 22nd? A reeaally long one. Ahaha!
366.H1100: It's only 1100, but... somehow I'm feeling hungry? Commander, what do I do? I guess breakfast might have been a bit too light.
366.H1200: 1200! Okay, it's lunchtime! What should we do? I can make another simple meal if you want. Oh, right! Irako-chan has the cafeteria open now. Let's go take a look! Fufufu...
366.H1300: I'm so fullll... Ah, 1300. Commander, I think I ate a little too much. My bulge is... Yeah, I'm still fine. Fuhehehe.
366.H1400: 140... Oh, Sacchin! Yoohoo, how are you? Ohhh? So hey, wanna swap and be the secretary ship? You don't? Ah, Commander... why are you glaring? Ehehehe...
366.H1500: Hey Sacchin, next time, want to go on an expedition together with Fumi-chan and Naganaga? A reaallly long one. We'll bring an extravagant bento! Won't that be fun? Eh... still a no? Tch... Ah, it's 1500!
366.H1600: 1600. *sigh* I'm kind of tired. Today was... Eh? It's not over yet? Is that so... ehehehe...
366.H1700: It's 1700. Commander! Look, look! The sunset is really pretty, huh? Ahaha... Isn't it great? The sunset overlooking the sea. I love it... ehehe.
366.H1800: It's now 1800. That it's for today. The fleet is coming back to port. Now, then! Should I focus all my efforts into making it? Making what? ...Making dinner. Dinner! ...Please wait.
366.H1900: Chop! Chop! Choo~op...! Ehehe... This one, too! Ehehe... Commander, please wait, alright? It'll only take a little while! Ah, the time is now... um... mhm! It's 1900!
366.H2000: 2000. And now... ta-dah! Tonight is... a crab croquette special! Eat as much as you want!
366.H2100: It's 2100. Commander, how were my crab croquettes? What did you think? Were they tasty? Ahaha♪ is that so? That's great. Whee~!
366.H2200: 220... Eh, Sendai-san. Did you need something? ...A night battle? Nahh... if you ask me what I'm good at, I'd say convoy escorting... Eh? I'll manage somehow? No way... I don't know... should I...? Hey, Commander? ...Huh? Commander!?
366.H2300: 2300. *phew* I'm saved... Commander, you're horrible. You should've stopped her properly. *sigh*

201.H1600: It's 1600! Aoba-san, a little while ago, Furutaka-san was looking for you. Is everything okay? Huh... she went off... um...
201.H1700: It's 1700! Commander, the sunset is pretty, isn't it? It'll be time for dinner soon, and a meal hasn't been prepared yet. Oh, you'll treat me to dinner tonight?
201.H1800: It's 1800. I'm feeling nervous about eating out with the commander... Let's see... a knife and fork... these are used out there, aren't they?
201.H1900: It's 1900! Commander, this consommé soup is hot and delicious! This salad, too... it's very extravagant and Western, isn't it?
201.H2000: It's 2000! I'm full, Commander! Ah, now then, I have to work hard to return the favor. Sir! I will continue to do my best!
201.H2100: It's 2100! Oh, it's Yura-san! Yura-san is wonderful, isn't she? Shirayuki-chan and the rest of us are all grateful to her. Aye!
201.H2200: 2200... Eh, my dream? I want to become stronger; to be able to protect everyone... If peace comes... I want us to always be basking in the sun.
201.H2300: It's 2300. Commander, what are your dreams for the future? Mhm, mhm... is that so? That's great♪ They're the same as mine. Aye!

205.H0000: It's now midnight. Tonight, I, Murakumo will serve as the secretary ship. What's with that face!? You're still the same petulant child as ever.
205.H0200: 0200. It's so quiet... It'd be nice if it were always this way.
205.H0300: It's now 0300. Are you still... ah... what? Are you asleep?
205.H0400: It's 0400. You woke up? Well, it's fine. I'll be on watch, so please have some rest.
205.H0500: 0500. It's almost morning. Hey, get up! It's morning. The morning sun sure is bright, isn't it?
205.H0600: 0600! Fleet: all hands, arise! Now then, let's begin!
205.H0700: It's 0700! To start with, would you get my breakfast ready? Huh...? What did you just say? Hurry it up!
205.H0800: 0800. Now then, breakfast tasted rather... well, not so bad. You should dilute the miso soup a little more. Yes, starting next time, you can try that.
205.H0900: It's 0900. Are you done cleaning up? Well then, let the fleet operations begin. First comes expeditions. Is the Third Fleet ready? Get to it!
205.H1000: 1000. Ah, Fubuki. You seem so lively. That's good. Things are going well here. It's under control.
205.H1100: It's 1100. Ah, the girls from the 11th? I must admit, they're my comrades. They're important to me.
205.H1200: It's 1200. So, what did you make me for lunch? Eh...? What's with that look! Are you telling me you didn't make anything? What were you thinking!?
205.H1300: 1300. ...Ahh... ugh. Fine! Then I'll make it. This is going to cost you. You'd better remember this! Think of it as a loan.
205.H1400: It's 1400. So? Are you satisfied? Even if it was simple, it wasn't bad, was it? Just as you'd expect from such a great destroyer, right?
205.H1500: 1500. Ah... Furutaka-san. Where were you? I couldn't find you anywhere... Anyway, I'm glad you seem to be doing well. I really mean it.
205.H1600: It's 1600. It's almost evening. Let's bring the fleet back to port. The sunset is... uh...! I wasn't saying anything! It had... nothing to do with you...
205.H1700: 1700. ...What is it? Are you mad? You're acting like such a child, you know? ...You're not mad? Well then, what is it!? Out with it!
205.H1800: 1800. Hmmm...? Is that so? Ufu♪ You're so cute, aren't you? Praising you a little is nice sometimes, isn't it? Just a little, okay?
205.H1900: It's 1900. Come to think of it, I'm getting kind of hungry... What are we having for dinner?
205.H2000: 2000. What's this scent...? Hm? Shirayuki? In that pot... did you make curry? There's so much of it. It can't be helped... I'll have some, too!
205.H2100: (2100?) Shirauki! Yur cookig ish elishious!! Where di you lear to... mm... Eh? The Accounting School!? Ah, I see. Is that so...
205.H2200: 2200. Night has fallen, huh. I don't like the night very much. I love the blue sky. I love seeing fluffy white clouds rising higher and higher against a pretty blue sky.
205.H2300: 2300. And just like that, another day comes to an end. You did well with giving it your all today. Tomorrow... ...Tomorrow, if you want me to keep you company... it'll be fine.

486.Intro: The youngest of the Special Type I Fubuki-class destroyers, Uranami here. Commander, I'm looking forward to working with you.
486.Library: The tenth ship of the Special Revised I Type Fubuki-class destroyers, Uranami here. I was born in Sasebo. I formed the 19th Destroyer Division together with Isonami nee-san, Ayanami, and Shikinami. I deployed to Midway at the beginning of the war, and even went to the southern seas. Please remember the 19th Destroyer Division's services.
486.Poke(2): Aye! Special Revised Type I, Uranami here.

486.2@YearsEnd: Commander, it's time for the Naval Base's New Year's cleaning right? The 19th Destroyer Division will do our best!

368.Intro: The youngest of the Special Type I Fubuki-class destroyers, Uranami here. Commander, I'm looking forward to working with you again today.
368.Equip(2): This is also nice equipment. It's fantastic.
368.H0000: It's midnight. Commander, I'm honored to have been appointed as your secretary for the day.
368.H0100: It's 0100. Notification brought to you by Uranami.
368.H0200: It's 0200. Notification brou- Oh, Commander... you're asleep...
368.H0300: It's 0300... What should I do...? Is it better to wake him up...? ...But...
368.H0400: It's 0400. Commander, you look tired. I'll make some hot Hojicha.
368.H0500: It's 0500. It'll be morning really soon. Commander, good morning!
368.H0600: It's 0600. I'll go do the morning call, if you'll permit me to do so.
368.H0700: It's 0700. I've finished making breakfast. I made a large serving of barley rice, so please enjoy it!
368.H0800: It's 0800. Once I finish tidying up, I believe we can commence fleet operations, if that is what you would like to do!
368.H0900: It's 0900. Notification brought to y- Ah... Isonami nee-san, good morning!
368.H1000: It's 1000. Isonami nee-san, today the 19th Destroyer Division will be performing fleet maneuvers! Ah, that's right— Uranami, roger that!
368.H1100: It's 1100. Yes! I have a very strong relationship with Isonami nee-san. We're very close. One time we got so close that we collided... ...Excuse me.
368.H1200: It's 1200. Commander, for lunch, I've made some rice balls! Would you like to have some with me? Then I'll prepare some Hojicha.
368.H1300: It's 1300. Commander, I shall assist you this afternoon as well!
368.H1400: It's 1400. Ah! Commander, Ayanami and the others are over there! Ayanami! Shikinami! Ah, they noticed!
368.H1500: It's 1500. Ayanami and Shikinami really get along with each other... so much so that I'm a little jealous. Ah, but don't get the... wrong idea...
368.H1600: It's 1600. Ah, that's true. My bridge and main battery are a little different from Ayanami's and the others'. See? Here, and right... here!
368.H1700: It's 1700. The sunset overlooking the sea is so beautiful. We do see it every day, but I still never get tired of it...
368.H1800: It's 1800. Commander, I'll get started with the preparations for dinner tonight.
368.H1900: It's 1900. Commander, dinner is now ready to serve! Tonight we're having boiled fish and barley rice! There's enough for seconds, too.
368.H2000: It's 2000. U-Um, there's an incoming message from DesRon 3's command center. ...Ah?
368.H2100: It's 2100. Commander, it seems DesRon 3's flagship is now sortieing... Um... the 19th Destroyer Division can also... that is...
368.H2200: It's 2200. The commander going off to talk to them helped me immensely! Alright! I'll have the remaining paperwork finished off by the end of the night!
368.H2300: It's 2300. Commander, thank you very much for your hard work today! Let's do our best tomorrow, too!

479.2@YearsEnd2017: Ah, well, I suppose it's a good thing Sagiri is so into it. Huh? Cleaning the Naval Base? I'm bad at that sort of thing. Come to think of it, I had something else I needed to do right now. See ya!

479.2@Setsubun2018: It's Setsubun now! The Oni for our DesDiv20 is... Ta-dah! Sa-gi-ri! Now, let's do this! Demon, begone!

479.2@Summer2018: Ooh, swimsuits. Isn't it fine since it's summer? Want to go out and buy swimsuits together, Sagiri? Alright.
479.2@Valentines2019: Hmm? Why is everyone giving me chocolates? Even you, Sagiri. I don't need them! I don't really like sweet... Ah, this is good!
479.2@WhiteDay2019: Oh, Admiral, in return for the chocolates? That's something you gotta do after all. I accept.
479.3@Anniversary2019: Admiral, congrats. It's the fleet's 6th Anniversary. It's great, such an exciting development. Right?

390.Join: 11th Destroyer Division heading off! Don't be late, Yuu-nee! Sortieing!

390.H0400: 0400. Our admira---....will grow to become...big...I believe...I'll be cheering him on...
390.H0500: Huh?! Oh crap, I was sleeping! The time is...0500! Seriously wake me up, Admiral! Ahh~ damn! This is bad!
390.H0600: 0600. All hands, assemble! It's morning, everyone! Come on, wake up~! The morning feels good~!
390.H0700: 0700. Where's breakfast, Admiral? Eh? Why isn't there any? Eh!? Why me?
390.H0800: 0800. Phew~ I'm full! I'm glad you were here, Sagiri! It was delicious too! Thanks!
390.H0900: 0900. Oh~~! Mogami-san and Mikuma-san! Mornin'! Well~ yea~ I'm doing well, yup!
390.H1000: 1000. Oh! Sagiri, thnx for earlier! Our elder sisters? Yeah~ they should be coming soon~ don't worry about it!
390.H1100: 1100. Haa~ jeez! Exercises are so dull! Let's just sortie, Admiral! Let's move onto the real stuff!
390.H1200: 1200. Oh! Sagiri brought lunch~ Whoa~ nice~. Eh? You brought some for us? Sweet! Hehehe~
390.H1300: 1300. *nom* This is delicious! My little sisters made these! It's good~! Gimme one more! Eating rice balls and drinking tea above the sea... is the best!
390.H1400: 1400. Alright! Now that we're full, let's start working! Let's do this!
390.H1500: 150...oh! It's big sis Fubuki. With Shirayuki-nee and Hatsuzuki-nee...eh? What? Sendai-san? I haven't seen her~ Isn't she sleeping?
390.H1600: 1600. Oh it's just you, Yuu-nee. Ahh, yeah~ it's almost dusk... It's your time, Yuu-nee.
390.H1700: 1700. *sigh*~ I'm hungry~. What's for dinner tonight, Admiral? I'm starving~
390.H1800: 1800. Nice, nice~ today's dinner looks great! Good work, Admiral! Eh? Sendai-san made dinner tonight?
390.H1900: 1900. Well~ alright. She's going to leave in the night time~ Thanks for the food! Yum! Delicious~! As expected from Sendai-san~!
390.H2000: 2000. The time is right! Let's go! DesRon3, Amagiri, off to sortie! Sendai-san, I'm coming too~!
390.H2100: 2100. No, don't worry about it, Sagiri. Just leave it to Sendai-san and me! Yeah!
390.H2200: 2200. I guess~ this is fine~. As long as everyone is safe, it's A-OK! Aah, what a great night!
390.H2300: 2300. Admiral, you look tired, tomorrow's going to be a hard day too, right? Go lie down a while~. Ah, good work!

480.2@Setsubun2018: Wha!? No way! Me? Why? Amagiri, st... stop that! It hurts! Jeez... Why...are all of you joining in too, Sazanami...

391.Damaged(2): Oh, no! It hurts! A direct hit!? No way...!
391.H0000: Admiral, it just turned midnight. Today I, Sagiri, have been assigned the responsibilities of secretary ship. I'm looking forward working with you!
391.H0100: It's 0100, Admiral. Is there anything I can help you with tonight?
391.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral. Orders acknowledged. I'm to organize these documents, right? Please leave it to me! I may not look it, but I'm good at organizing and cleaning!
391.H0300: It's 0300, Admiral. I've finished organizing the documents! Is there anything else I can help you with?
391.H0400: It's 0400, Admiral. Um... ah, that's right! I'll bring you some tea, okay? And also some sweets. ...Please take a breather. I'll get them ready, okay?
391.H0500: It's 0500, Admiral. Good morning! I'll go get ready to wake everyone up!
391.H0600: It's 0600, Admiral. *deep breath* All fleet hands are to arise!! A good morning to everyone!!!
391.H0700: It's 0700, Admiral. I have your breakfast ready, right over here. Now then, I'll bring your miso soup, natto, and tea over to you! ...Here! Help yourself!
391.H0800: It's 0800, Admiral. Yes, I'm almost done washing the dishes! The 20th Destroyer Division is to commence with exercises, right? Roger that.
391.H0900: It's 0900, Admiral. Ah... Amagiri-san! Good morning! That's right, our big sisters will probably be here soon.
391.H1000: It's 1000, Admiral. Ah, Amagiri-san, you shouldn't go overboard! Yes... she's usually a nice sister, but she can go too far...
391.H1100: It's 1100, Admiral. Oh? Ushio-chan? These rice balls are for us and the Admiral? Thank you! I'll take them. Lunch will be... ehehe♪ Aren't you looking forward to it?
391.H1200: 1200. It's lunch time! Admiral, Amagiri-san, let's open up the rice balls we got from Ushio-chan! Wow~ they look good♪ I'll pour us some tea!
391.H1300: It's 1300, Admiral. The rice balls were delicious♪ Eating rice balls while overlooking the sea made them even better! I ate so many. I'll have to make sure to exercise this afternoon.
391.H1400: 140- Ah, Sazanami-chan! Good work out there! An expeditionary mission? Roger that. Be careful, okay? Please do your best!
391.H1500: It's 1500, Admiral. Let's have some tea. As our sweet for today, it's kusa mochi! Please take a look— the red bean paste looks so good! Now, I'll get the tea.
391.H1600: 1600. Oh? Akatsuki-chan, what's wrong? Ah... yes, you certainly are. Akatsuki-chan, you're already a wonderful big sister! I'll have to try harder, too! Let's both keep at it♪
391.H1700: It's 1700, Admiral. The sun will be setting soon. I always look forward to it. I wonder why I feel so sad as I watch the sun set... Admiral, it's so beautiful, though... Why do I feel this way?
391.H1800: It's 1800, Admiral. Night has fallen. The night... I don't really like it. I'm a part of DesRon 3, though... Isn't that a little weird? ...Excuse me.
391.H1900: It's 1900, Admiral. Dinner has been served. Thanks to the operation F today, I was able to catch a lot of horse mackerel, so I tried deep frying it! Isn't it hearty and delicious? Feel free to help yourself♪
391.H2000: It's 2000, Admiral. How was the deep fried horse mackerel? There's still plenty more. Please have as much as you like! Eh? Sendai-san, what's wrong? ...Huh!? N-No, I'm not really a night person...!
391.H2100: It's 2100, Admiral. I'm not really a fan of this time of day... It makes my stomach hurt... Sendai-san, sorry for this. Next time, when the sun is up... I'll make it up to you, I promise.
391.H2200: It's 2200. Admiral, I beg your pardon. Sorry to make you worry... but I'll be okay! I need to pull myself together! I'm fine now!
391.H2300: It's 2300, Admiral. Thank you so much for your hard work every day! Even if it's for just a little while, Admiral, please go lie down and get some rest.

34.Intro: I'm Akatsuki! Treat me like the fully-fledged lady I am!
34.Library: I'm the first of the Special Type III destroyers, Akatsuki. I was based on the Fubuki-class, with improved cruising efficiency and range. I'm the most refined of destroyers! I'm quite the lady, as you can see! I-I really am...!
34.Poke(2): Today is certainly an auspicious day.
34.Poke(3): Don't pat my head like that! Didn't I say that I'm not a child anymore?
34.Married: C-Co-Co-Commander! For working so hard, I shall offer you my praise. Please lower your head.

34.Ranking: A telegram for the commander. Hurry and read it.
34.Join: It is my turn now, yes? Please observe.

34.Equip(2): You say that this equipment is a bit big? It's obviously just the right size!
34.Supply: Thank you. You have my regards.
34.Docking(1): It's not that I'm tired or anything, you know.
34.Docking(2): I'm only being deployed to violent battles. How troubling!
34.Construction: A new ship has been finished.
34.Return: The fleet's returned, as you can see. *whew*
34.Yasen(1): We have no choice but to charge!
34.MVP: No matter how you look at it, it's clear that I'm the best!
34.Damaged(3): Ugh... geez, I won't forgive you... I seriously won't!
34.Sunk: To sink in a place like this... I can't stand it...

34.2@Valentines: C-Commander! I-I made you chocolate! As a first-class lady... umm... that is...
34.2@Spring: It will be spring soon. A proper lady should participate in flower viewing. *excited* I hope I'll get an invitation soon.
34.2@Anniversary3: Commander, congratulation for the third anniversary. I shall celebrate it as a first class lady.

34.2@Summer: Geez! Building a sandcastle is no joke, you know! It's a way to practice building an elegant coastal fortification.

34.2@Saury: You're stockpiling saury? You may entrust this to us! Please observe the skill of the 6th Destroyer Division!
34.2@Xmas: I'm not a child, so I don't particularly have an interest in cake or anything, you know? *nom* *nom*
34.2@WhiteDay: Commander, where's the gift in return for the Valentine's suitable for a lady? Ah, must be this! Ah, I'll open it later.

234.Idle: *fidget* *fidget* ...I can wait for as long as it takes!
234.Supply: As a first-class lady, I shall accept it.

234.H0300: 0300. It's not like I asked because I needed to go to the bathroom or anything!
234.H0400: 04... 00... A lady can even pull an all-nighter flawlessly, you see?
234.H0600: 0... 6... 00... Ah...? "A well-rested child is a healthy child," they say...!
234.H0700: 07... 00... Eh? No way! I'm really late, aren't I!?

234.H0900: 0900. A lady prepares for the morning promptly.

234.H1300: 1300. Well then, you may now to treat me to an extravagant lunch, ok?
234.H1400: 1400. Ho-nest-ly!! Why does an extravagant lunch have a flag standing in it!? ...Well, I do enjoy fried prawns, hamburger and spaghetti.
234.H1500: 1500. "My, how extravagant." Yeah, right! So annoying!
234.H1600: 1600. Well then, I, as a fully-fledged lady, shall make a name for myself.
234.H1700: 1700. Now then, let's go the extra mile.

I was handed over to the Soviet Union as a war reparation, and given a name that means "reliable".

36.Intro: I'm Ikazuchi! Don't read my name as "Kaminari"! You'll do well to remember that!

38.Intro: We are Hatsuharu. We thank you in advance.
38.Library: We are the first Hatsuharu-class destroyer, Hatsuharu. We were attached to the Northern Force. As the clouds of war gathers, we did our duty in the Northern seas at such places as Attu and Kiska. The seas around Hokkaido are our favourite, no? The Gulf of Manila and Ormoc... ah, we are weak to the heat.
38.Poke(1): Oh, are you interested in us?
38.Poke(2): Yes, this is how you should be treating us.
38.Poke(3): You graceless swine! Can you not calm down a little?
38.Wedding: You...!? W-w-w-w-aaa! To expose us to such shameful words! Shame on you! For shame...
38.Ranking: There is something for you; a correspondence, perchance?
38.Equip(1): Yes. We became stronger once more.
38.Equip(2): Did you not say that the equipment up to now was not quite up to par?
38.Supply: Yes. We became stronger once more.
38.Docking(1): Yes, we shall take a small respite.
38.Docking(2): This arsenal has such skilled craftsman, we are unperturbed.
38.Construction: A new ship is complete, perchance?
38.Return: It appears that the fleet has returned. Surely, a triumph?
38.Yasen(1): At long last... we shall demonstrate our true purpose!
38.MVP: This triumph, it was not solely due to our efforts. Everyone did their part.
38.Damaged(2): Verily, thou shalt experience our wrath!
38.Damaged(3): 'Tis but a scratch! We shall not sink from just this!
38.2@NewYears: It's Hatsuharu! How auspicious. Let us celebrate this year together!
38.2@Setsubun: Hm! Setsubun is a ceremony of great import! It holds many meanings! Ah! Did you already know?
38.2@Anniversary: Yeah, congrats! To celebrate a day like today with you, we, too, are happy. Good.
38.2@Xmas: Ku-Kurisu...masu... thou sayeth!? Such a queer festival! This is... chicken? *nod nod*
38.2@Kessen: Well, that is, we trust you... Yes, well, that's all!
38.2@Valentines2018: Well, we mean, we want to experience the customs of this fleeting life once in a while...so we are, well, giving this to you!
38.4@Valentines2018: We of DesDiv 21 are not the main force of the fleet, but are charged with transport operations. We don't mind it, transports serve an important operational role. We are well aware!
38.2@WhiteDay2018: Humph, so this is known as a return gift. You're very dutiful. We have no choice but to accept this. Mmm, yes.
38.2@Anniversary2018: Yes, what a joyous occasion. We're happy that we can celebrate a day like this with you. The 5th Anniversary is great.
38.2@Rainy2018: Well, we don't dislike the rain but... it's really pouring down... When you think about it, rain is something wonderful.
38.2@Summer2018: Summer is here again this year. There aren't any cicadas though... Yup, even though the times may change, this never changes.
38.2@Saury2018: You want us... to lend a hand to the fishermen? Hmmm... Ah, alright, leave it to us. Just pay attention to how good our skills are!
38.2@Anniversary2019: Yup, this is really great. We're happy that we can... celebrate this day with you. The 6th Anniversary is great.

238.Idle: Aah, well, you know, it would be all right if we did some work... it would be all right, you know?
238.Married: You should... rest a little better as well. Of course, we can rest when it's important. ...It's pleasant!
238.H0000: That is right, we shall be telling you the time tonight. It's something special! Ufu~
238.H0200: 0200. That is right, it is the Hour of the Ox.
238.H0300: 0300. *yawn*~ Well, we are a bit tired.
238.H0400: 0400. Are you listening to us? We see.
238.H0500: 0500. It is morning now. A new day has begun again.
238.H0600: 0600. Yes, it will be good to assemble and inspect the fleet in the morning. Hmm? We? Why should we do it?
238.H0700: 0700. Breakfast has not been prepared yet. Huh!? We? Humph, we are hungry now. Save the jokes for later.
238.H0800: 0800. You can do it if you try. Today's breakfast tasted good. Please continue to make breakfast from now on.
238.H0900: 0900. Well, you are right. It is almost time to send out the fleet. Which one...
238.H1000: 1000. DesDiv21, gather! 21... Eh? No one is here. ...Hey! Wakaba! Everyone else!
238.H1100: 11... Oh, Wakaba good... No, you are late! Eh? You just got back? Good work.
238.H1200: 1200. It is already lunchtime. We need to have lunch now. Where is it? What is this package...
238.H1300: 1300. We...well, this is fine. Eating rice balls on the ocean is not bad. We see, so Hatsushimo made them... Humph.
238.H1400: 1400. DesDiv21 is finally assembled. No problems at all. Now it is time for us to sortie. To the north, right?
238.H1500: 150... W-watch out! W-we are fine. We are careful about avoiding collisions.
238.H1600: 1600. Humph, you are all looking cheerful. That is encouraging. That is the way we face our future.
238.H1700: 1700. What do you want? You want to watch the sunset? Alright then. Yes, it is splendid.
238.H1800: 1800. Now, it is dinnertime. We wonder what is on the menu. Come, hurry and bring it out.
238.H1900: 1900. Wow, this is a fine spread for dinner. What? Hatsushimo made this? We see, we are thankful.
238.H2000: 20... Ah, what is it? What? Night battle? We see, while that is important, now is the time to be more concerned about anti-air and anti-sub operations.
238.H2100: 2100. Nenohi, Wakaba, Hatsushimo, thanks for your hard work every day! Ah, same to you. Get a good rest.
238.H2200: 2200. What is it? Can you not sleep? It is too early!? What are you saying? Tomorrow will come soon. It is good to rest early.
238.H2300: 2300. What? We cannot rest when you are rustling around. You are so restless.

241.H0700: It's 0700. Here's your breakfast, Admiral. Today's miso soup has daikon and nappa in it.
241.H0800: It's 0800. I'm preparing rice balls for lunch. For my sisters too! There, all done!
241.H0900: It's 0900. What do you have planned for fleet operations this morning, Admiral? Fleet exercises? Roger!

241.H1300: It's 1300. ...Eh!? My sister was looking for me? Ah, I'll have to go! Teitoku, I'm sorry! Please wait a minute, okay?

241.H1600: It's 160... Yahagi! Thanks for your hard work! Yes, no problems here. I'm always... Yes!
241.H1700: It's 1700. Admiral... Yes. That was a hard battle. I... I...
241.H1800: It's 1800. I'm sorry, Admiral. I'll prepare dinner now. Please wait a moment.
241.H1900: It's 1900. Today we're having sardine fishball soup with barley rice and... Yes, there's enough for seconds. Dig in!
241.H2000: It's 2000. Admiral, and everyone in the fleet, great work. Thanks for all your hard work today.
241.H2100: It's 2100. This is a really, really important time, Admiral. That's what I feel.
241.H2200: It's 2200. It's nearly bed time, Admiral. Take it easy once in a while, alright?
241.H2300: It's 2300. Thank you for all of your hard work every day, Admiral. I'm sure... I'm sure you'll work hard tomorrow too! Good night.

43.Intro: I'm the Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Shigure. Please take care of me from now on.

405.Married: Um, I can't really say it well, but... I'm always grateful. Truly.
405.Wedding: Commander... U-um, what is it? Is it a new transport mission? Eh, it's not? Then night battle duty? That's not it either? Eh... for me... Fufu, I'll treasure it.
405.Ranking: A business message is... um... Please look.
405.Join: Yes, fifth Shiratsuyu-class Harusame... heading out!
405.Equip(1): With this... transport missions will progress.
405.Equip(2): With this, I'll be able to guard well too...
405.Docking(1): Yes, I think I'll take a bath.
405.Docking(2): I've gotten a bit tired... yes.
405.Construction: A new ship has, yes, been completed.

405.Sortie: Second Destroyer Division, Harusame, heading out!
405.Yasen(1): Allow me to start the night battle.
405.MVP: I was the best... really? Really? ...Yes, I'm a little bit happy.
405.Damaged(3): T-they got me... I can still continue my guard duties.
405.Sunk: I guess... that's... it... Murasame-neesan... This time, I'll go on ahead...

405.2@Saury: As always, being with the Commander and the 2nd Destroyer Division makes me want to do my best. Yep!

323.H0000: It's 0000. Uhm, it's a new day.
323.H0200: 0200. It's the dead of the night. I'm a little... No! I'm not scared at all.
323.H0300: 0300. Wah...! Uuu, I'm sorry. I'll be careful from now on.
323.H0400: 0400. Hey, I'm feeling kind of... I-It's alright! I'm not sleepy, yes!
323.H0500: 0500. Commander, it's the start of the day. Good morning.
323.H0600: 0600. Is it alright if Harusame makes breakfast? Right! Let's do it.
323.H0700: 0700. And for breakfast it's Mapo Haru... I'm kidding. I made a Japanese set meal. Please help yourself to it.
323.H0800: 0800. Let's work hard for today's transport mission. Transporting and escorting are important.
323.H0900: 0900. I wonder if Murasame-nee-san is doing well... Hmm...
323.H1000: 1000. For lunch... Ah, it's still to early for lunch right now. I apologise.
323.H1100: 1100. Commander, what are you having for lunch? It's not so bad to eat out once in awhile. Uh... Uhm...
323.H1200: 1200. Eh, it's alright for me to accompany the commander out for lunch? I'm so happy.
323.H1300: 1300. It was fun at the western restaurant. I'm glad to have gone, yes.
323.H1400: 1400. Huh? What's Yuudachi-nee-san doing at such a place? Isn't it dangerous?
323.H1500: 1500. Commander, uh, uhm... Should I bring along some snacks?
323.H1600: 1600. The skies are getting darker. It's almost evening, yes.
323.H1700: 1700. Commander, the sunset is beautiful, isn't it? I feel like I could stare at it forever.
323.H1800: 1800. I'll prepare dinner. Commander, what do you feel like having?
323.H1900: 1900. I've gone and done it. Harusame's special Mapo Harusame. T-Try it!
323.H2000: 2000. How was dinner? The secret ingredients were sesame oil and five-spice powder.
323.H2100: 2100. Commander, I'll be washing all this dishes up first. Excuse me.
323.H2200: 2200. Commander, it's about time we made plans for tomorrow's transport mission. Uhm...
323.H2300: 2300. Oh, uhm, Commander, thanks for the hard work today.

46.Intro: My name is Samidare! I look forward to working with you. Please leave any escort missions to me!
46.Library: I'm Samidare. My friends Murasame, Yuudachi and Harusame, we made up DesDiv2. Oh yeah, during a transport mission, I crashed into Shiratsuyu... Really, I'm... sorry for being clumsy... But, I'll do my best!
46.Poke(1): Admiral, I'll do my very best!
46.Wedding: Admiral, I...the admiral...I li...NOTHING! I'll do my best from now on too!
46.Join: At last it's finally our turn.
46.Equip(2): I'm so happy, I will show you the new me.
46.Docking(1): Fu... I'll take a small rest.
46.Docking(2): I can't anymore... I will take a small nap then...
46.Construction: Ah..., A new ally? I want to meet her soon.
46.Return: The operation has completed, thank you for your work.
46.Sortie: I won't let anyone call me clumsy anymore!
46.Yasen(1): It's not over yet, it starts from here!
46.Yasen(2): Please leave the front lines to me.
46.MVP: I did it! Admiral, did you see that?
46.Sunk: I'm sorry... it seems that this is as far as I can go...
46.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the new year! Admiral, you can leave it to me again this year! Yes!
46.2@Valentines: Admiral... I-It's Valentine's! This is a chocolate cake, so pl- wha, h-huh!? Whaah~~!!
46.2@Anniversary: Admiral, today is an anniversary, right? It's amazing! Samidare will try harder than usual!
46.2@Rainy: I'm quite fond of the rainy season. How should I put it.... Isn't the rain just so pleasant? Ne♪
46.2@Summer: It's summer, isn't it! Summer! Admiral, let's go to the sea together! Ah... we go there every day, don't we.
46.2@Xmas:
Admiral, Merry Christmas~! I went ahead and brought the
cake-W-Woaaahhhh... wooaahhhh... uwaaahhhh...!

246.Idle: When it is night, from time to time, I think back of something. Something about apologizing to Hiei-san. But, I co~uldn't remember clearly... What was it I wonder~? ...Just a bit more...
246.Married: If you push yourself too hard, you will be "clumsy". Take a rest! I will make a cup of tea. Please wait.

458.Intro: I am Umikaze, the Seventh of the Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, and the First of the Revised Shiratsuyu-class. I'll be in your care, Admiral!
458.Library: I am Umikaze, the Seventh of the Shiratsuyu Class Destroyer, and the First of the Revised Shiratsuyu Class. I was built according to the second Naval Armaments Supplement Program. I participated in the Battle of Guadalcanal, as part of the Second Torpedo Squadron. I will be in your care, Admiral.
458.Poke(2): Kawakaze? Well, what is it? Whoa!? Admiral!? Please, excuse me! Huh? Uhm....
458.Poke(3): Ah, the Bridge? Yes, as for the Umikaze-class... Ah, I'm sorry. It's Revised Shiratsuyu-class.
458.Idle: Admiral? Admi...ral? He seems busy. Maybe I should go see how Kawakaze is doing? But there is no way to know when he will need me...
458.Married: Admiral, are you not tired? Really? Are you okay? Your health is important. Please do not push yourself too hard. Ah, Umikaze will make some tea.
458.Wedding: Did you call for Umikaze, Admiral? You plan to summon the Revised Shiratsuyu-class and.. Ah, that's not it? This is... Really? Wow, I'm so happy!
458.Ranking: The information, Admiral? Yes, Umikaze will bring it for you.
458.Join: First of the Upgraded Shiratsuyu-class, Umikaze, setting sail!
458.Equip(1): Thank you very much, Admiral. I'm happy to become stronger.
458.Equip(2): Uh... Uhm. If it is okay, I would be happy if the same can be done for Kawakaze.
458.Supply: Ah, thank you for the resupply. It helps.
458.Docking(1): I'm sorry. I'll be in the dock for a bit.
458.Docking(2): I'm sorry... I'll take your word and let my wounds heal thoroughly.
458.Construction: It seems that a new ship girl has arrived.
458.Return: Fleet has returned safely to port. Thank you for the hard work! Phew...
458.Sortie: 24th Destroyer Division, leaving port! Everyone, follow me please!
458.Attack: It is just like the Solomons... This time, I'll fight!
458.Yasen(1): We will clear the remaining enemy through night battle! All fleet charge! Everyone, follow me please!
458.MVP: Umikaze is the top? Th-thank you! It's a bit embarrassing...
458.Damaged(1): No! I'm hit? Wh-what is it?
458.Damaged(2): Kyaa! What is it? Torpedo? Enemy ship!?
458.Damaged(3): I was hit heavily. This place is... dangerous.
458.Sunk: It seems like Umikaze... ends here... Kawakaze... you... take your time... okay?
458.2@NewYears: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! The 24th Destroyer Division and I will be counting on you again this year!
458.2@Setsubun: So it's Setsubun...? Hwah! Kawakaze, throwing beans at Sendai-san like that is...! Ah...! Awawah! Sendai-san, I'm sorry! Ah... um...! I'm so sorry...!
458.2@Valentines: I wonder if the shape is really okay... or maybe it was a little too exaggerated...? Ah... Admiral! If you don't mind, come here! Please have some of this...!
458.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, it's the third year! Congratulations! Umikaze will celebrate too!
458.2@Rainy: It rains pretty often at this time of year, doesn't it? But it's quiet... it's nice. I... like the rainy days, too.
458.2@EarlySummer: It's getting hotter. Admiral, it's going to be summer soon. What should I do for this year's swimsuit? Should I buy a new one?
458.2@Summer: Admiral, it's summer. The sunlight is really strong, isn't it? Oh, I'll be fine. I'll put on sunscreen just in case. Ehehe♪
458.2@Fall: Potatoes taste delicious in fall, don't they? Admiral, shall I make steamed sweet potatoes? I'll prepare some tea as well. One moment, please.
458.2@Xmas: Admiral, there's a festival today. The fir tree's decorations are so pretty. I'm... so happy...
458.2@YearsEnd: Admiral, it went by so fast! It's already December. I'm going to have to rush the naval base's cleanup. Ah... it'll be fine! Please leave it to me.
458.2@WhiteDay: Admiral!? This is meant for Umikaze? Thank you very much! I'll cherish it. I'm so happy!
458.2@Anniversary2018: Today is an anniversary, Commander. I'm honoured that I can spend it with you

350.H0000: Admiral, Umikaze will be by your side to alert you of the time today. Ah, I'll brew some more tea.
350.H0100: Admiral, it is 0100. Fleet in the night is... quiet as well.
350.H0200: Admiral, it is 0200. Do you feel a little sleepy? Then I will make a strong tea.
350.H0300: Admiral, it is 0300. Should I make black tea sometimes? Ah, no. I guess green tea is the best. Here it is.
350.H0400: Admiral, it is 0400. It's almost morning... Admiral, do you want to take a short nap? It's alright because Umikaze will be awake.
350.H0500: Admiral, it is 0500. It is... morning. Mmmpph, it is a nice morning. Let's strive today as well.
350.H0600: Admiral, it is 0600. I'll make the wake-up call to the fleet. All fleet, wake up! Good morning!
350.H0700: Admiral, it is 0700. I've prepared your breakfast as well. Today's fish is split mackerel. I'll get the tea now.
350.H0800: Admiral, it is 0800. After I'm done with the laundry, I'll get to checking the fleet composition and expedition. I'm sorry, please wait.
350.H0900: Admiral, it is 0900. I have finished checking today's fleet composition and expeditions. What will you do about the morning's sortie?
350.H1000: Admiral, it is 1000. Will you send the fleet to the South? Oh, should we prioritize the supply transport mission?
350.H1100: Admiral, it is 1100. My sisters? Yes, they are my pride. I wonder if Kawakaze is doing well? Ehehe.
350.H1200: Admiral, it is 1200. Leave the lunch to Umikaze as well. How about curry? Ah, curry udon sounds good too.
350.H1300: Admiral, it is 1300. Ah, didn't some curry get flung out? Are you okay? Curry stains are hard to get off, right?..... Ah , it's okay. Good.
350.H1400: Admiral, it is 1400. Ah, Jintsuu-san, you must be busy. Ah, right. 24th Destroyer Division is doing well. It's okay.
350.H1500: Admiral, it is 1500. Being part of the Second Torpedo Squadron is a great pride, but it makes me nervous. Yes...
350.H1600: Admiral, it is 160... Suzukaze! It must be tiring. You are full of energy. Ehehe, keep it up!
350.H1700: Admiral, it is 1700. Ah... What is it Michishio? Eh? Asashio ? I haven't seen her... are you searching for her?
350.H1800: Admiral, it is 1800. Umikaze will start preparing the dinner. I wonder what would be good tonight?
350.H1900: Admiral, it is 1900. Your evening meal is ready. Tonight's menu is chicken rice. How is it? Is it good?
350.H2000: Admiral, it's 2000. Hm, Kawakaze? You're sortieing with Sendai for a night battle? Ah... be careful! Do your best!
350.H2100: Admiral, it's 2100. Ah... I'm a bit worried about Kawakaze. If anything really happened...
350.H2200: Admiral, it's 2200. Kawakaze made it back to the port safely, thank goodness. Thank you for your hard work too, Sendai-san!
350.H2300: Admiral, it is 2300. It has been a hard day of work today. Let's keep our diligence tomorrow too.

587.Intro: Improved Shiratsuyu-class destroyers' lead ship, Umikaze. Admiral, today, too, I look forward to working with you!
587.Poke(3): Improved Shiratsuyu-class destroyer. How do you like these late model armaments? Well balanced, aren't they?
587.Idle: Admiral, I'll make some delicious tea, OK? It's hot, so be careful.
587.Sortie: 24th Destroyer Squadron flagship, Umikaze. Sortieing! Everyone, follow me!
587.Attack: It is just like the Solomons... This time, I won't lose! Fire!

457.Intro:
I'm... Shiratsuyu-class destroyer... the eighth ship... Yamakaze...
...It's not a big deal...
457.Library:
Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, eighth ship... revised Shiratsuyu-class, Yamakaze.

I was born in Uraga... just like Shigure-nee and Suzukaze were... Along with Kawakaze and the others, we formed the 24th Destroyer Division.

In order to protect Kaga, we started a big fight as a diversionary move... and I tried really hard. ...After that... I had to go from Oominato to Hashirajima... so I tried to go... and after that... I don't know. I can't remember.
457.Poke(3):
Don't tease me. ...Didn't I say to leave me alone?
...Stop doing... things like that...
457.Idle:
Leave me alone! Leave... ...well... um... um... I...
Ah...! It was... It's nothing... Nothing...
457.Married: What's wrong? Are you tired? ...I see. ...Would you like some tea? ...I'll make some. ...Well, I'd like some, too. Not really. Don't worry about it. ...Wait a little!
457.Wedding: If you don't need anything, leave me alone. I just want to be... ...Ah... n-no! Don't grab my arm! ...What's this? I don't really... ...Pretty. ...It's warm. ...It's... okay? ...I'm not really... happy or anything...
457.Ranking: Want to look? ...I guess it's fine.
457.Supply:
I'm fine, really...
...It's a waste on me...
457.Docking(1): For now... I'll get repaired... okay?
457.Docking(2): I won't sink, but... it kind of... hurts...
457.Sortie: DesDiv24... flagship... ...Yamaka... *sigh* It's fine. Kawakaze, you can do it if you want.
457.Battle: Enemy planes spotted... They're going to attack... Get ready...
457.Attack: I'll fire! I really will, you know!
457.Yasen(1): You can't see submarines at night. It's scary. ...But... there's no avoiding it, huh... ...I'm advancing!
457.MVP: I was...? ...You really shouldn't...! That kind of thing is... That kind of thing...! ...I... You don't need to...
457.Damaged(1): This is why... I didn't want to...
457.Damaged(3): No way! I... don't want to sink! I hate this!
457.Sunk:
Again... I'm sinking... No! Not into this dark sea... no...!
Kawakaze... Umikaze... help me...!
...Please... no...
457.2@NewYears: Happy New Year... ...Hold my hand again this year. ...No...! ...It was nothing...
457.2@Setsubun: Kawakaze... you're noisy. ...Ow... Stop throwing... ... ...Ow... That hurts...! ...I said it hurts!
457.2@Valentines: Um, I'll give this to you... Eat it later okay?
457.2@Hina: I feel, a little bit better now. Just a little... Yup!
457.2@LateWinter: ...Cold... it's kind of cold...! ...What are those white things? ...Snow? ...Admiral... I'm... a little... cold...
457.2@YearsEnd: The New Year's cleaning... I don't mind but, what should I be doing?
457.2@Rainy: I hate this season. I don't have any particular reason, it's just that my body feels like it can't move. No, I'm sorry.
457.2@WhiteDay: This? Really? Thank you... Thank you...
457.2@EarlySummer: A swimsuit?  I don't really mind though. I'll just wear one.
457.2@Fall2017: Why are all of you making so much noise? ...Saury? ...I'm fine, though... Eh? Me too?
457.2@Saury2017: DesDiv24 heading out on a saury fishing support mission~! Let's gooooooooo~ What?
457.2@LateFall2017: It's gotten a bit colder. Let's get out the kotatsu.
457.2@Anniversary2018: The fleet is in its 6th year... Congratulations... I see, that's right... I see.

369.Intro:
I'm... Shiratsuyu-class destroyer... the eighth ship... Yamakaze...
...Don't let go of my hand. ...I'll come back home.
369.Poke(3):
Leave me alone! ...I'm telling you not to tease me, and yet...
...I guess it's okay...
369.Join: Attached to the Fifth Cruiser Division, DesDiv 24, setting sail. Let's go.
369.Equip(1): I understand. I'll use this... with care.
369.H0000: Midnight... ...I'm doing it today? ...It's okay, but... you're kind of weird, too...
369.H0700: 0700. You'll have breakfast, won't you...? Here. It's barley rice and miso soup... also... pickled... radish...
369.H1000: 1000. ...Kawakaze... what...? You're... a little loud... your voice is too loud...
369.H1100: 1100. ...What are you doing for lunch? ...Oh? Then... I'll get something. ...It's okay.
369.H1200: 1200. ...Noon. Here. Rice balls. ...Is two enough? Three? ...Here's tea.
369.H1300: 1300. ...Still hungry...? ...Oh. ...Well, should we... start the afternoon work?
369.H1400: 140... ...Ah...! Nachi-san, Haguro-san... ...Yes, I... please... don't worry about me...
369.H1500: 15... ...Ah... Umikaze-nee? What... is this...? ...Dropping it off for me? Thank... you... I'll eat it.
369.H1600: 1600. ...Yeah, Umikaze-nee is... gentle... I kind of... like her. ...Kawakaze, too... she's so loud, but... I don't mind... her...
369.H1700: 1700. ...It's almost nighttime. I hate the night...
369.H1800: 1800. ...What are you doing for dinner? ...? ...I'll... make it...? ...Eh?
369.H1900: 1900. Mamiya's... I've always wanted to come here, even if only once... Um... th... tha... thank you...
369.H2000: 2000. ...Mamiya... the omurice... was delicious... If I can... I'd like... to come again.
369.H2100: 2100. ...Night... I don't like it... around now...
369.H2200:
2200. ...Admiral... what...? I'm... not really... scared or anything...
...but... it's so warm... your hand...
369.H2300: 2300. Today wore me out... Again... tomorrow... okay? Tomorrow...

459.Intro: The ninth Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Kawakaze of the revised Shiratsuyu-class. Nice to meet you! Ah, about the reading of my name, do not get it wrong!
459.Library: Ninth ship of the Shiratsuyu-class, the revised Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Kawakaze. Well now, I was built under the Maru 2 program, the same as Umikaze and our big sisters. Maaan, that was some hard, hard work! We sailed the Solomon's seas many times over. My last moments were during night battle. The enemy's radar... really, what foul play!
459.Poke(1): Hm, Admiral. Did you call me?
459.Poke(2): Revised Shiratsuyu-class. Top balance is good, don't you think?
459.Poke(3): The hell? Don't touch my equipment... Hm~? Admiral what's wrong? You're interested over me? Hm?
459.Idle: Ahhhh~ So bored. Hey Admiral, let's do something.　Or else my body will become quite weak.　Admiral, you listening!?
459.Married: Whats up Admiral, tired? That's embarrassing. I guess I have no choice, you can lean on me. Nn? Here, hows that?
459.Wedding: Hmm? Whats up, Admiral? Whats with the box? Are you giving it to me? Eh, what kind of wind blew around? I'll still take it though!
459.Ranking: Hm? ...Admiral, what's up? You looking at the report? Alright, alright.
459.Join: Revised Shiratsuyu Destroyer, Kawakaze, launching. Follow me!
459.Equip(1): Oh? Thank you. Yep~ that's nice.
459.Equip(2): Yeah! Nice, nice! New stuff is definitely a step forward for me!
459.Docking(1): Hmm... I'll just take a short bath...
459.Docking(2): Oh well. Gonna take a long bath. You wanna join me, Admiral? Ha, kidding.
459.Construction: So, a new one has arrived.
459.Return: Ahh~ Operation is over. Good work, good work!
459.Sortie: Yeah, let's go and get hype! 24th Destroyer Division, sortie!
459.Battle: Hm. I saw enemy fleet, let's do this. Guns ready!
459.Attack: Hm, nice nice. Destroyers really belong to the battlefield. Let's go!
459.Yasen(1): Heheheh, Night battle ho! Let's plunge in, sissies! Follow me!
459.Yasen(2): Alright, let's take 'em all at once!
459.MVP: Hm? I'm number one? Heh, Nothing personal, Shiratsuyu sis. Cause I'm numero uno! Hehehe.
459.Damaged(1): Puah... I still can go on! I ain't dying just yet!
459.Damaged(2): Tch... What? Where did they hit me!?
459.Damaged(3): Dammit... They got me... but I ain't sinking yet... owowowowow....
459.Sunk: The hell... I'm in deep sea again... Big sis... everyone... let's meet... again..
459.2@NewYears: Admiral! Happy New Year! Me and my sisters are countin' on ya again this year! Now, New Year's Gift please! Gimme, gimme!
459.2@Setsubun: It's Setsubun! Gonna throw beans! Target spotted to starboard! Fire! It's a hit! ...Eh? Er... Sendai...san...? I uh... uhm... eh!
459.2@Valentines: Admiral, here, some chocolate for you! ...Hm? It's fine. I bought it from the mess hall. I'm looking forward to a great return gift!
459.2@Anniversary3: Hm? It's the third anniversary, isn't it? Way to go! That's quite a shocker! Yay~!
459.2@Rainy: Hmm... It's been raining for days. It's the rainy season, after all. Oh well, time to relax.
459.2@EarlySummer: Hnnnaaa... It's so damn hot. I can't stand it. I should put on something cooler like a swimsuit. Ahh, can I get away with it? Can I wear a swimsuit around the base?
459.2@Summer: It's summertime!? Ku~ it's so damn hot!! What a shame! It'd a waste not to wear a swimsuit now, am I right? Admiral, you can strip down, too.
459.2@Fall: Alright! We made it through summer. Fall is pretty nice. Kinda makes me feel carefree, and even the food tastes great.
459.2@Xmas: Admiral! It's Christmas, you know! Christmas! Where's the cake? Cake! Yay~!
459.2@YearsEnd: It's the year end already! Time flies... The fleet's having a cleanup, huh... Oh well, I'm up for it. You too, Admiral. Here, take this broom!
459.2@Spring: Hm, it's finally spring eh, spring. It got a lil' hotter didn't it, wonder if I should go flower viewing with the 24thDesDiv. Hey!
459.2@WhiteDay: Oh? Admiral, a return for that chocolate? You know your manners, not bad, not bad. I'll try it... Oh, these are quite delicious. I say it works. It sure does.
459.2@Anniversary2018: Today is a special day, Admiral. Congratulations. Let's celebrate it together. Ok?

351.H0000: Alright, Admiral, today's timekeeping role will be me, Kawakaze! Oh you can count on me! Gehehe!
351.H0100: It's 0100. Admiral, hehe, this is how it's done, right?
351.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral. Gehehe, easy peasy! Even timekeeping won't hold me back!
351.H0300: 03..0...0...  !! I'm not sleeping! Not sleepy at all! Because this is easy!
351.H0400: 0...4...zer-... !! Ah, big sis made me some morning tea! It's helpful! Now this will be a walk in a park!
351.H0500: 0...-ive...0...0...Admiral...while i'm doing this it's morning all sudden...Ahh, it's getting brighter...so this is morning huh, uhehe...sleepy...
351.H0600: Admiral,its 0600! It wakie time for everyone! Wake up-!! Sissies-!! It's Morning-!!
351.H0700: It's 0700! Admiral, let's eat breakfast! Breakfast! Uh, I can't do this, I'm not my sister. Now, let's go!
351.H0800: (munch) Admiral its 0800. The breakfast at Mamiya's is delicious!
351.H0900: It's 0900! Admiral, let's begin managing fleets. Where should I start... from expedition ? hmm...
351.H1000: 100-eh, Solomon seas? Yeah, I've been there, quite a lot actually. Drum cans on my back transporting stuff and also patrol duty. Quite a chore.
351.H1100: It's 1100 now, Admiral. We talked too much that it's already noon. Say, you're hungry? Eh, we're having field rations for lunch?
351.H1200: It's 1200, Admiral! Lunchtime is Onigiri time. Whoop-pe-doodie-do. I'm good at making onigiri. Eat'em!
351.H1300: Admiral, It's 1300 now. How do you like my onigiri? Taste good, eh? Nothing beats like making em above water. That's what I think.
351.H1400: It's 1400, Admiral. Alrighty, It's time to get serious. Tokyo Express, eh. Now where's my drum?
351.H1500: Admiral! It's 1500! Where's the snack? Huh!? Nothing!? Why nothing!? My stomach's rumbling here!
351.H1600: Admiral, it's 1600 already. It's already dusk... Say, does that mean there's night battle tonight? Sendai's gonna be there, right?
351.H1700: It's 1700 now, Admiral. So how's dinner...? Huh, what? You're gonna cook? Yeah, Not a bad idea♪
351.H1800: Admiral! It's 1800! Whoa! Dinner's served! Down the hatch~! *nom* *nom* 'tis good, Admiral. Awesome!
351.H1900: Ahh— I've ate well... No wait, it's 1900, Admiral. So— I'm off with Sendai to a night battle~
351.H2000: 2000. Gonna watch out for the enemy's radar detection. Sendai, let's proceed with caution!
351.H2100: 2100. Eh? Shigure, what's the matter? Ah? Numerous torpedoes!? Evaaadeee!

248.Idle: Commander, if you put me on standby, I am prepared to wait here forever!

248.H0100: 0100. Do you have any orders for me, Commander? Please order me to do anything. Yes, it's my duty.
248.H0200: 020... Eh, my voice is a bit too loud? My deepest apologies, Commander.

248.H0400: 0400. ...Commander, I've... brought the tea! Here, please enjoy.

248.H0900: 0900. Roger that. We're having an exercise first. Ooshio, Michishio, Arashio; DesDiv8, weigh anchor.
248.H1000: 1000. Be careful, Arashio. Don't get distracted too, Michishio. How was that, Commander? Our DesDiv8 teamwork is great and our morale is high too. Anytime.
248.H1100: 1100. It's almost lunchtime. Ah, thanks for your hard work, Noshima. Is this a lunch box? Thank you very much! Let's eat, Commander.
248.H1200: It's lunchtime, Commander. Here is the lunch box we got. Hmmmmm... Whoa, it looks delicious, Commander.
248.H1300: 1300. Yes, I'll never ever forget that important promise. I won't...
248.H1400: 1400. What operations are we going to be deployed on this afternoon, Commander? Ah, I see, I see. I get it. As I expected of you, Commander.
248.H1500: 150... Ah, Isonami, Inazuma, thanks for all your hard work. Yes, Arashio is doing fine too.
248.H1600: 1600. Don't always be looking up. Pay attention to what's below... what's under the water too.
248.H1700: 1700. Look at that, Commander. The sunset is... the red sunset is so... beautiful.
248.H1800: 1800. It's time for dinner, Admiral. I'll do my best to make something. Please wait a while for the food to be ready.
248.H1900: 1900. Thank you for waiting, Commander. My special dinner is all done. I've set it all out over here. There's a large helping of barely rice, today's fresh fish boiled in soy sauce, miso soup and... yes, pickled radish! Please help yourself.
248.H2000: 2000. Commander, I'll leave your after meal tea... over here. It's hot! Please be careful.
248.H2100: 2100. Yes, Sendai. DesRon3, DesDiv8 will gladly accompany you for this night battle mission. Be careful, Arashio. Let's go!
248.H2200: 2200. All of DesRon3 has returned safely. I've learned a lot, Sendai. Thank you very much!
248.H2300: 2300. I'm so happy that we were able to complete today's missions together, Commander. I look forward to working with you again. Asashio, standing down.
