455.2@Fall: Summer passed in the blink of an eye and it's already fall! Commander, I'm currently studying up on healthy autumn cuisine.
455.2@Xmas: Commander, Merry Christmas! I tried making a healthier cake. I used less sugar and butter in it. Ah, is that okay with you? By all means! Say "ahhhh"...
455.2@YearsEnd: Umm... after I finish cleaning, I need to get the New Year's Eve soba ready. Is tempura using winter vegetables fine with you?
455.2@Spring: Flower viewing, was it!? That's nice. I will be preparing a bentou filled with healthy menu, alright? I'm looking forward to it!
455.2@WhiteDay: Commander, this is for me? Thank you. May I open it? Ah, looks tasty... *munch* Commander, this is... too sweet~
455.2@Anniversary2018: Today is an important day, Commander. I'm happy I can spend it with you. Congratulations, Commander.

355.Intro: Hagikaze, Fourth Destroyer Division, in position. Commander, please give me your orders!
355.Join: Fourth Destroyer Division, First Platoon, Hagikaze! Leaving port!
355.Equip(2): The night, I… No, it's fine!
355.Docking(2): Fwah. When I get into the bath like this… Huh? I wonder if the commander remembered to get some food.
355.Yasen(1): The night… The night sea is dangerous. But I will continue on! All ships, follow me! It's night battle!
355.H0000: Commander, the date has just changed. Today I, Hagikaze, will be the secretary ship. I'm counting on your guidance.
355.H0100: It's 01:00. Commander, night is after all a bit... scary isn't it? Ah, no! It's alright!
355.H0200: Commander, it's 02:00. Is the commander completely fine with nights? As expected of the commander!
355.H0300: It's 03:...00. *Scream* Co-Commander, please don't surprise me like that. I get really scared after all...jeez~.
355.H0400: 04:...00. Soon... Won't it become morning soon? Morning Sun... hurry!
355.H0500: 05:00! Commander, it's morning! It's dawn you know! I'll go prepare breakfast, alright? Huh? It's still too early?
355.H0600: It's 06:00. The fleet, all hands, get up! It's mo~rning! Commander, this time for sure I'll go prepare breakfast. Please wait!
355.H0700: 07:00. Here~, Hagikaze's healthy morning meal! Wheat rice with a precious vegetables side dish, burdock and tofu miso sauce and pickles! Enjoy your meal♪
355.H0800: It's 08:00. Commander, Please wait a bit while I clean up the dishes. Mornings are nice aren't they~, Mornings, I like them!
355.H0900: It's 09:00. Commander, sorry to have kept you waiting. Which mission will you start with first today? Or will you observe a ship's remodelling?
355.H1000: 10:0-...Ah! Nowaki, Maikaze, thank you for your hard work. Ah, Arashi? No, I haven't seen her. Next time, let's have a girl's meet with all of DesDiv 4. Commander, will you participate?
355.H1100: It's 11:00. Commander, what will you have for lunch? How about Hagikaze's special root vegetable curry? Is it really ok? Yes, Please wait!
355.H1200: 12:00. Commander, please enjoy the special root vegetable curry♪ It's main point is the combination of the carrots, burdock, wild yam and lotus root. It's also good for your health.
355.H1300: It's 13:00. Commander, the special root vegetable curry was surprisingly delicious wasn't it? It's also good for the bowels. I'll make it again next time.
355.H1400: It's 14:00. Commander...? Ah, the escort and relief of the special aircraft carrier? ...yeah... but, I believe that somewhere in this ocean, we'll meet again.
355.H1500: 15:0-...Ah, Kaga! On that occasion...Oh, no, I'm sorry. U-Um... Ah, yes! Thank you very much! I'll work hard!
355.H1600: 16:00. It's right, I couldn't protect... yes, Nisshin too... But... But! I believe... that we'll meet again. Yes!
355.H1700: Ah... Sorry Commander, I was stuck admiring the sunset. The current time is 17:00.
355.H1800: It's 18:00. Commander, what will you have for dinner? Is it alright if I do it again...Eh? Sendai will...with Me and Arashi? *groan*
355.H1900: 19:00. Excuse me Admiral. DesDiv4 along with the light cruiser Sendai will sortie in a transport mission. Um, I'm sorry it is little, but I left some rice balls for you. If you want them.
355.H2000: 20:00. Sendai, Shigure, Kawakaze, DesDiv4's Arashi and Hagikaze are attached to the navigation order. At the local, it'll become a nighttime breakthrough...
355.H2100: 21:00. This night... I have a bad, bad feeling... Everyone, be careful! Eh? Shigure, what is it? Eh!? Enemies!? An ambush!?
355.H2200: It's... 22:...00. Somehow... somehow we survived this night. Shigure, Kawakaze, thank you. Nights are...scary after all.
355.H2300: It's 23:00. Admiral. Hagikaze, DesDiv4, have safely returned. ...Ah, you ate the rice balls didn't you? Again... I'll make them again, ok?

122.Intro: Hello~! Kagerou-class destroyer, Maikaze! I'm not good in gloomy atmospheres!
122.Library: Kagerou-class destroyer Maikaze! From Midway to the Southern Operations, I continued to dance across the battlefield. I'm good friends with Nowaki, a fellow Kagerou-class. When Truk Island was attacked, I almost made it.
122.Poke(1): Go~od morning! Wait, what time is it? Ah, I't doesn't m~atter!
122.Poke(3): O~h, the admiral's in high spirits? Why don't we have a dance~?
122.Married: Admiral~ come and dance with me~!
122.Wedding: This is something I can only say to you, Admiral... truthfully, I can't help being scared... so I distract myself by dancing... But, with the admiral by my side, everything is alright... can I stay close to you some more...?
122.Equip(1): You know, I'm getting too strong!
122.Equip(2): Remodeled ships are hu~ge!... just kidding.
122.Supply: I can dance some more now!
122.Docking(2): I danced too much~... Thanks for the full-body massage~
122.Return: My elite fleet has come back to port~!
122.Battle: Okay! Let's have a magnificent dance!
122.Yasen(1): Right there, a big jump and turn!
122.MVP: Admiral!... will you dance with me the next time too?
122.Damaged(2): No... I can't dance well now...
122.Damaged(3): This... If I dance, you'll see it!
122.Sunk: Where's... Nowaki? Help me~. I hate it... I hate sinking!
122.H0200: 2 A.M, huh~. About time to sleep, yeah?
122.H0300: It's 3 A.M. Your skin's going to get bad, probably~
122.H0400: 4 A.M, Admiral~ It's almost really morning, you know~
122.H0600: It's Morning! It's 6 A.M.! Admiral, let's prepare breakfast, okay?
122.H0800: It's now 8 A.M! Let's do our best today too!
122.H0900: 9 o'clock. Maikaze wants to dance soo~n.
122.H1000: It's 10 A.M. It's a nice wind, yes?
122.H1100: It's 11 A.M! I've been getting hungry~ maybe~....
122.H1300: It's 1 P.M. You have to move after eating, come on, a-one-two!
122.H1600: It's 4 P.M. Just about evening, right?
122.H1800: It's 6 P.M! What should be do for dinner? I think that something like cutlet would be great~!
122.H1900: It's 7 P.M! Admiral, it's Dinner time! Work, Kancolle, take a break!
122.H2100: Maikaze's 9 P.M. announcement. It's almost night battle time!
122.H2200: 10 P.M! Night-dancing time. Going to a night battle?
122.H2300: It's now 11 P.M.~. Admiral, it's okay to take a break soon, yeah?
122.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the coming year, Admiral. Let's dance together again this year! Okay?
122.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, huh... Alright~ I'll be the demon then! One-two, one-two~♪ Fufu, you can't hit me~♪
122.2@Valentines: Here, Admiral! You'll have some of my chocolate, won't you? Here, it's for you. Have some, have some!
122.2@Anniversary: Admiral, today is a nice, important day. Dance with Maikaze~ Now, one, two~
122.2@Rainy: It's the rainy season. *sigh*... Nowacchi, want to dance on a day like this? Eh? No because it's too cramped? How petty!
122.2@EarlySummer: Summer is almost here, huh, Admiral? What dance steps should I use for summer? Hmm... what style do I use... Admiral, what do you think?
122.2@Summer: Summer has arrived~. Alright, one, two...! Ah, Katori! Shall we dance together again?
122.2@Fall: Nowacchi, Nowacchi! It's fall. Fall means delicious potatoes. Ah, but you gotta watch your weight!
122.2@Xmas: Admiral, it's Christmas! Christmas! Let's dance, shall we? One-two, one-two♪ Ahaha!
122.2@Spring: Alright! It's spring! Admiral, let's dance! Come on, let's do it under the cherry trees! 1, 2, 1, 2!
122.2@WhiteDay: Ah, you are giving this to Maikaze? Thank you Admiral! I'm very happy~ Come on, let's dance!
122.2@Saury2017: Ehe~! I can go saury fishing while dancing! Here I go, one, two... Light the stage lights please.

132.Intro: Akigumo, reporting for duty~ Look after me Admiral~
132.Library: Yokosuka born and raised, I'm Akigumo! I'm in the the Kagerou-class, but my (overwhelming) cruising range caught the eye of Adm. Nagumo and so I joined the 1st CarDiv. I mean, I always thought I was a Yuugumo-class... (even our uniforms are the same)... *grumble, mutter*... ah, whatever. After that, I was assigned to guard the 5th CarDiv. I didn't get to finish drawing Shoukaku and Zuikaku, though...
132.Poke(2): What what? Sexual harrasment? Is that okay?
132.Poke(3): Hmmh~mm. If you want to play with me that much, then why don't I sketch you? If you look at it this way, you can see the artistic sensibilities! Hmmh~mm♪
132.Idle: Waaaa! That's it! It's almost the submission deadline, isn't it! I can't just sit around!
132.Married: Admiral, are you beat? Well then, Akigumo will draw a picture of you♪
132.Wedding: At last the admiral has been caught by my charm~? Ju~st kidding! But I wonder what kind of picture the future of me and the admiral would be… Should I seriously try drawing a thin book? Wouldn't it be great?
132.Ranking: A report has arrived for the admiral. Hmm, gonna read it?
132.Equip(2): Mmm, yeah, equipment is important, you know.
132.Docking(1): Even Akigumo needs some repairs, yeah? I'll draw an illustration in the bath~
132.Docking(2): Going for a long bath~. Geez, those guys~ After I'm fixed, I'll return it twice over!
132.Construction: A new shipdaughter~ Admiral likes them too, yeah?
132.Return: The fleet has come back. Good work!
132.Sortie: You wanna order one of my illustrations?
132.Battle: All of you who are waiting, welcome!
132.Attack: Battleship class... I wanna beat them up~
132.Yasen(1): The night's so dark that I can't draw very well, you know~ Let's fire up the searchlights!
132.Yasen(2): Makigumo, look, look! Attacking is like th~is, yeah?
132.MVP: Lo~ok, I can do things that even battleships and heavy cruisers can't, you know. Oh, do you have a sketchbook?
132.Damaged(1): Woah! A hit like this won't penetrate me!
132.Damaged(3): I won't able to draw like this~!
132.Sunk: Hey, my resting place... will anybody sketch it out...
132.H0000: It's 0 o'clock. Are you okay? You ain't spacing out?
132.H0100: 1 at night, looks like you're still going, yeah?
132.H0200: It's 2 o'clock, I'm a night owl too, so it's fine~ I'll stay with you while I write out a manuscript!
132.H0300: It's 3 o'clock, but... are you alright? Will you be okay at your job tomorrow?
132.H0400: It's 4 A.M. At resting times you rest! At drawing times you draw! That's what the great circles do, yeah?
132.H0500: 5 A.M... And that's why I sleep from morning to mid~day...Zzz
132.H0600: It's finally 6 in the Morning, huh.... Admiral~ I'm gonna borrow a futon~ G'night~
132.H0700: 7o'clock... As I feared, it's bright so I can't sleep... What ever will I do...
132.H0800: 8 o'clock. I'll be able to do a manuscript 'cause I ate breakfast... Admiral, bread or rice in the morning, what kinda guy are you?
132.H0900: 9 o'clock, huh... a~nyway, flipping around the front cover and submit first and then off for training!
132.H1000: It's now 10 o'clock~ Are you making progress on your work, Admiral?
132.H1100: 11. With that said, Admiral, what kind of girl do you like the most?
132.H1200: Lunch~! When this time comes around, it's UkiUkiWatching time!... Ah, d-don't mind me...
132.H1300: 1 P.M... 'Lunch time' somehow sounds fun, yeah?... What'cha eating?
132.H1400: 2 P.M... Well, let's do the afternoon sortie!
132.H1500: 3 P.M! Admiral Ranks, check 'em! It'd be great if it's gone up, yes?
132.H1600: 4 P.M. Almost time for the sun to go down... If it gets dark, you can't really draw, you know?
132.H1700: 5 P.M. Hah-... Even though I'm, always fighting, I somehow really want to draw a carrier sinking... Why?
132.H1800: 6 P.M... I'm hungry~ I wanna eat canned beef, yeah, canned beef... Admiral, open up a can, will ya?
132.H1900: 7 P.M. Yeah, canned beef with silver chalis is great!
132.H2000: 8 P.M... For this evening's performance, of course the searchlight will be lit!
132.H2100: 9 P.M. Makigumo's 'Sleep, Sleep!' is so annoying~. Why does she do it?
132.H2200: 10 P.M. I'm tired, so I just be borrowing a futon~ Getting in with me is for.bid.den!
132.H2300: 11 P.M. Just a moment's sleep! Zzzz~... This is just practice, one more time.... Admiral, you too.. go sleep!
132.2@NewYears: Admiral! Happy New Year! Akigumo-san is relying on you again this year! Alright... it's time for the first illustration of the year! Admiral, don't move, don't move!
132.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, huh~? A ship girl who is eating ehoumaki is such a picturesque thing. Alright! Let's try drawing them. Kumano-san, then~ Hm, hm... Uh? E-Ehhhh!?
132.2@Hina: Ohhh! A Hina stand, huh? Nice! We're making progress! If everyone in the Kagerou-class were Hina Dolls... No, let's not. That's way too painful. Well, whatever! It's all good, right?
132.2@Anniversary3: Admiral. It's the third anniversary, congrats! For such an occassion, Akigumo will draw an illustration!
132.2@Rainy: The rainy season is so boring... eh? What? So everyone is making teru teru bozu? Then I'll make some from scratch. Now, for the paint...
132.2@EarlySummer: Hoho, it's almost summer. What's everyone up to? Getting their swimsuits ready? I have to prepare! Time to stock up on drawing materials at the base exchange, hehe!
132.2@Summer: Ah, that pose is good. That angle... don't move... Oh, right there works♪ Just a minute, I'll take a reference picture... uhhyoyo~♪ It's here— summer!
132.2@Fall: Fall has come around, huuuh? Oh well. The time between summer and winter is short, so you'd better be ready! But I guess fall is an easy time to let your guard doooown♪ I'll have a potato.
132.2@Saury: Saury fishing support fleet, huuuh. How moving of us... except not at all... Ah, that's Yuubari-san. That's awesome— the way she yells as she loads her gun... ...Rough cut.
132.2@Xmas: *nom* Admiral, this turkey is good! It tastes so good! It's insane how good this is turkey is! Eh? Zuikaku-san, what's up? From above!? W-Woah! Evasive action!
132.2@YearsEnd: Eh, what? Why do I have to help with the Yuugumo-class' cleaning? Eh, what's with this cloth? I'm telling you! I need to sleep early to wake up in time to get to Ariake!
132.2@Spring: So it's spring... everyone's in high spirit, but it's not quite the likable season, is it~ Hm? What's that? The flower viewing of all flower viewing? ...Can't be helped, I'll go along.
132.2@WhiteDay: Eh? What, Admiral? This is for me? This is bad~ I wasn't prepared for this at all! Uwah, I was caught with my guards down! It's delicious! Good senses. It's quite something!
132.3@LateFall2018: It's cold... Too cold! I don't wanna do anything! I'm gonna sleep under the kotatsu. Hey! Tama, Kuma! You're in the way! Ah, jeez, even the battleships! There's no room for me!
132.4@Xmas2018: Oh no, I'm not going to make it. I can't make the deadline for the early bird discount. Now that it's come to this, I'll have to ask a favour from my acquaintance's printing company... They're not picking up the phone!
132.2@Valentines2019: Fufun! Admiral, I have some chocolate for you. Also, here's a drawing I put my all into. Please use it to decorate your room. You better put it up!

133.Intro: First ship of the Yuugumo-class, Yuugumo, has arrived. Admiral, it's okay to spoil me a bit.
133.Library: First ship of the final mass-production destroyers. Laid down in Maizuru. My first battle was the ignominious defeat at Midway. It's okay, I don't mind. In the Tokyo Express to that island, Operation Ke, the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands and the evacuation of Kiska, I fought bravely, no? *sigh*
133.Poke(2): Admiral, let's do our best together.
133.Poke(3): Yes yes what is it~? Admiral, Makigumo, you're so fond of skinship, no?
133.Idle: Aren't you tired Admiral? Yuugumo is quite worried you know...
133.Married: Admiral~ is it not a good time to take a quick break?
133.Wedding: Ah, Admiral~, your hat is askance again. You're the commander of such a big fleet, please do look the part. Just how much do I have to look after you… eh? It's fine to keep on doing it? Well, that's・just・lovely♡
133.Ranking: A report from headquarters. Please examine it.
133.Join: Destroyer Yuugumo, going with full force!
133.Equip(1): Many thanks, I will use it well.
133.Equip(2): Yuugumo is being remodeled. No peeping.
133.Docking(2): Sorry, I might have to be in the bath for a while. I've been a bit exhausted lately.
133.Construction: A new ship has been launched, no?
133.Return: The fleet has returned from the operation.
133.Yasen(1): Mi~ss Makigumo, If you are talking about a night battle, this is how you do it!
133.Yasen(2): I say this gonna be quite interesting.
133.MVP: Admiral, choosing me was a good idea, yes?
133.Damaged(1): Ah... Armour, I don't really have any, yes?
133.Damaged(2): Kya! This level... I can still go on!
133.Damaged(3): Kyaaaa! Now you've really done it.... I-I'll return this twice over!
133.Sunk: Oh... I'm sinking too, no? Admiral... thanks for everything... up to now... See you... later...
133.H0100: It's 1 A.M... Zzz... Oh, please excuse me.
133.H0200: It is now 2 A.M. You have to go to sleep, yes?
133.H0300: It's 3 A.M. I just can't leave the admiral by himself...
133.H0400: 4 A.M. A visitor at this time?
133.H0500: 5 A.M. I wondered who it was, Mi~ss Makigumo. I wasn't there so you came to look for me, yes?
133.H0600: 6 A.M. Miss Makigumo.... t-this... I was with the admiral all night... planning battle strategy...
133.H0700: 7 A.M. Well then Admiral, I'll be heading back with Miss Makigumo to our room.
133.H0800: 8 A.M.... Once again, it's Yuugumo. Explaining to Miss Makigumo and getting her to understand was difficult.
133.H0900: 9 A.M. Admiral, shall we check the rankings? Let us put in a fun comment!
133.H1000: 10 A.M. The first fleet's name, shall we change it?
133.H1100: 11 A.M. I thought it was an interesting name, but I wonder why the admins checked it? What a bother.
133.H1200: 12 midday. Treating Yuugumo is okay, no?
133.H1300: 1 P.M. hmm~ After eating, I get tired, no? Wait, Yuugumo didn't sleep yesterday!
133.H1400: It's 2 P.M. Are you really not tired? I have heard that a midday nap is good for mental activity, no?
133.H1500: 3 P.M. Admiral, the new rankings have been released, no? Let us have a look.
133.H1600: 4 P.M, the sun has set a bit, no?
133.H1700: 5 P.M. I wonder who today's best shipdaughter is? Naturally, it's Yuugumo, yes?
133.H1800: 6 P.M. Dinner with just the two of us, I'm looking forward to it.
133.H1900: 7 P.M. Tonight's dinner will be made by Yuugumo!
133.H2000: 8 P.M. Admiral, was it tasty? Was it?
133.H2100: It's 9 P.M. Ah, Miss Makigumo is watching from the gap. Sorry Admiral, I'll be heading back now.
133.H2200: 10 P.M. Would it not be amicable to have a bath soon?
133.H2300: 11 P.M. hmm? Admiral, let us retire early today.
133.2@NewYears: Have a Happy New Year, Admiral. On behalf of all the Yuugumo-class destroyers, I'm here to wish you well for the new year. Okay, let's have some New Year's sake.
133.2@Setsubun: It's the Setsubun of all Setsubuns. The Yuugumo-class' demon for this year is... Oh? Me? Ufufu♪ That's fine. Okay everyone, start throwing.
133.2@Valentines: Ufufu. There, it's done! My special, super love chocolate. Now, how am I going to hand it over? Hmmm, I'll have to think about that~.
133.2@Hina: Ufufu. Admiral, these Hina dolls are rather cute. Maybe Makigumo, Kazagumo and I could be the three mainstay of mainstay court ladies... Admiral, wouldn't that suit us? Oh...?
133.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, it seems to be the third anniversary. Ufufu. Admiral, let's do our best from here on!
133.2@Rainy: Oh, my. Hehehe... Makigumo-san, what kind of teru teru bozu is that? It looks a bit too unique. Let me borrow that. There. Now it looks cute, doesn't it?
133.2@Summer: Hey now, Akigumo-san. Please stop. Geez... don't scrutinize me so intently. I'm begging you, ok?
133.2@Fall: It's fall. At this time of year, I'd rather not go to the south. Kazagumo-san and Isokaze-san, you two are always so lively.
133.2@Saury: Ufufu♪ As for the support of the fishermen, leave it to me. That sort of thing is my specialty. Come, Akigumo-san. Don't just draw pictures— do your job, too.
133.2@Xmas: Admiral, please have a drink. Today is Christmas. On a day like this, it's fine to loosen up a bit. I won't get angry, you know? Fufu♪ It can't be helped...
133.2@YearsEnd: Now, everyone in the Yuugumo-class, it's cleaning season. It's now time to show what the mainstay of mainstays can do. Alright, now get your dust cloth from Makigumo-san.
133.2@Spring: Nfufu! It'll be spring soon. A good season has come by. Let's go for the flower viewing of all flower viewing with the Yuugumo-class.
133.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, this is for Yuugumo? A bit off the whole, I guess? Ufufu. Thank you, I'll accept it.
133.2@EarlySummer: Uwaa, It's gotten a bit hotter right?  Eh? Change into Type 4 summer equipment? That's right, it's the season for that, isn't it.
133.3@LateFall2018: Oh, Admiral, what's the matter? You look frozen. Are you feeling cold? Ehe, it can't be helped then. You can cuddle with me a bit more. How's that?

542.Intro: 1st ship of the Remodelled Yuugumo-class, Yuugumo, arriving on station. It's fine to leave everything to me, Admiral.
542.Join: I'm going to set out at full force, Admiral. Destroyer Division 10, weigh anchor!
542.Attack: Enemy fleet spotted. Ready for combat! Alright, all ships, charge!
542.MVP: Aren't you glad that you picked me, Admiral? Of course, there's nothing to regret. You can always depend on me.

134.Intro: Yuugumo-class destroyer, I am Makigumo. Following Yuugumo-neesan's example, I'll do my best!
134.Library: I'm Makigumo, second ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers. While cleaning up after the Hornet, 'situation permitting, tow and capture it'... they said, but that was pretty much impossible... and now Akigumo's pointing and laughing at me. Seriously, what the heck?
134.Poke(1): Commander-sama~. Makigumo always has perfect posture. Hey~? My clothes are too big~
134.Poke(3): Hawawawawa, nobody but Yuugumo-neesan is allowed to touch me~!
134.Idle: ...I'm always looking at Commander-sama from the screen.
134.Married: Commander-sama, do your be~st! Makigumo will too!
134.Wedding: Commander-sama, thank you very much for letting me take my time today. Makigumo too, has to graduate from Yuugumo-neesan some time. Is that okay?
134.Join: It's Makigumo's turn, I'll do my best!
134.Equip(1): Hmmhmmm! My new armament, how is it?
134.Docking(2): Makigumo, you can really see her damage... I'll have to work harder!
134.Construction: A new friend has been born!
134.Attack: Heyaaa~ Right in the middle, I'll hit it!
134.Yasen(2): More than scuttling, I want to shoot at the enemy!
134.Damaged(1): Fuyaaa, a hit on the stern!
134.Damaged(2): Fuwaaaaan, even though I thought I could do it today~!
134.Damaged(3): Hawawawawa, turning on the searchlight at a time like this! Akigumo, you idiot!
134.Sunk: Yuugumo-neesan, I can't move anymore, please leave me. My final selfish request... the one to scuttle me, should be you...
134.H0100: Hawawawa, how is it 1 in the morning~!
134.H0200: 2 in the morning.... This is Makigumo's limit...
134.H0300: 3 A.M. Commander-sama, KanColle isn't going anywhere, so let's just sleep~...
134.H0600: S... s... Si... wa! Sorry, I wasn't sleeping~
134.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. Look after me today, too! *salute*
134.H1000: It's now 10 o'clock~. I wonder what kind of person will be your practice buddy today?
134.H1100: It's 11 o'clock. What will Commander-sama's lunch be today?
134.H1200: 12 o'clock. On such a fine day, having lunch on deck is nice too~
134.H1300: 1 P.M. To just daydream with Commander-sama like this, it's somehow relaxing~...
134.H1400: 2 P.M. Commander-sama~ Let's do special training; special training!
134.H1500: 3 P.M. Ah, I forgot! I was invited to Kongou's tea party~!
134.H1600: 4 P.M. Ah, being with Commander-sama is nice... even if I don't go to the tea party...
134.H1700: It's 5 in the eve~ning. The sun has dissapeared~
134.H1900: 7 at night. Commander-sama, I desire dinner!
134.H2000: It's 8 at night. Hey~ Hey~ Commander-sama, is it okay to take a bath?
134.H2100: It's 9 o'clock~. I'll head into the bath first. Oh~? Glasses, glasses~
134.H2200: It's 10 at night. Commander-sama, how are you doing?
134.H2300: 11 o'clock~. Commander-sama~, Makigumo, is all sleepy~...
134.2@NewYears: Commander-sama, have a Happy New Year~! I'll do my best again this year! Along with Yuugumo nee-san, we're counting on you again this year~!
134.2@Setsubun: It's Setsubun, isn't it? This year's demon is...? Huh? Yuugumo nee-san!? U-Umm, hey... Kazagumo, why don't you take her place? Ah...! She already has her mask on? Ehh? Uuuu...
134.2@Hina: Wow~! Cute Hina Dolls! Me, and... Yuugumo-neesama, and... Kazagumo, and... Akigumo, too... we can be the three court ladies! Huh? That's one too many? Oh, never mind! The four court ladies!
134.2@Anniversary3: Admiral-sama, congratulations... to you. It's the third anniversary for the KanColle. Makigumo feels proud. I'll do my best from here on!
134.2@Rainy: It's doing nothing but raining. Let's change the mood by making teru teru bozu. This one is going to be like Yuugumo nee-san! So I do this, and... this! Eh, or is it like this? Huh??
134.2@Summer: Akigumo? Why did you bring something like that to the beach? Geez~ don't make sketches in a place like this! Geez~ ...ah, hey, don't draw Yuugumo Nee-san!
134.2@Fall: It's fall, huh~? The time for baked sweet potatoes! Akigumo, what's with all that scrap paper? You're gonna burn it? Okay, let's bake some potatoes! I'll go and gather some dried leaves!
134.2@Saury: Yuugumo nee-san, we're protecting and supporting fisherman-san? Just leave it to me! This kind of thing is my specialty! I'll do my best! Hey, hey, hoooo!
134.2@Xmas: Commander-sama, Merry Christmas to you~! I've cut a piece of cake for you here. ...Ah, Kazagumo, this is so good! Give it a try, okay?
134.2@YearsEnd: Ahh! So busy! It's cleaning season! Everyone, I have some dust cloths ready for you. Take one cloth per person, please~! Ah, ah, ah, it's one per person!
134.2@Spring: Waa~ it's spring~ The execution of the Yuugumo-class' the flower viewing of all flower viewing, roger! Let's have Irako-san helps in preparing the flowering viewing bentō. Kazagumo, give me a hand.
134.2@WhiteDay: Eh? Commander, is it alright for me to take these? Hawawawaa, I'm sorry! Excuse me! Next year- next year I'll give my very best, for sure!
134.2@EarlySummer: Yuugumo-nee-chan, by "Type 4 Summer equipment"... do you mean swimsuits?... What should I do?  Jeez.
134.2@Valentines2019: I'll make some chocolates. Let's see, first I need some for Yuugumo-neesan, and Kazagumo too... I better make one for Akigumo too... and a share for the Admiral! I'll work hard!

563.Intro: 2nd ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Makigumo, reporting for duty. I'll do my best to follow Yuugumo-neesan's example!
563.Poke(1): That's strange, I'm sure the uniform size was right. So strange... Mmm... Right?
563.Wedding: Commander, I think it's about time I swap my glasses for contacts right? I just heard about them. What do you think? ...Eh, I'm fine the way I am? Really? Alriiight! Then, I'll stay just the way I am alright? Hehe, hehehehe!
563.H2200: It's 10pm. Commander... Hu-huh? That light... Hey, Akigumo you idiot! Turn. Off. The. Searchlight!

453.Intro: Third ship of the Yuugumo class destroyers, Kazagumo. So you're the admiral. Roger. Well then, your orders!
453.Library: Fleet type destroyer, Yuugumo class, Kazagumo. Regards. From Midway to Solomon, I advanced around the main battlefields. On that fateful night, I looked upon the burning aircraft carrier. I'll never forget the dragon's last moments.
453.Poke(2): I'm Kazagumo. Not "Fuu'un". Understand? Then, it's fine.
453.Poke(3): What is it, Admiral? I don't need extra outfitting. Eh, that's not it? Eh?
453.Idle: Hey? What is my next mission...? Huh, even though you're that busy... Admiral, I... Ahh... It is okay? Take it easy once in a while? Okay...
453.Married: What is it? Get it together. If you're not well, I won't be able to do my best either.
453.Wedding: What? Calling me to a place like this, Admiral, do you have a new task or something? Eh...! The new task is... meaning, this... put it on... eh...! Me?
453.Join: Yuugumo-class destroyer, Kazagumo, setting out. Ok? Fleet, sortie!
453.Equip(2): What? Torpedoes? It would be nice if they didn't blow up.
453.Supply: Thanks for the supplies, Admiral. I'll head out again.
453.Docking(2): Ahh, geez. I can't fight like this! I'm going to hop in the bath for a bit, so don't peek!
453.Construction: Admiral, a new ship has come. Yeah!
453.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned. Good work, everyone.
453.Sortie: 10th DesDiv, sortie! This Kazagumo will take the role of the flagship. Advance!
453.Battle: I found you! Fleet, prepare for battle, let's do this. Okay?
453.Attack: Aim towards the enemy on the starboard side. Begin firing!
453.Yasen(1): Night... huh. Hiryuu-san... All ships, sortie! We'll annihilate the enemy in the night battle!
453.Yasen(2): Not bad, I'm returning it! There!
453.MVP: Eh, I... this Kazagumo's battle results... Well, it doesn't... feel bad... I guess!
453.Damaged(2): Mo~u. It hurts! But this won't...!
453.Damaged(3): Ehh. They got me. No~, don't explode!
453.Sunk: N... Not yet, I'm going to go ahead. I'm... still, going. Still... still...
453.2@NewYears: Admiral, Happy New Year! The 10th Squadron and I will be counting on you again this year. Alright, let's go!
453.2@LateWinter: Uuu... it's so cold lately... I'm not so good with winter. I wonder where my coat is... Admiral, aren't you listening?
453.2@Setsubun: Setsubun, huh...? Akigumo, are you drawing a demon's face? It's pretty good... Wait... is that... me!? What for!?
453.2@Valentines: Admiral! Um... that is... here, it's for you! Ah, it's fine to open it later. It's fine!
453.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, it's the third anniversary? Why didn't you tell me earlier? I haven't prepared anything to celebrate it! Geez~!
453.2@Rainy: I'm not fond of this season. For some reason, it makes me feel gloomy deep inside. I wonder why?
453.2@EarlySummer: It's getting so hot. I wonder what the rest of DesDiv 10 will do with their swimsuits this year. What should I do?
453.3@EarlySummer: I bought one. It's a bit embarrassing, but since it's summer, it's okay, right? Ah, Akigumo, what are you drawing!? Let me see! Hey!
453.2@Fall: It's gotten a bit chilly, hasn't it? Fall, huh? Potato. I wanna have a baked sweet potato. Right, Akigumo?
453.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas, Admiral! This is fun! Can I drink a little bit of sake today? Ah... I can't?
453.2@YearsEnd: The Tenth Division's on cleaning duty? Roger! I'll be leading the sweeping division! Akigumo? Ah... she ran away...
453.2@Spring: I like spring, you know! Somehow, I'm fond of this drifty kind of good feeling! Admiral, do you... hate spring? That so? Then that's fine, ufufu~
453.2@WhiteDay: Eh? You are giving me these? Wow... T-thanks. You sure? I'm not giving it back, you know?
453.2@Anniversary2018: Oh no, isn't today an anniversary, Admiral? Tell me that sooner! I haven't done anything yet!
453.2@Saury2018: Yuugumo, Makigumo, roger that. I'll do my best to prepare to participate in the Naval Base Saury Festival!
453.3@Anniversary2019: Admiral, is it the 6th Anniversary? Tell me that earlier. I haven't made any preparations for celebrating... Ngh, jeez, you need to let me know!

349.Friend43(1): The 10th Destroyer Divison has arrived! Akigumo, ready? Yuugumo-nee, Makigumo-nee, let's do this!
349.H0000: I, Kazagumo will be in charge for today's hourly notification duty! ...What's with that face? Are you saying that you have a problem with it!?
349.H0100: Ah, really? Then it's okay... Admiral! It's now precisely 0100!
349.H0200: It's 0200. Hmm... And that's that♪ It's not a problem right?
349.H0300: It's 0300, admiral. What? Something about my sister? Yuugumo...? What, You like her!?
349.H0400: Admiral, it's 0400. Not her? Okay then... Eh, is it about my other sister, Makigumo?
349.H0500: It is 0500. Oh really? It's not her either. Okay then... Then who are you referring to?
349.H0600: Your story makes no sense that I forgot it's already morning, admiral. It's 0600.
349.H0700: It's 0700, admiral. I'll be making breakfast right away. It's OK, leave it to me. I'm surprisingly... Ow! I-I'm okay!
349.H0800: Admiral, It's 0800. Sorry for taking it so long, but breakfast is ready. Have some! There's even seconds!
349.H0900: It's 0900, admiral. What, my finger? Oh don't worry, it's not so bad! First aid box, you say? Oh for pete's sake, you're over-exaggerating it, Admiral!
349.H1000: Admiral, it's 1000. It's this late already? Uhh... The sallying fleet and... Ah, the expedition... W-wait...
349.H1100: It's 1100, Admiral. It's almost noon. What's our plan for lunch? Is it at Mamiya's?
349.H1200: *Nom nom nom* Admiral, it's 1200. *nom nom* Nothing like a curry at Mamiya's for lunch, eh? It's delicious! *nom nom*
349.H1300: Admiral It's 1300-hmm? Akigumo? What's up? Model for your rough sketch? No! Go find someone else!
349.H1400: It's 1400, Admiral. Phew... Akigumo finally leaves. She's quite the pestering one...
349.H1500: Admiral. It's 1500. Akigumo? Ah, She's not really that bad. Rather she is... No, I mean... a bit of a bother.
349.H1600: Admiral, It's 16... Ah, Shoukaku, Good work for today! Zuikaku? No, I don't think she went here...
349.H1700: It's 1700, Admiral. The sunset sure is pretty... Let's go back inside.
349.H1800: Admiral, 1800. Today's I'll be making dinner... Eh? I'm not doing this out of desperation, I really want to do it. Honest!
349.H1900: 1900. The admiral ended up making dinner in the end... Down the hatch. Oh, it's delicious! Eh, this one too! But why?
349.H2000: 2000. So you can cook, Admiral. Very good in fact. Where did you learn it? Eh, during your academy years? I see...
349.H2100: Admiral, it's 2100. Sendai? No, the new squadron 10 was under Yahagi as flagship. I greeted her the other day. Hehehe.
349.H2200: It's 2200, Admiral. Today was quite a day. Thanks for that. Me? I'm fine. I actually worked hard as part of the Squadron 10, you know.
349.H2300: Admiral, it's 2300. Here, have some tea. Eh? I can do something as easy as serving a tea! What do you expect? Geez... Good night!

564.Intro: I'm the remodelled Yuugumo-class destroyer, Kazagumo. Admiral, what's wrong? You're not looking very well, are you? It'll be fine, I'll be right here, so let's head out together, alright?
564.Poke(2): I said it's "Kazagumo", what's with this "Fuu'un"? I'm sure you're getting it wrong on purpose. Hmm, you're not? Liar. Jeez!
564.Join: 10th Squadron, remodelled Yuugumo-class, Kazagumo, heading out! Fleet sortie! Follow me.
564.Sortie: I'll be acting as the 10th Destroyer Division's flagship. We're weighing anchor. Everyone, follow me!
564.Attack: I'll have to show you what I'm made of. Target the guns at the enemy ships to port. Battle stations! Fire!
564.Yasen(1): The moon... Hiryuu... No, I'm fine. All ships, charge. We'll crush the enemy in this night battle!

135.Intro: I'm Naganami, the fourth ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers. And off we go. Yeah!
135.Library: I'm Naganami, the fourth ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, built and launched during wartime under the maru-4 project. I rampaged all over as a member of the proud Second Torpedo Squadron. At Guadalcanal, we gave an enemy ambush a beat down under the famous command of Rear Admiral Raizo Tanaka.
135.Poke(1): What? Admiral Tanaka? He's the real deal, isn't he? Great at battle and bad at politics—so cool!
135.Poke(2): What, you touchin' me again? ...What? You wanna load fuel drums? ...Hmph. But leave the torpedoes, would you.
135.Poke(3): I've seen a lot of excellent admirals in my time... There isn't a single one that touches so much...
135.Idle: Hmm, if you're not going to sortie, how about a nap? The night's long.
135.Married: Aa~, of course I get you, Admiral. How lovely~
135.Wedding: What is it? With that glum face and all.If you keep acting that way, it'll spread to the entire fleet, you know. Well, I'll lend this Naganami's chest to you here. Now, spit out your problems. Now, in a big voice! Eh? I-it's that!? Well, that's fine too, I guess...
135.Ranking: Here a report to ya, Admiral. So, how 'bout it?
135.Join: Now, let's go do a replay of Savo!
135.Equip(1): No, no! I'm okay, I can switch equipment by myself!
135.Equip(2): This Naganami is just gonna get stronger, ya know.
135.Supply: Resupply is the basics of all.
135.Docking(2): I really wanna fight more, but I gotta go wash up. Sorry!
135.Construction: A fresh n' lively fleet girl, up and ready!
135.Return: A fleet's returned! Let's go greet 'em!
135.Sortie: Not bad, gotta love the rag-tag fleets!
135.Battle: All ships, follow me! We're charging in!
135.Attack: Ugh, don't let your guard down in a shoot-out!
135.Yasen(1): All right, drop the gas drums, battle stations!
135.Yasen(2): Let them cut our clothes, and we break their bones!
135.MVP: On par with Admiral Tanaka's very own command. That was awesome, Admiral. We can do this!
135.Damaged(3): Ahh! Ah, what an embarrassment... Don't you forget this! We're comin' back for you!
135.Sunk: I guess this is it... My proud days with the Second Torpedo Squadron... I'll never... forget...
135.Repair: Nice~ I love those kinds of things. Mm, mm!
135.H0000: It's 0 o'clock. Hey, someone's here... Oh, Nenohi... What, you wanna say that it's ne-no-shoukoku?
135.H0100: 1 AM. Hey, is it okay if I watch some late night shows?
135.H0200: 2 AM, huh... You're working hard, Admiral... That's good!
135.H0300: 3 AM. Hey, you were dozing off just now.
135.H0400: It's 4 AM. Give up and go to bed already!
135.H0500: 5 AM. The city's getting ready right about now.
135.H0600: It's 6 AM... Yup, it's totally morning.
135.H0700: 7 AM. Let's grab some grub, and make operational plans the day ahead, huh?
135.H0800: 8 AM. The docks are gonna get busy this time around.
135.H0900: 9 AM, huh... Shall we head out with a full-on roster?
135.H1000: 10 AM. Having something to eat now? ...Huh. So it's called a "brunch"? That's kinda cool.
135.H1100: 11 AM. And here comes Nenohi again... What is it this time?
135.H1200: Noon. Nenohi told me that this gozen (AM) and gogo (PM) thing is coming from the term, "hour of the horse".
135.H1300: 1 PM. Nenohi went back with a smile... I guess she wanted to do the hourly report thing.
135.H1400: 2 PM. Yuugumo came by just now. Brought us something to snack on. She's always the caring one.
135.H1500: 3 PM. The Kongou's are having a party over there! Not sure why, but they're crazy, aren't they!
135.H1600: 4 PM. How was the ranking, huh?
135.H1700: 5 PM. Once you've seen the rankings, why don't you change the comments too? I mean, they do say to treasure every meeting since it's once in a lifetime... Or uh... that might be different.
135.H1800: 6 PM. I kinda feel like having fried rice.
135.H1900: 7 PM. Whoa! Admiral, you're amazin' at making fried rice! Thanks!
135.H2000: 8 PM. Someone's getting restless... Oh, it's Sendai. Looks like she's just doing her thing.
135.H2100: 9 PM. All right, now let's get serious!
135.H2200: It's 10 PM. Girl's talk? ...Well, other than the other Yuugumo-classes, I guess I get along with Shimakaze and Yukikaze.
135.H2300: It's 11 PM. I wish we could get the Second Torpedo Squadron together again.
135.2@NewYears: I'm thankful. We're celebrating another new year. Right, Shimakaze? Oh, she's gone. Well, whatever. Admiral, I'm counting on you for another year. Let's do our best!
135.2@Setsubun: Ohh, it's Setsubun. 'Kay, I'll do my best! So? Who is this year's representing the Yuugumo-class' demon-san? ...Eh? Yuugumo-nee? Oh, maaan. Who's even gonna try throwing at her?
135.2@Valentines: Yeaa~ I'm not good at these kinds of things. Well, it's about communication, you know, communication. Admiral, here. It's not... very sweet.
135.2@Hina: Hm, hm, how cute! Mm. Who put this Hina stand together? Ehhhh... so I see. It's nicely arranged! And this part... Woah, the neck bent! Oh, no... gotta get it fixed.
135.2@Anniversary3: Seriously, a third anniversary! My... that's... quite amazing. Well, what's done is done. I'll just thrash around again this year, okay, Admiral!?
135.2@Rainy: Hey, what's that? Teru teru bozu? Let me borrow that, Makigumo-nee. Check this out. Ain't it cute? Eh? Why are you angry?
135.2@Fall: It's finally arrived... fall has. I don't like the fall... right, Shimakaze? Oh, you sure are energetic. It must be nice to be young. Well I'm young, too, but...
135.3@Fall: Ugh... so it's finally this time of year. I tend to watch the skies a lot... like all the time... E-Enemy aircraft!? Ah, what? It's only a Zuiun... The number of them has increased lately... those Zuiun.
135.2@Saury: Saury fishing, seriously!? Eh!? The fleet is heading out in support? Seriously!? Well, it can't be helped. It can't be helped! It's our shift, so I guess I gotta? Takanami! Bring all the searchlights you can carry!
135.2@Xmas: O-Ohhhhh... so this is that Merry Christmas thing? It's nice, and even the food is good!
135.2@YearsEnd: Right! I feel like busting though something! I'm so pumped up now! Oh, what is it Makigumo-nee? Just a dust cloth? Leave it to me! Let's go! Raaaaah!
135.2@Spring: Ah, what's this? The flower viewing of all flower viewing? Why say it twice? Aah, so it's the idea from Yuugumo-nee. Nice, let's invite that Akigumo as well. She's surprisingly a worrywart, that person.
135.2@WhiteDay: Heh? Is it okay for me to accept these? Somehow, I feel bad, Admiral. I'm fine! Next year-Next year it'll happen for sure! Maybe... but, thank you.
135.2@EarlySummer: Wheew~  What are you wearing a swimsuit for, Yuugumo-nee? Hmm, not bad.  Oh, what's that Takanami?  I don't need that. I really dont!
135.3@LateFall2018: Maan, it's gotten cold recently. Kotatsus are definitely the best. Shimakaze, Yukikaze, aren't you cold? Amazing, respect.

304.Married: Ahh~ you know your stuff, Admiral~ Lovely. This is why I can just leave it to you. Nice, just like that. It's been a while.
304.Return: I came back safe and sound again this time. It's all thanks to you!

543.Intro: The remodelled Yuugumo-class, Naganami, has arrived! I'm not the person I used to be! Now, let's get going, hooah!
543.Poke(1): Isn't this fine, a rag-tag bunch of misfits are the greatest! It fits the current me perfectly, so let's go!
543.Equip(1): That's right, give it all to me! Ah, hey, Admiral! I can do it myself, dummy.
543.Equip(2): Oi, you aren't giving me more barrels, right? It's fine, but I'd like torpedoes too, alright?
543.Return: I've returned safely again. Thanks to you, Admiral!
543.Sortie: Oh, what is it? Time for me to sortie? Alright!
543.Friend42(1): Alriiight, this is my time to shine. I'm charging in!

424.Intro: I'm the sixth of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Takanami. E-ehm, I will do my best! Really, probably!
424.Library: I'm Takanami, the sixth Yuugumo-class Destroyer. Born in Uraga.  I was assigned to the 31st Destroyer Division, and I had done my part well.  On a fateful night battle at Lunga Point, as the Leadship of the Lookouts squad, our crew first spotted the enemy fleet... and that may have brought victory to the battle... Yup!
424.Poke(2): Commander, did you call for Takanami?
424.Poke(3): Hya! U-Um, I was incredibly startled so... please approach me in a different way if possible!
424.Idle: Drum cans, Drum cans... Oh, we have them. Me? I might not be equipping those, because I'm the leading look out ship! What? What you mean by that? Um... I don't know.
424.Married: Commander, are you a little tired? Just wait a moment, Takanami will put in some Tea! Yes, it's Japanese Tea! Commander, just take a little rest!
424.Wedding: Commander, is it true that you need to talk to me? What? This box for Takanami? Am I allowed to open.. it? Wow, it's beautiful, is this for real, for reals?
424.Ranking: Commander, report time right? Yup, right away.
424.Join: Destroyer Takanami of the Yuugumo-class, going... maybe.
424.Equip(2): With this... with this I can maybe fight!
424.Supply: Maybe I'm happy... with these precious supplies.
424.Docking(1): I'm sorry, I might need the bath.
424.Docking(2): I'm sorry. Looks like my bath will take longer this time...
424.Construction: Commander, a new ally is ready to be interviewed.
424.Battle: It seems the enemy fleet has been spotted! Please follow me!
424.Attack: Maybe I have to do this...Aiming...Fire!
424.Yasen(1): Night battle...My memory is coming back...No, it won't. I can do this! I will do this! Everyone, attack!
424.MVP: Takanami was helpful? Really? Yay, maybe I'm happy... for real.
424.Damaged(2): H-Hya~... Are you ok? Can you fight?
424.Damaged(3): N-No... concentrated fire? Maybe I can still go on. Maybe I'll sink? No, don't sink!
424.Sunk: Looks like I'm getting concentrated fire again... Maybe lighting the enemy ships... was also helpful... Commander...
424.2@Setsubun: Naganami nee-sama, these beans are... Eh? You think I should throw them? E-Eii! Like this...?
424.2@Valentines: For Commander and Naganami nee-sama... I maybe made some chocolates... I wonder if they'll accept them...
424.2@Anniversary3: Commander, it's maybe the third anniversary. Congratulations! Takanami will celebrate, maybe so!
424.2@Rainy: The rainy days will continue... maybe. Still, rainy days are quiet and nice, aren't they? I... might like them.
424.2@EarlySummer: It's gotten hot, hasn't it? It will probably be summer soon. Are you maybe feeling a little hot?
424.2@Summer: It's summer, Commander. I may want to eat some red beans on ice. Mamiya-san... Ah, I'll serve it!
424.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas, maybe... to you, Commander! Here, I think I have a present for you... this!
424.2@YearsEnd: It's that time already. It's time for naval base cleaning, so I will do my very best... I think... that is. Yes!
424.2@Spring: Commander, it's spring isn't it. It might be the season of sakura... probably. Flower viewing with Naganami-neesama and the rest... wouldn't you want to join?
424.2@WhiteDay: I might have received some cookie from Naganami-neesama... Eh? Commander is also giving me these? R-really?
424.2@Anniversary2018: Today is an important day, Commander. I think I'm honoured that I can spend it with you.

345.Intro: Destroyer Takanami of the Yuugumo-class will give her best this time! Really, probably!
345.Poke(2): Commander? Maybe... did you call for Takanami?
345.Poke(3): Hya wa! U-Um, I was incredibly startled so... please aprroach me in a different way... Um... maybe it's... better.
345.Construction: Commander, a new ally has arrived.
345.Sortie: Destroyer Takanami, member of Torpedo Squadron no.2, going!
345.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! Maybe we need to press our advantage now... Please follow me!
345.Attack: Takanami might show you the increased fire power! Aiming... Fire!
345.Yasen(1): It's probably a night battle... But I am no longer lost. Takanami, attacking! Please follow me!
345.H0000: Admiral! I, Takanami might announce the time today. Ah! We just passed 0:00 AM!
345.H0100: Maybe it's... 1... AM! Eh? That first part is confusing? Y-yes...but...
345.H0200: Maybe it's 2... AM! Ah? It's okay? I'm sorry it's a bad habit. Yup.
345.H0300: Maybe it's 3... AM. I'm sleepy. Ah, but I'll be fine, really!
345.H0400: Maybe it's 4... AM. It's early morning already. It's the darkest around this time... probably.
345.H0500: 5:00. Morning have come. Commander, good morning!
345.H0600: Maybe it's... 6:00 AM. Everybody, good morning! It's morning!
345.H0700: 7:00. I might have brought breakfast. Today we have miso soup with green leaves...
345.H0800: Maybe it's 8:00 AM. Ah, Naganami-neesama! G-Good morning!
345.H0900: Maybe it's 9:00 AM. Naganami-neesama? Yup! She's my prideful sister!
345.H1000: 10:00. It's probably time for... practice? Yes, roger that!
345.H1100: Maybe it's 11:00 AM. Commander, it's time for lunch. What do you want?
345.H1200: 12:00. 'As for lunch, you can ask Mamiya-san for a treat'? Yay, I'm happy!
345.H1300: 13:00. *nom nom*. Mamiya's omurice is delicious! *nom nom*
345.H1400: 14:00 Next expedition might be... Tokyo Express? Eh... ah... it's... nothing...
345.H1500: 15:0... Ah! Naganami-neesama! Eh? Refreshment? Thanks you!
345.H1600: 16:00. I received cookies from Naganami-neesama! For now, I'll brew some tea.
345.H1700: 17:00. Such a wonderful sunset...! The sun might set at any moment. It might looks pretty.
345.H1800: Maybe it's 18:00 PM. Commander, Takanami need to prepare dinner? Yup!
345.H1900: 19:00. Dinner's preparation is probably done. We have Fricandeau Beef today...
345.H2000: Maybe it's 20:00. Commander, do you want another dish of... Takanami's Fricandeau Beef...?
345.H2100: 21:00. Maybe it's night. Commander, I'll brew some tea again, yup!
345.H2200: 22:00. That Light Cruiser sister... Eh? Maybe I should just... leave her be...?
345.H2300: 23:00. Commander, good work today... probably. Yup!

485.Intro: Thanks a bunch!  I'm the 11th ship of the Yuugumo class, Fujinami!  Commander, look out for me, okay?
485.Library: The definitive edition of the fleet's destroyer's, the Yuugumo-class's 11th ship, I'm Fujinami.  I was a part of the 32nd and later the 11th Destroyer Divisions.  The situation was pretty bad by the time I came in but I tried my best.  In the end I was part of the 2nd Torpedo Squadron and took part in the final battle: Operation Sho-Go-1 (Leyte Gulf). It was painful....yeah.  But still, I did the best that I could.  Please remember me.
485.Poke(1): Whaaat? Did you call for Fujinami?
485.Poke(3): Aaa...jeez, seriously.  Because.....I'm busy right now....eh?  A new mission?  Then I'll take care of it for Commander's sake.  Jeez!
485.Idle: Commander...right now...ah, is he busy.  In that case....ah!  Oki! Oki-chan get over here!  Ah, Yahoo!  How are you doing?  Oh really, I see.  Kihihihihi, well, I'm fine I suppose.  Kay, Oki-chan is doing her best too.  That's alright then.
485.Wedding: Ah, jeez, I really am busy, ya know.  We have to get ready for decisive battle don't we?  I'm already providing an escort for the transport fleet.  And I have an expedition after that.  That's why I said...huh?  This...is for Fujinami?  Wow, it's beautiful.  Is this...really okay?  Okay then.
485.Married: Commander, you don't look so good...hmm, oh, should I get you something warm?   I'll go fetch something.  Here, it's hot so please be careful!  Ah...jeez, that's why I told you to be careful!  Ergh....
485.Ranking: You want your info?  Well, I guess that's important.  Here.
485.Join: 2nd Torpedo Squadron, Fujinami, ready to sortie.  Let's go!
485.Supply: Thx, I'll take it.  Thank you.
485.Docking(1): Not Goood....I'll take a little bath then?
485.Docking(2): Fuunfufuun....Don't look in on me now!  You got that, Commander?
485.Return: The fleet is back.  We're all here safe and sound and that's what matters right?
485.Sortie: 32nd Destroyer Division Fujinami, weigh anchor!  You okay Ha-ma-na-mi?  Please get here soon.
485.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted.  Alright Everyone.  Let's push in!
485.Yasen(1): I like night because there's no annoying enemy aircraft.  There's nothing that can bring me down now!  Let's continue.
485.MVP: Eh?  That's for, Fujinami? I...see.  Well ain't that fine.  Kihihihihi  It's okay right?  Right!
485.Damaged(3): It's just a little damage!  Something...something like that...there's no way it'll make Fujinami sink!
485.Sunk: I'm sinking...hey...are you looking...until the moment Fujinami disappears...keep watching...me...okay....
485.2@Spring: So, it's the season of flower viewing, huh? Okie! Hey Okichin, whatcha doin' for flower viewing? Oh, you're going with Naganami and the others? Ah, then I might wanna go too. It's okay if I join you guys, right?
485.2@Rainy: It's still coming down... Well, can't do anything about it. Oh, that's a cute umbrella. Looking at the umbrellas is pretty fun too.
485.2@WhiteDay: Eh...even though I didn't give you any this year, is this okay? So? Well then, I will take this. Wait for it next year.
485.2@EarlySummer: Oh, a summer festival? I'll definitely go. Got to put on a yukata. Hmmm, let's see here... Hmmm... Ummm... Like this... A-Asashimo, I-I definitely need your help!
485.2@Summer2017: Oh, a summer festival? I'll definitely go. Got to put on a yukata. Hmmm, let's see here... Hmmm... Ummm... Like this... A-Asashimo, I-I definitely need your help! ...Is it fine now?
485.2@LateFall2017: What is it, Commander? Did you call me? I'm just about to go out in a while.
485.3@LateFall2017: I'm definitely well dressed when I go out! But since it's getting colder, I guess... I'll need to wear a coat.
485.4@LateFall2017: Aah, jeez, really. I'm really busy during autumn! Ah, Choukai-san? Yes, I'll definitely return. I'm 100% sure I will.
485.2@Surigao: Huh? Did you call me, commander? If you didn't notice, I've been very seriously busy making all sorts of preparations.
485.3@Surigao: Ugh, jeez. Right now I'm really busy. Tch.
485.4@Surigao: That's right; I'm getting ready to sortie. I'm preparing for Operation Sho-Go 1. Eh? "Good luck"? I said I'm not done getting ready yet. Tch!
485.3@Xmas2017: Wah, Commander, I'm busy right now, but I guess it's okay. Here Commander, have some of this cake. Hehe, it's pretty good, right?
485.2@Xmas2017: Choukai, please take some of this cake. You...you think it's delicious? I'm so glad...ah...umm...try this one too.
485.2@NewYears2018: Happy New Year Commander, let's do our best this year too. Yeah. So... my New Year's money, please. Heeheehee, 'course!
485.2@Setsubun2018: Let's see, the person playing the Oni for us is... Choukai-san? ...That's not right, Noshiro-san? Well... then...! Take this! And this! Oh... Oh no! Let's scram, Okicchi!
485.2@Valentines2018: This is for you, Commander. It's handmade. Totally!
485.2@Leyte: I won't die! I'll return, definitely!
485.13@Leyte: DesDiv32, Fujinami, sortieing. I'll come back alive, definitely!
485.3@Leyte: It's alright, Hamacchi. This sea is... but everyone is here now!
485.2@Homecoming: Ah, I've been waiting for you, Hamacchi. Yep, I've waited a long time. Well, that's fine. Let's go greet Okichin and the rest. Let's give it our all as DesDiv32. For sure!
485.2@WhiteDay2018: That's right, I did it properly this year. So, I'll gladly accept this.
485.2@Anniversary2018: It's the fleet's 5th Anniversary. That means we're entering our 6th year. Hmm, I see. That's amazing. ...Congratulations, Commander. I'll definitely do my best this year too!
485.3@Summer2018: Hey, how does my yukata look, Commander? Do I... look good? Really? Well, of course it does. Hey, that looks delicious. Buy it for me, Commander. And Hamacchi's share too, so make it two. Of course!
485.2@Saury2018: It's the Saury Festival, Hamacchi. I'll definitely be joining in too. You'll come with me, right?
485.2@LateFall2018: Ah, Hamacchi. This? Yeah, I'm getting the preparations done for a filming. For something like a news programme. No, no, Choukai taught me to do it kinda like this. I know, help me out, Hamacchi. It's definitely fine, right? Yup, thanks.
485.3@Anniversary2019: Eh, it's the fleet's 6th Anniversary? That means this year is the 7th year. That's kinda amazing. Commander, congrats. I'll keep on working hard. Definitely!
485.2@Summer2019: That's right, once the rainy season is over, it's summer. Of course it is!
485.3@Summer2019: When you think of summer, summer festivals come to mind, right? I'll have to put on a yukata. Hmmm... where did I put it... Aha, here!? ...It wasn't there... Huh? Where is it?
485.3@Fall2019: Shall I come along too? Kure! Kure Naval District!
485.2@Fall2019: A strategic manoeuvre? Alright! We'll be coming from Osaka, right? Coming from Osaka... we'll take the land route.
485.3@Saury2019: Kure? It was lots of fun! Also, there were lots of delicious things too. I think I ate too much. I probably need to go on a bit of a diet.

373.Intro: Thanks a bunch! I'm the 11th Ship of the Yuugumo class, Fujinami.  Commander, let's do our best from today on, okay?
373.Poke(2): Ah, jeez.  I'm busy....how bout later.
373.Poke(3): Aaa...jeez, seriously.  I said Fujinami's busy right now!  Jeez, seriously....Commander does it really have to be now, don't you get its' not a good time?

373.Friend43(2): DesDiv32, attacking! Let's go! Hayacchi, keep up!

528.Intro: Onee-chan, Commander, thank you. 12th ship of the Yuugumo-class, Hayanami, has arrived.
528.Library: I'm the 12th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Hayanami. That's right, I'm Fujinami-oneechan's little sister. As part of the 2nd Torpedo Squadron, I did my best with escorts, patrols, and even transport operations. Eh, Tawi? Anti-submarine patrols? No, I won't lose this time! Onee-chan, Commander, just watch!
528.Poke(1): Onee-chan, no wait... Commander, what is it?
528.Poke(2): Ah, I'm busy too. It's true.
528.Poke(3): Onee-chan, about this... Ah, I see, so that's it. As expected of my Fujina... my onee-chan. Ah, Commander. Yes, she's the onee-chan I'm proud of.
528.Idle: Ngh, that... that place is dangerous, Suzunami-oneechan. Run... if you don't... *heavy breathing* A dream... It was just a dream... Ah, onee-chan, Commander, uhmm, did you need something? ...No, I see. I'll go wash my face a bit.
528.Married: Commander, since I'd made some tea for onee-chan... Here you go. Also while I'm at it, I cut some youkan too. It's really just because I was already making some. Yup, that's right. So don't mind me.
528.Wedding: Commander, did you call me? Eh, onee-chan? No, I don't know where she is. Maybe she's on an expedition? Eh, shut the door? Why? ...What's this box? Is it for me? ...I'll open it, okay? Huh... what's this? Eh, me? It's for me!? ...No way, for me? It's for me? Really!? ...Yay!
528.Ranking: Onee-chan, you want information? Ah, I'll go fetch it. ...Ah, here it is... Hup... Whoa... whoaaaa... Ah, Co-commander? Th-thank you.
528.Join: 32nd Destroyer Division, Hayanami, setting sail! Onee-chan, Commander, I'm off.
528.Equip(2): Hmmm. Well, it's better than nothing.
528.Equip(3): Onee-chan, take a look at this.
528.Docking(1): J-jeeez, can I take a short bath? Commander, can I?
528.Docking(2): Huh, did someone get in first? Could it be, onee-chan!? I-I'll get in too! There we go... Uh-umm!
528.Sortie: I-I may not look it but I'm still a member of the 2nd Torpedo Squadron. Yuugumo-class destroyer, Hayanami, sortieing!
528.Battle: Onee-chan, we've spotted them. Fleet, ready for battle. I won't lose!
528.Yasen(2): There they are. I see them. Fire!
528.Yasen(1): Let's go after them. Fleet, begin the night battle pursuit!
528.MVP: Check this out, onee-chan, I'm number one! Ehehe. Hooray! Commander, thank you. I'm proud of everyone too. Hooray!
528.Damaged(3): Oh no. I'm getting overwhelmed... I-I won't lose!
528.Sunk: I... see... I'm sinking... again... I don't want this... Onee-chan, everyone, Commander... See you... later...
528.2@Setsubun2019: Demons begone~! Fortune welcome~! ...Ah, Hama-chan, sorry. Did that hurt?
528.2@Valentines2019: Onee-chan, Commander, Happy Valentine's! Ehehe, I put my all into making this.
528.2@WhiteDay2019: Commander, take a look. I got this from onee-chan! Ah, you're giving me something too? Thanks.
528.2@Rainy2019: Onee-chan! Look, look! My full anti-tsuyu equipment. Whenever a rain shower comes, I'll be ready~!
528.2@Summer2019: Everyone is wearing a swimsuit... Hmmm... Onee-chan is...! Ah, she isn't...
528.2@Summer2019_2: Onee-chan... that yukata... looks good! It looks really good on you! Just what I expect from my sister!
528.3@Summer2019_2: What? Sasebo? I'm from Maizuru. ...Eh, you're going, onee-chan? Then, I'll come too!

688.Intro: Onee-chan, Commander, thank you. 12th ship of the Yuugumo-class, Hayanami, has arrived today too.
688.Poke(2): I'm pretty good at this too, right? ...Eh? ...Jeez, I can do it!
688.Equip(1): Looks good? I can use this.
688.Yasen(2): There they are. Now that we've found them, don't let them escape!
688.Friend43(2): The 32nd Destroyer Division has arrived at the operation area. Onee-chan, ready? Let's charge right in!
688.H0000: I'll be in charge today. Eh, I don't wanna. I can do it properly. Even I can be a secretary!
688.H0100: Uhmm, the time is now... Ah, yes, 0100. It's midnight.
688.H0200: The night is really quiet... Isn't it kinda scary when the Naval Base is too quiet? Well? ...Ah, the time is 0200.
688.H0300: Since I want to drink some tea, I made some for you too. The time is now... Ah, it just turned 0300.
688.H0400: *Yaaaaaawn* It's almost morning... I'm really sleepy... I'll... make some more tea... Here... The time is... 0400.
688.H0500: Look at that, it's morning! The morning sun is beautiful isn't it? It just feels like it resets your internal clock. Eh, the time? Ah, yes. The time is 0500.
688.H0600: All hands assemble! It's morning now! Morning! It's 0600. Ah, Commander, I'll go wake onee-chan up. Eh, don't worry. I'll be right back.
688.H0700: Commander, I've woken onee-chan up too. Now, here's the breakfast I worked hard to make for both of you. Freshly cooked barley rice, hot miso soup, and some pickled daikon. Now, help yourself. ...Ah, that's right, it's 0700.
688.H0800: Onee-chan, you want another helping? I won't be responsible if you get fat. But, I'll still love you, onee-chan. Ah, you're done, Commander? Really? Shall I clean up then? Ah, oh no. It's already 0800. Onee-chan, hurry up.
688.H0900: Whew, alright. Onee-chan, I'm done cleaning up. Now, let DesDiv32 head out to sea. Commander, that's fine right? Oh right, the time is now... Ummm, 0900.
688.H1000: I definitely love the sea. Isn't that right, onee-chan? Eh, you're already tired? No way. It's still only 1000 you know.
688.H1100: Commander, onee-chan is in a bit of a pinch so can we take a short break? It's still only 1100 but... Shall we have lunch early? Ah, we can't? Alriiight.
688.H1200: Commander, onee-chan went back first. That's fine right? So now you can have two helpings of my special barley rice balls. ...Oh, you don't need it? Then, just have half of it. The time is now exactly noon. 1200.
688.H1300: I ate too much for lunch... *Heavy breathing*... 13...00...
688.H1400: Ah, Shima-chan, hello. You're always fast and looking well. Ah, me? I ate a bit too much for lunch. Ah, she's already gone. It's now 1400.
688.H1500: Whew, I'm finally feeling better. Aaah, tea is definitely the best. It calms you down in all sorts of ways. ...Here's a cup for you too, Commander. The time is now... Ah, it's already 1500.
688.H1600: Ah, Noshiro, good work. Yes, I have nothing to report. The time is now 1600. That is all.
688.H1700: About Noshiro? She's someone beautiful isn't she? I think she's second only to onee-chan. Ah, Commander, look at that. The sunset is beautiful. I like this time of day. It's a beautiful 1700.
688.H1800: Oh no, it's already this late. I'll need to go get dinner ready. Hama-chan, help me. ...Ah, excuse me. Thank you. Onee-chan, Commander, just wait a minute. The time is 1800.
688.H1900: Dinner is ready. Today is something extra special. An aji-fry set! Go on, I guarantee it's delicious. Eat up, eat up. Ah, that's right, the time is now 1900. Eat up.
688.H2000: Onee-chan, Commander, how was the aji-fry for dinner? Was it delicious? ...Really? That's great. I'll get you some tea. 200... Oh, Yamashiro?
688.H2100: Eh, Fusou? No, she hasn't been around here toda... Uh-umm, Yamashiro... She's gone. Oh right, the time is now... Ummm, 2000.
688.H2200: Yamashiro's feelings for her sister are wonderful. I feel my heart pounding when I see such loyalty... Commander, umm, are you listening? ...Jeez! The time is now 2200. Jeez!
688.H2300: So many things happened and didn't happen today. ...It was kinda tiring. Shall we get some rest to prepare for tomorrow? 2300. Thanks for your hard work!

484.Intro: I'm the 13th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, r-reporting for duty. I'm Hamanami. Uhh, umm, I...
484.Library: I-I'm the 13th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Hamanami. Together with 4 of my other sister ships, I was part of DesDiv32.  We lost ship after ship in battle. In the end, I was with Nacchan and the others in DesDiv31. That sea was scary... The swarms of enemy planes were also scary... It was all so scary...
484.Poke(2): What? I don't really need that. I always have it. I'm fine.
484.Poke(3): Fuu-chan? Ah, Commander, what is it? It's nothing, I'm fine. I'm fine so...
484.Idle: Ah, Ha-chan. Oh, yeah, I'm fine, thank you. Ah, Fuu-chan is here too. Yeah, don't worry.
484.Married: U-ummm, I made some tea, Japanese tea. Would you like some?
484.Wedding: W-what is it, Commander? If you don't need anything, I'll... Huh... U-ummm, can you repeat that? No way, no way!
484.Ranking: You want to read this, commander? Yes. This is the intelligence, here.
484.Docking(1): I'll be right out of the bath soon, real soon...
484.Docking(2): Don't peek... into the bath. No. I-I-I'm sorr... I'm sorry, I...
484.Construction: A new girl, umm, ah, that's right....
484.Return: Th-the fleet returned safely... Y-yes, it looks like it.
484.Sortie: Don't go ahead without me, Fuu-chan. DesDiv32, H-hamanami, going. H-heading out.
484.Battle: Th-the enemy. Oh no. Y-yes, Commander. Battle stations, ready!
484.Yasen(1): I hope no enemies come tonight, not tonight.
484.MVP: Y-yes! I was able to help out a bit, great.
484.Damaged(3): I said I didn't like this... I really don't like this!
484.Sunk: O-oh no... No way... Save me, Fuu-chan...
484.2@WhiteDay2018: Th-than... But, I... didn't get you anything this year...
484.2@Spring2018: DesDiv32... Ah, yeah, the Yuugumo-class cherry blossom viewing is fun. You're not looking well, Fuu-chan. Did you eat too much?
484.3@Spring2018: Umm, Acchan... Umm, please have this. I-it's delicious...Uh-umm, thank you.
484.2@Anniversary2018: It's the fleet's 5th Anniversary... Con... congratulations, Commander... Let's... let's celebrate.
484.2@Rainy2018: What are you making, Fuu-chan? ...A-a teruteru... teruteru bouzu? Ah, I'll make one too... Mmm... Ah... Uhm...
484.2@Summer2018: Ah, you look cute, Fuu-chan. Yep. ...M-me too... Hmmm, well, should I...
484.3@Summer2018: Ngh, Umm, Fuu-chan... I...can't eat so much... Yeah... Tha... Thank you...
484.2@Saury2018: F-fuuchan... Ngh, that's not it... That's not too much... Haaa...
484.2@LateFall2018: Uh-umm, what are you doing, Fuu-chan? A camera? Here too? Is it... fine for me to help too?
484.2@Xmas2018: Co-commander, look at this. This is... Fuu-chan. This is Ta-chan and me... This is is you. Wh-what do you think?
484.2@NewYears2019: Uhhh... Ummm... Commander... Ha-happy New... Whoa... Th-thank you very much... *blowing*... Aah, it's warm...
484.3@NewYears2019: Thank you... very much... *blowing*... Aah, it's warm...
484.2@Valentines2019: Fuchan, Okichan, ah, I'm fine... Uhh... Umm... Tea with... Ummm, the Commander? I-I'll go make some now.
484.2@Rainy2019: Mm, Ha-chan... That's...cute. Mm... I...I took a picture from that hill. So cute.
484.2@Summer2019: A-are you... going to the summer festival, Fuu-chan, Ha-chan? ...Th-then, I'll come too...
484.3@Summer2019: Fuu-chan, what are you looking for? Your yukata... Uh-umm, I'm sure it was in these drawers... Ah, found it. Fuu-chan, it's... it's here... I kinda like... your yukata.

680.Intro: I'm the 13th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Hamanami. Uhh, umm, I'll... do my best.
680.Poke(3): Ah, Fuu-chan? Eh, Commander, what's wrong? I'm doing just fine. Th-thank you...
680.Join: I-I'm s-sortieing now, so... Yes, now.
680.Damaged(3): I said I didn't like this. But I won't lose to something like this.
680.Friend43(1): Ah, Fu-chan, I got it... Full speed ahead... Hamanami, attacking!

452.Intro: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. Umm... Yes, I'll do my best. Pleased to meet you!
452.Library: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. I was developed as part of the Rapid Naval Armaments Supplement Programme. Yes, my birthplace was in Maizuru. Though by that time, the front line was already heading towards disintegration... But I still did my best escorting the main fleet and convoys.
452.Poke(1): U-Umm...Commander? Did you call for Okinami?
452.Poke(2): My glasses...glasses... Oh...I...had them on. Well... That's great.
452.Poke(3): Commander? Umm...I'm sorry. I can't see very well... Wah... too close... That's too close, Commander!
452.Idle: Um, Commander? Co... -mmander? Umm... I guess you're busy at the moment. Okinami will then focus on training herself. Right, umm... ummm...
452.Married: Commander, um... I'm... very sorry for always causing you trouble. Oh, no, not at all...Because you're a very kind Commander. Because you're very kind and I... Huh?... No... Why am I... crying? I don't...Why?
452.Wedding: Commander, Did you call for Okinami? Did I do something wrong...I...Huh? That's for me!? Wha... I don't... but... I can't... believe it... Ehhhh!?
452.Ranking: Th-The information, Commander? Okinami will...bring it over. Aahh!
452.Equip(1): An-, an improvement. Thank you very much.
452.Equip(2): This equipment is... With this equipment, I won't lose against even a swarm of fighters as thick as clouds. Probably?
452.Supply: Commander. From the bottom of my heart, I thank you very much for your kindness.
452.Docking(1): Um... I'm very sorry. I have to dock for a little while. I'm sorry...
452.Docking(2): Commander, this is very embarrassing but have to take a bath... a long bath... and um...
452.Construction: Commander. there's a new kanmusu that... Yes, that's correct.
452.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! All ship... prepare for gun battle...Please take care of me.
452.Yasen(1): I can't see very well at night... But, we have no choice! All ships, charging in!
452.Yasen(2): M-My glasses... Ah, I'm okay. That's wrong. Firing guns, over there! Fire!
452.MVP: Wha... Ehhhh!? Me? Okinami is number one...? Umm...umm...I, I'm so sorry!
452.Damaged(3): It, it's okay... My glasses are... safe...
452.Sunk: This... is what feels like... to sink into the ocean...? Oh... You... can't see anything... anymore...
452.2@NewYears: Commander, best wishes for the coming year. I really owe you a lot for this last year. I hope you'll allow me to rely on you again this year.
452.2@LateWinter: Commander, aren't you cold? The kotatsu feels nice, so please feel free to come over... It's so warm, isn't it? I like this kotatsu as well. Ufufu♪
452.2@Setsubun: Setsubun... Eh? Kiso-san is the demon? N-No way... I-I can't throw this! I-I can't! E-Ei...! Eh? Ah... ehh!?
452.2@Valentines: Commander, ummm... will you accept this chocolate? Ummm, so... sorry! If you don't want it, sorry!
452.2@Anniversary3: Commander, congratulations to a third anniversary! Okinami will celebrate it! Here!
452.2@Rainy: It's been raining a lot. However, I find the rainy season to be quite fun. I love it.
452.2@EarlySummer: It's getting hotter, Commander. Eh? A swimsuit? Ah... I don't think... eh? Really... are you sure?
452.3@EarlySummer: Since you strongly recommended it, I... um, bought a swimsuit. How is it? U-Um, p-please don't stare so intently.
452.2@Fall: So it's autumn? It's the season for reading. I really love this time of year! Admiral, what are you reading right now? Is that a photograph collection?
452.2@YearsEnd: Cleaning up after the year is over using sunshine is fun, right? Eh, you don't like spring cleaning, Commander?
452.2@Spring: Spring... feels great~. Ah, commander, a flower petal's on your shoulder... How elegant, fufu~
452.2@WhiteDay: These... are? A return gift for my chocolate? Thank you, Commander. I am really sorry to trouble you. Um...
452.2@Anniversary2018: Uh-umm, today is an anniversary, Commander. I'm really glad I could spend it with you.
452.3@Saury2018: Kishi, Asa, are you ready? DesDiv31 will be joining the Saury Festival! Set sail!
452.3@Anniversary2019: Commander, I give you my sincerest congratulations on the 6th Anniversary. Yes!

359.Intro: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. Commander, I...have also upgraded my anti-air equipment. I think...I'll be okay. I'll try my best.
359.Join: DesDiv31, Okinami. I'll protect it... definitely! Moving out!
359.Equip(2): Alright. With this gear, with this gear, I think I can protect everyone from the enemy planes. Surely!
359.Attack: It's okay, just aim carefully. That's right... now! Fire!
359.Friend42(1): The 31st Destroyer Division has arrived on the battlefield. Kishi-chan, Asa-chan, are you ready? Let's attack!
359.Friend42(2): Roger that! We'll begin the attack! Feel free to go all out, Asa-chan!
359.H0000: Commander, I'll be the one who declares the time right? I'll be in your care.
359.H0300: Commander, it's 0300. Eh!? I am too bland you say? uhn...bland? uh... uhnn..
359.H0400: Commander, it's 0400. Uhm... ah.. yes, it'll be...morning...soon...
359.H0500: Commander, uhm... it's 0500. It's morning already right? I'll prepare to wake everyone up.
359.H0600: It's 0600. All fleets, all hands on...wake up! It's morning, it's morning already!
359.H0700: It's 0700, Commander. Umm...Breakfast is has been prepared...over here. It's your favorite, grounded natto and miso soup.
359.H0800: It's 0800. Commander, what missions are we doing this morning? Expeditions? Eh... the arsenal? ... Really? Ah... yes...
359.H0900: It's 0900 Commander. Ummmm, the expedition fleet is fine. Next is... ah Kumano-san! Umm... Good morning.
359.H1000: It's 1000, Kumano-san's Commander. Kumano-san, are you looking for Suzauya-san? No, I haven't seen her today.
359.H1100: It's 1100, Commander. Kumano-san was holding a lot of sandwiches. That was Suzuya-san's half right? A bit was split for us.
359.H1200: Commander, it's 1200. The sandwiches Kumano-san brought were tasty. I ate it in one helping.
359.H1300: It's 1300, Comm... Ah, Naganami nee-san, good work today. Were you looking for someone? Oh... I'm fine, don't worry.
359.H1400: It's 1400, Commander. These glasses? Yes, they're a favorite of mine. Glasses and radars are important, of course. No, really!
359.H1500: It's 1500, Commander. I'd... like to eat some sweets but, patience... patience... right?
359.H1600: 1600... Oh, Suzuya-san, Kumano-san was looking for you just now. Ah, so you met her? I'm glad... huh? She's missing again!?
359.H1700: It's 1700 Commander. Suzuya-san, Kumano-san's sandwiches were delicious. Eh, you don't like them if it's every day...? That's... true...
359.H1800: It's 1800 Commander. What shall we do for dinner? I'll make it! What do you want? Steak? Beefsteak?
359.H1900: It's 1900, Commander. I couldn't find enough ingredients for beef steak, so I prepared a whale steak instead. How is it?
359.H2000: It's 2000, Commander. It's already night. Night battle!? No...Okinami is...
359.H2100: 210... ah Noshiro-san! Thank you for your hard work. Yes, I'm currently doing my best. Please don't worry. Excuse me...
359.H2200: It's 2200 Commander. About Noshiro-san? She's a very gentle senpai, and kind... Eh, Jintsu-san? ... I've only heard she's amazing...
359.H2300: It's 2300 Commander. Thank you for all your hard work today. Tomorrow... I'll do my best too.

527.Intro: I'm the 15th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Kishinami. You're the Admiral? I see, that's fine then. Kishinami, reporting to the 31st Destroyer Division.
527.Library: I'm the 15th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Kishinami. I was born in Yokosuka Uraga and along with the other Yuugumo-class, I was part of Destroyer Division 31. At the start I fought in the waning days of the Pacific. After surviving Mariana and the final battle at Leyte, I was part of the 2nd Striking Force and supported the collapsing front. Eh, Iwanami? I don't know her. What are you talking about?
527.Poke(3): What is it, Admiral? There's no problem with my rigging. The battle reports have already been turned in. Was there... anything else?
527.Idle: Ah... Oh it's you, Asa-chan. No, I'm not expecting anyone in particular. Stop that, I'm... I'm fine. I'm happy enough to have all of you here with me. Yup.
527.Married: Would you... like some tea, Admiral? I see, roger. I'll leave it here. No, don't worry. I've already gotten Oki-nee some. Ah, I think it'd be good if you took a break sometimes.
527.Wedding: What is it, Admiral? You might not notice, but I don't have time to spare. Eh, what's wrong? Your face is red. Do you have a cold? Come here a bit... Whoa, you've got a bit of a temperature and you're sweating too... Sigh, come here. There, keep warm and get some rest. I'll go and make something. Jeez, treasure your body. I swear.
527.Ranking: Information? Please wait. ...Ah, here it is.
527.Equip(2): I see. So these sorts of equipment are possible too.
527.Docking(1): Ships enter the docks to get repaired.
527.Docking(2): Ships enter the docks to... That's right, I need to get repaired.
527.Construction: Reporting that a ship has been commissioned, Admiral.
527.Return: Reporting that the fleet has returned to port, Admiral.
527.Sortie: Oki-nee, Asa-chan, are you ready? 31st Destroyer Division, weigh anchor! Fleet, forwards!
527.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! Fleet, battle stations! I'll lead the way!
527.Yasen(2): Take careful aim! Don't let them get away! Fire!
527.Yasen(1): DesDiv31, begin the attack! Fleet, line ahead and increase speed!
527.MVP: Me? I see... But, I'm glad that I did well. It's all thanks to your command, Admiral. Thank you.
527.Damaged(1): Aaah! N-no, it's just a scratch.
527.Damaged(2): Aaaah! That hurt. N-now you've done it.
527.Damaged(3): Not yet... I won't sink yet. I won't lose!
527.Sunk: So... I'm... sinking here... again... That's fine... I've done all I can... I'll... leave the rest to you, Asa-chan...
527.2@Saury2018: So this is the Naval Base Saury Festival? Asa is really getting into this. Ro-roger, I'll do my best too! I like saury!
527.2@Fall2018: The salt-grilled saury is... delicious! This flavour hits you right in the soul. It's perfectly salted. Hey, you have some too, Admiral. Come on!
527.2@Xmas2018: It's a Western festival I see. Ah, but it's delicious. Oki-nee and Asa-chan look like they're having fun. Admiral, this festival is nice isn't it?
527.2@NewYears2019: Admiral, a very Happy New Year to you. DesDiv31 and I will be in your care this year too.
527.2@Setsubun2019: It's the Naval Base's Setsubun. This is like a wargame where you can't show any weakness. Humph, over there! Not bad. As I expected of Naga-nee.
527.2@Valentines2019: Admiral, here you go. Ah, please don't hold back. I-I just made it to be good enough so I can't guarantee the taste.
527.2@WhiteDay2019: Is this... for me? From you, Admiral? I'm... grateful for this. Then, I won't hesitate... Ummm, you know, I won't give it back.
527.2@Spring2019: Ah, Admiral, there's something on your shoulder... O-Oki-nee! No, it's nothing... Nothing at all... Ah, the sakura are beautiful.
527.3@Anniversary2019: So it's the 6th Anniversary. Admiral, congrats. I'm happy too. It's true. Somehow my heart feels warm.
527.2@Rainy2019: Oki-nee's favourite season... It rains a lot. Rain... Why don't I try making one? That thing. Eh? Not that. Teru teru bozu.
