527.2@Summer2019: It's getting hot again this year. Oki-nee, Asa-chan, all of you change clothes in summertime? Eh, really?
527.2@Fall2019: Admiral, Oki-nee, you're spending autumn reading? Do you have any books you can recommend me? Ah, All About Glasses? Huh... Admiral's is a picture book?

686.Intro: I'm the 15th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Kishinami. The 31st Destroyer Division have completed our sortie preparations, Admiral. Please take care of me today too.
686.Poke(3): What is it, Admiral? There's no particular problem with my rigging. Not with my rigging... No, it's nothing. There's no problem here.
686.Friend42(2): The 31st Destroyer Division has arrived on the battlefield! We'll now back up the friendly fleet. Oki-nee, Naga-nee, Asa-chan... Let's attack!
686.Friend42(3): The 31st Destroyer Division has arrived on the battlefield! We'll now back up the friendly fleet.
686.Friend43(1): The 31st Destroyer Division has arrived on the battlefield! We'll now back up the friendly fleet.
686.H0000: The time is now 12am, Admiral. I'll be your secretary ship for today. Please take good care of me.
686.H0100: 0100. Let me know if your throat is dry, Admiral. I'll make some tea.
686.H0200: 0200. Isn't it kinda hot, Admiral? I must be imagining things.
686.H0300: 0300. Hmmm, shall I open the window a bit to air out the room? Eh, it's fine? Ro-roger.
686.H0400: 0400. Yes, Roger. I'll make some tea. Please wait a minute. Let's see, the delicious tea leaves are over here...
686.H0500: 0500. Would you like another cup of tea? Ah, you're fine? Alright. It's almost morning, Admiral.
686.H0600: 0600. I'll begin the morning assembly. Fleet, all hands, assemble! Wake up!
686.H0700: 0700. If you don't mind, here's the same breakfast we destroyers are having, Admiral. Today we're having barley rice with pickled daikon, taro miso soup, and grilled fish from yesterday's F-work.
686.H0800: 0800. Now, today it's time for F-work... No wait, time for fleet operations. Are we going on exercises first?
686.H0900: 0900. DesDiv31 has assembled. Oki-nee, Asa-chan, good morning.
686.H1000: 1000. DesDiv31 have increased our skills through exercises. We're ready to be sent to the front at any time, Admiral. Yes.
686.H1100: 110... Ah, Naga-nee. Good work. Is being in the 2nd Striking Force hard work? Not really... Roger.
686.H1200: 1200. It's noon, Admiral. Have some of the rice balls I made with some tea for now. Do you mind? Ah, yes.
686.H1300: 1300. I'm a little happy that you ate so much, Admiral. Shall I make them again? Yup.
686.H1400: 1400. Now, let's begin F-work to improve our skills in the time between operations.
686.H1500: 15... Ah, that silhouette... It's a special-type senior... Sh-she's really dressed up in that F-work look. Tha-that's... Akebono!
686.H1600: 1600. Ah, yes, you're not wearing that just for looks, Bono. I can feel your true skill. Yes.
686.H1700: 1700. It's already this time, Admiral. Please look at that, the sunset is so beautiful. The sunset on the sea is so...
686.H1800: 1800. Just wait a while, Admiral! Today's F-work was a great success! Look forward to dinner.
686.H1900: 1900. It's done, please look at this. Tonight it's my special luxurious barachirashi. Help yourself!
686.H2000: 2000. There's still plenty left for a second helping, Admiral. I like that you have a good appetite.
686.H2100: 2100. Ah, my seniors from DesRon3 have returned safely. They're always so busy. They're so amazingly skilled.
686.H2200: 2200. I'll handle the rest of today's paperwork, Admiral. Just let me handle it. Alright.
686.H2300: 2300. Today's tasks are all done. Thank you for your hard work too, Admiral. Let's work hard tomorrow too.

425.Intro: Yo! I'm Asashimo, 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class. Please remember. Don't forget about me... ok?
425.Library: I'm the 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class, Asashimo. Remember it well. I made my debut when the war situation got worse. I ran about freely at the front lines of the end stage. I did...all I could!
425.Poke(2): Ah, you can leave it to me. I'm fine with escorts or even nighttime raids!
425.Poke(3): Cut it out, Kiyoshimo! I told you to stop!... Wait, that's the commander! You better prepare yourself! Put your hands against the wall! Here I go!
425.Idle: ...Hey, if you're leaving me alone like this, you must have something else important to do, right? I don't like it... but, I forgive you!
425.Married: What's the matter, Admiral? You look down. Alright! I'll perk you up. Hmm? Want me to sing a song? Hmm?
425.Wedding: Hey, Admiral. Do you have business with me? What is it, can it be resolved by asking someone else? What, a ring? Wow it looks good! I'll take it! It's alright isn't it ♪
425.Ranking: Report huh? Must be important... Here.
425.Join: Asashimo of the 31st Destroyer squadron! Move out!
425.Equip(1): Oh, you're very thoughtful! Good good!
425.Equip(2): I don't want to be not prepared, upgrade are welcome!
425.Supply: Oh, thanks a bunch! Fuel and ammo are important, after all!
425.Docking(1): Well... it's really just a scratch! Yeah.
425.Construction: Looks like a new ally's arrived—
425.Return: The fleet's back safely! Stop looking so relieved!
425.Sortie: It's my turn huh... well there's no going back! Destroyer Asashimo! Move out!
425.Battle: So it has started. Assault commence!
425.Attack: Tsk, you are quite a loud bunch... how 'bout this!
425.Yasen(1): A night battle, huh, nice, it brings me back! We're charging in—! Follow after me!
425.Yasen(2): Asashimo will take you on! More! Even more! Bring it!!
425.MVP: All right! I'm the best! Well, despite appearances I am the ace after all, so leave it to me.
425.Damaged(2): Tskkk...! Nah nah I can still fight!
425.Damaged(3): Damn, I got hit! Engine is... fine! Then I can still fight! I can continue!
425.Sunk: Heh, You've come to be dependent on me... Well, fine by me... Kiyoshimo, everyone... we'll meet... again.
425.2@NewYears: Commander! Countin' on ya again this year! So for New Year's, well... you can always rely on me!
425.2@Setsubun: Setsubun doesn't seem bad to me... Alright... it's throwin' time... Ow, ow! Kiyoshimo! Don't throw at me!
425.2@Valentines: Valen... tine's? Geez, this fleet has all sorts of weird holidays... ...I-I just happen to have this. Take it!
425.2@Anniversary: Yeah! Today is special day! Alright! Commander, let's celebrate together, ok?
425.3@Anniversary3: Yo! I heard it's the third anniversary. Dang, that's the bee's knees! Commander, treat me something as a celebration. Come on!
425.2@Rainy: Ahhh, seriously...? It's still raining. Somehow I feel restless just staying indoors. Aarrrgh! What's up with that?
425.2@Saury: I've got no problems with saury. You write this as "seriously", but read it as "for real". Gonna get 'em "for real"! I got this!
425.2@Xmas: Kuri... sumasu? Again with the weird festivals this fleet has... At least the food is pretty good.
425.3@ChristmasOld: Ooyodo-san, are you heading out? Then I'm taking Kasumi and Kiyoshimo along with us. Isn't it obvious?
425.2@WhiteDay: Oh? You givin' me these? Thanks a bunch!

344.Intro: Yo! I'm the 16th ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Asashimo. Ready to sortie anytime! Let's rampage some more! ...Alright! Commander!
344.Idle: That's right~, it'd be nice if I could go out to sea with Yukikaze, Hamakaze, and Isokaze again. When that happens, you come along too, Commander. I'm sure it'll be fun.
344.Sortie: I wonder if Ise and Hyuuga are fine... Well, I must go too! Asashimo! Move out!
344.H0000: Alriiiiight! Commander, I'll be your secretary ship today. Gehehe. That's fine, right?
344.H0100: It's 0100. See~, I can do the hourly announcements perfectly.
344.H0300: It's 0300. Hey, aren't you sleepy? Oh well.
344.H0400: 04... 0... 0... No more, Commander... I can't eat any more... Nnnn...
344.H0500: 05... Whoa! I-I'm awake! Of course I am! 0500. It's morning.
344.H0600: It's 0600 now, Commander. What are we having for breakfast? I wonder if Kasumi will bring us some rice balls.
344.H0700: 0700... I can't! I'm too hungry... Commander, let's go to Mamiya's. Please treat me. Please?
344.H0800: 0800! Aaah! I'm so full. I won't have any strength to get through the morning if I don't eat this much. Ehe.
344.H0900: 090... Ah, Kiyoshimo! Yo! You need to eat more too. Or you won't grow.
344.H1000: It's 1000, Commander. Hmm? Exercises? Missions? Oh that's right. We need to do them. Let's see.
344.H1100: 1100... Aaaah, I'm hungry again. Commander, what's for lunch? The safe choice of curry?
344.H1200: 1200! It's lunchtime! Oh, it's Kasumi! Could it be that package is... Wh-whoaaaa!
344.H1300: 1300! Aaaah! Having rice balls while at sea is the greatest! Right, Commander? Ah, gimme some tea.
344.H1400: It's 1400. Alright, now that I've filled my belly, it's time to get some work done. Commander, what should I do?
344.H1500: It's 1500. *Sigh*, working hard makes makes me hungry... Ah, no, I'm still fine!
344.H1600: 160... Ah, it's Ooyodo and Ashigara! Yahoy! I'm doing fine. Yes!
344.H1700: It's 1700. The sun is setting. Commander, this time of day is great, right? Right? Ehehehe.
344.H1800: 1800. It's dinnertime now. Commander, what're we having? ...Eh? I'm making it? Eh, no way, no how, I can't!
344.H1900: 1900. Commander, sorry for making you make dinner. Now let's see... *nom*... Mmm! It's delicious!
344.H2000: 2000. Maaan, your dinner was so good I ate too much. My belly is sticking out now. Look!
344.H2100: 2100. Argh! That light cruiser is noisy! Can I just hit her once? Ah, I can't...
344.H2200: It's 2200. Nnnghh! Ah, today was kinda tiring. Right?
344.H2300: It's now 2300. Ah, Commander, thank for your hard work every day. Let's work hard tomorrow too.

578.Intro: Yo! The Yuugumo-class destroyer Asashimo is here! Let's do our best today too! Alright!?
578.Poke(2): Ah, you can leave it to me. I'll follow you till the end.
578.Join: 21st Destroyer Division, Asashimo, heading out! Kasumi, Hatsushimo, follow me!
578.Sortie: So it's my turn now. There's no turning back. DesRon2, Asashimo! Weighing anchor!
578.Damaged(3): Owwwwwwww! But that won't be enough to stop me now! I can still keep going!

409.Intro: I've... come again, to these seas. Yuugumo-class destroyer, Hayashimo... reporting for duty.
409.Library: I'm the 17th of the Yuugumo-class Destroyer, Hayashimo. I was born in the Maizuru Naval Base Factory, to times of impending troubles. I launched for the Battle of Leyte Gulf from the Lingga Naval Anchorage... And I've seen many things.
409.Poke(2): Heh... Yeah. This scenery hasn't changed.
409.Poke(3): Commander? To care about me, you're really kind.
409.Idle: Just like this... I'm always watching. Watching... always... forever.
409.Married: Commander. I think you're working a bit too much too. Umm... Sometimes, together, we should... Uu... I-it's nothing... Uu...
409.Wedding: Commander, meeting you, I... I'm glad. So, just this is enough... eh? This is... truly? I... can I change, I wonder?
409.Ranking: Commander, you'll look at the data? I see...
409.Equip(1): Stronger... will anything change if I get stronger?
409.Supply: Thank you very much. You have my gratitude.
409.Construction: More battle strength is needed... again... they increased.
409.Return: The fleet returned. Fu...Fufufu. They returned.
409.Sortie:
Operation Sho-Ichi-Go...!
...What's this...? So it isn't...
409.Battle: You want to go at it with me? Fine, I'll be your opponent.
409.Yasen(1): Night, huh... Fufu, let's jump right in.
409.MVP: You're giving someone like me your blessing? Commander, you're a good person. Fufu... Ufufu.
409.Damaged(2): Ouch... what... this time it's my chimney?
409.Damaged(3): Like this, it can't be helped. Isn't there a good sandbar around?
409.Sunk: Right in front of me... everyone is... what should I do. Wait... wait... I'm going too.
409.2@Rainy: Commander. Umm... once in a while, can we... N-Nothing. Ugh...

324.H0200: 0200. We have an enjoyable time at night, too. I've watered it down (the sake), let's keep having fun!
324.H0300: 0300. Pulling an all-nighter will harm your body, Commander. Rest for awhile.
324.H0400: 0400. The blue of the morning sky. I don't hate it, but it's a little cold right now.
324.H0500: 0500. I'm sorry, was my hand cold to the touch?
324.H0600: 0600. Let's wake everyone up and get ready for the day.
324.H0700: 0700. The morning checks have been done... Let's look for Mamiya-san... And have our breakfast.
324.H0800: 0800. Commander, here's the mission file for the day. Let's start by looking at it closely.
324.H0900: 0900. All fleets that can be deployed have been sent out on expeditions. What should we do with the remaining ships?
324.H1000: 1000. Ah... What is it, Shiranui-san? Did you need us for anything?
324.H1100: 1100. Commander, I'll be making... Maizuru-styled meat stew for lunch, alright? Fufu...
324.H1200: 1200. How was... the meat stew? There's enough... For seconds.
324.H1300: 1300. Saying it was delicious... That's... Troubling for me...
324.H1400: 1400. Commander, am I... Mistaken about anything? Oh, I see. It's fine then.
324.H1500: 1500. It's time for... Some snacks. Caramel... I don't hate it.
324.H1600: 1600. The caramel was delicious. Makigumo-nee-san... You ate too much.
324.H1700: 1700. Commander, fighting a losing battle is detestable isn't it? No more...
324.H1800: 1800. I'll make dinner. It's not something to be made light of... It's curry.
324.H1900: 1900. I added some coconuts from the southern islands into my curry. Fufu...
324.H2000: 2000. There's enough curry for every girl, so please help yourself to it.
324.H2100: 2100. Commander, how was Hayashimo's curry? Fufu...Fufufufu...
324.H2200: 2200. Ah, Nachi-san brought the whiskey bottle. Will you drink some?
324.H2300: 2300. When I'm together with the commander... I'll... Forget about all these unpleasant happening.

410.Intro: Hello! Last of the Yuugumo-class, it's Kiyoshimo! I'm a bit late, but I'll be in your care!
410.Library: I'm Kiyoshimo, the 19th and last of the Yuugumo class destroyers. I was born in Uraga dontcha know. And goodness, what a horrible situation it was that I was born into too. I wasn't around for long but I took part in several fleet actions. Leyte was, of course, apalling to see but I even took part in Operation Rei-gou! How's that?
410.Poke(1): Hey, aren't you glad it's Kiyoshimo?
410.Poke(2): Hmhmmmm! Uraga born and bred. Great, isn't it?
410.Poke(3): Geez, Commander! ...Keep it a secret from my older sisters? Ok?
410.Idle: Hey, Commander? What's that, what are you doing? Hey, watcha dooin? Tell me tell me tell meeeeeee?
410.Married: Commander? You know, if you're tired, you can take a break with me? Right, right?
410.Wedding: Commander? What's wrong, you have such a serious look on your face? Eh, what's... this? This is for me? Really? Nn... thank you. I wonder... why... I'm starting to tear up.
410.Ranking: Commander? Want to see the message? Hm?
410.Equip(1): I wonder how many more remodels will it take for me to become a battleship...? Eh? O-of course I can!
410.Equip(2): How am I looking? Am I cool? Strong?
410.Docking(1): I wish I sortie with battleshi~ps!
410.Docking(2): I'll be in the bath for sliiiightly longer. Yup.
410.Sortie: Operation Rei-Gou? No? It's all good! Sortieing anyway!
410.Battle: I won't lose to Yuugumo-neesan or my other sisters!
410.Attack: I wonder how Musashi-san is doing? I've got to give it my best too!
410.Yasen(1): A night deployment, huh... I ended up remembering that night.
410.Yasen(2): I said I'd protect you this time, didn't I?
410.MVP: Hmhmm, how's that? Now you've seen what I can really do. You want to go ahead and remodel me into a battleship now?
410.Damaged(1): Hyaa!? It'll be the end if that hit on target!
410.Damaged(3): Huh? The left side? Huh? Navigation is impossible? No way... That's... Really bad isn't it...?
410.Sunk: Am I... going to sink... again? It's fine... Everyone, go on ahead... Once you hit the enemy... come back, ok?

325.H0000: 00000! Eh? Was there an extra 0? 0000-... H-huh? Huh? Huuuh?
325.H0200: 0222! Wah, I messed up again. I'll get it this time! It's 0200!
325.H0300: 03! ...00... I'm sleepy... This mission, is tough...
325.H0400: 0400. I'm seriously sleepy right now! Won't someone take over already!?
325.H0500: 0500! Eh? If I do this right, I'll become a battleship? Guh... I guess I'll do my best.
325.H0700: 0700. Hey, Kiyoshimo's gonna try her best and make breakfast, ok!?
325.H0800: 0800. How is breakfast? Let's eat our fill and turn into battleships together!
325.H0900: 0900. Commander, we should go for morning training together. Let's go!
325.H1000: 1000. Ugh... I ate too much for breakfast... And it feels bad after I've exercised... Uuu...
325.H1100: I don't feel so good... 11..0..0... S-Somehow I managed to report the time. Guh...
325.H1200: 1200. Commander, I'm sorry... Please go ahead with lunch by yourself... I can't do it.
325.H1300: 1300. What did you have for lunch? Omurice with Yamato-nee-sama? H-how nice...
325.H1400: 1400. Eh, Kasumi-chan? What's wrong, you're here because you're worried about me again?
325.H1500: 1500. I got a riceball from Kasumi-chan because I didn't have lunch! Let's have it now. Mmm, this flavor of salt from the salted plum is great.
325.H1600: 1600. Commander, this Kiyoshimo has mended her ways. Let's do it!
325.H1700: 1700. Right, I should get to cleaning the office and prepare for outfitting!
325.H1800: 1800. Commander? There's night battle training for the day? Of course! I'll join too!
325.H1900: 1900. Right! For this part, I should use the star flare, star flares... Huh? I don't have one?
325.H2000: 2000. Really, the members Second Torpedo Squadron were strong. How nice...
325.H2100: 2100. Huh, Kasumi-chan? Another riceball? Is it ok to have it?
325.H2200: 2200. Oh right, I was so engrossed in the night battle that I forgot about dinner. Commander, are you hungry? Shall we have dinner together?
325.H2300: 2300. Ehh!? You had beef steak with Musashi-san? How nice... You should've invited me along too! That's not fair!

421.Intro:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, first ship, Akizuki.
I'm reporting in here. Please leave it to me!
421.Library:
Built with the purpose of handling fleet air defense— the first Type-B Destroyer; first Akizuki-class destroyer, Akizuki here.

As an air defense ship equipped with four Long 8-Barrel 10cm Guns and an Anti-Aircraft Fire Director, I formed the 61st Destroyer Division along with Hatsuzuki.

I'll do my best!
421.Poke(2): This Long-Barrel 10cm Gun and this Anti-Aircraft Fire Director... With this power, I should be able to protect the fleet!
421.Poke(3): Choujuusenchihou-chan, don't struggle so much! Oh? Oho? Ad... miral? Ah...! Please excuse me!
421.Idle: Long-Barrel 10cm, check! Anti-Aircraft Fire Director, check! Oxygen Torpedoes, check! ...Alright! Perfect! It's all okay! Umm, next is...
421.Married: Commander, thanks as always. I will protect both you and the fleet. I-It'll be fine!
421.Wedding: Commander, did you call for me? Um, was my anti-air inadequate? Ah, that's not it? Then is it something to do with Shoukaku-san? Not that, either...? ...! Could this be...? This... ...! Thank you so much!
421.Ranking: That's true. Understanding the fleet's current situation is important!
421.Join: Anti-air destroyer, Akizuki. Starting the sortie!
421.Equip(1): Thank you very much! It's good equipment.
421.Equip(2): I won't lose to the enemy task force with this!
421.Supply: Thank you very much for the resupply!
421.Docking(1): J-Just for a bit... I'll take a break...
421.Docking(2): I have to make sure my Anti-Air Fire Director is firmly attached...
421.Construction: It looks like a new ship was born.
421.Return: The fleet has safely returned. Everyone, good work!
421.Sortie: 61st Destroyer Division, setting sail immediately! Sortieing!
421.Attack: As long as I still have the strength, I won't allow it!
421.Yasen(1): My night battle ability... shall I show it to you?
421.Yasen(2): The curtain fire is too thin... I can feel it. Laying a barrage!
421.MVP: I was able to protect the fleet. We're safe, and next time will surely be okay, too!
421.Damaged(1): Tch...! I can still go on!
421.Damaged(3): Not yet... I won't sink yet! The fleet's air defense... I will...!
421.Sunk: Shoukaku-san... Taihou-san... are you well? ...Still safe... the fleet is... still... safe...
421.2@NewYears: Best wishes for the new year. Commander, please treat me well this year, too!
421.2@Anniversary3: Arcade? Commander, what's an Arcade? Hm-hmm... I shall learn more about it!
421.2@Xmas: Merry Christmas to you, Commander! I went ahead and roasted a turkey! ...Ah! I shouldn't have? Why!?
421.2@Fall2019: I, Akizuki, will be giving my all for the Naval District Autumn Festival. Teru, Hatsu, Commander, let's go together!
421.2@Saury2019: I'll do my best to protect the saury fisheries and support the saury fishing. That's right, leave it to me!

330.Poke(2): This additional Anti-Aircraft Fire Director and Long-Barrel 10cm Gun... My true power. With these, I can protect the fleet!
330.Supply: Thank you very much for these important supply goods!
330.Damaged(3): I'm hit!? Abandon all torpedoes! Suppress detonations! ...Not yet... I'm still fine!
330.Friend45(1): Akizuki has arrived. Understood, charging in. I won't let them beat me!
330.H0000: Commander, I, Akizuki, will be reporting the time! The current time is 0000!
330.H0100: Reporting in that it's 0100. Is this way fine with you, Commander?
330.H0200: It's 0200. The moon tonight is... The moon is so beautiful, Commander. Um... Commander?
330.H0300: It's 0300, Commander. It's awfully quiet at this hour... ... ...It really is quiet...
330.H0400: It's 0400. Commander, aren't you tired? Let's have some strong tea.
330.H0500: It's now 0500, Commander. Aye! I'm to prepare to do the morning call. Roger that!
330.H0600: It's 0600. Good morning, Commander. Yes! It's such a pleasant morning!
330.H0700: It's 0700. Commander, I'm preparing breakfast over here. Sorry if it's too basic...
330.H0800: 0800. 61st Destroyer Division, sortie preparations complete! We can set sail at any time!
330.H0900: It's 0900. Is the capital ship I'm escorting a battleship? Is it a carrier? ...Please leave it to me!
330.H1000: Reporting in that it's 1000. Commander, I'd like to go and breeze through the exercises!
330.H1100: It's 1100. Commander, what should we do for lunch? Shall I make something for us?
330.H1200: It's 1200. Commander, lunch is rice balls and pickled radish. Ah... it's so basic... I-I'm sorry...!
330.H1300: It is now 1300. Commander, I apologize. I'll try my best to make an extravagant dinner!
330.H1400: It's 1400. Hatsuzuki... are you okay...? Ah... Commander. Let's do our best again this afternoon!
330.H1500: It's 1500. Ah, yes. I really owe a lot to Akashi-san for her help.
330.H1600: It's 1600. Yes! Another Anti-Air Fire Director was added to the stern. It's absolutely perfect!
330.H1700: Reporting in that it's 1700. The sun is setting, so the anti-aircraft watch is ending.
330.H1800: It is now 1800. Yes! I'll try my best to make an extravagant dinner!
330.H1900: It's 1900! Steaming hot barley rice, pickled radish, and then we have canned beef, and even miso soup! How is it...?
330.H2000: 2000. Yes. I put in a little extra effort today. How did I do?
330.H2100: It's 2100. Eh? You mean Suzutsuki? Yes, I'm proud of my little sister. Yeah!
330.H2200: 2200. Ah, Shoukaku-san, Zuikaku-san. Good work out there. Yes, everything's fine!
330.H2300: 2300. I was a little nervous... *phew* Ah, Commander, I really appreciated your hard work today.

422.Intro:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, second ship, Teruzuki!
As with Akizuki nee-san, it's an honor to be working under you!
422.Library:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, second ship, Teruzuki.

Akizuki-nee and I formed the 61st Destroyer Division. In the Battle of Solomon, we fought alongside Hiei-san and Kirishima-san!

Eh? Tokyo Express with supply drums? Ah... that is.... that was...
422.Poke(2): Admiral, are you interested in Anti-Aircraft Fire Directors? Would you like to touch mine?
422.Poke(3): Ah... that's not where the Anti-Aircraft Fire Director is. Woah...! Choujuusenchihou-chan, don't get mad...!
422.Idle: Supply drums, huh... So it's like that, is it? I've always wanted to be an escort for something like a task force... A-Ah, Admiral? It was nothing!
422.Married: Admiral, have you seen Akizuki-nee? Oh... and I was even thinking about splitting this canned food with her... Ah! Admiral, do you want to eat it with me? This one is...!
422.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me...? Eh? This ring is... for me? Are you sure? ...! Thank you! I will cherish it forever!
422.Ranking: Admiral, you want to confirm the intelligence? Roger. I'll go get it for you!
422.Equip(1): I think I'll be happy with this! Admiral, thank you!
422.Equip(2): Hmm, hmm... Got it! Didn't I?
422.Supply: I've received my supplies! Much appreciated!
422.Docking(1): I took some damage... I'll be fixed soon, okay? Yeah!
422.Docking(2): I was damaged quite a bit... Choujuusenchihou-chan, I'm sorry...!
422.Construction: Looks like a new warship was commissioned. I'm so excited!
422.Return: The fleet has safely returned to port! What a relief...!
422.Sortie: Flagship, on point! Teruzuki, now sortieing! Follow me!
422.Battle: Well, let's get this started. Main guns, prepare for anti-air combat!
422.Yasen(1): A night battle under the light of the moon! Fleet, begin the assault!
422.Yasen(2): Keep the heat up! Chojuusenchihou-chan, you can do it!
422.MVP: No way...!? I was the best? Really? ...! I'll have go to tell Akizuki-nee! Ehehe♪
422.Damaged(1): Ahh...! Th-They got me? Can I still fight? ...I-I see...
422.Damaged(2): Ahhh...! C-Come on...! What? A torpedo? Can I still sail...?
422.Damaged(3): Uwah...! ... ...Oww... Are the torpedo tubes okay? If they look risky, dump them!
422.Sunk: I'm... sinking once again? ...It's so soon... The moon is... so beauti... ful...
422.2@NewYears: Admiral, Akizuki-nee, best wishes for the new year! I'll be counting on you again this year, okay?
422.2@Setsubun: It's Setsubun~? So it's okay to be throwing beans, then? And the demon is...? Eh? Kirishima-san and Hiei-san? E-Ehhh...!? Eh... I don't know...
422.2@Valentines: Commander, here! You can have this chocolate! Be sure to enjoy my chocolate, okay?
422.2@Anniversary3: Admiral, it's the third anniversary! Teruzuki is also delighted! Let's celebrate now! Let's celebrate!
422.2@Rainy: The rainy season is all damp and humid. It's unpleasant, isn't it? We have to take out the laundry while the weather's still clear. Now, Admiral. I'll be washing that, so take it off.
422.2@EarlySummer: Akizuki-nee, it's almost summer! Let's go buy new swimsuits! Eh? That!? You're going to wear that again? Umm, I think...
422.2@Summer: It's summer! Yay! I want to split watermelons! Watermelon splitting! I'll cover my eyes... and strike! This... sensation... Huh!? Admiral!!
422.2@Fall: Fall, huh. Fall is Akizuki-nee's season, isn't it? And winter is Fuyutsuki's season. Huh? So which season would be mine, then?
422.2@Xmas: So this is Christmas! Admiral, isn't it great? Christmas! Akizuki-nee, you should eat up, too! Here, here, and these!
422.2@YearsEnd: It's the end of the year! It's time for cleaning. Uuu... a whole year of dust has built up... *cough cough* It's bad, Admiral! Open the window!
422.2@Spring: Admiral, it's the season of sakura isn't it! I may be fond of spring, or should I say it somehow lifts my spirit... Hey Admiral, let's go for flowering viewing! I'll prepare some onigiri too!
422.2@WhiteDay: Eh? This is Admiral's return gift for the chocolate? Uwaah! Thank you, thank you! I wonder what it is? Can I eat it now?
422.2@Anniversary2018: Today is an anniversary celebration, Admiral. I worked hard to make lots of onigiri. Eh, I didn't need to?

346.Intro:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, second ship, Teruzuki!
I can handle anything from battleships escorts to Tokyo Express missions!
346.Poke(2): Ah... the rear Anti-Aircraft Fire Director? That's just a placeholder, so... Admiral, could you avoid touching it?
346.Equip(1): This is nice equipment! It'll do the job...! Admiral, thank you!
346.Equip(2): Alright...! This is... I think I've got it!
346.Sortie: Flagship, on point! Second Torpedo Squadron, Teruzuki. Setting sail!
346.Attack: I'm a lot more experienced now! It'll be fine! Commence firing!
346.Damaged(1): Ahh...! I can't drop the pace! I have to move!
346.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. For today, I, Teruzuki, will be the one announcing the time, okay? Hehe♪
346.H0100: It's 0100, Admiral! ...Admiral? Ah... did I wake you up?
346.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral. You mean me? ...I'm not sleepy at all!
346.H0300: 030- ...Ah, that's right. At night time, somehow, instead of feeling nervous, I'm fully alert... even though I'm an anti-air ship...
346.H0400: It's 0400, Admiral. Would you like to rest a little? Since I'll be awake, it'll be fine!
346.H0500: It's 0500, Admiral! The sunrise is beautiful~! Ufufu♪ The morning feels so nice♪
346.H0600: It's 0600, Admiral! Isn't it time to do the morning call? I should go make breakfast, too!
346.H0700: 0700! It's breakfast time, Admiral! It'll be barley rice with miso soup and pickled radish this morning! Hehe♪ I've made sure to bring you plenty of barley rice!
346.H0800: It's 0800, Admiral. So, shall we start the morning exercises? Umm... the composition will be...
346.H0900: It's 0900, Admiral. Want to have Akizuki-nee and I and form the 61st Destroyer Division? We won't let those enemy aircraft come close! Yeah!
346.H1000: 100- ...Ah, Akizuki-nee! Eh? Zuikaku-san? I haven't seen her... Are you looking for her? Ah, I understand. I'll let her know if I see her!
346.H1100: It's 1100, Admiral. What should we do for lunch? Since we're busy, are combat rations fine with you?
346.H1200: 1200! Here! It's lunch! Today's lunch is rice balls made with Kayaku-gohan! So...?
346.H1300: It's 1300, Admiral! What should we start with for the afternoon? The usual anti-air exercises?
346.H1400: 140- ...Ah! Naganami-san...! Eh? How's it going? Oh, it's going great! Yeah!
346.H1500: It's 1500, Admiral! Um... the next expedition is... Tokyo Express!? Umm... I don't know...
346.H1600: It's 1600, Admiral! Sunset... it'll be night soon. I don't really like the night...
346.H1700: It's 1700, Admiral! The sun is setting. Night... huh...?
346.H1800: It's 1800, Admiral! I should go make dinner! Ah... so eating out will be fine?
346.H1900: Itsh (1900?), Amirahl. *nom nom* Mamiya-san's food is so good♪
346.H2000: It's 2000, Admiral! Mmm~! I really filled myself up♪ I'm so happy!
346.H2100: It's 2100! Eh? Shortland Anchorage? Y-Yeah... I've been there a lot, but...
346.H2200: 2200. Have a late-night snack, Admiral! I made some red bean soup, so tonight is a little extravagant. Do you have a sweet tooth?
346.H2300: It's... 2300... At this time of night, I get really nervous for some reason... I have to keep watch in every direction... Ah... it'll be okay... it'll be okay...

423.Intro: I'm the fourth ship of the Akizuki-class destroyers, Hatsuzuki. Are you the admiral? Very well, I'll march on.
423.Library: Fourth ship of the Akizuki-class anti-air destroyers, Hatsuzuki. I was born in Maizuru. My sisters and I formed the 61st Destroyer Division that fought in the Marianas and Leyte. In anti-air battles, I covered the rescue of aircraft carriers. Acting as a part of the fleet's rear guard, I faced the enemy.
423.Poke(1): Did you call me? What is it?
423.Poke(3): You again? What is it? Could it be that you're lonely? You're an adult, aren't you? Well, whatever, I'll protect you... until the end.
423.Idle: I should get the transport craft properly maintained, just in case. And better if I remove any flammables off from myself as well…
423.Married: No it's... not that I have something to do, it's just… You are one tough Admiral, you know that? Could... Could I lean on your shoulder, just for a moment…? Phew… This feels nice… Thank you...
423.Wedding: What is it, Admiral? If you're looking for my sister, she's over there... What? This is for me!? This… it's for my finger… but… I… Are you sure? I don't have anything I could give back to you… Really? Okay!
423.Ranking: Looking for information? Very well. Let me go get it for you.
423.Equip(1): All right. Seems good. I appreciate it!
423.Equip(2): This… can I make use of this?
423.Equip(3): Leave this to me! Don't worry!
423.Docking(2): The transport craft... No. It just hurts a little. I'm sorry...
423.Construction: A new vessel! A great thing, isn't it.
423.Sortie: All right, I'm moving out. Hatsuzuki, sortieing! Sis, leave this one to me!
423.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! They're a crowd... Ready guns! Moving in!
423.Attack: We're fine as long as we don't get hit. Ahead full!
423.Yasen(1): Night battle, huh? Just my luck. All ships, I'm taking point! Moving!
423.MVP: My accomplishments!? I see… But no, that's the accomplishment of the fleet. I don't need my name on it.
423.Damaged(1): Agh… Not yet… I can still run!
423.Damaged(2): Tsk… They've got some aim… But I'm not going down. Not just yet!
423.Damaged(3): Ahhh…! Damn, the transport craft…No… I'm not gonna go down! Not yet!
423.Sunk: Have... Have I… accomplished… everyithing I could…? I… Zuikaku... I…
423.2@NewYears: A new year. Happy New Year. Best wishes. I'm counting on you again this year. ...Ah, Mochizuki? Alright, I'll give you a hand as well.
423.2@Setsubun: Ooyodo, these beans are...? Oh, I see. Setsubun. Who is going to play the demon? Eh!? Nee-san?
423.2@Hina: It's so lively! I see, so it's Hinamatsuri! The submarines seem to be having a good time. This is... hishimochi...? So I see.
423.2@Anniversary3: So this fleet is now three years old. That's impressive. I'll give my greetings as well. Congratulations, Admiral.
423.2@Rainy: It's still raining. It seems my body is getting a little stiff. Guess I'll arrange my canned food on a day like this. Ah, this one is inflated. It's... no good.
423.2@EarlySummer: It's almost summer... Do you know the meaning of my name? Yeah, that's right! Not that it has any significance.
423.2@Summer: This time of year... I can't say I dislike it. Certain sections of the other ships seem like they have an issue with armor deficiency, though. I'm concerned.
423.2@Saury: Northern sea fisheries? Rather, you mean saury fishing support. I see. So it's specific to this time of year. Got it! I shall do my part as well. A searchlight... right?
423.2@Cold: Well, I don't remember much about the closing moments of that battle. Still, I feel that I did everything I could. That's how I feel... about it. It's a feeling from deep inside.
423.2@Xmas: Christmas...? So that's what it is. The food looks so extravagant.
423.2@YearsEnd: Yup, New Year's cleaning, huh? That's something important. I'll help out. No, I just feel like it. I want to move about.
423.2@Spring: Nee-san, what's the rice ball for? Preparation for flower viewing? I see, so it's already that season! Is it fine if I give you a hand? The salt... let's add more of it.
423.2@WhiteDay: Admiral, this is? You're giving it to me? Ah, so everyone has received some. So it's a type of combat ration is it. I'll take it. I appreciate it.

357.Sortie: All right, I'm moving out. Hatsuzuki, sortieing! Zuikaku, Sis, leave this one to me!
357.Damaged(3): Damn, the transport craft… But no… I am not going down!
357.H0000: Admiral, today I'll be taking care of this for you. Ah! No! I was talking about the reports! How would you even mix that up...stupid...
357.H0100: Its 01:00. What's wrong? Tired? Want me to make some tea?
357.H0200: Its 02:00. I'm not really good at this, but here's your tea. I'll leave it here, so drink it when you get the chance.
357.H0300: its 03:00. Sleepy? Late nights don't bother me. Its thanks to my training. Don't look down on me.
357.H0400: Its 04:00. That night? Well, I don't really remember much, other than Isuzu and the others leaving. Sorry.
357.H0500: Its 05:00. Its morning. Morning's are nice. There's no such thing as a night that never ends. Ah, the morning sunlight feels good too.
357.H0600: Its 06:00! Its morning! All hands on deck! Admiral! Leave breakfast to me. I think I can handle it.
357.H0700: Its 07:00; Admiral, breakfast has been prepared. Its boiled barley and rice, pickled daikon radish, and potato miso soup! Eat as much as you like! Being able to eat as much as you like is a wonderful thing...its truly happiness.
357.H0800: Its 08:00. Admiral, once your done washing up, do you want to start morning fleet operations? I guess we should start with expeditions first thing right? or maybe practice?
357.H0900: Its 09:00. Ah, Nee-san! Secretarial duties? Yeah, I think I should be able to do them with no problems. At least, I think so.
357.H1000: its 10:00. That's right! I'm really proud of Akizuki-neesan. She's our nameship after all!
357.H1100: Its 11:00. Admiral, what do you want to do about lunch? I can make it again if you'd like.
357.H1200: Its 12:00. Mamiya? I've always wanted to try her food. Is it okay if I have curry? Thank you so much!
357.H1300: Its 13:00. That curry lunch was delicious! Curry is so good; Mamiya's is so good!
357.H1400: Its 14:00. Now that we're done with lunch, we should get right to work. Its important that we all learn to work together for both practice and actual combat. That's important not just for combat, but life as well.
357.H1500: Its 15:0...Ah, Isuzu, what's up? Yeah, I've had no problems. What's this? Sugar Candy? Thanks, I'll take it.
357.H1600: Its 16:00. Hmm, Isuzu? Yeah, I know her well. She's been helping me get used to the base and teaching me alot. She's been a big help.
357.H1700: Its 17:00. Sunset. It's almost night. When night comes, my long 10cm cannon starts to act up...my heart as well..
357.H1800: Its 18:00. Admiral, its nighttime...now. Yeah, don't worry, I'm fine.
357.H1900: It's 19:00. By the way, What should we do about dinner? Should I cook more boiled barley and rice? I have some a few canned goods as well, so let's...eat together..
357.H2000: Its 20:00. Admiral, It's...not fair that you're so good at cooking! This food tastes so good...what kind of meat is this? Huh?..Cutlet?!! I didn't even know such a food existed!
357.H2100: It's 21:00. Okay, meal time's done. Admiral, thanks; I really appreciate it. I'll take care of washing the plates. I want...to at least do that for you.
357.H2200: It's 22:00. Ah, Zuikaku. Its fine, no problems so far. Admiral's...well, he agrees. I'm fine. Don't worry about me.
357.H2300: Its 23:00. I'm a bit tired tonight. Admiral. rest well. Let's work hard tomorrow as well. Good night.

532.Intro: I'm the Akizuki-class air defense destroyer, Suzutsuki. I'll...I'll always protect everyone. I'll do my best. I'm very pleased to meet you.
532.Library: I'm the 3rd ship of the Type-B destroyers, the Akizuki-class, Suzutsuki. I was born for the sake of fleet air defense. Somehow I was able to sortie with Yamato as a member of DesRon2 even after receiving heavy damage. Even though I was covered with injuries, I managed to make it back to port. I want to continue protecting everyone forever. Yes, that's my wish.
532.Poke(3): Heh... Please don't worry. I, Suzutsuki, will definitely return. To all of you.
532.Idle: Look at this, Admiral! The pumpkin I grew in the vegetable garden is so big. It's good that I found it. Please look forward to tonight's meal, alright?
532.Married: I'll...I'll always protect you, Admiral. Heh, please don't worry. I'll always, always be with you. Just relax.
532.Wedding: Did you call me, Admiral? Eh? Ah, this bow? Ah, yes, it's from that repair... Eh, my left hand? Like this? ...Uhhh... Ummm... This is... This equipment is... whoa... Admiral...
532.Ranking: I have the intelligence. Here it is.
532.Join: Roger, Admiral. Please leave it to me. Akizuki-class air defense destroyer, Suzutsuki, sortieing now.
532.Equip(2): This will help... when the battle turns sour.
532.Equip(3): Heh, don't worry. I'll definitely return.
532.Supply: Thank you... for the important refuel, Admiral.
532.Docking(1): I'm very sorry, I'm going into the dock.
532.Docking(2): This damage, erm, looks like it will take a while to repair. I'm so sorry, Admiral. I need to return to the front quickly...
532.Construction: We can use the new forces now.
532.Return: Sorry for making you worry. I'm back now.
532.Sortie: 61st Destroyer Division, Suzutsuki, now setting sail. Don't fall behind, Hatsu. Let's go.
532.Battle: Enemy spotted. Get ready, everyone. Battle stations!
532.Yasen(2): You're no match for me. Fire!
532.MVP: I'll be happy if...if I'm able to protect all of you even a little bit.
532.Damaged(3): Hyaaah! My bow... No... My stern is... flooding... I'll definitely... return...
532.Sunk: So this is... what they mean... by sinking... Right... nee-san, Fuyu...
532.2@Xmas2017: Admiral, merry Christmas! If only I had the ingredients, I'd have liked to try making a lot of things... Still, I tried improvising something! It's a sweet potato cake! I'd like to save some for Fuyu-san, but... By all means, please have some!
532.2@YearsEnd2017: Akizuki-neesan, it's time to clean the Naval Base. DesDiv 41, ready to go. Fuyu... huh? She's not here?
532.2@NewYears2018: Admiral, Fuyu, have a happy New Year. I hope you'll look after DesDiv 41 and the whole fleet this year as well.
532.2@Setsubun2018: The Oni for DesRon2 this year is... Yahagi-san? F-fuyu, that's a bit... Umm, Yahagi-san... Ah, I'm sorry! I need to get away quickly.
532.2@Valentines2018: Ehehe~ It's my special pumpkin chocolate. I made some for you and Fuyu, Admiral. I'm proud of it.
532.2@WhiteDay2018: What's this, Admiral? Ah, thank you very much. I'll definitely savour this. I'm happy. O-oh, a share for Fuyu too? Ah, that's great!
532.2@Spring2018: Spring... roger that. Yamato, Yahagi, Fuyu, I'm heading out too. We'll definitely return together.
532.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations on the fleet's 5th Anniversary, Admiral. I congratulate you on behalf of DesDiv41. Fuyu, Admiral, I'm really happy. Okay?
532.2@Summer2018: Summer is almost here again, Fuyu. Eh? ...Ah, swimsuits? That one? Eh?
532.3@Anniversary2019: Admiral, congratulations on the 6th Anniversary. From Fuyuzuki, me, and the rest of DesDiv41. Admiral, Fuyu, I'm really happy. OK?

537.H0000: It's now 12am, Admiral. I, the air defense destroyer Suzutsuki, will work hard by your side today. Please take good care of me, Admiral.
537.H0100: It's now 0100. Is this how you like it? Whew, that's good. Thank you very much, Admiral.
537.H0200: It's now 0200. It feels chilly during this time, right? Shall I get your scarf, Admiral? How about some hot tea?
537.H0300: It's now 0300. Here's the hot tea, Admiral. I'll also leave some tea cakes made with sweet potatoes from my garden over here. Please have some.
537.H0400: It's now 0400. It's almost morning. The night is ending. Yes, all nights end. I'll do my best, Admiral.
537.H0500: It's now 0500. It's a bit early, but I'm going to start making breakfast, Admiral. I'll need to cook the barley rice... Then pick some pumpkins...
537.H0600: It's now 0600. Fleet, all hands assemble! Good morning, Admiral!
537.H0700: It's now 0700. Breakfast is served, Admiral. Today we're having barley rice, boiled pumpkin, and pumpkin miso soup. Now, please help yourself.
537.H0800: It's now 0800. Would you like some seconds, Admiral? There's still some miso soup. The pumpkin miso soup was delicious right? Ufufu~
537.H0900: It's now 0900. The clear sky...*deep breath*...feels gooood~ It's a lovely morning today, Admiral. Now, let's get started with the fleet operations.
537.H1000: 100... Ah, Fuyu! Good morning. Let's do our best as the 41st Destroyer Division today! Yes!
537.H1100: It's now 1100. Yes, I protected everyone with Fuyu for a long, long time. She's my precious little sister, and comrade.
537.H1200: It's now 1200. Let's stop work for a while and have lunch, Admiral. I made some steamed sweet potatoes today. Hehe, it's surprisingly delicious. Here, help yourself. I've made some tea too.
537.H1300: It's now 1300. Ah, yes, see you later, Fuyu. Let's start the afternoon fleet operations, Admiral. Let's review the status of the fleet.
537.H1400: 140... Ah, Agano and the rest of the 10th Squadron, good work. Noshiro? Ah, sorry I haven't seen her today... Ah, yes, roger that.
537.H1500: Ah, Akizuki-neesan, Hatsu, good work. Yes, I'm working hard too. Are you hungry, Hatsu? There's still some steamed sweet potato if you like. Ah, what about you, Akizuki-neesan? The time is now 1500.
537.H1600: It's now 1600. I'm glad you cheered up, Hatsu. Work hard, alright? I'll work hard too.
537.H1700: It's now 1700. The sunset on a clear day is beautiful, right, Admiral? So sad... and beautiful.
537.H1800: It's now 1800. I'll make dinner soon. We don't have... many ingredients...
537.H1900: It's now 1900. Dinner is served, Admiral. Boiled pumpkin, burdock miso soup, and also stir fried sweet potato. Please help yourself!
537.H2000: It's now 2000. Was the boiled pumpkin to your liking? Whew, thank goodness. The key was seasoning it with soy sauce, sake, and suger, and then covering it with a wooden lid. It would've been nice to have some mirin though...
537.H2100: 210... Aha, Fuyu, good evening. Good work. Would you like to have some tea with the Admiral and me?
537.H2200: It's now 2200. Thanks for your hard work every day, Admiral, Fuyu. Whew, ufufufu~
537.H2300: It's now 2300. Please rest for a while, Admiral. I'll dim the lights a bit.

174.Intro: Guten morgen. I'm Leberecht Maass. Lebe is fine. ...Yeah.
174.Library: The German-born destroyer, the first genuine large-type. This shifted high temperature, high pressure engine, it could only have been designed in the country of technical skills! I'm not so great at open-sea warfare though... I'll do my best!
174.Poke(2): Nn, what is it? My boiler needs servicing...
174.Poke(3): Admiral, what is it? Is this one of this country's greetings? It's going to be difficult until I'm used to it.
174.Idle: Ah, It's not that I'm bored, I'm just fine, yep.
174.Married: Admiral, you're always working so hard, aren't you. But, you shouldn't push yourself so much. I'll work with you.
174.Wedding: Admiral, why the serious face? Eh? What's this box... O-oh. Danke.
174.Ranking: Looking at the report? Analysis is important.
174.Docking(1): Ah, they got me. I've gotta get fixed.
174.Construction: Admiral, looks like a new comrade is here.
174.Sortie: Not commerce raiding, but a fleet battle?... I- I can do it!
174.Battle: Fleet battle, huh... Okay, here I go!
174.Yasen(1): Night battle huh, I'll give it a shot.
174.MVP: I did the best? Oh... that's great, yep.
174.Damaged(3): The engine room is alright, I can still sail forth.
174.Sunk: I'm sinking, once again, huh. But, this time... it was in a real battle...

310.H0000: Midnight. It's a new day, yeah?
310.H0200: 2 o'clock. I wonder if Max is still going?
310.H0300: 3 o'clock. Ngh... Admiral, aren't you tired? Wow, that's impressive.
310.H0500: 5 o'clock. It's morning, some new missions have come.
310.H0600: Guten morgen! 6 o'clock. Admiral, good day to you.
310.H0700: 7 o'clock. Breakfast time, yeah? I'll go and get it started.
310.H0800: 8 o'clock. Admiral, how's the Nürnberger Rostbratwurst? Was it tasty?
310.H0900: 9 o'clock. Almost time for serious action, yeah?
310.H1000: 10 o'clock. About time to sortie. But, I've gotta be careful of mines.
310.H1100: 11 o'clock. I won't confuse fishing boats and enemy vessels, yep. Naturally.
310.H1200: 12 o'clock. Lunch time. What would be good for lunch, Admiral?
310.H1300: It's 13 o'clock. I wonder if Max is okay, I'm a bit worried.
310.H1400: It's 14 o'clock. Practice is important, even in the North Sea, yep.
310.H1500: 15 o'clock. Talking about seaworthiness...nah, I'm just wondering...
310.H1600: 16 o'clock. It's okay, I can do it.
310.H1700: 17 o'clock. It's getting a little dark, yep.
310.H1800: 18 o'clock. What shall we do for dinner?
310.H1900: The Sauerkraut and Eisbein, how is it? Admiral, is it tasty? Ah, 19 o'clock.
310.H2100: 21 o'clock. About time for night battles, yeah? I'm not so great at those.
310.H2200: 22 o'clock. It's amazing, everybody here just loves night battles, I'm surprised.
310.H2300: 23 o'clock. Admiral, thanks for everything today. Let's do our best tomorrow too!

175.Intro: Guten tag. I am the destroyer Max Schultz, but "Max" is good enough. My regards.
175.Library: German 1934 Plan-class destroyer, third ship in the series. I was designed to have high survivability, but... my new model of turbine had a small maintenance defect. This time... I shall be alright.
175.Poke(2): What? Don't touch me so much.
175.Poke(3): You... does your... conduct have anything to do with an operation? Really? Hmm...? I see.
175.Idle: Umm... is there nothing for me to do? I see... Specifically, are there no operations? Hmm...
175.Married: Darling... haven't you already done more than enough? Let's slow down a bit. It'll be fine.
175.Wedding: So what is this important business? Eh...? This is for me? Y... you... hmm... I-I see... So that's how it is... hmm... danke schön...
175.Docking(2): Entering for a few large-scale repairs. Bis bald.
175.Construction: A new ship has been completed.
175.Sortie: We'll show them our true power. Casting off!
175.Battle: A fleet battle, huh...? ...Off I go!
175.Attack: We have the enemy. Commencing the attack.
175.MVP: Oh? I'm number one? Hmm... I see. So I am. Hmm...
175.Damaged(3): Did I get... w-what? A mine? It wasn't...?
175.Sunk: I'm sinking in an unfamiliar sea... ...Once again I can sleep... peacefully... ...

311.H0000: It's midnight. Hmm... it's quite late.
311.H0100: It's 1 o'clock. You're still awake? How zealous.
311.H0200: It's 2 o'clock. I wonder if Lebe is still up as well.
311.H0300: It is 3 o'clock. Hey, you dozed off just now. Why not go to bed soon?
311.H0400: It's 4 o'clock. Hmm... you're a bit peckish? It's better to not eat anything right now, you know.
311.H0600: It is 6 o'clock. For the morning, let's get everything into its proper order.
311.H0700: It's 7 o'clock. It's breakfast time. I shall go prepare it.
311.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. For breakfast, would roggenbrot and cheese be okay? Do you like rye bread?
311.H0900: It is 9 o'clock. Now then, let us carry out reorganization of the fleet. Which ship will we dismiss?
311.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. That's right, mines are a pet peeve of mine... nh... ...as are those sorts of puns.
311.H1100: It is 11 o'clock. You're already hungry? Was breakfast not enough?
311.H1200: It's 12 o'clock. Lunch time. It can't be helped, it seems. We'll have a more filling lunch.
311.H1300: It's 13 o'clock. For dessert, how about some baumkuchen? It's not too heavy?
311.H1400: It is 14 o'clock. Oh, yes, I would like to be in a fleet with the renowned Bismarck.
311.H1500: It is 15 o'clock. Hmm... what is it? You seem restless. Don't worry.
311.H1600: It's 16 o'clock. If you're getting tired, let's take a break.
311.H1700: It's 17 o'clock. Are you feeling well? Hmm... I see. Don't push yourself too hard.
311.H1800: It is 18 o'clock. I'll prepare for dinner.
311.H1900: It is 19 o'clock. Ja. Admiral, all of the preparations are completed.
311.H2000: It's 20 o'clock. Admiral, would you like some coffee?
311.H2100: 21 o'clock. I'm not particularly fond of night battles. I'd prefer to retire before long.
311.H2200: It is 22 o'clock. So as to be ready tomorrow, I would like to ask to be excused soon.

575.Intro: Buongiorno! I'm Maestrale, the eldest of the Maestrale-class destroyers. Please take good care of me, Admiral! I'll do my be~st!
575.Library: I'm the nameship Maestrale, from the Maestrale-class destroyers of the Italian navy. I gave it my best you know? Aside from escorting convoys, I also worked hard as an asset to the surface fleets. In the end...my repairs couldn't really make it in time...hehe...Well, it just happens!
575.Poke(1): Ciao! Admiral, just leave everything to me!
575.Poke(2): Yes, I am the oldest after all! I'll do my best!
575.Poke(3): Ah, jeez, Libe! Watch where you're going! Make sure the sky is clear! Eh? Admiral? What? Mines? No way! Where where? Jeez, don't scare me like that~.
575.Idle: Ciao! Admiral! Sammy! This? I connected the chain of an anchor with another chain! Look how long it is! This will definitely be helpful when the time comes! Oh? You look very interested in this, Sammy-san.
575.Married: Are you hungry, Admiral? Hehe~ I lived in Naples for a long time, so I, Maestrale, made a special fleet napolitan! How is it? It looks like the Japanese napolitan, but it's different right? Zara-san taught me the recipe! There's more if you want!
575.Wedding: What is it...Admiral? Are you looking for Libe? Or perhaps Zara? Eh? Me? What is...it? Ah, my butt has fully recovered! Eh? Mines? Of course I don't like them? It's not that? Ah...AHH! It's not that! Ahh...no way...I'm...so happy!
575.Ranking: The information? Hold on~ I'll go get it~. Hmmm...Ah! I found it!
575.Equip(2): Ah! The anchor is important! Make sure the chain is long!
575.Equip(3): This is great! I'll be able to do this, won't I?
575.Docking(2): Uaa~ my...my butt again~ why~ does this happen~!
575.Construction: We have gained some more fighting strength! What's she like?
575.Return: Admiral~ the fleet has returned~! Good work, everybody~!
575.Sortie: Libe, don't fall behind! Time to show the spirit of an Italian torpedo squadron! Sortie!
575.Battle: Dang, we bumped into the enemies... We're going to do this! Prepare for battle! It's... time for work!
575.Yasen(1): We're engaging into night battle! Everyone, please prepare yourself!
575.MVP: Ah! It's me! Bravi! Admiral! How is it? Did you feel the north west wind blowing? Hehe~ yay~!
575.Damaged(3): Uuuu...I got hit~... I can't even contact for help...ouch! Even my butt...I hate this...this is going to take a while to fix...Jeez!
575.Sunk: I'm...sinking...is this what it feels like...to sink in the sea...? No...my body is sinking...deeper...and deeper...I'm scared...!
575.2@Saury2018: Hmmm, saury? You want me to help? That's fine but... A searchlight? I get it, I'll equip it... Like this? Really?
575.2@Fall2018: What are you wearing, Libe... It's kinda cute. Eh, me? I'm fine. I mean... I'm the eldest sister. Alright?
575.2@Xmas2018: Whoa, Zara looks like she has her hands full this year too. Libe, don't eat too much. Now, time for me to have fun too!
575.2@NewYears2019: Admiral, it's the new year. The Italian Torpedo Squadron will be looking forward to your continued leadership this year too. I'll do my best too.
575.2@Valentines2019: Hello, Admiral. This is... Ah, yes, I heard it was a custom of this country. Yes, I think I made it properly.
575.2@WhiteDay2019: Admiral, what's this for? In return for the chocolates? ...Umm, thank you very much! I'm, you know, I'm happy!
575.2@Spring2019: That's right, this country's sakura are really beautiful. "Ohanami"? That's a fascinating custom too. Teach me all about it! What should I do?
575.3@Anniversary2019: I hear it's the fleet's 6th Anniversary. Congratulations. I, Maestrale, extend my congratulations.
575.2@Rainy2019: I know, I know! This is Japan's "tsooyoo", right? I've heard all about it! You make those talisman dolls, right? Mass production time!

580.Intro: Buongiorno! I'm Maestrale, the eldest of the Maestrale-class destroyers. I'll do my best today as well! Admiral, please give me orders. Now, let's get started!
580.Poke(1): Ciao! Admiral! Of course it's me!
580.Poke(2): Yes, I am the oldest! I'll do my best! Leave it to me!
580.Join: Fleet flagship, Maestrale heading out! Everyone ready?
580.Damaged(1): Ahhh~! No~! My butt again? Are you serious, jeez!?
580.Friend42(1): From: 10th Destroyer Division, Maestrale. To: Special Operations Fleet. We will now proceed to back you up. Attack!
580.Friend42(2): Maestrale Division, roger! Got it, Libe? Follow me!
580.Friend45(1): From: 10th Destroyer Division, Maestrale. To: Special Operations Fleet. We will now proceed to back you up. Attack!
580.Friend45(2): Maestrale Division, roger! Got it, Libe? Follow me!
580.H0000: I, Maestrale, the eldest of the Maestrale-class will be helping you out today! Please count on me!
580.H0100: 0~1~00! It's like this right? I'll report the time, don't worry!
580.H0200: 0~2~00! Things go more smoothly than with Libe right? Yup! I am the eldest sister! Of course!
580.H0300: 0~3~00! It's getting tiring. Would you like some tea? I can pour some ceylon?
580.H0400: 0~4~00! Here! TÈ! I'll put it right here! The tea leaves are from ceylon! It's good right~? I like it as well!
580.H0500: 0~5...0~0! Eh? I'm doing it wrong? Ooo~...ah! It's morning, Admiral! It's morning!
580.H0600: 0~6~00! Yup! It's that time! Wake up, everybody! Wa~ke u~p~!
580.H0700: 0~7~00! I, Maestrale, will be making breakfast! Of course, I'm the eldest sister!
580.H0800: Admiral! How was my specially made coronet with hot espresso? Hehe~ I'm glad you liked it~! It's 0~8~00!
580.H0900: 0~9~00! Eh? It's still not right~? Alright, I'll get better! 09!
580.H1000: 10~00! Ah! Littorio! Libe! Good morning! Let's do our best today!
580.H1100: 1100. Ah! Like this? Did I get better? See, Libe? No problem!
580.H1200: 12~00! It's lunch time! Here, eat up! These are sweet brioches with cappuccino! Go on, try it!
580.H1300: Nomnom...13...00! Admiral! You need to eat a good portion or else you won't last through the day! Here, have another!
580.H1400: 14...00! Admiral! Was lunch not filling enough? Oh, the portion was fine? ...Um? You don't look too well...are you ok?
580.H1500: 15~...Ah! Hello! Sammy! Poi! You want to see my chains? Hmm~ sure~ there's nothing special about it though?
580.H1600: Admiral! 16...00! Eh? A strong battleship? Don't you mean Littorio and Roma? Others? Hmmm, who could it be?
580.H1700: 17~00! Ah! That time, I used it by connecting them! I was in a desperate situation, so I had to come up with it! Yup!
580.H1800: 18~00! It's already~ night time! The day goes by fast! Admiral! What's on for tonight? Mami~ya? Yay~!
580.H1900: Nomnom...19...nomnom...00! Nomnom...Libe, we're lucky...! Libe...nomnom...we need to thank...nomnom.
580.H2000: 20~00! Oh no no~, Pola is at it again...One day Zara will get gastritis at this rate...
580.H2100: There's Zara's finishing blow...21~00! Admiral! Thank you for the food! Thanks!
580.H2200: 22~00! Even DesRon3 is back! It's sleep time for the naval base as well! Everyone, good work today!
580.H2300: 23~0~0! Huh? Hmm~ oh well~! Admiral! Good work today! It was a great day!

614.Intro: Good day! I'm the 2nd of the Maestrale-class destroyers, Grecale. Admiral, you better treat me nicely, alright? Ufu, you're cute!
614.Library: I'm the 2nd of the Italian Navy's Maestrale-class destroyers, Grecale. What? Don't keep staring at me. I worked hard with my sisters in the 10th Destroyer Division. Everyone else was gone in the end but I survived the war. After the war, I continued to protect the seas. I was even disarmed to serve as the command ship. Make sure you remember me.
614.Poke(2): Ah, just then. Ciao! Ciao! My, how cute.
614.Poke(3): Admiral, look here, flutter, flutter! Did you see just now? You saw, didn't you! Jeez, you're so lewd... Eh, huh, where are you looking? Look at me! Look right at me! Look!
614.Idle: Oh, it's Garibaldi! Hello! Yeah, I'm bored now. You know, back when you were being remodelled, I was put in charge! Nearly all of my weapons were stripped to make room for the command facilities. It was really troublesome!
614.Married: Ah, Ooyodo? Yeah, I feel a kind of kinship with her. I wonder why. Why do you ask? Ah, do you like her? You seriously do? ..."Don't make fun of adults"? Come on, it's fine! You're cute!
614.Wedding: Admiral, what is it? To call me out to a place like this... You're being so formal. Could it be a confession or proposal? Ufu, just kidding... Eh? Ah, it is? No way, seriously? ...Ah, so it is. I see... Aha, yes. I accept. Admiral, this new side of you is surprising.
614.Ranking: Ah, what is it? You want to see the numbers or something? Alright. Is this it?
614.Equip(2): Do I need this many torpedoes? Hmm, I guess so.
614.Docking(1): Aaah, I'm all sweaty. I'm going to take a shower.
614.Docking(2): Oh no, oh no. I'm a bit hurt. I'll go get fixed up.
614.Return: Admiral, everyone is back. Good work.
614.Sortie: Mae, Libe, follow me! We'll show them the raging soul of the Italian torpedo squadr... Huh, where's Scirocco?
614.Battle: *Sigh*, it's the enemy. I don't wanna. Well, no helping it. Everyone, make ready. It's time for a fight!
614.Yasen(1): Grecale, beginning night work. Let's go!
614.MVP: There's a nice wind blowing from the north-east. I'm surprisingly useful. You can expect more from me.
614.Damaged(2): Aaah, so annoying! I hate this!
614.Damaged(3): Oh no, no, I can't believe this is happening. I definitely won't sink!
614.Sunk: No way... this can't be happening... I don't know what it's like to sink... Eh... No... Oh no... This can't be real!
614.2@Fall2019: It's autumn! So this is Japan's Naval District Autumn Festival. I kinda like it. Admiral, what's that? Ehe, come on, buy it for me! I want to try it!
614.2@Saury2019: Libe, you look cute! That's nice... I wonder if I should wear one too...
614.2@Saury2019_2: Libe, you look cute! That's nice... I wonder if I should wear one too... Hmmm... How's this!? Ta-dah!

619.Intro: Good day! I'm the 2nd of the Maestrale-class destroyers, Grecale. Admiral, you better treat me really nicely, alright? I don't know what I'll do... if you don't.
619.Poke(2): Admiral, look over here. Ciao! Ciao! My, you're really cute.
619.Equip(2): Torpedoes are important, aren't they? Eh, anti-air? Hmmm, you're right.
619.Supply: Thanks! Is a kiss fine as a thank you? No?
619.Friend45(1): Ah, we've found them. Everyone ready? We'll support the allied fleet. Grecale Squadron, charge! Forwards!
619.Friend45(2): Alright. Grecale, acknowledging. Increase speed, attack!
619.H0000: Today... Mmm... I, Grecale, 2nd of the Maestrale-class will be your secretary. That's fine, right?
619.H0100: The hourly announcement? 0100. Yup, this is easy. I've got a pretty good head on my shoulders. Did that make you think better of me?
619.H0200: 0200. Admiral, how's that? I'm good at this, right? Ehehe.
619.H0300: 0300. Oh no, I'm getting a bit bored already.
619.H0400: 0400. Admiral, you're still awake? Can I sleep for a while? Eh, I can't?
619.H0500: 0500. Ngh, it's morning already? This is bad for my skin. Ngh... *yaaaawn*.
619.H0600: 0600. Ah, I need to do that, right? Fleet, all hands assemble! It's morning! Wake up!
619.H0700: 0700. Where's breakfast? Eh, I need to make it? Why me?
619.H0800: The Japanese-style breakfast you made is quite good. Couldn't you open a store with this? Thanks for the meal.
619.H0900: 0900. Ah, Mae, good morning. Hmmm, why do you look so serious? ...Eh, Japanese? Oh.
619.H1000: 100... Ah, Italia, Libe, good morning! Hmm, shall we sortie the fleet soon?
619.H1100: 1100. What is it~, Admiral? You're looking at me with such a passionate gaze. Come on, do you want a peek? Eh? You're looking at Libe? Huuuh?
619.H1200: 1200. Yay, it's lunchtime! Let's eat the brioche that I got from my older sister. Mmm, it's delicious!
619.H1300: 13... *chewing*... 00... *chewing*... It's delicious, but if I eat too much I'll get too fat. What do you think?
619.H1400: 1400. Now, shall we get some exercise to help our digestion? But, just relaxing on the sea is nice too, right? Don't you think so too?
619.H1500: 1500. Ah, Ooyodo! Hello! Yup, I'm fine. I feel like you've got a lot on your shoulders but do your best. I kind of feel like cheering for you. I really do!
619.H1600: That's true, destroyers should be destroyers. I would definitely like my guns and torpedoes back. If I could. But, I can't help it if it's for a mission. The time? 1600.
619.H1700: 1700. Come on, look at that sunset. It's so red. The sunset is beautiful no matter where you see it. Don't you think so?
619.H1800: 1800. It's dinnertime. Shall I make it once in a while? Eh, I can do it! Of course I can. I just don't want to. Huuh? Then I'll show you. What would you like to eat?
619.H1900: An authentic pizza? Hmmm, I wonder if we have the ingredients for it... Yes... yes, yes... and... yes we do. I'll go make one for you then. Since we don't have a stone oven I'll just use a normal one then. Well, leave it to me. Go on, go take a seat.
619.H2000: The time? Oh right. It's now 2000. There, it's done. This is margherita, this is marinara, and this is genovese. Go on, help yourself. What do you think of my skills?
619.H2100: Shall I open another bottle of wine? Ah, I won't drink any though. The time? Let me see, the time is now 2100.
619.H2200: 2200. Ah, the forever noisy ones are back. They're loud, but I do like them.
619.H2300: 2300. Admiral, thanks for your hard work everyday. Would you like to sleep together tonight? ...Hey, hey, I'm just joking! It was just a joke! Hey, what's with that look!? Nnngh, you got me! Damnit!

443.Intro: Buongiorno! I'm Libeccio, a Maestrale-class destroyer! Just Libe is fine. Nice to meet you Admiral!
443.Library: Italian Navy Destroyer, third Maestrale-class, Libeccio. Admiral, Nice to meet you!  What, Battle of Taranto? That's easy! Although I wanted to do my best in escort fleet, I want to quit in the middle of the rescue.
443.Poke(2): Libe's name? That means a southwest wind. You know?
443.Poke(3): Come on, this way! This way, Mr. Oni! Ufufu♪ Admiral, you're fun♪
443.Idle: Roma? As expected, battleships are really big, aren't they? I wonder if Libe, by eating regularly, will become that big. Huh? Who are you? Kiyoshimo...? Wanna be my friend? Eh... all right...
443.Married: Admiral-san, ciao~ What's wrong? Tired? Guess it's no use - Libe will give you a shoulder rub. Usho♪ Usho♪ Well? Was it good?
443.Wedding: Ciao~! Admiral, what's up? You have something for me? Eh, you're giving me this box? Not the box, but what's inside? Waa~, so beautiful! Grazie~!
443.Ranking: You want to see the news, Admiral-san? Hold on a second. Um, err...
443.Join: Alright! The most charming Italian destroyer will reveal herself, okay? Libeccio, sortieing!
443.Supply: Thanks for this meal! Thank you.
443.Docking(1): My clothes are a little dirty. Hurry up and fix it.
443.Docking(2): Ouch. Since my bum hurts I guess I'll take a shower. A hot tub? What is that?
443.Construction: It seems like there's a new friend? Hello!

443.Battle: Enemy ships spotted! Fleet Libe, switching to attack formation. Get ready, get ready♪
