443.Yasen(1): Evening, huh. That's fine, it'll be a night battle, won't it? I'll try it!
443.Yasen(2): Libe will take point. Line ahead formation! Let's get serious~!
443.MVP: Hooray!! Libe's number one? Admiral-san, praise me! Yes, please! Praise me!!
443.Damaged(2): W...what? Torpedoes...Stop attacking me while I need help~
443.Damaged(3): Like I said, my bum hurts! Stop it, already!
443.Sunk: Libe...wanted to help properly...To protect everyone...Good...night....
443.2@NewYears: Admiral-san! It's New Year's! Watch me do all the tough jobs one by one this year! I'll be fine! Right?
443.2@LateWinter: Isn't it a little cold? Japanese winters are so cold... Brr~rrr... Eh? Kiyoshi? What? Ko-ta-tsu? Ah! It's warm! This isn't bad at all!
443.2@Setsubun: Setsuboon... Eh? Really? That's really the name of this Japanese ritual? So I throw this? At Bismarck? Then... Eii! Eiii!
443.2@Valentines: Admiral-saan! Fufufu~ should I give you this? Want it? Don't want it? Which one...? Do you want my chocolate? ...Theeeen... it's yours! Here!
443.2@Anniversary3: I'm going to celebrate our third anniversary. Congratulations, Admiral! Hehehe~
443.2@Rainy: Rain! Rain, rain, rain! Isn't this "Tsuuyou" season nothing but rain? So it's that kind of a season.
443.2@Summer: So this is summer in Japan. It's so hot, of course. However, I love this ramune♪ I love this shaved ice♪ Ah, Libe will have strawberry ice! Strawberry!
443.2@Fall: That sound I hear... what's making it? An autumn bug? Ah! So it's called a bell cricket. It sounds nice, huh? Eh? Bell crickets eat watermelon? Really?
443.2@Halloween: Here's my costume. So...? Does it suit me...? It does? Yay! Ehehe♪
443.2@Xmas: Buon Natale! Admiral-san, let's eat some panettone!
443.2@YearsEnd: Why is everyone rushing around everywhere? Shi-wa-su? What event is that? Eh? What's this cloth? A dust cloth? But I don't like cleaning events~!
443.2@Spring: It has gotten a bit warmer. This is what they call "spring of Japan", right? That's the cherry blossom... Huh? It's not? Plum flower? Like the plum used for Ume-boshi? Oh~
443.2@WhiteDay: Ciao, Admiral! Eh, what is it? Is this a return gift for Libe's chocolate? Yay~! Grazie! Japanese admirals are so kind! Whee~!
443.2@Anniversary2018: Isn't today a day to celebrate, Admiral? I'll celebrate too! Congratulations!

347.Friend42(2): Ciao, ciao! I'm here! Are you all doing well? I'm here to back you up! Raaaawr!
347.H0000: Ciao~ Admiral. Libeccio will be your time keeper. No problem, just leave it to me!
347.H0100: Admiral! 0100! How's that? Libeccio's perfect yes? Ehen!
347.H0200: Admiraaal! 0200! Hehe, Libeccio has gotten really good at this you know~!
347.H0300: Admiral! 03...00! Oo~ Isn't Libeccio's already perfect at announcing the time? You can praise me you know? C'mon c'mon!
347.H0400: Admiral! 04...00! It's morning soon huh~ Libeccio... is a little tired now... but I can do it!
347.H0500: Admiraaal! 05...00! It's morning! Morning! Should I wake everyone? Not yet? Wake them? No? Not yet huh...
347.H0600: Aaadmiraaal! 06...00! I'll wake the fleet yes? All personnel wake up~! Waakkeee Uuuupp!
347.H0700: Admiral! 0700! Libeccio... is a little hungry. Ah, Admiral is going to make breakfast for me? Grazie~!
347.H0800: Nom nom nom... Admiraaaal! 08~00! Your hand made breakfast is delicioush! Make more tomorrow!
347.H0900: Admiral! 0900! Now, let's bring out the fleet. Sortie? Expedition? Or training? If it's training, we have to win!
347.H1000: Admiral! 1000! Ah, It's Littorio! Eh, now you're called Italia? Italia? Why? Why?
347.H1100: Admiral, 1100! Air raid? Umm... I'm scared but, I'm not! If you ask me... I don't like submarines. I just don't like it!
347.H1200: Admiraaaal! 1200! What's for lunch? Oh, Mammiya? Yeah, I wanna go! Yaaay!
347.H1300: *munch* Admiral! 1300! Ehehe... Mammiya's food is delicious! Nom nom nom... Eating at Mammiya's all day sounds great! Yeah!
347.H1400: Admiral! 1400! Phew... I ate a bit too much... Let's work out! Exercise! Gonna sortie out! Let's go, let's go!
347.H1500: Admiral! 1500... Ah, Kiyoshii! Yeah, I'm good! Battleships? Yeah, Battleships are strong... Yep, strong indeed.
347.H1600: Admiral! 16...00! Eh? The strongest Battleship? Should it be Littorio or Roma? The others? Hmm... I wonder who...?
347.H1700: Admiraaal! 17...00! Strongest Battleships... Strongest Battleships... Ah, I know! Warspite! That ship was powerful. I kinda remember it.
347.H1800: Admiral! 18...00! It's nighttime. It's so dark! What are we doing for tonight? No, I mean dinner!
347.H1900: Nom nom... Admiral! 19...00! Tonight is also at Mammiya's...Nom nom... I'm so happy! Nom Nom... Let's eat at Mammiya's tomorrow or even after!
347.H2000: Admiraaal! 2000! It's already nighttime. So daaark! Night battle? I wonder... You Japanese really love night battles.
347.H2100: Admiraaaal! 2100~ I felt a bit sleepy~ You don't feel sleepy, Admiral? Really? How matured...
347.H2200: 2200~ Admiral! Big trouble! The Japanese light cruisers are making a ruckus. It's kinda loud! Why is that? Oh, let them be? Really?
347.H2300: Admiraaal! 2300~! Today was a good day~ Let's do our best for tomorrow, too!

519.Intro: Nice to meet you. Lucky Jervis is here! Yeah, that's absolutely right! Leave it to me!
519.Library: I'm the J-class Jervis! Yup, can you call me "Lucky Jervis"? From the Home Fleet to the Mediterranean Fleet, I helped out with escorting, transporting, fighting, and even supporting land battles! "Lucky Jervis"! Remember it, okay?
519.Poke(2): Am I up~? Ah? Not yet? I'm ready whenever~!
519.Poke(3): Could you make a report? Ehh, I have to write it? No~way~! Are you for real?
519.Idle: Battle honour? Hmm~ Where did it go~? Umm.... haha~ Oh well~! Yeah!
519.Married: Darling! Would you like to have some tea~? Jervis will make you some! I'm good at it! Leave it to me!
519.Wedding: Wh~at~? Another battle honour? Eh? It's not...? What~is~it, darling? What's this? It's beautiful~ Lovely! It's for me? Really? Lucky! Yay!
519.Ranking: Wah! You want to see the report~? Gimmie a sec! Here! This, right! Thank you!
519.Join: Lucky Jervis! Heading out! Let's go~!
519.Equip(1): Thank you! I wanna try this out!
519.Equip(2): This~looks~great. Let's take this for a spin!
519.Docking(1): Uwaa~ Well, it can't be helped... I'll fix it in a jiffy!
519.Docking(2): Whoaaa~ dang! Need to hurry up and repair! Sorry!
519.Construction: Someone new~? Nice to meet you!
519.Return: The fleet~ has safely returned! Of course!
519.Sortie: Jervis! Weigh anchor! Everyone~ Follow ME~!
519.Yasen(2): There you are! You won't escape~!
519.Yasen(1): All ships, assault formation! Re-ady? Follow ME~!
519.MVP: Battle honour? Lucky! I'm glad I have been able to help!
519.Damaged(3): No... not yet! Lucky Jervis won't sink!
519.Sunk: No way... No way... Not like this... Lucky Jervis is... I'm...
519.2@WhiteDay2018: What's this? A return gift? I didn't get you anything, though... It's fine? Ehe, thanks! Then I'll definitely get you something next year, alright?
519.2@Spring2018: It's spring! Lucky! The cherry blossoms are pretty too! Lovely! What is it, Darling? A cherry blossom viewing party? I'll definitely help out!
519.2@Rainy2018: It's raining. So this is "Tsuyu" right? Yup, I've heard of it.
519.2@Summer2018: Summer in this country sure is hot. Hmmm? ...What's this lightly armoured rigging? What's it for?
519.2@Saury2018: It's a Sanma Operation, right? Leave it to me. With this excellent sonar, I'll... Eh, that's not enough? This is hard. Teach me, Darling.
519.2@Fall2018: What's wrong, Lady? Ah, it's that, right? That old wound? Now that you mention it, my head hurts too... Yes, let's watch the skies for each other.
519.3@LateFall2018: I'll... I'll need to be careful of *that* during this time of year! Janus, keep the anti-air watch on alert! I hate those things!
519.2@Xmas2018: Darling, Happy Christmas! The cake looks delicious! Come on, let's start eating!
519.2@NewYears2019: Darling, Lucky New Year! Now, let's go! For the first shrine visit!
519.2@Valentines2019: My Darling, this is for you. I must treasure this fleet's traditions. Come on, help yourself.
519.2@WhiteDay2019: Is this in return for the chocolates? Lucky! Thanks, my Darling. Hoooooraaaaaay!

394.Intro: Hey, how's it going? Lucky Jervis, today will be an absolutely fine day as well! All right! Leave it to me!
394.Ranking: Waa~ Darling, do you want to see the report? Gimmie a sec! Alright! This, right! This too~?
394.Equip(1): Darling! Thanks! I can't wait to try this out!
394.Join: Mediterranean Fleet, flagship Lucky Jervis! Heading out!
394.Yasen(1): Darling! Leave night battle to me too! There you are!
394.MVP: Battle honour? Lucky! I'm glad to have been able to help! Darling!
394.H0000: Darling! You're in luck! Today I, Jervis, will help you out with things! You can count on me!
394.H0100: It's 1 o'clock! Hey, leave telling the time to me too!
394.H0200: It's 2 o'clock! Like this, right~? No problem!
394.H0500: It's 5 o'clock! Good morning! Good~ mor~ ning~!
394.H0600: It's 6 o'clock! Let's wake everyone up~! Everyone~ get up!
394.H0700: 7 o'clock! Full breakfast! Here you go! Enjoy!
394.H0800: It's 8 o'clock! The Home Fleet... I wonder how they're doing~?
394.H0900: It's 9 o'clock! Oh, Oak! You look good. Me? I'm totally great, of course!
394.H1000: It's 10 o'clock! Ah~ Kelly? She's... yeah... never mind, she's doing well!
394.H1100: It's 11! Oh~ this? It's anti-submarine equipment. It's a big, big deal! What sorta equipment do you have here? Ohh~ Ahh~, I see... hmmm. Will you be ok?
394.H1200: It is noon! Here's lunch! I made some sandwiches! Here you go! Bon appetit!
394.H1300: It's 1 o'clo...whoa! Hey! You're... right, Yuki... kaze! How is it going!
394.H1400: It's 2 o'clock! Hi, lady~ Lucky Jervis here! Of course!
394.H1500: It's 3 o'clock! Let's tea time! Yes~!
394.H1600: It's 4 o'clock! Janus? Ahh, yeah... it's alright. I'll see her again one day. I just, have a feeling... don't you think, darling?
394.H1700: It's 5 o'clock! Lovely! The sunset at the Mediterranean Sea is great, but the sunset here is pretty as well, darling!
394.H1800: It's 6 o'clock! Now then, day's over! Let's bring back the fleet!
394.H1900: It's 7 o'clock! Darling, we're going out for dinner? Lucky!
394.H2000: *nom nom*... It's... 8 o'clock! Darling, Mami-ya~! It's delicious!
394.H2100: It's 9 o'clock! Hmmm~ Oh? Those noisy heavy cruisers over there... I think I know them... Hey! Hey you! Oh! Whoaaa~!
394.H2200: It's 10 o'clock! Huh? Shigure? What are you doing on such a night? Hmm? For me? Thanks!
394.H2300: It's 11 o'clock! Darling, would you like to drink some of the green tea I got earlier? I'll make you some! Just a moment!

520.Intro: Hi, my name is Janus. Yes, from the same flotilla as Jervis... Eh, you don't know me? You really are unqualified to be admiral. Listen up, alright? You better remember this.
520.Library: I'm the J-class destroyer, Janus. Yes, I worked hard doing lots of things with Jervis and the others in the Home and Mediterranean Fleets. We even fought against a French fleet... During Operation Shingle when Jervis and I were supporting the landings at Anzio, that's when... It looked like Jervis was lightly damaged. Fate is such a fickle mistress...
520.Poke(1): I got it! Leave it to me!
520.Poke(2): Eh? Eeeh? Where is it!? Eh? You're joking? Jeez, stop that!
520.Poke(3): Ah, about that. I don't really want to talk about it anymore. It was so impossibly big. It was just unfair. Ah, Jervis? I think she got off with just a scratch.
520.Idle: Admiral? What is it? Eh, bogey? I don't know what that is. Do you mean an enemy? Outer space? A training ship? What are you talking about? Hmmm, Ginga? I know that, it's the new type of bomber here, right? You don't mean that?
520.Married: Ah, Jervis, is it tea time? I'll go get some tea for you and the Admiral. Just leave it to me, I'll be just fine. ...Ngh, what's with that look? I said I'll be fine!
520.Wedding: What is it, Admiral? Do you have orders for me? If you want Jervis, she's over there. ...Eh, you need me? F-for what? ...Ah, this box is... No way! Is it really for me? Are you fine with me? ...I see. So you are. Thanks a lot. I love you too!
520.Ranking: Information? Just wait a minute, I'll get it for yo... Aaah, whoaaa! Urgh... Umm, thanks. Oopsie.
520.Join: Home Fleet, 7th Destroyer Flotilla, weigh anchor! Janus, sortieing!
520.Equip(1): Thanks a lot. Alright! This is it!
520.Equip(2): This feels great. I can work with this.
520.Docking(1): I got a bit dirty. Can I take a shower? Ehe, thanks!
520.Docking(2): Oh no, my clothes are all... I have to send them for cleaning... I'll get them for this!
520.Construction: A new girl? Welcome to the fleet!
520.Return: Whew, it looks like we somehow made it back safely. Thank goodness.
520.Sortie: I, Janus, will be the flagship. Jervis, are you ready? Follow me!
520.Battle: I've got the enemy in sight.
520.Yasen(2): Just so you know, I'm really quite persistent. Got it!?
520.Yasen(1): Alright, let's finish them! Follow me!
520.MVP: Eh, I worked the hardest? Really? Oh my, Jervis, take a look at my... Y-you've really got a lot of them, huh... Well, no matter. Numbers aren't everything.
520.Damaged(1): Oh no! A-am I still alright? I am?
520.Damaged(2): Whaaaa! I said that hurt! You...!
520.Damaged(3): Whoaaaaah! Urgh, bloody hell! Jeez, I told you this was too much!
520.Sunk: No... It hurts, it's cold... Oh no, am I sinking? ...Jervis, where are you? Hold my hand... Please...
520.2@Fall2019: I like this season. It just passes by peacefully. What's that? *sniff* *sniff*. What's that smell? It smells good. The Naval District Autumn Festival? Ah, Admiral, can we go?
520.2@Saury2019: The saury operation. I've heard all about it. Please let me take part too. I see, so equipment is important. Let's see now... Ah, this might suit me pretty well.

893.Intro: Hi, I'm the J-class destroyer, Janus. Admiral, let's work hard today too. Eh? Ah, what is it? Is there something on my face?
893.Poke(3): Eh, what is it? Jervis, did you say something? Really? That's fine then.
893.Join: Mediterranean Fleet, 14th Destroyer Flotilla, weigh anchor! Janus, sortieing!
893.Equip(2): This feels quite good. I can work with this.
893.Sortie: Leave being the flagship to me, Janus. Everyone, Jervis, are you ready? Follow me!
893.H0000: That's right, I'll be taking care of everything today. That's fine, right? Humph, that's good. Leave it to me.
893.H0100: It's 1 o'clock. Hmmm, what shall we do? Is there anything you'd like to do?
893.H0200: It's 2 o'clock. What do you think, Jervis? Ah, I see. Hmmm.
893.H0300: It's 3 o'clock. It's late at night now but how about we have a late-night tea party? I'll go make some tea then. Leave it to me.
893.H0400: It's 4 o'clock. Would you like another cup of tea? ...Yup, got it. It's almost morning.
893.H0500: It's 5 o'clock. It's morning, Admiral. Good morning! I need to wake everyone up.
893.H0600: It's 6 o'clock. All hands, assemble! I repeat. All hands, assemble! This is not a drill! Wake up! Get up!
893.H0700: 7 o'clock. Admiral, I've made breakfast. Here you go. Go on, help yourself.
893.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. Admiral, did my full breakfast suit your tastes? Really? Great.
893.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. Jervis, good morning. Ah, Ark is here too. The Home Fleet is definitely doing well.
893.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. Yes, we need to be careful around the Mediterranean. Eh, Iron Bottom Sound? I don't know what that is. It sounds like something hard. Where can you find it?
893.H1100: It's elevenses. Hmm? This? This is a sonar. It's an excellent equipment. It's really important for fleet escort! This? This is my magazine. ...Please don't keep touching it. It's dangerous.
893.H1200: It is noon. It's time for lunch. Would you like some of my handmade sandwiches? You would? Then, here you go. Go on, help yourself. Is black tea fine? Then I'll leave a cup here.
893.H1300: It's 1 o'clock. Did you like my sandwiches? You did? Ehehe. Would you like more Earl Grey? You would? Here!
893.H1400: It's 2 o'cl... Oh, Warspite! Good day. How are you? ...I see! I wouldn't expect anything else. I'm fine too. Just look!
893.H1500: It's 3 o'clock. It's tea time. It's really important. Is Earl Grey... fine for today? You would? Great. Wait a minute.
893.H1600: It's 4 o'clock. Jervis, what is it? You're staring at me so intently. Is there something on me? Eh, what is it?
893.H1700: It's 5. I don't really like the sunset on the Mediterranean. But, the sunset here is beautiful. Ehe, I like it.
893.H1800: It's 6 o'clock. Now then, it's about time we brought the fleet back to port. What are we doing for dinner? We're going out? Really?
893.H1900: It's 7 o'clock. So this is Mamiya's, the restaurant I've heard about. I can't wait! Can I call Jervis too? Ehe, great!
893.H2000: It's 8 o... Mmm, this is delicious! Mamiya's is incredible! Ah, Jervis is here. Over here! We're over here!
893.H2100: It's 9 o'clock. ... Umm, I think I remember that noisy heavy cruiser over there from somewhere... Ah, Jervis don't get involved with them! Ah, aaah! Jeez, you're so reckless!
893.H2200: It's 10 o'clock. Today was tiring. Admiral, every day must be hard for you. Eh, really? It's fun? ...Hmm, I guess it must be if you think so... Really?
893.H2300: It's 11 o'clock. Good work today. It will be nice if tomorrow is a good day too. See you. Good night.

516.Intro: Hello, I'm the destroyer leader, Tashkent. I've come from afar to meet you. Please look after me, Comrade Admiral.
516.Library: I'm from the Northern Country, the sky-blue cruiser, Tashkent. Mmm, yeah. I'm really classed as a destroyer. A destroyer leader. Well, I'm definitely bigger than your average destroyer. I worked hard in naval battles and as reinforcement for land battles. I'm pretty reliable. What do you think of the Sky-blue cruiser? Yup, great! Remember me alright? Thanks!
516.Poke(2): The sky-blue cruiser... Yeah, well, that's what they called me... It's kind of, a bit, embarrassing.
516.Poke(3): Ah, my deck? It's pretty spacious right? You can use it to transport lots of things. Want to take a look under it?
516.Idle: Comrade... Ah, he looks busy. Ah, Verniy! What is it? Oh, that looks fun! Thanks!
516.Married: What's wrong, Comrade? You look unwell. I know! I'll get you some Russian tea. Wait a moment.
516.Wedding: What's wrong, Comrade? You're acting strange. Why is your face red? Mmm, let me get a closer look. Yep, that's a really nice expression. I like it, let me look some more.
516.Ranking: Intelligence is important. That's always the case. Here.
516.Join: Destroyer leader, Tashkent, setting sail! Now, Comrade, shall we go?
516.Equip(1): Thanks! Thank you, Comrade. I think that was right?
516.Equip(2): Thank you very much! Aha, this is nice!
516.Docking(2): I'll need to go an get a proper repair. Sorry. It'll just be a little while... See you.
516.Construction: Good job! Isn't this good, Comrade?
516.Return: The fleet has returned, Comrade Admiral. Whew~
516.Sortie: Are you ready, Comrades? Alright, fleet flagship, Tashkent, sortieing!
516.Battle: Enemy ships... we have to do this. Battle stations! Let's go!
516.Yasen(1): You wish to witness my night battle? Alright. Let's charge in, Comrades! Hurrah!
516.MVP: Am I, the sky-blue cruiser, number one, Comrade? That makes me happy. Great!
516.Damaged(3): Forgive me, they got me. Sorry, Comrade. But, I'm not done yet!
516.Sunk: It looks like this is as far as the sky-blue cruiser goes, Comrade... Goodbye.
516.Friend41(1): Alright now. The Northern Union fleet will be supporting you! Are you ready, comrades? Alright! Hurrah!!
516.2@WhiteDay2018: Eh, this is for me? Sorry, no, thank you. I'm eating it... *nom* It's delicious. Not bad, Comrade. Yep.
516.2@Spring2018: What are you cooking, Verniy? Cherry blossom viewing? Cherry blossoms? I understand, I'll help too! We're making a lunch box? Great.
516.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations, Comrade Admiral! It's the fleet's 5th Anniversary? Nice. I'll make some borscht tonight. It's pretty tasty.
516.2@Rainy2018: Huh... "Teeribouzu"? Hmmm, so that's how you make them. Can you teach me to make them, Comrade Gangut? Thank you!
516.2@Saury2018: Saury? What's that? Ah, you're going fishing in the northern seas? I understand.
516.2@Fall2018: Hmmm, this is a nice mood. This country's autumn is great. The food is delicious too. Yummy!
516.3@LateFall2018: Gangut, if you stay under the kotatsu for too long you'll grow soft. Eh, is that so? ...I see...
516.2@Xmas2018: Merry Christmas! No, Comrade Gangut, you've had enough to drink. I swear you've had too much to drink. Ahaha.
516.2@NewYears2019: Happy Holidays! It's the New Year. Nice. Comrade Admiral, I'm counting on you this year too.
516.2@Setsubun2019: Settsubuun? That's a harsh festival. Gangut, the enemy is strong. Shall I back you up? Wh-whoaaaaaaa! That was amazing.
516.2@Valentines2019: Comrade Admiral, th-this is for you. That's right, it's just camaraderie, Admiral. Th-that's all this is!
516.3@Anniversary2019: Comrade Admiral, congratulations. Is it the fleet's 6th Anniversary? That's amazing. I'll treat you to some pirozhki tonight. Let's go.

395.Intro: Hello, I'm the destroyer leader, Tashkent. Please look after me today too, Comrade Admiral.
395.Poke(2): The sky-blue cruiser... Yeah, well, that's what they called me, Comrade Admiral... It's kind of, a bit, embarrassing. Really?
395.MVP: Am I, the sky blue cruiser, number one again, Comrade Admiral? No, it still makes me happy. Yup, it's great!

395.Friend44(2): Alriiight, good. We'll now support the Northern Combined Fleet. Comrades, are you ready?

561.Intro: I'm John C. Butler-class destroyer escort Samuel B. Roberts! Make sure to remember it! Ah, too long? Then "Sam" is fine, okay? Nice to meet you!
561.Library: I'm John C. Butler-class destroyer escort Samuel B. Roberts. I had a lotta sisters. We were really multi-purpose: convoy escort, anti-submarine patrols, and more! So, you see, that's why I was fighting to protect the escort carriers as part of Task Unit "Taffy 3". And with ships way bigger and stronger than I was. Be sure to remember me, okay? Thanks!
561.Poke(1): Did you call me? What is it?
561.Poke(3): What is it? Are you lonely? Okay! I'll keep you company. I'll do my best, really, just watch! Wahhh!
561.Idle: Oh, hi, Gambier Bay! What's the matter? Ah, that? If you want to do that, then do it here like this, and done! Huh? Alright, I guess I'll have to come with you. You sure need help a lot. Not that I mind!
561.Married: Hmm? Are you tired? Ah, okay, then... would gum be good? Okay! Oh, you don't need it? What? What's wrong? Okay, could you lie down for a sec? Theeere!
561.Wedding: Huh? What, enemies!? W-Where? Oh, it's you? You really surprised me! What's the matter, Admiral? Oh, me? Yeah, I'm fine... you're being weird. You're giving this? Later? Ohh? Later is fine. I think? Ehehe. Thanks a lot!
561.Ranking: Information? That's important! I'll get it for you, okay?
561.Join: Samuel B. Roberts, heading out! Now then, let's hang in there with the escorting today too!
561.Equip(2): Ah, nice! I'm glad to have this.
561.Supply: Thanks! Torpedoes too, please! I'll be using them!
561.Docking(1): Sorry! I'll get fixed up right away!
561.Docking(2): Oh, my bad! Sorry, I'll be on leave for a bit!
561.Sortie: Taffy 3, weigh anchor! Mind if I take point?
561.Battle: Target in sight! Is it finally time? I'll do my best!
561.Yasen(1): We're charging in! That's fine, right!?
561.MVP: Eh? Me? I, I see! I did it again? But I guess being praised does make me glad. Thanks!
561.Damaged(3): Ahhhh! I, I can keep going! One more shot!
561.Sunk: Getting shot this much, I... it hurts. It's so cold... everyone, Admiral... bye... bye...
561.2@Rainy2018: Aaah... So this is the season called "Tsuyu"? I've heard lots about it! I want to go buy a nice umbrella too. Ah, Yamato's is nice!
561.2@Summer2018: Eh, what's "On Ice"? What's this about ice? Eh, what? What kind of fleet mobilization is this?
561.2@Saury2018: Saury? A Saury Festival! Yup, I'll work hard too! Off I go! Can I use a Hedgehog? ...Eh, I can't? Re-really?
561.2@Fall2018: Well, autumn is a bit...you know... My body just feels so restless... How do I say it... Eh, have a sweet potato and calm down? ...Ah, yes! *nom*...*nom*...*nom*...*nom*... It's delicious.
561.2@Xmas2018: Merry Christmas! John, this is delicious! It's gotta be turkey alright! Yep, yep! ...Eh, Gamby, what is it? ...Behind me? Ah, above me? ...WHOAA!!
561.2@NewYears2019: Happy New Year! Look after me this year too. I'll be sure to protect you well!
561.2@Setsubun2019: Eh? Setsubuun? What is "buun" supposed to mean? ...Take this set of beans, hold it like this, and throw it like that? Ah, Kongou, here I come! SettsuuuuBUUUN! Huh?
561.2@Valentines2019: Uhihi, it's my special coffee-flavored chocolate. Admiral, make sure you savor it. Here, help yourself! Uhihi!
561.2@WhiteDay2019: Eh, this... is in return for the chocolates? Thanks! Ah, it's delicious. This is great. Ehehe.
561.2@Spring2019: It's spring! I definitely kinda like spring. It was the season that I debuted in after all. Eh, a Taffy 3 party? "Ohanami"? OK, I'll come along!
561.3@Summer2019: It's getting hot again this year. Everyone... Ah, I see. Swimsuits...
561.4@Summer2019: I bought one. A swimsuit! H-how do I look? I don't look strange? Really!? No problems?

681.Yasen(1): Prepare to fire torpedoes! We're charging in! That's fine, right!?
681.H0000: Sam'll be doing it today! Secretary ship yeoman, ready to go! Leave it to me! Even if I look like this... hya! No problem... o-okay!?
681.H0100: It is one now. Uhm, these documents go here... ahh, so sleepy...
681.H0200: It is two now. Aren't you sleepy, Admiral? Really?
681.H0300: It is three now. Can I have some coffee? Ah, thanks. Admiral, this, it's delicious and sweet.
681.H0400: It's four now. Yaaawn. It's almost morning, right? Yaaawn.
681.H0500: Good morning, Admiral! It's five now! Morning's here!
681.H0600: It is six now. There's nothing like a cup of hot coffee in the morning. I- ah, ahhh! No, no problem!

681.H2300: It is eleven now. Thanks for all your hard work today! Make sure to rest when you get the chance! Let's work hard again tomorrow!

596.Intro: Thank you for your hard work. The nameship of the Fletcher-class destroyers, Fletcher, reporting for duty. A mother? Oh no, that's not... I'll try my best to be of use to everyone!
596.Library: I'm the nameship of the most successful mass produced destroyers, the Fletcher-class destroyers, USS Fletcher. I have more than 170 sisters. We're definitely the default standard. We were even deployed to the Japanese Maritime Self-Defense Force afterwards.
596.Poke(1): Did you happen to call the Lucky 13?
596.Poke(2): This net? Yes, it's very useful. If you use it like this...
596.Poke(3): Wh~at? Who~ is it? Jenkins? Ah, Admir...No, Admiral, what's the matter? A sortie? Ah, these documents? I finished these earlier.
596.Idle: My sisters? Yes... I've never even met some of them... well... yes. There's easily over a hundred of them.
596.Married: Are you tired? Would you like some sweets to relieve you? I'll prepare some delicious pancakes and coffee.
596.Wedding: Engagement ring? Really? I... I love you so much...
596.Join: 1st ship of the Fletcher-class destroyers, Fletcher, sortieing.
596.Equip(2): Thank you so much! I'll try it out!
596.Supply: Supply has been completed. Thank you very much.
596.Docking(1): I'm sorry... I'll fall back for now.
596.Docking(2): Admiral, I'm very sorry. This body is going to need repairs.

596.2@Fall2019: This country has so many traditional festivals in Autumn. It's so very interesting. Ah, what's that?
596.2@Saury2019: I was secretly waiting for this moment. The Saury Festival! Now my net can be put to good use. Eh, it's not the right equipment?

692.Intro: Thank you for your hard work. The nameship of the Fletcher-class destroyers, Fletcher, reporting for duty. Admiral, I'll do my best to help everyone today as well.

692.H2200: It's 10 o'clock. How were the pancakes? I'm pretty good at making them! That's good!
692.H2300: It's 11 o'clock. Admiral, great work today... Good night...

562.Intro: Hi! I'm USS Johnston of the Fletcher-class! I'm going to be a fighting ship. That means I'll keep on fighting until I run out of shells! Once again... I'll protect all of you!

562.Docking(2): Oh no! Ah! Don't peek! Blegh!

562.2@Summer2019_2: Summer here is hot... Well, I should be fine dressed like this... H-hey you, don't stare at me so much. ...Hmm?

689.H1100: Elevensies. Mmm~ this iced tea is good! Thanks! Uh... eh? Kongou!? Th-Thank you.

689.H1400: It is tw... Oh! Sam! Hi! You doing well? I'm doing great, of course. Like always!
689.H1500: It is three. Yeah... as part of Taffy 3, Sam and Hoel both fought well. Of course, I did my best too!
689.H1600: It is four. Hi Yukikaze! You always seem so cheerful. Aren't you... cold, wearing that? No?

689.H2300: It is eleven. You did well today too. Sleep well. Ah, good night! See you tomorrow!

517.Intro:
Shimushu-class Kaiboukan, first ship, Shimushusu!
Commander, you can leave the coastal defense to me-su!
I'm a coastal defense ship that protects the seasu!
517.Library:
Built for the sake of coastal defense duties such as protecting the northern fisheries, I'm the small-type Kaiboukan, first shipsu!

I was named for Shimushu, the northernmost of the Kuril Islandsu! My military duties were for the sake of protecting things like fisheries and fishermen, so even though my body was small, I had a really important jobsu! When the fighting became fierce, I put my all into fleet escorts like anti-submarine patrolsu.

Once everything was over, I took everyone home. It was my really important jobsu! Shimushu— that's a name you should definitely remembersu!

...!

...Shu?

517.2@Xmas2017: Merry Christmashu! Commander, have you eaten anything-su? Make sure you eat lots-su! And of course, there's a lot of liqour too-shu!

518.Intro: I'm the 2nd ship of the Shimushu-class Kaiboukan, Kunashiri. What was that, that's wrong. That's it, you can call me Kuna if you like.
518.Library:
I'm the 2nd ship of the Shimushu-class Kaiboukan, Kunashiri. Leave protecting the north to me.
Eh, I look a bit plain? What!? You know I had the important duty of patrolling Hitokappu Bay before that sortie.
I protected all sorts of important places like the Kuril Islands, the La Pérouse Strait, and the Tsugaru Strait​ while based in Oominato. Hey, are you listening?
In the end I worked very, very hard on important things. Although I did cause a little bit of trouble for Kamikaze, I did my best!
518.Poke(2): Eh, you mistook me for Shimushu? Huh!? What's that? I'm leaving!

518.Wedding: A transport mission to the north? An evacuation? Guarding the straits? *sigh* Having so many things to do is troublesome! Commander, aren't you giving me too much work? Eh, what's this? A reward? For me? Is... that so... Eh?

518.2@Saury2017: You're really excited about anything to do with the fishing industry, nee-san. Is it in your blood? Eh, me? I'm, well, I don't dislike it...

584.Intro: Ah, me? I'm Hachijou. Yes, the Shimushu-class coastal defense ship. Hachi? Hmmm, well, that's fine. I'll let you call me that. Nice to meet you.

From Oominato to Chishima to Paramushir, just leave it all to me! I really did my best. But, I couldn't win against planes. My final moments were in Maizuru, but I don't dislike that city.... Admiral, take care of me.

585.Intro: I'm the Shimushu-class coastal defense ship, Ishigaki. What? Is there something on my face? ...Oh, alright then. Leave destroying submarines to me. I'm serious.
585.Library: I'm the Shimushu-class coastal defense ship, Ishigaki. I've come to defend the Northern Seas. I was stationed in Oominato and Paramushir where I performed escort, anti-submarine patrol, security, and rescue duties for the Northern Fleet. Enemy submarines are a nuisance, we must sink them when we can. I'll do my best. Please watch over me.
585.Poke(1): What is it? I'm, not really... Actually, it's nothing.
585.Poke(2): Am I of use to you? I see.
585.Poke(3): You have something you want to say to me? Admiral, okay, take my hand. Now close your eyes. What do you see? Eh? Nothing? It's warm? Huh?
585.Idle: Take this hand and... no. Um, Admiral, this hand, this isn't right. This is tough. Ah, Hachi-neesan? N-no! It's not like that!
585.Married: There are no problems in particular. You don't need to worry so much. But it makes me a little happy.
585.Wedding: You don't look so good. Shall I prepare some tea? Please rest. I'll watch over you. I will...
585.Ranking: You want to know, right? I'll bring it here.
585.Equip(1): It'll be nice if this has a purpose.
585.Equip(2): This might just work, or not.
585.Sortie: I'm the flagship? That's fine. Okay, follow me.
585.Battle: I have no intention of losing. Bring it on!
585.Yasen(1): We'll press the attack. I won't let you get away!
585.Damaged(2): That won't do anything to me.
585.Damaged(3): It hurts! But this won't defeat me!
585.Sunk: Hahaa... I'm sinking? Fine then... I'll... just go... back to... Oominato...
585.2@Rainy2019: Hachi-neesan? Is that...me? Oh... I see... That's how it is... Hahhh... Why?
585.2@Fall2019: It's autumn... Alright. I feel motivated for some reason. I'll do my best. I feel like I won't lose. Humph.
585.2@Saury2019: Supporting the saury fishing? I'll do it then. Please allow me to be your pilot through the Northern seas. I'll do my best.

379.Intro: I'm the Shimushu-class coastal defense ship, Ishigaki. What? Is there something on my face? ...Oh, alright then. I want to protect the fleet, and you. Please leave it to me.
379.Join: 2nd Maritime Escort Fleet, Ishigaki, heading out.
379.Sortie: I'm the flagship? Understood, leave it to me. Sortieing fleet. I will protect everyone.

524.Intro: Commander, good morning! I'm the 1st ship of the Etorofu-class Kaiboukan, Etorofu. I'll do my best today too.
524.Library:
I'm the first ship of the Etorofu-class Kaiboukan, Etorofu. I'm an improved version of my seniors, the Shimushu-class. My engine power and depth charge equipment were improved.
A lot of my sisters were sent to be fleet escorts. Even though not a lot of us were left fighting at the end, we protected the home waters to the last.
Even after the battle was over, I kept doing my best.
524.Poke(2): I'll fulfill my duties as a coastal defense ship!
524.Poke(3): What's wrong Commander? Fleet escort? Guarding the strait? I'm ready anytime! Eh, that's not it?
524.Idle: Commander, I know you're busy with work but... your room is... It can't be helped, I'll clean it up for you alright? Ah Admiral, where does this camera go? Eh? Since it's out you want to take a picture together? Ah, yes... Umm, later can I get a copy too?
524.Wedding: Commander, you've got to clean up your room once in a while... I'll clean it up nicely for you today alright? Ummm... huh? What's this? Commander, what is this? Eh, it's... for me? Eh... Oh... Umm....
524.Married: Commander, I'm always cleaning your room... Ah, this photo... You decorated it. Ehe, I'm happy. Thanks, Commander.
524.Ranking: You want the report. Please wait a while. I'll get it!
524.Docking(1): Sorry, I'll be in the bath a while.
524.Docking(2): I'll be in the bath a little while longer... Yes, I'll be out as soon as I can!
524.Return: The fleet has returned safely. Everyone, thanks for your hard work!
524.Sortie: First Naval Escort Squadron, Etorofu, sortieing! Everyone, follow me!
524.Battle: We've found the enemy. Be careful everyone!
524.Yasen(2): I'm not going to let you do whatever you want on this sea!
524.Yasen(1): Let's charge in! Everyone, follow me.
524.MVP: I'm number one you say!? Is that so. I'm grateful! I'll put in even more effort and work hard to protect our sea!
524.Damaged(2): Ugh... But, I'm not done yet!
524.Damaged(3): Aaaaaah! How's the engine room? It's fine? I'm... I'm really not done yet!
524.Sunk: It's cold... I... That's right... Ah... I'm sorry everyone... I couldn't protect you...
524.2@Rainy: It's raining, isn't it... Commander, at times like this, I think it'd be good to make some teru teru bozu. Do you want to make them with me? Hand made teru teru bozu, look! It's cute!
524.2@EarlySummer: Summer is getting closer again this year, huh? ...Lots of memories are coming back to me. But, this time I'll work hard together with everyone!
524.2@Fall2017: I'll help you with the festival preparations, Commander!
524.2@Saury2017: Please give me the duty of supporting the saury fishing! Yes!
524.2@LateFall2017: It's getting colder. I'll get the kotatsu out, alright?
524.2@Xmas2017: Mmmmm! Commander, this cake, it's totally delicious!
524.2@YearsEnd2017: Coastal defense ships, let's do our best to clean up the Naval Base too! Yeah!
524.2@NewYears2018: Commander, have a Happy New Year!
524.2@Setsubun2018: It's Setsubun, I'll do my best. Come on everyone, you too!
524.2@WhiteDay2018: Thank you very much, Commander! I'll savour these!
524.2@Spring2018: All of us coastal defense ships are going cherry blossom viewing! You're welcome too, Commander.

383.Poke(3): What's wrong Commander? Guarding the strait? A blockade? Fleet escort? I'm ready anytime! Eh, that's not it?
383.Sortie: 104th Squadron, Etorofu, sortieing! Follow me everyone!

525.Intro: I'm the Kaiboukan, Matsuwa ...Ummm, Etorofu-chan...I'll do my best!
525.Library:
I'm the Kaiboukan, Matsuwa.
I was constructed to be an improved type of the Shimushu-class escort ships, and was assigned to be under the fleet of the Sasebo naval district. My duties were mainly fleet escorts and worked with the anti-submarine fleet.
In order to reduce the damage of the fleets, I fought with enemy submarines...but, I'm really afraid of them...
525.Poke(3): I'm the younger sister of Etorofu-oneech---eh? Shimushu-chan? Ummm...ah...I'm sorry. I don't know.
525.Idle: Commander~! Ummm...! Ah! You seem busy...um. Commander, I'll...be waiting, right here!
525.Married: Ah, umm! Commander! Here's tea! Ah, hot! Uuu~, I'm sorry! I'll clean it right now...umm...
525.Wedding: What is it Etorofu-chan... Eh? The commander...? Wants to see mee...? Did I make a big mistake? Ah, um! Etorofu-chan! I'm sorry, but can you come wit-...eh? You can't!? No way~!
525.Ranking: The report? Hold on just one moment please.
525.Equip(3): Enemy subs? Phew~, guess it wasn't.
525.Construction: Looks like a new ship...is waiting for you!
525.Return: We somehow got back safely! Phew~
525.Sortie: First maritime escort fleet, Matsuwa... is sortieing!
525.Attack: I-I'm sorry! Please don't come here!
525.Yasen(1): I'm charging in! Everyone, follow me!
525.Damaged(2): No! Where did it come from?
525.Sunk: I'm scared...! I'm scared..! I'm scared! Save me, Commander!
525.2@Fall2017: The... Autumn Festival is wonderful. I'll get my yukata too, Etorofu-chan. Please wait for me.
525.2@Saury2017: Saury is delicious! Thank you, Isokaze-san. It's a bit bitter, but... it's delicious!
525.2@LateFall2017: It's gotten a bit colder. A-are you taking out the kotatsu, Etorofu-chan? I'll help too. Whoa... It's heavy...
525.2@Xmas2017: Christmas, it's so nice, isn't it? I like it a lot .... Oh, Etorofu, have some cake...here. .....Admiral, you too!
525.2@YearsEnd2017: O-souji. Commander, that place might be a little too high for me to reach. I'll clean here, like this, wipe it down, and scrub it...
525.2@NewYears2018: Commander, have a Happy New Year! I... I hope you'll look after me again this year... uhm...
525.2@Setsubun2018: Etorofu-chan, I...I can't throw it! I'm sorry, I just can't!
525.2@Valentines2018: Umm, th-this is for you... Commander, Etorofu-chan! I...I made it myself.
525.2@WhiteDay2018: Are these for me? Th-thank you very much. I'm happy.
525.2@Spring2018: It's spring. The cherry blossoms are beautiful. The coastal defense ships are having a cherry blossom viewing, Etorofu? Yes, I'll make some food, then.
525.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations on the 5th Anniversary, Commander. I'll celebrate too. Hawawa.
525.2@Rainy2018: It's raining. I'll make a teruteru bouzu too, Etorofu-chan. Just like this... I-it's cute!
525.2@Summer2018: I don't... I don't... like... summer. I'm scared. ...Sorry.
525.3@LateFall2018: It's cold. Etorofu, are you alright? Don't catch a cold... Re-really?

531.Intro: I'm the 3rd ship of the Etorofu-class Kaiboukan, Sado-sama! Nice. To. Meet. You. Commander!
531.Library: I'm the 3rd ship of the Etorofu-class coastal defense ships, Sado. I did my very best to stop submarines from dominating the seas as part of the 1st Surface Escort Division. I worked alongside Matsuwa, Hiburi and Taiyou-san too. But protecting the 1st Fleet was really difficult. I'll protect them properly this time. Nice to meet you!
531.Poke(2): Ehe, what's up? Is it my turn now?
531.Poke(3): Eto, Matsu, what are you doing? Ehe, that tickles. Oh? You want to play with me, Commander? Sounds good.
531.Idle: What, what, what do you want with me? You've gotten quite a big head, huh, Commander? Honestly... wait, it couldn't be that this is how you always are? Hehehe.
531.Married: What's wrong, Commander? You tired? That's weak. Can't be helped then, want me to give you a piggyback ride? Heheh.
531.Wedding: Co-man-der! What've you got there? Hehe. Could that be a present for me? Then give it here! Come on, hurry up... Oh...Umm... This makes me...pretty happy, actually...
531.Ranking: Ah, right, the intelligence. Just wait.
531.Join: 1st Surface Escort Division, Sado, setting sail. Let's go!
531.Equip(2): This is it! This is what I've been waiting for! Alright!
531.Docking(1): Sorry, gonna take a short break.
531.Docking(2): Urrrgh, I'm going to take a short nap... Good night!
531.Construction: A new one has been completed!
531.Return: Ehe, I've returned to port. All's well that ends well!
531.Sortie: Eto, Matsu, don't fall behind. Sweeper Squad, it's our turn!
531.Battle: Ehe, found you. Let's do this.
531.Yasen(1): Night, huh... I don't like it one bit. Let's give it a shot!
531.MVP: Whoa, me? I'm number one? Hehe... Too bad for you. How's that, Eto, Matsu?
531.Damaged(3): Oh boy... This is bad. Stop that! You really need to stop that!
531.Sunk: It's cold... I'm going under again... It's cold... It's lonely... I don't want... to...
531.2@Xmas2017: Christmas, it's great. Love it, love it! Oh, Matsu, give Sado-sama some of that cake. Oooh, so good! It's really great!
531.2@YearsEnd2017: Matsu, you seen to be pretty excited about cleaning. Heheh, you must really like this kind of thing. Sado-sama's gonna skip out for a bit.
531.2@NewYears2018: Co-man-der! Happy New Year! Take care of Sado-sama this year too, kay? I'm countin' on you!
531.2@Setsubun2018: Argh! What's with you Tsushi? Did you forget it's Setsubun, what are you waiting for? Matsu, what's with you acting like such a wuss? Throw it like this!
531.2@Valentines2018: Hehe, I learned how to make chocolate from Hayasui! Now, let's do this! Just wait and see, Commander!
531.2@WhiteDay2018: Wait wait wait, you're giving me a gift in return for the chocolates? I love it! That's great! Thanks!
531.2@Spring2018: We're having a cherry blossom viewing, Eto? I really love things like that! Matsu's cooking is so good~ You're coming too, right, Commander? Ehehe~
531.2@Rainy2018: Ah, Tsusshi is making some strange commotion. W-what? Looks like it's something really serious. What!?
531.2@Saury2018: What are you up to, Asakaze? Eh, preparing to support saury fishing? I see. Eh, you want me to do it too? Well okay...

385.Intro: I'm the 3rd ship of the Etorofu-class Kaiboukan that just got stronger, Sado-sama! Let's have a good day, Commander! Heheh.
385.Join: It's time for the 1st Surface Escort Division and me to take the stage. Let's go!
385.Attack: Matsu, Hibu, just watch me! Kick their asses!
385.MVP: Ah, me? I'm number one? Hehe... Hey... Taiyou, Hayasui, just watch me. This time I'll protect you. This time for sure.

540.Intro: The Etorofu-class Kaiboukan, Tsushima, has arrived. I'll put this body made for defending the Southern Corridor to good use. Just wait and see.
540.Library: I'm the 7th ship of the Etorofu-class Kaiboukan, Tsushima. I was born for the sake of defending the Southern Corridor. I escorted fleets between mainland Japan and Singapore. After that Corridor got too dangerous, I protected the Corridor between Taiwan's and Japan's seas. After the fighting was over, I worked repatriating everyone.
540.Poke(3): The Southern Corridor is full of dangers. The Naval Base is... full of dangers too? Ufufu.
540.Idle: *yawn*... Hu-huh, Ukuru? Ah, I made a mistake. Whew, just a mistake. Fufu, ufufufu.
540.Married: I'm right here, Commander. Ah, you want to lie on my lap? Well, I-I got no choice then. Here.
540.Wedding: Eh...this ring is for me?  Thank you...so much, Commander. I'll never ever forget this. This day, this moment. I'm so happy.
540.Ranking: You want... to see it? Okay, then. Here.
540.Equip(1): There are lots of dangerous things. I have lots of depth charges, though. Ufufu.
540.Equip(3): What do you mean? I see.
540.Docking(2): That's right, I need to hurry with the repairs... I need to hurry or I won't make it in time.
540.Sortie: Whew, 1st Surface Escort Division, Tsushima, heading out.
540.Yasen(2): There are a lot of dangers here. Take that!
540.MVP: Whew... Me? I... see. I'm glad I was able to be of use. Ufufu, ufufufufu.
540.Damaged(2): I don't... I don't like this.
540.Damaged(3): Oh no....is my stern still properly attached?
540.Sunk: So this is... this is... what they call 'sinking'? ...It's... dark... and cold... I can't... see anything...
540.2@Xmas2017: Christmas in Singapore is so much fun. Fufu, fufufu. Commander, Merry Christmas.
540.2@YearsEnd2017: Ukuru-chan, Daitou-chan, I know already. The end of year cleaning, right? Sweeping... here I go.
540.2@NewYears2018: Commander, the New Year's begun... I hope...you have... a happy one.  This year ple...please...umm...
540.2@Setsubun2018: But, we didn't have Setsubun in Taiwan. Oh, SetsuBUn? I have even less a clue what that is.
540.2@Valentines2018: I'll give you this, just this once, Commander. Ah, umm, because I won't lose.
540.2@WhiteDay2018: This is? You did, Commander? Th-than...thank you very much. I'm happy.
540.2@Spring2018: It's spring, Commander. Eh, the 100th Squadron and Surface Escort Division are having a cherry blossom viewing? That's nice.
540.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations, Commander. I congratulate you on the 5th Anniversary. *sigh*
540.2@Rainy2018: My body has been feeling really... strange lately. Commander, shall we... shall we go to Taiwan? ...Ah, we can't.
540.2@Summer2018: Daitou? Ah, that's good. Eh, a swimsuit? I don't have anything like that though... Eh?
540.2@Saury2018: The saury fisheries? Yes, it's the season for them to appear along the route... Ah, they won't? I need to equip a searchlight?
540.2@LateFall2018: This is the season when I couldn't follow Kashi to the end... During the air raids... it was already...

386.Intro: The Etorofu-class Kaiboukan, Tsushima, has arrived. I'll protect the Southern and Taiwanese Corridors. I'll do my best to not lose with this body of mine.
386.Idle: *yawn*... Hu-huh, Ukuru? Ah, I made a mistake. Just a wrong guess. Ufu, ufufufu.

565.Intro: One of the Etorofu-class coastal defense ships, Fukae, arriving on station. I won't lose, Commander. I won't.
565.Library: I'm the Etorofu-class coastal defense ship, Fukae. I was born near Yokosuka in Uraga. The tide of war was already turning when I entered service... but I did my best at whatever I could do. After the war, I was assigned elsewhere. I wanted to do even more work. I'm counting on you, Commander.
565.Poke(1): Did you call me? Reporting as requested.
565.Poke(3): Whoa... The Seikan Ferry is... Everyone in Oominato is... Aaah... It's just a dream... I won't let them down this time. This time I'll make these seas peaceful...
565.Idle: I'm worried about Hachinohe. I'm leaving the rest to you, Inagi. Protect the ships, the city, and the people. Please.
565.Married: Is this alright, Commander? Selling oil here. Well, we'll be left with nothing if you sell it all. What? You kept a stockpile?
565.Wedding: What's wrong? Did you spot a problem with my equipment? So you didn't. I see. You must be tired, Commander. Fine then, I'll lend you my lap. It's a bit small but take a short rest. Yeah.
565.Ranking: Ah, intelligence? Wait a minute, I'll... Ugh... I... I can't reach it...
565.Join: 2nd Surface Escort Division, Fukae, sortieing! I'll protect everyone.
565.Equip(2): Alright, I'll get them with this. I'm heading out again!
565.Equip(3): I think this will do. It should work.
565.Supply: The resupply helps. I'm heading out again so wait for me.
565.Docking(1): Oh no, they got me. I'll get fixed so just wait.
565.Docking(2): Urggh... No, I'm not holding it in. Ouch... I'll get fixed out properly and head back out so just wait.
565.Construction: A new ship has been commissioned.
565.Return: The fleet has safely returned to port. Thank goodness.
565.Sortie: Coastal defense ship, Fukae, setting sail!
565.Battle: The enemy. No choice then. We'll intercept.
565.Yasen(2): Don't let the enemies close! Fire!
565.Yasen(1): It's night. It's not one of my strengths. But, I'll give it a shot.
565.MVP: I see, I'm... Ehe, I feel like I can do more... and protect more... I still haven't...
565.Damaged(2): Aaah! Tch! This... doesn't... hurt at all!
565.Damaged(3): I won't lose! There's no way I can! I still haven't...!
565.Sunk: So this... is sinking... under the sea... to the bottom... I see... this... is...
565.2@Rainy2018: Ah, it's raining... It's been pouring recently. "Shimushusussu", what's that? It's not a teruteru bouzu. Is it some sort of new decoy? It's not? Ehe, don't get mad.
565.2@Summer2018: Etorofu-neesan, Tsushima-neesan is being a bit... well... you know... Eh, it's fine? Really? ...Is that how things are here?
565.2@Saury2018: Saury fishing support? Leave it to me. After all, Oominato and the northern seas is my base. I'll work hard. First I'll need...a light!
565.2@Fall2018: This atmosphere is good. To tell the truth, I don't mind these occasions, Etorofu-neesan. This festival is nice.
565.2@Xmas2018: Hmm, so this thing called "Christmas" is a festival? It's pretty. Shimushushushu, what's that? ...I see.
565.2@NewYears2019: Commander, and everyone from Oominato, Happy New Year. I'm counting on you this year too. I'll keep protecting everyone. Yep.
565.2@Valentines2019: Commander, I guess this is customary. This is for you. Yup, that's right. Ah, it's not very sweet. Sorry.
565.2@WhiteDay2019: Is this a return gift? Even in times like these... Thank you, Commander. I'm kinda happy.
565.2@Spring2019: Is it spring? It's a nice season. The sakura are beautiful... Are the Etorofu-class having a cherry blossom viewing? Great. I want to come too! Ah!

685.Intro: One of the Etorofu-class coastal defense ships, Fukae, reporting for duty again today. I won't lose, Commander. Yep, I won't.
685.Poke(1): Did you call me? Yup, I'm here. Leave it to me.
685.Join: Assigned to Oominato Guard District, 104th Squadron, sortieing! I'll definitely protect everyone.
685.MVP: I see, I'm... But it's still not enough. I feel like can do more and protect more. I still... still haven't...

551.Intro: 1st ship of the Hiburi-class Kaiboukan, Hiburi. The Hiburi-class is reporting for duty, Admiral. We'll do our best!
551.Library: I'm the 1st ship of the Hiburi-class coastal defense ships, Hiburi! Yes, because we were in very troubled times... the ability to be mass produced was prioritised, and I was built from blueprints with a lot of straight lines. But, I'm definitely not lacking in armament! Be it ASW, escorting, or minesweeping; the Hiburi-class will do their best! Please look after me!
551.Poke(2): An escort mission? Leave it to me. I'll work hard.
551.Poke(3): Stop messing around, Daitou. Ah, Admiral. Yes! The depth charges are all calibrated properly. I'm ready at any time.
551.Idle: Admiral, umm, the code for the Hi-convoy is... Ah, that's right. I got it. What should I do? Should I reply?
551.Married: Is there anything for me to do, Admiral? An escort? An ASW sweep? Ah, I know! I'll make some tea first, alright? Please wait!
551.Wedding: Did you call me, Admiral? I'm here now. Ah, what is... this? Can I open it now? Eh? Do it... later? Roger that... Is this the usual reward? Eh? I'm happy. I'm very grateful for it. Now then!
551.Ranking: Yes! I'll bring all the intelligence to you!
551.Equip(2): This has made me stronger! I'll work even harder!
551.Equip(3): No trace... of enemy subs! Alright!
551.Supply: Thank you very much! I'll help myself!
551.Docking(1): Sorry, Admiral. Can I go take a short bath? I'll be right back!
551.Docking(2): Sorry, Admiral. I'll go take a short... uhm, a long... rest. But I'll be back as soon as I can!
551.Construction: A new ship has been commissioned. What sort of person is she?
551.Return: The fleet has returned, Admiral. I'm glad it was a safe voyage.
551.Sortie: Hi-convoy, Escort Group flagship, Hiburi, setting sail. Everyone, make sure to be on high alert for submarines. Let's go!
551.Battle: Be careful, everyone. The enemy has been detected. Escort fleet, increase speed and prepare for contact!
551.Yasen(2): Over here! I won't let you near the main fleet!
551.Yasen(1): We need to be careful of the night sea.
551.MVP: Eh, really? Me? Umm... thank you very much for the praise, Admiral. Hooray!
551.Sunk: So I'm sinking... again... Sacchan, Macchan... be careful... Don't... come here...
551.2@Spring2018: It's spring, Admiral! The 1st Surface Escort Division is having a cherry blossom viewing! Ecchan, Macchan, Sacchan, and... Oh yes, Dai-chan too... I'm ready to start the viewing!
551.2@Anniversary2018: Congratulations. It's the fleet's 5th Anniversary. On behalf of the Hiburi-class, I congratulate you.
551.2@Rainy2018: It's been pouring recently. It can't be helped since it's the rainy season. Dai-chan? Ah, depth charges are dangerous!
551.2@Summer2018: Sacchan, Macchan, it's gotten kinda hot this year too. We'll need to take care on summer nights or mornings... Sacchan?
551.2@Saury2018: It's the Naval Base Saury Festival, right? Leave it to the Hiburi-class. Let's get going, Dai-chan. What's with those depth charges? What are you going to do with them!?
551.2@LateFall2018: It's gotten a bit colder. But I'm fine! I'll work hard! Dai-chan too... Dai-chan? H-huh? Huuuh!?
551.2@Xmas2018: Christmas... this is what it's called, right? Isn't it great? I think that this festival is really nice. Yes!
551.2@NewYears2019: A very Happy New Year. Please take care of the Surface Escort Fleet this year too. Yes!
551.2@Setsubun2019: Ummm, the person playing the Oni for us in the Fleet Escort Division is... Ah, Taiyou. Well, excuse me. Here I come! Demon begone! There.
551.2@Valentines2019: Admiral, this is for you. Of course it's handmade. Ah, Dai-chan. Here, there's some for you too. Alright?
551.2@WhiteDay2019: This is... in return for the chocolates? Admiral, thank you very much! *nom*... It's delicious! Admiral, you're good at this.
551.3@Anniversary2019: Congratulations. I heard it's the fleet's 6th Anniversary. As the representative of the Hiburi-class, I offer you lots of my sincerest congratulations.

678.Intro: 1st ship of the Hiburi-class Kaiboukan, Hiburi. The Hiburi-class will do our very best today, Admiral.
678.Poke(1): An escort mission? Leave it to me! I'll work hard!
678.Poke(2): I'll go and make some tea now. Please wait.
678.Ranking: Yes, Admiral! I'll bring all the latest intelligence to you!
678.Docking(1): I'm... sorry, Admiral. Can I go take a short bath? I'll be back as soon as I can!
678.Yasen(1): We need to be very careful of the night sea.

552.Intro: I'm the 2nd ship of the Hiburi-class Kaiboukan, Daitou! Reporting for duty! So you're the Admiral. Hehe~! Great! Take care of me too. Now, let's get going!
552.Library: I'm the 2nd ship of the Hiburi-class Kaiboukan, Daitou! That's right, I had some rough times. I worked hard on surface escorts and minesweeping missions... Huh, what? Don't make that face. Admiral, safe seas are great, right? I like them too. So you know... Well, forget it. Just remember what I told you about me!
552.Poke(2): Ah, this? It's a depth charge. Ah, this? It's a depth charge too. They're my weapons for fighting those things.
552.Poke(3): *sigh*... Yeah, that's right, I've put a lot of thought into defending the seas. That still hasn't changed. It's my important duty. If I have to give a reason for it, it'd be "love". Right!
552.Idle: Hmm? Ah, a minesweeping story? Fine, I don't mind. It was an important mission back then, just like it is today. I wanted to pass a clean sea down to future generations. Hmm? Oi~, are you listening!?
552.Married: What, I don't really need to be babied. Ah... Oh... It's fine, I'm feeling fine.... Ehehe, you're nice.
552.Wedding: Huh, did you call me? You didn't? I see... What, if you have something to say, say it! Eh, what was that? Say it again, hey! One more time!
552.Ranking: Hmm? Intelligence? Well, I'll have to get it for you then. Is this fine?
552.Join: 1st Surface Escort Division, Daitou, sortieing now! Follow me!
552.Equip(2): Wow~ this is nice too, it really is!
552.Docking(1): I'm going to take a bath.
552.Docking(2): Tch... I'm all filthy and torn up. Dammit! Admiral, I'll be resting for a while. That's fine, right!?
552.Construction: Looks like some new girl's done.
552.Return: Whew~ the fleet has returned. Being in harbour feels good~ Somehow makes me feel relieved. Ehehe.
552.Sortie: I'll protect you! Fleet, weigh anchor! Keep a caaaareful watch on the sea and sky, everyone! Let's go!
552.Battle: It's the enemy. We gotta do this! Escort Division, forwards! Listen up, I'll protect you!
552.Attack: Not yet... Wait... Now, open fire! Fire!
552.Yasen(2): Don't underestimate me! I said I'd protect everyone, didn't I!
552.Yasen(1): *sigh*... Night, huh? Not like I have torpedoes. But, I'll still go. Are you ready, everyone? Fleet, increase speed, we're charging in!
552.MVP: Hmph, didn't I tell you not to underestimate the Kaiboukan? I did say I'd protect you. Heheh, right!
552.Damaged(3): Nooo! I told you to stop it! Just you wait, you bastards!
552.Sunk: Argh... Am I seriously falling in a place like this... I still have... so many things to do... after the fighting ends...
552.2@WhiteDay2018: Oh, oooh, that looks good, Ro-chan. Give me some too, Admiral... Ah, I see. Then, I'll do it next year!
552.2@Spring2018: A cherry blossom viewing? With the Escort Division? Nice. I'm counting on you for delicious food, Hibu~ This is going to be fun~
552.2@Anniversary2018: Oh, the 5th Anniversary. Amazing. Let me praise you. There, there! Well, now that we've reached this point, let's try for the 6th Anniversary. Alright?
552.2@Rainy2018: Gaaah, jeez, you're annoying, Hibu. It's fine. I'm bored since it's the rainy season. Right, Admiral? Right, right!?
552.2@Summer2018: Ehe, it's gotten hot this year too! This is definitely the time for swimsuits! What do you think of this, Hibu? Ah, what's with that look?
552.2@Saury2018: The Saury Festival, huh... It's my turn to shine! I'm going to use these depth charges I'm so proud of...! Huh, why are you stopping me, Hibu? Why!?
552.2@LateFall2018: Aaah, it's cold! Well, it's better than winter in Hokkaido... Ah, a kotatsu! Aaaah, this is great... I'll become a useless coastal defense ship... Aaaah...
552.2@Xmas2018: Hibu, this is delicious! What is it? Ah, Ro-chan, what is that? ...Ahaa, this is tasty too! This Christmas thing is great!
552.2@NewYears2019: Happy New Year! Admiral, Hibu, Happy New Year! Oh, Happy New Year to you too, Ro-chan! Look after me this year too!
552.2@Setsubun2019: Ah, really? That carrier? Then I won't hold back!
552.2@Valentines2019: Ooh, Hibu, you're giving me chocolate! Thanks. Are you giving me some too, Admiral? Just kidding! Here, this is from me.
552.2@WhiteDay2019: Oh, ooooh, a return gift. Nice. Whoa, is it handmade? Mm! Delish! Something like sushi would be fine for next year, you know.
552.3@Anniversary2019: Oooh, it's the 6th Anniversary! Seriously? That's amazing. Now then... Well, we can't help it. How about we try aiming for the 7th Anniversary instead. Well?

679.Intro: 2nd ship of the Hiburi-class Kaiboukan, Daitou! I'm right here! Hehe, you're looking good, Admiral, isn't that great! Now, let's get going!
679.Poke(2): Ah, this? It's a depth charge. Ah, this? It's a depth charge too. They're my means of fighting those things. Want one?
679.Join: 101st Escort Squadron, Daitou, sortieing! Follow me!
679.Damaged(2): Ouch... goddammit! This really pisses me off!

611.Intro: I'm the 1st ship of the Mikura-class coastal defense ships, Mikura. Reporting for duty. Admiral, the Mikura-class will be in your care. I may be small, but I'll try to do my best.
611.Library: I'm the 1st ship of the Mikura-class coastal defense ships, Mikura. We're an improved version of the Etorofu-class that are more easily produced with better anti-air and anti-submarine capabilities. Although manpower was reduced, we still increased the fighting power of the fleet escorts. Please remember the fight of the Mikura-class, the successors to the Etorofu-class.
611.Poke(1): Coastal defense ship, Mikura, arriving on station.
611.Poke(2): Fighting is... difficult. But I won't... back down.
611.Poke(3): I don't believe there was an error in the Hi-convoy strategy. Our communications and codes were bad... but even then, we still did our best with our jobs. I believe that this won't happen again.
611.Idle: What should I do? The threat of enemy submarines and aircraft will keep on increasing. The maritime escort missions are important. We must do what we can. Wouldn't it... wouldn't it be nice if there came a day when the fighting would end?
611.Married: Admiral, you look tired. Even if it's just a little while, won't you rest? Have some tea. I'm here, so please rest.
611.Wedding: Admiral, did you call me? What did you need me for at this time? Eh, for me? Surely you're joking, please stop that. ...You're not? ...You truly feel this way? ...Umm... Umm... Thank you very much. I'm happy you feel this way.
611.Ranking: You want information? That's important. Please wait.
611.Join: 1st Maritime Escort Division, Mikura, sortieing. All ships, please follow me.
611.Docking(1): Please forgive me, I got damaged.
611.Docking(2): I've received a major injury on my arm. I'll enter the docks and get a major repair.
611.Construction: A newly built ship has been commissioned.
611.Return: The fleet has returned to port. Whew, I'm back.
611.Sortie: Mikura-class coastal defense ship, Mikura, weighing anchor. Fleet, forwards! Let's sortie.
611.Yasen(1): A night battle? It's not one of my duties, but I'll do it.
611.MVP: So does this mean I was useful to everyone? That's something to be happy about. I'll keep on doing my best.
611.Damaged(2): Waaah! Begin fire control where the shell landed.
611.Damaged(3): Gah, no matter how strong the enemy is... I'll... I'll never lose! I'll fight to the end!
611.Sunk: I can't go on... So this is... where I'll fall... Admiral, everyone... please... stay safe... I'll... I'll...
611.Friend45(1): The reinforced 102nd Squadron has arrived at the operation area. We'll now support the allied forces. Let's go, charge!
611.2@Fall2019: It's autumn. The Naval District Autumn Festival is nice. Very nice. It's... it's the return of peacetime. I'm happy. *sigh* I'll have something to eat too. What should I have... Aha, *nom*... Ah, it's delicious!
611.2@Saury2019: Supporting saury fishing and protecting the fisheries is important. I'll sortie. Please wait a minute while I ready my equipment.

616.Intro: I'm the 1st ship of the Mikura-class coastal defense ships, Mikura. On alert. Admiral, please continue to care for the coastal defense ships and the Maritime Escort Division. I'll continue to give my best.
616.Poke(2): Everyone... believes in the future. Of course I do too.
616.Join: 102nd Squadron, Mikura, sortieing. All ships, please follow me.
